GV02pncvbr1u:0: (PB 1.1.1) oṃ mahan me voco bhargo me voco yaśo me vocaḥ stomaṃ me voco bhuktiṃ me vocaḥ sarvaṃ me vocas tan māvatu tan māviśatu tena bhukṣiṣīya
GV02pncvbr1u:1: (PB 1.1.2) devo devam etu somaḥ somam etv ṛtasya pathā
GV02pncvbr1u:3: (PB 1.1.4) badvā nāmasi sṛtiḥ somasaraṇī somaṃ gameyam
GV02pncvbr1u:4: (PB 1.1.5) pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūḥ pitaro bhūḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:6: (PB 1.1.7) mṛdā śithirā devānāṃ tīrthaṃ vedir asi mā mā hiṃsīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:7: (PB 1.1.8) viṣṇoḥ śiro 'si yaśodhā yaśo mayi dhehi
GV02pncvbr1u:9: (PB 1.2.1) yunajmi te pṛthivīm agninā saha yunajmi vācaṃ saha sūryeṇa yukto vāto 'ntarikṣeṇa te saha yuktās tisro vimṛjaḥ sūryasya
GV02pncvbr1u:12: (PB 1.2.4) vānaspatyo 'si bārhaspatyo 'si prājāpatyo 'si prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:13: (PB 1.2.5) maruto napāto 'pāṅkṣayāḥ parvatānāṅkakubhaḥ śyenā ajirā endraṃ vagnunā vahata ghoṣeṇāmīvāṃ cātayadhvaṃ yuktāstha vahata
GV02pncvbr1u:14: (PB 1.2.6) idam aham amuṃ yajamānaṃ paśuṣv adhy ūhāmi paśuṣu ca māṃ brahmavarcase ca
GV02pncvbr1u:15: (PB 1.2.7) vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā saṃ mṛjantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena chandasā saṃ mṛjantv ādityās tvā jāgatena chandasā saṃ mṛjantu
GV02pncvbr1u:16: (PB 1.2.8) pavitraṃ te vitataṃ brahmaṇaspate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvato 'taptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantaḥ saṃ tad āśataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:17: (PB 1.2.9) praśukraitu devīmanīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājy āyuṣe me pacasva varcase
GV02pncvbr1u:18: me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāya
GV02pncvbr1u:19: mām āyuṣe mama brahmavarcasāya yajamānasyarddhyā amuṣya rājyāya
GV02pncvbr1u:20: (PB 1.3.1) vekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:21: (PB 1.3.2) sūryo mā divyābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:22: (PB 1.3.3) yo 'dya saumyo vadho 'ghāyūnām udīrate viṣūkuhasya dhanvanāpa tān varuṇo 'pa dhamatu
GV02pncvbr1u:23: (PB 1.3.4) yo ma ātmā yā me prajā ye me paśavas tair ahaṃ mano vācaṃ pra sīdāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:24: (PB 1.3.5) agnes tejasendrasyendriyeṇa sūryasya varcasā bṛhaspatis tvā yunaktu devebhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:25: prāṇāyāgnir yunaktu tapasā somaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
GV02pncvbr1u:26: (PB 1.3.6) annaṃ kariṣyāmy annaṃ praviṣyāmy annaṃ janayiṣyāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:27: (PB 1.3.7) annam akaram annam abhūd annam ajījanam
GV02pncvbr1u:28: (PB 1.3.8) śyeno 'si gāyatracchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:29: (PB 1.3.9) saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tapobhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena saṃ vijñānena
GV02pncvbr1u:30: manasaś ca satyair yathā vo 'haṃ cārutamaṃ vadānīndro vo dṛśe bhūyāsaṃ sūryaś cakṣuṣe
GV02pncvbr1u:31: vātaḥ prāṇāya somo gandhāya brahma kṣatrāya
GV02pncvbr1u:32: (PB 1.3.10) namo gandharvāya viṣvag vādine varcodhā asi varco mayi dhehi
GV02pncvbr1u:33: (PB 1.4.1) adhvanām adhvapate svasti me 'dyāsmin devayāne pathi bhūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:39: (PB 1.4.7) tutho 'si viśvavedā uśig asi kavir aṅghārir asi bambhārir avasyur asi duvasvān
GV02pncvbr1u:47: (PB 1.4.15) pāta māgnayo raudreṇānīkena piṣṭata mā namo vo 'stu mā mā hiṃsiṣṭa
GV02pncvbr1u:48: (PB 1.5.1) ṛtasya dvārau stho mā mā saṃ tāptam
GV02pncvbr1u:50: (PB 1.5.3) śyeno nṛcakṣā agneṣ ṭvā cakṣuṣāva paśyāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:51: (PB 1.5.4) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato gāyatracchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:52: (PB 1.5.5) ūrdhvaḥ sapta ṛṣīn upa tiṣṭhasvendrapīto vācas pate saptartvijo 'bhyuc chrayasva juṣasva lokam mārvāg ava gāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:53: (PB 1.5.6) soma rārandhi no hṛdi pitā no 'si mama tan mā mā hiṃsīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:54: (PB 1.5.7) soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ vardhayāmo vācovidaḥ sumṛḍīko na ā viśa
GV02pncvbr1u:55: (PB 1.5.8) ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
GV02pncvbr1u:57: (PB 1.5.9) avamais ta ūrdhvais te kāvyais te pitṛbhir bhakṣitasya madhumato nārāśaṃsasya sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:58: (PB 1.5.10) dīkṣāyai varṇena tapaso rūpeṇa manaso mahimnā vāco vibhūtyā prajāpatis tvā yunaktu prajābhyo 'pānāya
GV02pncvbr1u:59: (PB 1.5.11) vāyur yunaktu manasā stomaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
GV02pncvbr1u:60: (PB 1.5.12) vṛṣako 'si triṣṭupchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:61: (PB 1.5.13) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato triṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:62: (PB 1.5.14) sūryo yunaktu vācā stomaṃ yajñāya voḍhave dadhātv indra indriyaṃ satyāḥ kāmā yajamānasya santu
GV02pncvbr1u:63: (PB 1.5.15) svaro 'si gayo 'si jagacchandā anu tvā rabhe svasti mā saṃ pārayā mā stotrasya stotraṃ gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām
GV02pncvbr1u:64: (PB 1.5.16) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato triṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:65: (PB 1.5.17) āyur me prāṇo mano 'si me prāṇa āyupatnyām ṛci yan me mano yamaṃ gataṃ yad vā me aparāgataṃ rājñā somena tad vayaṃ punar asmāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:66: (PB 1.5.18) yan me yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ mano jagāma dūragās tan ma āvartayā punar jīvātave na martave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye
GV02pncvbr1u:67: (PB 1.5.19) yenāhy ājim ajayad vicakṣya yena śyenaṃ śakunaṃ suparṇaṃ yad āhuś cakṣur aditāv anantaṃ somo nṛcakṣā mayi tad dadhātu
GV02pncvbr1u:68: (PB 1.6.1) aindraṃ saho 'sarji tasya ta indav indrapītasyendriyāvato 'nuṣṭupchandaso harivataḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:69: (PB 1.6.2) indav indrapītasya ta indriyāvato 'nuṣṭupchandasaḥ sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:70: (PB 1.6.3) stutasya stutam asy ūrjasvat payasvad ā mā stotrasya strotraṃ. gamyād indravanto vanemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:71: (PB 1.6.4) iṣṭayajuṣas te deva soma stutastomasya śastokthasya tirohnyasya yo 'śvasanir gosanir bhakṣas tasyopahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:72: (PB 1.6.5) ṛtasya tvā deva stomapade viṣṇor dhāmāni vi muñcāmy etat tvaṃ deva stomān avakaram agann aśīmahi vayaṃ pratiṣṭhām
GV02pncvbr1u:73: (PB 1.6.6) somehānu mehi soma saha sadasa indriyeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:74: (PB 1.6.7) subhūr asi śreṣṭho raśmir devānāṃ saṃsad devānāṃ yātur yayā tanvā brahma jinvasi tayā mā jinva tayā mā janaya prakāśaṃ mā kuru
GV02pncvbr1u:75: (PB 1.6.8) apāṃ puṣpam asy oṣadhīnāṃ rasa indrasya priyatamaṃ haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:76: (PB 1.6.9) hāriyojanasya te deva someṣṭayajuṣaḥ stutastomasya śastokthasya yo 'śvasanir gosanir bhakṣas tasyopahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:78: 'vayajanam asy asmatkṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi yad divā ca naktaṃ cainaś cakṛma
GV02pncvbr1u:79: tasyāvayajanam asi yat svapantaś ca jāgrataś cainaś cakṛma tasyāvayajanam asi yad
GV02pncvbr1u:80: vidvāṃsaś cāvidvāṃsaś cainaś cakṛma tasyāvayajanam asy enasa-enasāvayajanam asi
GV02pncvbr1u:81: (PB 1.6.11) apsu ghautasya te deva soma nṛbhiḥ sutasya
GV02pncvbr1u:88: surabhi no mukhā karat pra na āyūṃṣi tāriṣat
GV02pncvbr1u:89: (PB 1.7.1) aśvo 'sy atyo 'si mayo 'si hayo 'si vājy asi saptir arvāg si vṛṣāsi
GV02pncvbr1u:90: (PB 1.7.2) ādityānāṃ patmānv ihi namas te 'stu mā mā hiṃsīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:91: (PB 1.7.3) vāyoṣ ṭvā tejasā prati gṛhṇāmi nakṣatrāṇāṃ tvāṃ rūpeṇa prati gṛhṇāmi sūryasya tvā varcasā prati gṛhṇāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:92: (PB 1.7.4) rathantaram asi vāmadevyam asi bṛhad asi
GV02pncvbr1u:93: (PB 1.7.5) aṅkānyaṅkū abhito rathaṃ yau dhvāntaṃ vātāgram abhisaṃcaratau dūre hetir indriyavān patatrī te no 'gnayaḥ paprayaḥ pārayantu
GV02pncvbr1u:94: (PB 1.7.6) vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam ā ruha divaḥ pṛṣṭhe mandamānaḥ sumanmabhiḥ sapūrvavaj jantave dhanāḥ samānam ayman pary eti jāgṛviḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:95: (PB 1.7.7) gidaiṣa te ratha eṣa vām aśvinā ratho 'riṣṭo viśvabheṣajaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:98: (PB 1.8.1) devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prati gṛhṇāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:99: (PB 1.8.2) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe varuṇāyāśvaṃ tenāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:100: (PB 1.8.3) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe rudrāya gāṃ tayāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:103: (PB 1.8.6) agnīṣomābhyām ajān mayāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:104: (PB 1.8.7) annasyānnapatiḥ prādād anamīvasya śuṣmiṇo namo viśvajanasya kṣāmāya bhuñjati mā mā hiṃsīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:105: (PB 1.8.8) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe tvaṣṭre 'viṃ tayāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:107: (PB 1.8.10) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe bṛhaspataye vāsas tenāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigṛhītre
GV02pncvbr1u:108: (PB 1.8.11) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe uttānāyāṅgirasāyāprāṇat tenāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:109: (PB 1.8.12) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe pūṣṇa uṣṭram
GV02pncvbr1u:110: (PB 1.8.13) vāyave mṛgaṃ tenāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:111: (PB 1.8.14) jāpataye hastinaṃ prajāpataye varāhaṃ prajāpataye vrīhiyavāṃs tair amṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:112: (PB 1.8.15) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe kṣetrapataye tilamāṣās tair amṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:113: (PB 1.8.16) varuṇas tvā nayatu devi dakṣiṇe savitre 'śvataraṃ vāśvatarīṃ vā tayāmṛtatvam aśīya vayo dātre bhūyān mayo mahyaṃ pratigrahītre
GV02pncvbr1u:114: (PB 1.8.17) ka idaṃ kasmā adāt kāmaḥ kāmāyādāt kāmo dātā kāmaḥ pratigrahītā kāmaḥ samudram āviśat kāmena tvā prati gṛhṇāmi kāmaitat te
GV02pncvbr1u:115: (PB 1.9.1) raśmir asi kṣayāya tvā kṣayaṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:116: (PB 1.9.2) pretir asi dharmaṇe tvā dharmaṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:117: (PB 1.9.3) anvitir asi dive tvā divaṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:118: (PB 1.9.4) saṃdhir asy antarikṣāya tvāntarikṣaṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:119: (PB 1.9.5) pratidhir asi pṛthivyai tvā pṛthivīṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:120: (PB 1.9.6) viṣṭambho 'si vṛṣṭyai tvā vṛṣṭiṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:121: (PB 1.9.7) prāco 'sy ahne tvāhar jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:122: (PB 1.9.8) anvāsi rātryai rātriṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:123: (PB 1.9.9) uśig asi vasubhyas tvā vasūn jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:124: (PB 1.9.10) praketo 'si rudrebhyas tvā rudrān jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:125: (PB 1.9.11) sudītir asy ādityebhyas tvādityān jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:126: (PB 1.9.12) ojo 'si pitṛbhyas tvā pitṝn jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:127: (PB 1.10.1) tantur asi prajābhyas tvā prajā jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:128: (PB 1.10.2) rodasy asy oṣadhībhyas tvauṣadhīr jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:129: (PB 1.10.3) pṛtanāṣāḍ asi paśubhyas tvā paśūn jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:130: (PB 1.10.4) abhijid asi yuktagrāvendrāya tvendraṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:131: (PB 1.10.5) adhipatir asi prāṇāya tvā prāṇān jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:132: (PB 1.10.6) dharuṇo 'sy apānāya tvāpānān jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:133: (PB 1.10.7) saṃsarpo 'si cakṣuṣe tvā cakṣur jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:134: (PB 1.10.8) vayodhā asi kṣetrāya tvā kṣetraṃ jinva savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:135: (PB 1.10.9) trivṛd asi trivṛte tvā savṛd asi savṛte tvā pravṛd asi pravṛte tvānuvṛd asy anuvṛte tvā savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:136: (PB 1.10.10) niroho 'si nirohāya tvā saṃroho 'si saṃrohāya tvā praroho 'si prarohāya tvānuroho 'sy anurohāya tvā savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:137: (PB 1.10.11) vasuko 'si vasyaṣṭir asi veṣaśrīr asi savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye stuta
GV02pncvbr1u:138: (PB 1.10.12) ākramo 'sy ākramāya tvā saṃkramo 'si saṃkramāya tvotkramo 'sy utkramāya tvotkrāntir asy utkrāntyai tvā savitṛprasūtā bṛhaspataye
GV02pncvbr1u:139: (PB 2.1.1) tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa prathamayā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa madhyamayā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa uttamayodyatī trivṛto viṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:141: (PB 2.1.3) agrād agraṃ rohaty abhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāmantyā evābhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:142: (PB 2.1.4) pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtir vipāpmanā vartate ya etayā stute nāvagato 'pa rudhyate nāparuddho 'va gacchati /
GV02pncvbr1u:143: na śreyāṃsaṃ pāpīyān abhyā rohati na janatā janatām abhy eti nānyo 'nyasya prajā ā dadate yathākṣetraṃ kalpante /
GV02pncvbr1u:144: avarṣukas tu parjanyo bhavatīme hi lokās tṛcas tān hiṅkāreṇa vy eti
GV02pncvbr1u:145: (PB 2.1.5) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā trivṛto viṣṭutiḥ prati tiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:146: (PB 2.2.1) tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhis tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhis tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhiḥ parivartinī triviṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:147: (PB 2.2.2) praparīvartam āpnoti ya etayā stute saṃtatā viṣṭutiḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyānas ta ṛcas tān hiṅkāreṇa saṃ tanoti /
GV02pncvbr1u:148: sarvam āyur eti na purāyuṣaḥ pra mīyate ya etayā stute varṣukaḥ parjanyo bhavatīme hi lokās tṛcas tān hiṅkāreṇa saṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:149: (PB 2.2.3) ślakṣṇeva tu vā īśvarā paśūn nirmṛjaḥ saiṣā ca parācota śreyān bhavaty uta yādṛṅ eva tādṛṅ net tu pāpīyān
GV02pncvbr1u:150: (PB 2.2.4) tām etāṃ bhāllavaya upāsate tasmāt te pratigṛṇantaḥ parīvartān na cyavante
GV02pncvbr1u:151: (PB 2.3.1) tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhis tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti yā madhyamā sā prathamā
GV02pncvbr1u:152: yottamā sā madhyamā yā prathamā sottamā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti yottamā sā prathamā yā
GV02pncvbr1u:153: prathamā sā madhyamā yā madhyamā sottamā kulāyinī trivṛto viṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:154: (PB 2.3.2) prajākāmo vā paśukāmo vā stuvīta vai kulānāyapaśavaḥ kulāyaṃ-kulāyam eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:155: (PB 2.3.3) etām evānujāvarāya kuryād etāsām evāgraṃ pariyatīnāṃ prajānā[m] agraṃ pary eti
GV02pncvbr1u:156: (PB 2.3.4) etām eva bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ kuryāt yat sarvā agriyā bhavanti sarvā
GV02pncvbr1u:157: madhye sarvā uttamāḥ sarvān evainān samāvadbhājaḥ karoti nānyo 'nyam apa ghnate sarve
GV02pncvbr1u:159: (PB 2.3.5) varṣukaḥ parjanyo bhavatīme hi lokās tṛcas tān hiṅkāreṇa vyati ṣajati
GV02pncvbr1u:161: (PB 2.3.7) adharottaram apāvagato rudhyateva gacchaty aparuddhaḥ pāpīyān śreyāṃsam abhyā rohati janatā janatām abhy ety anyo 'nyasya prajā ā dadate na yathākṣetraṃ kalpante
GV02pncvbr1u:162: (PB 2.4.1) pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:163: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:165: (PB 2.4.2) pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktāt paśavas tayā puruṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti vajro vai
GV02pncvbr1u:166: pancapaśo yat pañca-pañca vyūhati vajram eva tad vy ūhati śāntyā eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā
GV02pncvbr1u:167: pañcadaśasya viṣṭutiḥ prati tiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:168: (PB 2.5.1) pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhiḥ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhis
GV02pncvbr1u:170: (PB 2.5.3) pañcabhiḥ pañcadaśaṃ tisṛbhis trivṛtaṃ saptabhiḥ saptadaśam
GV02pncvbr1u:171: (PB 2.5.4) vīryaṃ vai stomā vīryam eva tad ekadhā samūhate brahmavarcasyāvaruddhyai tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:172: (PB 2.6.1) tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhiḥ pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir udyatī pañcadaśasya viṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:173: (PB 2.6.2) etayā vai devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyan svargakāmaḥ stuvīta svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:174: (PB 2.6.3) abhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāmantyā evābhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:175: (PB 2.7.1) pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:176: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:178: (PB 2.7.2) etayā vai devā asurān aty akrāmann ati pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ krāmati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:179: (PB 2.7.3) abhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāmantyā evābhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:180: (PB 2.7.4) garbhiṇī viṣṭutiḥ pa prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:181: (PB 2.7.5) viḍ vai saptadaśas tasyā rājā garbho viśa eva tad rājānaṃ garbhaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:183: (PB 2.7.7) annaṃ vai saptadaśo yat sapta madhye bhavanti pañca-pañcābhito 'nnam eva tan madhyato dhīyate 'naśanāyuko yajamāno bhavaty anaśanāyukāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:184: (PB 2.7.8) vairājo vai puruṣaḥ sapta grāmyāḥ paśavo yad daśapūrvā bhavanti saptottamā yajamānam eva tat paśuṣu prati ṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:185: (PB 2.7.9) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā saptadaśasya viṣṭutiḥ prati tiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:187: (PB 2.8.2) brahmaṇo vā āyatanaṃ prathamā kṣatrasya madhyamā viśa uttamā yat prathamā
GV02pncvbr1u:188: bhūyiṣṭhā bhājayati brahmaṇy eva tad ojo vīryaṃ dadhāti brahmaṇa eva tat kṣatraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:189: ca viśaṃ cānuge karoti kṣatrasyāsya prakāśo bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:190: (PB 2.8.3) tām etāṃ trikharvā upāsate tasmāt te spardhamānā na vlīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:191: (PB 2.9.1) saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti parācībhiḥ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ saptāsthitā
GV02pncvbr1u:192: (PB 2.9.2) bhrātṛvyaṃ stuvīta yathā saptāsthitena matyena samī karoty evaṃ pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ pra rujati
GV02pncvbr1u:193: (PB 2.9.3) etām eva bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ kuryād yaḥ prathamo hiṅkāraḥ sa prathamāyā
GV02pncvbr1u:194: yattāṃ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti tena sā sapta bhajate yat saptaiva madhye sapadyante
GV02pncvbr1u:195: tena sā sapta bhajate ya uttamo hiṅkāraḥ sa uttamayā yattāṃ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:196: tena sā sapta bhajate sarvān evainān samāvadbhājaḥ karoti nānyo 'nyam apa ghnate
GV02pncvbr1u:198: (PB 2.9.4) tām etām abhipratāriṇa upāsate tasmāt ta ojiṣṭhāsvānām
GV02pncvbr1u:199: (PB 2.10.1) eṣa eva vyūha ubhayaḥ saptaikamadhyā nirmadhyā
GV02pncvbr1u:200: (PB 2.10.2) ānujāvara stuvītāloko vā eṣa yad ānujāvaro yat saptaprathamāḥ saptottamās tisro madhye tryakṣaraḥ puruṣo lokam evāsmai tan madhyataḥ karoti tasmiṃl loke prati tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:201: (PB 2.10.3) etām eva prajākāmāya kuryān madhyato vā eṣa saṃrūḍho yaḥ prajāṃ na vindate lokam evāsmai taṃ madhyataḥ karoti taṃ lokaṃ prajayā ca paśubhiś cānu pra jāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:202: (PB 2.10.4) etām evāparuddharājanyāya kuryād viḍ vai saptadaśas tasyā rājā garbho viśa eva tad rājānaṃ nir hanty apāvagato 'pa rudhyate 'va gacchaty aparuddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:203: (PB 2.10.5) etām evābhicaryamāṇāya kuryāt prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim eva madhyattaḥ pra viśanty astṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:204: (PB 2.11.1) pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhir navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:205: (PB 2.11.2) caturastomān prativihitā brahmavarcasakāmāḥ stuvīta pañcabhiḥ pañcadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:206: tisṛbhis trivṛtaṃ navabhis triṇavaṃ svayaṃ saptadaśaḥ sampanno vīryaṃ vai stomā vīryam
GV02pncvbr1u:207: eva tad ekadhā samūhate brahmavarcasyāvaruddhyai tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:208: (PB 2.12.1) tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhiḥ pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir udyatīsaptadaśasya viṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:209: (PB 2.12.2) etayā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargakāmaḥ stuvīta svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:210: samaṣṭyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvāno 'bhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāntyā evābhikrāntena
GV02pncvbr1u:211: hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:212: (PB 2.13.1) saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:213: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa ekayā sa tisṛbhir bhastrāvācīnabilā
GV02pncvbr1u:214: (PB 2.13.2) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasya kuryād yathāvācīnabilayā bhastrayā pradhūnuyād evaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:215: yajamānasya paśūn pradhūnoty apakrāmantī viṣṭutis tayā yajamānasya paśavo 'pakrāmanti
GV02pncvbr1u:217: (PB 2.14.1) saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā saptabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:218: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:220: (PB 2.14.2) sapta grāmyāḥ paśavas tān etayā spṛṇoti sapta śirasi prāṇāḥ prāṇā indriyāṇīndriyāṇy evaitayāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:221: (PB 2.14.3) eṣā vai pratiṣthitaikaviṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:222: (PB 2.15.1) pañcabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā saptabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:223: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:225: (PB 2.15.2) etayā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargakāmaḥ stuvīta svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:226: samaṣṭyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvāno 'bhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāntyā evābhikrāntena
GV02pncvbr1u:227: hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:228: (PB 2.15.3) saiṣā trivṛt prāyaṇā trivṛd udayanā yat trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:229: navaitā ekaviṃśasyottamā bhavanti prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān eva tad ubhayato dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:231: prāṇa uttareṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ sarvam āyur eti na purāyuṣaḥ pramīyate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:232: (PB 2.15.4) tām etāṃ kradviṣa upāsate tasmāt te sarvam āyur yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:233: (PB 2.16.1) navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ pañcabhyo hiṅ
GV02pncvbr1u:234: karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa
GV02pncvbr1u:236: (PB 2.16.2) navabhis trivṛtaṃ pratiṣṭauti pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcadaśaṃ saptabhiḥ saptadaśaṃ svayam ekaviṃśaḥ saṃpannaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:237: (PB 2.16.3) sa eva stomā yajñaṃ vahanti tān uttame stotre saṃtarpayati yathānaḍuho
GV02pncvbr1u:238: vāśvān vāśvatarān vohuṣaḥ saṃtarpayed evam etad uttame stotre stomān saṃtarpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:239: tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:240: (PB 2.16.4) etām eva purodhākāmāya kuryād brahma vai trivṛt kṣatram ekaviṃśo yat
GV02pncvbr1u:241: trivṛtaikaviṃśaṃ pratipadyate brahma tat kṣatrasya purastān nidadhāti gacchati purodhāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:242: na purodhāyāś cyavate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:243: (PB 2.16.5) tām etāṃ prāvāhaṇya upāsate tasmāt te purodhāyā na cyavanta
GV02pncvbr1u:244: (PB 2.17.1) navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhis tisṛbhyo hiṅ karoti sa parācībhir navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sūrmy ubhayata ādīptā
GV02pncvbr1u:245: (PB 2.17.2) brahmavarcasakāmaḥ stuvīta tejo vai trivṛt tryakṣaraḥ puruṣo yat trivṛtāv
GV02pncvbr1u:246: abhito bhavatas tisro madhye yathā hi hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭaped evam enaṃ trivṛtau niṣṭapatas
GV02pncvbr1u:248: (PB 2.17.3) apaśavy eva tu vā īśvarā paśūn nirdahaḥ kilāsattvān nūbhayamati hi niṣṭapataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:249: (PB 2.17.4) etām evābhiśasyamānāya kuryāc chamalaṃ vā etam ṛcchati yam aślīlā vāg
GV02pncvbr1u:250: ṛcchati yaivainam asāv aślīlaṃ vāg vadati tām asya trivṛtau niṣṭapatas tejasvī bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:251: (PB 3.1.1) navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhiḥ sa ekayā navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhir navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa pañcabhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:252: (PB 3.1.2) vajro vai triṇavo vajram eva tad vyūhati śāntyai
GV02pncvbr1u:253: (PB 3.1.3) pañcabhir vihitaikā paricarā pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajamānaḥ paricarā yat pañcabhir
GV02pncvbr1u:254: vidadhāty ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tat paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā
GV02pncvbr1u:255: triṇavasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:256: (PB 3.2.1) saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā
GV02pncvbr1u:257: sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhir ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa pañcabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:259: (PB 3.2.2) etayā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargakāmaḥ stuvīta svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:260: samaṣṭyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvāno 'bhikrāmantī viṣṭutir abhikrāntyā evābhikrāntena
GV02pncvbr1u:261: hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:262: (PB 3.3.1) ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa saptabhiḥ sa ekayaikādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa saptabhir ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa saptabhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:263: (PB 3.3.2) anto vai trayastriṃśaḥ paramo vai trayastriṃśa stomānāṃ saptabhir vihitaikā
GV02pncvbr1u:264: paricarā sapta grāmyāḥ paśavo yajamānaḥ paricarā yat saptabhir vidadhāty ekā paricarā
GV02pncvbr1u:265: bhavati yajamānam eva tad antataḥ paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā trayastriṃśasya
GV02pncvbr1u:267: (PB 3.4.1) ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhiḥ sa tisṛbhir ekādaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:268: hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhir ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa pañcabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:270: (PB 3.4.2) anto vai trayastriṃśo yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ sṛptvā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmaty evam etan nedīyaḥsaṃkramayā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:271: (PB 3.4.3) pañcabhir vihitās tisraḥ paricarāḥ pāṅktāḥ paśava etāvān puruṣo yadātmā
GV02pncvbr1u:272: prajā jāyā yat pañcabhir vidadhāti tisraḥ paricarā bhavanti yajamānam eva tat paśuṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:273: pratiṣṭhāpayati paśumān bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:274: (PB 3.5.1) navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhiḥ sa ekayaikādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:275: sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa saptabhis trayodaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa saptabhiḥ sa tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:277: (PB 3.5.2) etayā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargakāmaḥ stuvīta svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:278: samaṣṭyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvāno 'grād agraṃ rohaty abhikrāmantī viṣṭutir
GV02pncvbr1u:279: abhikrāntyā evābhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti tasmād etayā stotavyam ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:280: (PB 3.6.1) trayodaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhiḥ sa pañcabhir ekādaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:281: hiṅ karoti sa pañcabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhir navabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa
GV02pncvbr1u:283: (PB 3.6.2) yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ sṛptvā śākhāyāḥ śākhām ālambham upāvarohed evam etayemaṃ lokam upāvarohati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:284: (PB 3.6.3) trivṛtā praiti trivṛtodeti prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇenaiva praiti prāṇam abhyudeti sarvam āyur eti na purāyuṣaḥ pramīyate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:285: (PB 3.6.4) tām etāṃ karadviṣa upāsate tasmāt te sarvam āyur yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:286: (PB 3.7.1) pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa pañcabhir ekādaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa pañcabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ saptabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:287: (PB 3.7.2) yo vai trayastriṃśam ekaviṃśe pratiṣṭhitaṃ veda pratitiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhā
GV02pncvbr1u:288: vā ekaviṃśaḥ stomānāṃ yad etāḥ sapta trayastriṃśasyottamā bhavanti saptavidhaikaviṃśasya
GV02pncvbr1u:289: viṣṭutir ekaviṃśa eva tat trayastriṃśaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:290: (PB 3.8.1) aṣṭābhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa catasṛbhiḥ sa ekayāṣṭābhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa catasṛbhir aṣṭābhyo hiṅ karoti sa catasṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:291: (PB 3.8.2) paśavo vai chandogā yad aṣṭābhyo-'ṣṭābhyo hiṅ karoti aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:292: (PB 3.8.3) catasṛbhir vihitaikā paricarā catuṣpādāḥ paśavo yajamānaḥ paricarā yac
GV02pncvbr1u:293: catasṛbhir vidadhāty ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tat paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty
GV02pncvbr1u:294: eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā caturviṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:295: (PB 3.9.1) pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā caturdaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:296: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekādaśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:298: (PB 3.9.2) brahmaṇo vā āyatanaṃ prathamā kṣatrasya madhyamā viśa uttamā yat pañcadaśinyau
GV02pncvbr1u:299: pūrve bhavataś caturdaśottamā brahmaṇi caiva tat kṣatre caujo vīryaṃ dadhāti brahmaṇe
GV02pncvbr1u:300: caiva tat kṣatrāya ca viśam anugāṃ karoti kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:301: (PB 3.9.3) astomā vā ete yac chandogā ayujo hi stomā yugmanti chandāṃsi yad eṣā yujinī catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutis tenāstomāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:302: (PB 3.9.4) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā catuścatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhait ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:303: (PB 3.10.1) caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:304: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa ekādaśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:306: (PB 3.10.2) astīva vā ayaṃ loko 'stīvāsau chidram ivedam antarikṣaṃ yad eṣā nirmadhyā bhavatīmān eva lokān anu prajāyate pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:307: (PB 3.11.1) pañcadaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ sa ekayā pañcadaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:308: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekādaśabhiḥ caturdaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:311: (PB 3.11.3) yājyānāṃ sā hotur yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yokthānāṃ sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino
GV02pncvbr1u:312: yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ sahotur yokthānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya yājyānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:313: sā brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya yokthānāṃ sā hotur yājyānāṃ sā maitrāvaruṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:314: yā pṛṣṭhānāṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino yaiva hotuḥ sācchāvākasya sarvā ājyeṣu sarvāḥ pṛṣtheṣu sarvā uktheṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:315: (PB 3.11.4) paśavo vai samīṣantī yad eṣā sarvāṇi savanāny anusaṃcaraty anusavanam evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayati paśuman bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:316: (PB 3.12.1) ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvadaśabhiḥ sa ekayā ṣoḍaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:317: hiṅ karoti sa ekayā sa tisṛbhiḥ sa dvādaśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa dvādaśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:319: (PB 3.12.2) anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ paśavaś chandogā yat ṣoḍaśabhyaḥ-ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti ṣoḍaśakalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:320: (PB 3.12.3) dvādaśabhir vihitaikā paricarā dvādaśamāsās saṃvvatsaro yajamānaḥ paricarā
GV02pncvbr1u:321: yad dvādaśabhir vidadhāty ekā paricarā bhavati yajamānam eva tad antatas saṃvvatsare
GV02pncvbr1u:322: paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayaty eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitāṣṭācatvāriṃśasya viṣṭutiḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:323: (PB 3.13.1) ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:324: hiṅ karoti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa tisṛbhiḥ sa daśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo hiṅ karoti sa daśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:326: (PB 3.13.2) anto vā aṣṭācatvāriṃśo yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ sṛptvā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmaty evam etan nedīyaḥsaṃkramayā nedīyaḥsaṃkramāt saṃkrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:327: (PB 3.13.3) daśabhir vihitā tisraḥ paricarā daśākṣarā virāḍ etāvān puruṣo yad ātmā
GV02pncvbr1u:328: prajā jāyā yad daśabhir vidadhātt tisraḥ paricarā bhavanti yajamānam eva tad virājy
GV02pncvbr1u:329: annādye 'ntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayaty annādo bhavati ya etayā stute
GV02pncvbr1u:330: (PB 4.1.1) gāvo vā etat sattram āsata tāsāṃ daśasu māssu śṛṅgaṇy ajāyanta tā abruvannarāḥ smottiṣṭhāmopaśā no 'jñateti tā udatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:331: (PB 4.1.2) tāsāṃ tv evābruvann āsāmahā evemau dvādaśau māsau saṃsaṃvvatsaram āpayāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:332: tāsāṃ dvādaśasu māḥsu śṛṅgāṇi prāvartanta tāḥ sarvam annādyam āpnuvaṃs tā etās tūparās
GV02pncvbr1u:333: tasmāt tāḥ sarvān dvādaśamāsaḥ prerate sarvaṃ hi tā annādyam āpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:334: (PB 4.1.3) sarvam annādyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:335: (PB 4.1.4) prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam atirātram apaśyat tam āharat tenāhorātre prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:336: (PB 4.1.5) yad eṣo 'tirātro bhavaty ahorātre eva prajanayanty ahorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhanty etāvān vāva saṃvvatsaro yad ahas ca rātriś cāhorātrābhyām eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:337: (PB 4.1.6) yaj jyotiṣṭomo bhavati yajñamukhaṃ tad ṛdhnuvanti yad uktho yajñakrator anantarayāya yad rātriḥ sarvasyāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:338: (PB 4.1.7) sa etān stomān apaśyat jyotir gaur aur itīme vai lokā ete stomā ayam eva jyotir ayaṃ madhyamo gaur asāv uttama āyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:339: (PB 4.1.8) yad ete stomā bhavantīmān eva lokān prajanayanty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:340: (PB 4.1.9) sa etaṃ tryahaṃ punaḥ prāyauṅkta tena ṣaḍahena ṣaṭkratūn prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:341: (PB 4.1.10) yad eṣa ṣaḍaho bhavati ṛtūn eva prajanayanti ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:342: (PB 4.1.11) sa etaṃ ṣaḍahaṃ punaḥ prāyuṅkta tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ṣaḍahābhyāṃ dvādaśamasaḥ prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:343: (PB 4.1.12) yad etau ṣaḍahau bhavato māsān eva prajanayanti māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:344: (PB 4.1.13) sa etau dvau ṣaḍahau punaḥ prayuṅkta taiś caturbhiḥ ṣaḍahaiś caturviṃśatim ardhamāsān prājanayat
GV02pncvbr1u:345: (PB 4.1.14) yad ete catvāraḥ ṣaḍahā bhavanty ardhamāsān eva prajanayanty ardhamāseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:346: (PB 4.1.15) sa idaṃ bhuvanaṃ prajanayitva pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahena vīryam ātmany adhatta
GV02pncvbr1u:347: (PB 4.1.16) yad eṣaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati vīrya evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:348: (PB 4.1.17) tena māsān saṃvvatsaraṃ prājanayad yad eṣa māso bhavati saṃvvatsaram eva prajanayanti saṃvvatsare pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:350: (PB 4.2.2) prāyaṇīyena vā ahnā devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāyan yat prāyaṃs tat prāyaṇīyasya prāyaṇīyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:351: (PB 4.2.3) tasmāt prāyaṇīyasyāhna ṛtvijā bhavitavyam etad dhi svargasya lokasya nediṣṭhaṃ ya etasyartviṅ na bhavati hīyate svargāl lokāt
GV02pncvbr1u:353: (PB 4.2.5) caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam ārabhya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:354: (PB 4.2.6) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaraḥ sākṣād eva saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:355: (PB 4.2.7) yāvatyaś caturviṃśasyokthasya stotrīyās tāvatyaḥ saṃvvatsarasya rātrayaḥ stotrīyābhir eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:356: (PB 4.2.8) pañcadaśastotrāṇi bhavanti pañcadaśārdhamāsasya rātrayo 'rdhamāsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:357: (PB 4.2.9) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśaśastrāṇi samāso māsaśa eva tat saṃvvatsaram āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:358: (PB 4.2.10) tad āhur īrma iva vā eṣā hotrā yad acchāvākyā yad acchāvākam anusaṃtiṣṭhata
GV02pncvbr1u:359: īśvarermā bhavitor iti yady ukthaṃ smātraikakubhañcodvaṃśīyañcāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpye
GV02pncvbr1u:360: vīryaṃ vā ete samanī vīrya evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:361: (PB 4.2.11) atho khalv āhur agniṣṭomam eva kāryam eṣa vai yajñaḥ svargyo yad agniṣṭoma ūrdhvo hi hotāram anusaṃtiṣṭhate
GV02pncvbr1u:362: (PB 4.2.12) dvādaśastotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaras tena saṃvvatsarasaṃmito
GV02pncvbr1u:363: dvādaśa stotraṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaras
GV02pncvbr1u:365: (PB 4.2.13) atho khalv āhur uktham eva kāryam ahnaḥ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:366: (PB 4.2.14) sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kriyante sarvaṃ hy etāhnāpyate
GV02pncvbr1u:367: (PB 4.2.15) pavante vājasātaye somāḥ sahasrapājasa iti sahasravatī pratipat kāryā
GV02pncvbr1u:368: (PB 4.2.16) saṃvvatsarasya rūpaṃ sarvan evainān etayā punāti sarvān abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:369: (PB 4.2.17) atho khalv āhuḥ pavasva vāco agriya ity eva kāryā mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yad vāco 'graṃ mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:370: (PB 4.2.18) mithunam iva vā eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ pavasveti puṃso rūpaṃ vāca iti striyāḥ someti puṃso rūpaṃ citrābhir iti striyā mithunam evaibhyo yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:371: (PB 4.2.19) agne yuṅkṣvā hi ye taveti jarābodhīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kāryaṃ yuktenaiva saṃvvatsareṇa prayanti caturviṃśatyakṣarāsu bhavati caturviṃśasya
GV02pncvbr1u:372: (PB 4.2.20) atho khalv āhur yajñāyajñīyam eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:373: (PB 4.2.21) panthā vai yajñāyajñīyaṃ patha eva tan na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:375: (PB 4.3.2) abhīvartena vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati svargasya lokasyābhivṛttyai
GV02pncvbr1u:376: (PB 4.3.3) ekākṣaraṇidhano bhavaty ekākṣarā vai vāg vācaiva tad ārabhya svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:378: (PB 4.3.5) sāma vai asau loka ṛg ayaṃ yad itaḥ sāmnā yanti svargaṃ lokam ārabhya yanti yad ṛcā punar āyanty asmin loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:379: (PB 4.3.6) yat sāmāvasṛjeyur ava svargāl lokāt padyeran yad ṛcam anusṛjeyur naśyeyur asmāl lokāt
GV02pncvbr1u:380: (PB 4.3.7) samānaṃ sāma bhavaty anyo-'nyaḥ pragātho 'nyad-anyad dhi citram adhvānam avagacchann eti
GV02pncvbr1u:381: (PB 4.3.8) vṛṣā vā eṣa retodhā yad abhīvartaḥ pragātheṣu reto dadhad eti yad itaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:382: samānaṃ sāma bhavaty anyo-'nyaḥ pragātho reta eva tad dadhati yat parastāt samānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:383: pragātho bhavaty anyad-anyat sāma reta eva tad dhitaṃ prajanayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:384: (PB 4.3.9) sāmnetaḥ pragāthāṃ dugdhe pragāthena parastāt sāmāni dugdhe salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:385: (PB 4.3.10) yo vā adhvānaṃ punar nivartayanti nainaṃ te gacchanti ye 'punar nivartaṃ yanti te gacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:386: (PB 4.3.11) ya āstutaṃ kurvate yathā dugdhām upasīded evaṃ tat
GV02pncvbr1u:387: (PB 4.3.12) ye nāstutaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam abhyaśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:388: (PB 4.3.13) brahmavādino vadanti yātayāmāḥ saṃvvatsarā3 ayātayāmā3 iti te nāyātayāmeti vaktavyaṃ punar anyāni stotrāṇi nivartanta ūrdhvam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:391: (PB 4.4.3) tisra uṣṇihaḥ syur ekā gāyatrī tās tisro bṛhatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:392: (PB 4.4.4) tad āhuḥ saṃśara iva vā eṣa cchandasāṃ yad dve chandasī saṃyuñjantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:394: (PB 4.4.6) paśavo vai caturuttarāṇi cchandasāṃsi paśubhir eva tat svargaṃ lokam ākramam ānayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:395: (PB 4.4.7) ekaṃ gāyatrīm ekāham upeyur ekāmuṣṇiham ekāham ekām anuṣṭubham ekāhaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:396: bṛhatyā pañcamāsa iyuḥ paṅktim ekāham upeyus triṣṭubhā ṣaṣṭhaṃ māsam īyuḥ śvo viṣuvān
GV02pncvbr1u:398: (PB 4.4.8) tad āhur anavakḷptāni vā etāni cchandāṃsi madhyandine bṛhatyā caiva triṣṭubhā caitavyam
GV02pncvbr1u:399: (PB 4.4.9) ete vai chandasī vīryavatī ete pratyakṣaṃ madhyandinasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:400: (PB 4.4.10) rathantare 'hani bṛhatī kāryaitad vai rathantarasya svam āyatanaṃ yad
GV02pncvbr1u:401: bṛhatī sva eva tad āyatane rathantaraṃ pratitiṣṭhati bārhate 'hani triṣṭup kāryaitad
GV02pncvbr1u:402: vai bṛhataḥ svam āyatanaṃ yat triṣṭup sva eva tad āyatane bṛhadrathantare pratitiṣṭhantī itaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:403: (PB 4.4.11) trayastriṃśatā pragāthair etavyaṃ trayastriṃśad devatā devatāsv eva pratitiṣṭhanto
GV02pncvbr1u:404: yanti caturviṃśatyaitavyaṃ caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsara eva
GV02pncvbr1u:405: pratitiṣṭhanto yanti dvādaśabhir etavyaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsara eva
GV02pncvbr1u:406: pratitiṣṭhanto yanti ṣaḍbhir etavyaṃ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanto yanti caturbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:407: etavyaṃ catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanto yanti tribhir etavyaṃ traya
GV02pncvbr1u:408: ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanto yanti dvābhyām etavyaṃ dvipād yajamānaḥ svargasya
GV02pncvbr1u:409: lokasyākrāntyā anyenānyena hi padā puruṣaḥ pratitiṣṭhann eti
GV02pncvbr1u:411: (PB 4.5.2) svarbhānur vā āsur ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat taṃ devāḥ svarair aspṛṇvan yat svarasāmāno bhavanty ādityasya spṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:412: (PB 4.5.3) parair vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃ lokam apārayan yad aparayaṃs tat parāṇāṃ paratvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:413: (PB 4.5.4) pārayanty enaṃ parāṇi ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:416: (PB 4.5.7) anuṣṭup chandaso bhavanty ānuṣṭubho vai prajāpatiḥ sākṣād eva prajāpatim ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:418: (PB 4.5.9) devā vā ādityasya svargāl lokād avapādād abibhayus tam etaiḥ stomaiḥ saptadaśair adṛṃhan yad ete stomābhavanty ādityasya dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:419: (PB 4.5.10) catustriṃśā bhavanti varṣma vai catustriṃśo varṣmaṇaivainaṃ saṃmimate
GV02pncvbr1u:420: (PB 4.5.11) tasya parācīnātipādād abibhayus taṃ sarvaiḥ stomaiḥ +paryārṣan viśvajidabhijidbhyāṃ vīryaṃ vā etau stomau vīryeṇaiva tad ādityaṃ paryuṣanti dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:422: (PB 4.5.13) tad āhuḥ kartapraskanda iva vā eṣa yat trayastriṃśata+ḥ saptadaśam upayantīti pṛṣṭhyo 'ntaraḥ kāryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:423: (PB 4.5.14) tasya yat saptadaśam ahas tad uttamaṃ kāryaṃ salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:424: (PB 4.5.15) tad āhur udaraṃ vā eṣa stomānāṃ yat saptadaśo yat saptadaśaṃ madhyato nirhareyur aśanāyavaḥ prajāḥ syur aśanāyavaḥ sattriṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:425: (PB 4.5.16) trayastriṃśād eva saptadaśa upetyo varṣma vai trayastriṃśo varṣma saptadaśo varṣmaṇa eva tad varṣmābhisaṃkrāmanti
GV02pncvbr1u:426: (PB 4.5.17) nānāhur ukthāḥ kāryā3 iti yady ukthāḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:427: (PB 4.5.18) paśavo vā ukthāni śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntenaiva tad viṣuvantam upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:428: (PB 4.5.19) tad āhur vivīvadham iva vā etad yad agniṣṭomo viṣuvān agniṣṭomau viśvajidabhijitāv athetara ukthāḥ syur iti
GV02pncvbr1u:430: (PB 4.5.21) vīryaṃ vā agniṣṭomo vīrya eva madhyataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti nava saṃstutā bhavanti nava prāṇāḥ praṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:432: (PB 4.6.2) devaloko vā eṣa yad viṣuvān devaokam eva tad abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:433: (PB 4.6.3) ekaviṃśo bhavaty ekaviṃśo vā asya bhuvanasyāditya ādityalokam eva tad abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:434: (PB 4.6.4) dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:436: (PB 4.6.6) vāyo śukro ayāmi ta iti śukravatī pratipad bhavaty ādityasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:437: (PB 4.6.7) vāyur vā etaṃ devatānām ānaśe 'nuṣṭup chandasaṃ yad ato 'nyā pratipat syāt pradahet
GV02pncvbr1u:438: (PB 4.6.8) yanti vā ete prāṇādityāhur ye gāyatryāḥ pratipado yantīti yad vayavyā bhavanti tena prāṇān na yanti prāṇo hi vāyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:439: (PB 4.6.9) atho śamayanty evainam etayā śantir hi vāyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:440: (PB 4.6.10) ā yāhi somapītaya iti saumī pāvamānī
GV02pncvbr1u:441: (PB 4.6.11) niyutvatī bhavati paśavo vai niyutaḥ śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntenaiva tad ādityam upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:443: (PB 4.6.13) svarbhānur vā āsur ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat tasya devā divākīrtyais tamo
GV02pncvbr1u:444: 'pāghnan yad divākīrtyāni bhavanti tama evāsmād apaghnanti raśmayo vā eta ādityasya
GV02pncvbr1u:445: yad divākīrtyāni raśmibhir eva tad ādityaṃ sākṣād ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:446: (PB 4.6.14) bhrājābhrāje pavamānamukhe bhavato mukhata evāsya tābhyāṃ tamo 'paghnanti
GV02pncvbr1u:447: (PB 4.6.15) mahādivākīrtyaṃ ca vikarṇaṃ ca madhyato bhavato madhyata evāsya tābhyāṃ tamo 'paghnanti bhāsam antato bhavati patta evāsya tena tamo 'paghnanti
GV02pncvbr1u:448: (PB 4.6.16) daśastobhaṃ bhavti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:449: (PB 4.6.17) yat tv ity āhuḥ ṣaḍbhir ito māsair adhvānaṃ yanti ṣaḍbhiḥ punar āyanti kva tarhi svargo loko yasya kāmāya sattram āsata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:450: (PB 4.6.18) mūrdhānaṃ diva iti svargaṃ lokam ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:451: (PB 4.6.19) aratiṃ pṛthivyā ity asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:452: (PB 4.6.20) vaiśvānaram ṛta ājātam agnim iti viṣuvata eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:453: (PB 4.6.21) kaviṃ samrājam atitihiṃ janānām ity annādyam evopayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:454: (PB 4.6.22) āsan nāpātraṃ janayanta devā iti jāyanta eva
GV02pncvbr1u:455: (PB 4.6.23) tat triṣṭub jagatīṣu bhavati traiṣṭubhjāgato vā ādityo yad ato 'nyāsu syād ava svargāl lokāt padyeran
GV02pncvbr1u:456: (PB 4.6.24) samrāḍvatīṣu bhavati sāmrājyaṃ vai svargo lokaḥ svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:457: (PB 4.7.1) ātmā vā eṣa saṃvvatsarasya yad viṣuvān pakṣāv etāv abhito bhavato yena
GV02pncvbr1u:458: ceto 'bhīvartena yanti yaś ca parasmāt pragātho bhavati tāv ubhau viṣuvati kāryau
GV02pncvbr1u:459: pakṣāv eva tad yajñasyātman pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:460: (PB 4.7.2) indra kratuṃ na ābhareti pragātho bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:461: (PB 4.7.3) vasiṣṭho vā etaṃ putrahato 'paśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad eṣa pragātho bhavati prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:462: (PB 4.7.4) jīvā jyotir aśīmahīti ye vai svasti saṃvvatsaraṃ saṃtaranti te jīvā jyotir aśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:463: (PB 4.7.5) māno ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso 'vakramur iti ye vai stenā ripavas te durādhyas tān eva tad atikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:464: (PB 4.7.6) tvayā vyayaṃ pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāma so 'tisaṃvvatsaro vai pravataḥ śaśvatīr apas tam eva tat taranti
GV02pncvbr1u:465: (PB 4.7.7) adyādyāśvaḥ śvas tvām idā hyo naro vayam enam idā hya iti saṃtanayaḥ pragāthā bhavanti teṣām ekaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya śvastanam evābhisaṃtanvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:466: (PB 4.7.8) atho khalv āhur indra kratuṃ na ābharety eva kāryaṃ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:468: (PB 4.7.10) yathā vā ito vṛkṣaṃ rohanty evam enaṃ pratyavarohanti svargam eva lokaṃ rūḍhvāsmiṃl loke pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:471: (PB 4.8.3) ūnātiriktau bhavata ūnātiriktaṃ vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:472: (PB 4.8.4) vairājau bhavato 'nnaṃ virāḍ annādya eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:474: (PB 4.8.6) virāḍ vā eṣā samṛddhā yad daśāhāni virājy eva samṛddhāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:475: (PB 4.8.7) pṛṣthāni bhavanti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya eva pratitiṣṭhanti cchandomā
GV02pncvbr1u:476: bhavanti paśavo vai cchandomāḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanty athaitad daśamam ahar āptastomam
GV02pncvbr1u:478: (PB 4.8.8) yad adhyāhur ati tad recayanti tasmān na vyucyam
GV02pncvbr1u:479: (PB 4.8.9) parokṣam anuṣṭubham upayanti prajāpatir vā anuṣṭub yat pratyakṣam upeyuḥ prajāpatim ṛccheyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:480: (PB 4.8.10) yo vai sattrasya sad veda sad bhavati vāmadevyaṃ vai sāmnāṃ sad agnir devatānāṃ virāṭ chandasāṃ trayastriṃśaḥ stomānāṃ tāny eva tad ekadhā saṃbhṛtyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:481: (PB 4.8.11) brahmavādino vadanti yataḥ sattrād udasthātā3sthitā3d iti
GV02pncvbr1u:482: (PB 4.8.12) ye rathantareṇa stutvottiṣṭhanti te yata uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyād apratiṣṭhānā
GV02pncvbr1u:483: bhaviṣyantīti ye bṛhatā stutyottiṣṭhanti te sthitād uttiṣṭhanti tān brūyāt sthāyukaiṣāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:485: (PB 4.8.13) ye vāmadevyena stutvottiṣṭhanti te sataḥ sad abhyuttiṣṭhanti pūrṇāt pūrṇam āyatanād āyatanam antarikṣāyatanā hi prajā
GV02pncvbr1u:487: (PB 4.8.15) prājāpatyaṃ vai vāmadevyaṃ prajāpatāv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ paśuṣv eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:488: (PB 4.9.1) patnīḥ saṃyājya prāñca udetyāyaṃ sahasramānava ity aticchandasāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:489: (PB 4.9.2) ime vai lokā aticchandā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:490: (PB 4.9.3) gor iti nidhanaṃ bhavati virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad gaur virājy eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:492: (PB 4.9.5) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhirs tvacam apaghnate
GV02pncvbr1u:493: (PB 4.9.6) iyaṃ vai sārparājñy asyām eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:494: (PB 4.9.7) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti traya ime lokā eṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:496: (PB 4.9.9) manasā hiṅ karoti manasā prastauti manasodgāyati manasā pratiharati manasā nidhanam upayanty asamāptasya samāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:497: (PB 4.9.10) yad vai vācā na samāpnuvanti manasā tat samāpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:500: (PB 4.9.13) caturhotāraṃ hotā vyācaṣṭe stutam eva tad anuśaṃsati nahi tat stutaṃ yad ananuśastam
GV02pncvbr1u:501: (PB 4.9.14) prajāpatiṃ parivadanty āptvevainaṃ tad vyācakṣate tāvad āpāmainam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:502: (PB 4.9.15) gṛhapatir audumbarīṃ dhārayati gṛhapatir vā ūrjo yantorjam evaibhyo yacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:504: (PB 4.9.17) dugdhānīva vai tarhi chandasāṃsi yātayāmāny antargatāni tāny eva tad rasenāpyāyayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:507: (PB 4.9.20) yadā vai puruṣa ātmano 'vadyati yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:508: (PB 4.9.21) dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ dvābhyām asthi dvābhyāṃ majjānaṃ dvābhyāṃ pīvaś ca lohitaṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:509: (PB 4.9.22) śikhā anupravapante pāpmānam eva tad apaghnate laghīyāṃsaḥ svargaṃ lokam ayāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:511: (PB 4.10.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'ricyata so 'padyata taṃ devā abhisamagacchanta
GV02pncvbr1u:512: te 'bruvan mahad asmai vrataṃ saṃbharāma yad imaṃ dhinavad iti tasmai yat saṃvvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:513: annaṃ pacyate tat samabharaṃs tad asmai prāyacchaṃs tad avrajayat tad enam adhinon
GV02pncvbr1u:514: mahan maryā vrataṃ yad imam adhinvīd iti tan mahāvratasya mahāvratatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:515: (PB 4.10.2) prajāpatir vāva mahāṃs tasyaitad vratam annam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:516: (PB 4.10.3) tad āhur madhyaḥ saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ madhyato vā annaṃ jagdhaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:517: (PB 4.10.4) tad v āhur yan madhyata upayanty ardham annādyasyāpnuvanty ardhaṃ sambaṭ kurvantīty upariṣṭād eva saṃvvatsarasyopetyaṃ saṃvvatsare vā annaṃ sarvaṃ pacyate
GV02pncvbr1u:518: (PB 4.10.5) caturviṃśaṃ bhavati caturviṃśo vai saṃvvatsaro 'nnaṃ pañcaviṃśam
GV02pncvbr1u:519: (PB 4.10.6) yad vā adaś caturviṃśaṃprāyaṇīyaṃ tad etad udayanīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:520: (PB 4.10.7) yat saṃvvatsaram annaṃ saṃbharanti saiṣā pañcaviṃśy upajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:523: (PB 5.1.3) trivṛd dhy eva śiro loma tvag asthi
GV02pncvbr1u:524: (PB 5.1.4) pāṅkta itara ātmā loma tvaṅ māṃsam asthi majjā
GV02pncvbr1u:526: (PB 5.1.6) tasmāc chiro 'ṅgāni medyanti nānumedyati na kṛśyanty anukṛśyati
GV02pncvbr1u:527: (PB 5.1.7) punar abhyāvartam itareṇātmanā stuvate tasmād itara ātmā medyati ca kṛśyati ca
GV02pncvbr1u:529: (PB 5.1.9) annaṃ vā arko brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatry annādyaṃ caivaibhyo brahmavarcasaṃ ca mukhato dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:530: (PB 5.1.10) pañcadaśasaptadaśau pakṣau bhavataḥ prakṣābhyāṃ vai yajamāno vayo bhūtvā svargaṃ lokam eti
GV02pncvbr1u:531: (PB 5.1.11) tāv āhuḥ samau kāryau pañcadaśau vā saptadaśau vā savīvadhatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:532: (PB 5.1.12) tad v āhur yat samau bhavata ekavīryau tarhi bhavata iti pañcadaśasaptadaśāv eva kāryau sācīva vai vayaḥ pakṣau kṛtvāpatīyaḥ patati
GV02pncvbr1u:533: (PB 5.1.13) dakṣiṇato bṛhat kāryaṃ dakṣiṇo vā ardha ātmano vīryavattaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:534: (PB 5.1.14) atho khalv āhur uttarata eva kāryaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsino 'rdhāt traiṣṭubhaṃ vai bṛhat traiṣṭubho vai brāhmaṇācchaṃsī traiṣṭubhaḥ pañcadaśastomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:535: (PB 5.1.15) dakṣiṇato rathantaraṃ kāryaṃ maitrāvaruṇasyārdhād gāyatraṃ vai rathantaraṃ gāyatro maitrāvaruṇo gāyatraḥ saptadaśastomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:537: (PB 5.1.17) ekaviṃśo vai stomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā tasmād vayaḥ pucchena pratiṣṭhāyotpatati pucchena pratiṣṭhāya niṣīdati
GV02pncvbr1u:538: (PB 5.1.18) yajñāyajñīyaṃ pucchaṃ kāryaṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ hy eva mahāvratasya puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:539: (PB 5.1.19) atho khalv āhur atiśayaṃ vai dvipadāṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ bhadram kāryaṃ samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:540: (PB 5.2.1) vāmadevyaṃ mahāvrataṃ kāryaṃ tasya gāyatraṃ śiro bṛhadrathantare pakṣau yajñāyajñīyaṃ puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:541: (PB 5.2.2) yo vai mahāvrate sahasraṃ protaṃ veda pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:542: (PB 5.2.3) tasya prācī dik śiras tac chandobhiḥ sahasram asāv anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ sanakṣattraiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:543: sāhasro 'yam anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ sa oṣadhibhiś ca vanaspatibhiś ca sāhasro 'ntarikṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:544: ātmā tad vayobhiḥ sāhasraṃ pratīcī dik pucchaṃ tad agnibhiś ca raśmibhiś ca sāhasraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:545: pra sasasraṃ paśūn āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:546: (PB 5.2.4) tad āhur apṛṣṭhaṃ vai vāmadevyam anidhanaṃ hīti
GV02pncvbr1u:547: (PB 5.2.5) anāyatanaṃ vā etat sāma yad anidhanam
GV02pncvbr1u:549: (PB 5.2.7) etad vai sākṣād annaṃ yad rājanaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhavati pāṅktaṃ hy annam
GV02pncvbr1u:553: (PB 5.2.11) ati vā eṣānyāni cchandāṃsi yad aticchandā aty etad anyāny ahāny ahar yan mahāvratam
GV02pncvbr1u:557: (PB 5.3.2) etad vai sākṣād annaṃ yad ilāndam irānnaṃ etad irāyām evānnādye 'ntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:558: (PB 5.3.3) samudro vā etac chandaḥ salilaṃ lomaśaṃ samudra iva khalu vai sa bhavati salila iva lomaśa iva yo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:560: (PB 5.3.5) vratam iti nidhanaṃ bhavati mahāvratasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate svar iti
GV02pncvbr1u:561: bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai śakuna iti bhavati śakuna iva vai yajamāno vayo
GV02pncvbr1u:564: (PB 5.3.7) yad vā anyā vāṅ nātivadet tad agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ na vai vāg vācam ativadati vāg yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:566: (PB 5.3.9) agnir vā idaṃ vaiśvānaro 'dahan naitasmād devā abibhayus taṃ varaṇaśākhayāvārayanta yad avārayanta tasmād vāravantīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:567: (PB 5.3.10) tasmād varaṇo bhiṣajya etena hi devā ātmānam atrāyanta
GV02pncvbr1u:568: (PB 5.3.11) tasmād brāhmaṇo vāraṇena na pibed vaiśvānaraṃ necchamayā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:569: (PB 5.3.12) paśavo vai vāravantīyaṃ śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntād eva tat saṃvvatsarād uttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:570: (PB 5.4.1) prāṇena purastād āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante prāṇam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:571: (PB 5.4.2) apānena paścāt puccham upatiṣṭhante apānam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:572: (PB 5.4.3) vratapakṣābhyāṃ pakṣāv upatiṣṭhante diśa eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:573: (PB 5.4.4) prajāpater hṛdayenāpikakṣam upatiṣṭhante jyaiṣṭhyam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:574: (PB 5.4.5) vasiṣṭhasya nihavena cātvālam upatiṣṭhante svargam eva tal lokam āotvā śriyaṃ vadante
GV02pncvbr1u:575: (PB 5.4.6) vaiśvadevyām ṛci bhavati viśvarūpaṃ vai paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ paśūn eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:577: (PB 5.4.8) caturakṣarāṇidhanaṃ bhavati catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:578: (PB 5.4.9) ātamitor nidhanam upayanty āyur eva sarvam āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:579: (PB 5.4.10) ślokānuślokābhyāṃ havirdhāne upatiṣṭhante kīrtim eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:580: (PB 5.4.11) yāmena mārjālīyam upatiṣṭhante pitṛlokam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:581: (PB 5.4.12) āyurṇavastobhābhyāṃ sada upatiṣṭhante brahma caiva tat kṣatraṃ ca jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:583: (PB 5.4.14) indraṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny astuvaṃs tasyarśya ekam aṅgam astutam acāyat tad asyaitenāstaut tenāsya priyaṃ dhāmopāgacchat priyam evāsyaitena
GV02pncvbr1u:584: (PB 5.4.15) yat paro'kṣaṃ nidhanam upeyur hrītamukhaṃ pratimuñceran pratyakṣam upayanti hrītamukham evāpajayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:585: (PB 5.5.1) āsandīm āruhyodgāyati devasākṣya eva tad upariṣadyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:586: (PB 5.5.2) audumbarī bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarunddhe
GV02pncvbr1u:588: (PB 5.5.4) chandobhir ārohati svargam eva tal lokam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:590: (PB 5.5.6) sarveṇātmanā samuddhṛtyodgeyam eṣu lokeṣu ned vyāhito 'sānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:592: (PB 5.5.8) saha nidhanena pratiṣṭhām upayanty eṣeṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:593: (PB 5.5.9) preṅkhām āruhya hotā śaṃsati mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:594: (PB 5.5.10) yadā vai prajā maha āviśati preṅkhās tarhy ārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:596: (PB 5.5.12) kūrcān itare 'dhyāsata ūrdhvā eva tad utkrāmanto yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:597: (PB 5.5.13) abhigarāpagarau bhavato nindaty enān anyaḥ prānyaḥ śaṃsati ya enān nindati pāpmānam eṣāṃ so 'pahanti yaḥ praśaṃsati yad evaiṣāṃ suṣṭutaṃ suśastaṃ tat so 'bhigṛṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:598: (PB 5.5.14) śūdrāryau carmaṇi vyāyacchete tayor āryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:599: (PB 5.5.15) devāś ca vā asurāś cāditye vyāyacchantas taṃ devā abhyajayaṃs tato devā abhavan /
GV02pncvbr1u:600: parāsurā abhavann ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:601: (PB 5.5.16) yadāryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanty ātmānam eva tad ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:602: (PB 5.5.17) parimaṇḍalaṃ carma bhavaty ādityasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:603: (PB 5.5.18) sarvāsu sraktiṣu dundubhayo vadanti yā vanaspatiṣu vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:604: (PB 5.5.19) bhūmidundubhir bhavati yā pṛthivyāṃ vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:605: (PB 5.5.20) sarvā vāco vadanti yeṣu lokeṣu vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:606: (PB 5.5.21) saṃnaddhāḥ kavacinaḥ pariyantīndriyasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate 'tho mahāvratam eva mahayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:608: (PB 5.6.2) adhvaryuḥ śirasodgāyan maitrāvaruṇo dakṣiṇena pakṣeṇa brāhmaṇācchaṃsy uttareṇa gṛhapatiḥ pucchenodgātātmanā
GV02pncvbr1u:609: (PB 5.6.3) tad yady evaṃ kuryur ekaikayā stotrīyayāstutayodgātāram abhisameyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:610: (PB 5.6.4) tisṛbhir udgātātmana udgīyātha yā śirasaḥ stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād aparābhis
GV02pncvbr1u:611: tisṛbhir udgīyātha yā dakṣiṇasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād aparābhis tisṛbhir
GV02pncvbr1u:612: udgīyātha yottarasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyāt tisṛbhir vaikayā vā stutaṃ syād
GV02pncvbr1u:613: atha yā pucchasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:614: (PB 5.6.5) ātmany eva tad aṅgāni pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:615: (PB 5.6.6) atho khalv āhuḥ katham adhvaryur bahvṛcaḥ sāma gāyed ity udgātaiva sarveṇodgāyet tad eva samṛddhaṃ samṛddhāv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:616: (PB 5.6.7) havirdhāne śirasā stutvā saṃrabdhāḥ pratyañca eyus te dakṣiṇena dhiṣṇyān
GV02pncvbr1u:617: parītya paścān maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya rathantareṇa pañcadaśena stuvīraṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:618: ta udañcaḥ saṃsarpeyur jaghanena hotur dhiṣṇyaṃ paścād brāhmaṇācchaṃsino dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya
GV02pncvbr1u:619: bṛhatā saptadaśena stuvīraṃs te yenaiva prasarpeyus tena punar niḥsṛpyottareṇāgnīdhraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:620: parītya paścād gārhapatyasyopaviśya pucchenaikaviṃśena stuvīraṃs te yenaiva niḥsarpeyus
GV02pncvbr1u:621: tena punaḥ prasṛpya yathāyatanam upaviśyāsandīm āruhyodgātātmanodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:622: (PB 5.6.8) taṃ patnyo 'paghāṭilābhir upagāyanty ārtvijyam eva tat patnyaḥ kurvanti saha svargaṃl lokam ayāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:623: (PB 5.6.9) kule-kule 'nnaṃ kriyate tad yat pṛccheyuḥ kim idaṃ kurvantītīme yajamānā annam atsyantīti brūyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:624: (PB 5.6.10) yo vai dīkṣitānāṃ pāpaṃ kīrtayati tṛtīyam evāṃśaṃ pāpmano haraty annādas tṛtīyaṃ pipīlikās tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:625: (PB 5.6.11) parimādbhiś caranti tvak ca vā etal loma ca mahāvratasya yat parimādas tvacaṃ caiva tal loma ca mahāvratasyāptvāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:626: (PB 5.6.12) vāṇaṃ vitanvanty anto vai vāṇo 'nto mahāvratam antenaiva tad antam abhivādayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:627: (PB 5.6.13) śatatantrīko bhavati śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:628: (PB 5.6.14) tam ullikhet prāṇāya tvāpānāya tvā vyānāya tveti prāṇāpānavyānān eva tad āptvāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:629: (PB 5.6.15) pari kumbhinyo mārjālīyaṃ yantīdaṃ madhv idaṃ madhv iti saghoṣā eva tad vayo bhūtvā saha svargaṃl lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:630: (PB 5.7.1) devā vai vācaṃ vyabhajanta tasyā yo raso 'tyaricyata tad gaurīvitam abhavad anuṣṭubham anu pariplavate vāg anuṣṭub vāco raso gaurīvitam
GV02pncvbr1u:631: (PB 5.7.2) yad gaurīvitenānvahaṃs stuvate vācy eva tad vācā rasaṃ dadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:632: (PB 5.7.3) rasavad vācā vadati ya evaṃv vedeti
GV02pncvbr1u:633: (PB 5.7.4) dvyudāsaṃ bhavati svargasya vā etau lokasyāvasānadeśau pūrveṇaiva pūrvam ahaḥ saṃsthāpayanty uttareṇottaram ahar abhyativadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:634: (PB 5.7.5) etad vai yajñasya śvastanaṃ yad gaurīvitaṃ yad gaurīvitam anusṛjeyur aśvastanā aprajasaḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:635: (PB 5.7.6) saṃ vā anyo yajñas tiṣṭhata ity āhur vāg eva na saṃtiṣṭhata iti yad gaurīvitam anvahaṃ bhavati vācam eva tat punaḥ prayuñjate
GV02pncvbr1u:637: (PB 5.7.8) devakṣetraṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ye svarṇidhanam upayanti sa u vai sattriṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:638: sattram upanayed ity āhur ya enān devakṣetram abhyārohed iti na vai devakṣetra āsīna
GV02pncvbr1u:639: ārtim ārchati yat svarṇidhanam anvahaṃ bhavati naiva kāṃ canārtim ārchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:640: (PB 5.7.9) cyavante vā ete 'smāl lokād ity āhur ye svarṇidhanam upayantīti yad ṛcā
GV02pncvbr1u:641: svarūpaṃ yanty asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhanti yad ekāro 'tarikṣe yat sāmnāmuṣmint sarveṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:644: (PB 5.7.11) devā vai svargaṃl lokaṃ yanto 'jñātād abibhayus ta etat saṃjñānam apaśyaṃs tena jñātram agacchan yat sujñānam anvahaṃ bhavati jñātram eva gacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:645: (PB 5.8.1) ye vai vācam annam ādayanty annādā bhavanti ye vitarṣayanti rukṣā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:646: (PB 5.8.2) gaurīvitaṃ śyāvāśvaṃ nihava etāni vai sāmāni vāco 'nnam eteṣāṃ vāg annaṃ yad etāni na cyavante vācam eva tad annam ādayanti tena sarve 'nnādā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:647: (PB 5.8.3) abhikrāntāpakrāntāni bhavanty abhikrāntāpakrāntaṃ vai vāco rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:649: (PB 5.8.5) samudraṃ vā ete prasnānti ye saṃvvatsaram upayanti yo vā aplavaḥ samudraṃ prasnāti na sa tata udeti yat plavo bhavati svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:650: (PB 5.8.6) ati viśvāni duritā taremeti yad evaiṣāṃ duṣṭutaṃ duḥśastaṃ tad etena taranti
GV02pncvbr1u:652: (PB 5.8.8) parāṃ vā ete parāvataṃ gacchanti ye ṣaḍahasyāntaṃ gacchanti yadokonidhanaṃ ṣaḍahamukhe bhavati prajñātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:653: (PB 5.8.9) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:655: (PB 5.9.2) eṣā vai saṃvvatsarasya patnī yad ekāṣṭakaitasyāṃ vā gatāṃ rātriṃ vasati sākṣād eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:657: (PB 5.9.4) vicchinnaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣante 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū bhavete
GV02pncvbr1u:658: (PB 5.9.5) ārtaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ye 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū abhidīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:661: (PB 5.9.8) mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yat phālguno mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:662: (PB 5.9.9) tasya sāniryā yat saṃmeghe viṣuvān saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:664: (PB 5.9.11) cakṣur vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yac citrāpūrṇamāso mukhato vai cakṣur mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante tasya na niryāsti
GV02pncvbr1u:666: (PB 5.9.13) teṣām akāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyate tenaikāṣṭakāṃ na saṃbaṭ kurvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:667: (PB 5.9.14) teṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe sutyā saṃpadyate pūrvapakṣe māsāḥ saṃtiṣṭhamānā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:668: pūrvapakṣa uttiṣṭhanti tān uttiṣṭhataḥ paśava oṣadhayo 'nūttiṣṭhanti tān kalyāṇī
GV02pncvbr1u:669: vāg abhivadary arātsur ime sattriṇa iti te rādhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:670: (PB 5.10.1) ā vā ete saṃvvatsaraṃ pyāyayanti ya utsṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:671: (PB 5.10.2) yathā vai dṛtir ādhmāta evaṃ saṃvvatsaro 'nutsṛṣṭo yan notsṛjeyur amehena pramāyukāḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:672: (PB 5.10.3) prāṇo vai saṃvvatsara udānā māsā yad utsṛjanti prāṇa evodānān dadhati yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate yā saṃvvatsarasyānutsṛṣṭasya śuk sā tam ṛcchati
GV02pncvbr1u:674: (PB 5.10.5) yady utsṛjeyur ukthāny utsṛjeyus tad evotsṛṣṭaṃ tad anutsṛṣṭam
GV02pncvbr1u:675: (PB 5.10.6) atho khalv āhur ekatrikaṃ kāryaṃ tad eva sākṣād utsṛṣṭam abhyutṣuṇvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:676: (PB 5.10.7) chidro vā eteṣāṃ saṃvvatsara ity āhur ye stomam utsṛjantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:677: (PB 5.10.8) paśum ālabhante stomam eva tad ālabhante stomo hi paśuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:678: (PB 5.10.9) śva utsṛṣṭāḥ sma iti vatsān apākurvanti prātaḥ paśum ālabhante tasya
GV02pncvbr1u:679: vapayā pracaranti tatas savanīyenāṣṭākapālena tata āgneyenāṣṭākapālena tato dadhnaindreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:680: tataś caruṇā vaiśvadevena tat prātaḥsavanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:681: (PB 5.10.10) tataḥ paśupuroḍāśenaikādaśakapālena tataḥ savanīyenaikādaśakapālena tato marutvatīyenaikādaśakapālena tataś caruṇaindreṇa tan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:682: (PB 5.10.11) paśunā pracaranti tataḥ savanīyena dvādaśakapālena tato vaiśvadevena dvādaśakapālena tataś caruṇāgnimārutena tat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:684: (PB 6.1.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:685: (PB 6.1.2) ekādaśena ca vai satā stotreṇāgniṣṭomasyāsṛjataikādaśena ca māsā saṃvvatsarasya tā dvādaśena ca stotreṇāgniṣṭomasya paryagṛhṇād dvādaśena ca māsā saṃvvatsarasya
GV02pncvbr1u:686: (PB 6.1.3) tasmāt prajā daśamāso garbhaṃ bhṛtvaikādaśam anu prajāyante tasmād dvādaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:687: nābhyatiharanti dvādaśena hi parigṛhītās tad ya evaṃv veda pari jātāḥ prajā gṛhṇāti pra jātā janayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:688: (PB 6.1.4) tāsāṃ parigṛhītānām aśvatary atyakrāmat tasyā anuhāya reta ādattā tad vaḍavāyāṃ nyamāḍ yasmād vaḍavā dviretās tasmād aśvatary aprajā āttaretā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:689: (PB 6.1.5) tasmād v adakṣiṇīyāti hi sā yajñam aricyatātiriktasya dakṣiṇā syāt salomatvāya ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotredeyātirikto vai ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:690: (PB 6.1.6) so 'kāmayata yajñaṃ sṛjeyeti sa mukhata eva trivṛtam asṛjata taṃ gāyatrī
GV02pncvbr1u:691: cchando 'nyasṛjyatāgnir devatā brāhmaṇo manuṣyo vasanta ṛtus tasmāt trivṛt stomānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:692: mukhaṃ gāyatrī cchandasām agnir devatānāṃ brāhmaṇo manuṣyāṇāṃ vasanta ṛtūnāṃ tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:693: brāhmaṇo mukhena vīryaṃ karoti mukhato hi sṛṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:694: (PB 6.1.7) karoti mukhena vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:695: (PB 6.1.8) sa urasta eva bāhubhyāṃ pañcadaśam asṛjata taṃ triṣṭup chando 'nvasṛjyatendro
GV02pncvbr1u:696: devatā rājanyo manuṣyo grīṣma ṛtus tasmād rājanyasya pañcadaśa stomas triṣṭup chanda
GV02pncvbr1u:697: indro devatā grīṣma ṛtus tasmād u bāhuvīryo bāhubhyāṃ hi sṛṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:698: (PB 6.1.9) karoti bāhubhyāṃ vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:699: (PB 6.1.10) sa madhyata eva prajananāt saptadaśam asṛjata taṃ jagatī cchando 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:700: viśve devā devatā vaiśyo manuṣyo varṣā ṛtus tasmād vaiśyo 'dyamāno na kṣīyate prajananād
GV02pncvbr1u:701: dhi sṛṣṭas tasmād u bahupaśur vaiśvadevo hi jāgato varṣā hy asyartus tasmād brāhmaṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:703: (PB 6.1.11) sa patta eva pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśam asṛjata tam anuṣṭup chando 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:704: na kā cana devatā śūdro manuṣyas tasmāc chūdra uta bahupaśur ayajñiyo videvo hi na
GV02pncvbr1u:705: hi taṃ kā cana devatā 'nvasṛjyata tasmāt pādāv anejyaṃ nāti vardhate patto hi sṛṣṭas
GV02pncvbr1u:706: tasmād ekaviṃśastomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhāyā hi sṛṣṭas tasmād anuṣṭubhaṃ chandāṃsi nānu vyūhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:708: (PB 6.1.13) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:709: (PB 6.2.1) yo vai stomān upadeśanavato vedopadeśanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:710: (PB 6.2.2) prāṇo vai trivṛd ardhamāsaḥ pañcadaśaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saptadaśa āditya ekaviṃśa ete vai stomā upadeśanavanta upadeśanavān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:711: (PB 6.2.3) ime vai lokās triṇavas triṇavasya vai brāhmaṇeneme lokās triṣ punar navā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:712: (PB 6.2.4) eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:713: (PB 6.2.5) devatā vāva trayastriṃśo 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityāḥ prajāpatiś ca vaṣaṭkāraś ca trayastriṃśau
GV02pncvbr1u:714: (PB 6.2.6) sa devena yajñena yajate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:715: (PB 6.2.7) yo vā adhipatiṃ vedādhipatir bhavati trayastriṃśo vai stomānam adhipatiḥ puruṣaḥ paśumān
GV02pncvbr1u:716: (PB 6.2.8) tasmān nyañco 'nye paśavo 'danty ūrdhvaḥ puruṣo 'dhipatir hi saḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:717: (PB 6.2.9) adhipatiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:720: (PB 6.3.3) dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tena paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:721: (PB 6.3.4) dvādaśa stotrāṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nuprajāyante tena paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:722: (PB 6.3.5) agnau stotram agnau śastraṃ pratitiṣṭhati tena brahmavarcasasya
GV02pncvbr1u:723: (PB 6.3.6) kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiṣṭomatvam ity āhur virājaṃ saṃstutaḥ saṃpadyate virāḍ vai cchandasāṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:724: (PB 6.3.7) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:726: (PB 6.3.9) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmai śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tato 'smai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:727: (PB 6.3.10) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:728: (PB 6.3.11) yat tv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kva tarhi turīyaṃ cchando 'nuṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:730: (PB 6.3.13) aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī hiṅkāro navama ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub dvādaśākṣarā jagatī cchandobhirevānuṣṭubham āpnoti yajamānasyānavalopāya
GV02pncvbr1u:731: (PB 6.3.14) yo vā anuṣṭubhaṃ sarvatrāpiṃ savanāny anvāyattāṃ veda sarvatrāsyāpir bhavaty eṣā vā anuṣṭup sarvatrāpiḥ savanāny anvāyattā tad ya evaṃ vveda sarvatrāpir bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:732: (PB 6.3.15) yad vai rājāno 'dhvānaṃ dhāvayanti ye 'śvānāṃv vīryavattamās tān yuñjate
GV02pncvbr1u:733: trivṛt pañcadaśa ekaviṃśa ete vai stomānāṃv vīryavattamās tān eva yuṅkte svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:734: (PB 6.3.16) catuṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai catuṣṭomaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:735: (PB 6.4.1) prajāpatir devebhya ūrjaṃ vyabhajat tata udumbaraḥ samabhavat prājāpatyo
GV02pncvbr1u:736: vā udumbaraḥ prājāpatya udgātā yad udgātaudumbarīṃ prathamena karmaṇānvārabhate svayaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:738: (PB 6.4.2) tām ucchrayati dyutānas tvā māruta ucchrayatūd divaṃ stabhānāntarikṣaṃ pṛṇa dṛṃha pṛthivīm
GV02pncvbr1u:739: (PB 6.4.3) tām anvārabhata āyoṣ ṭvā sadane sādayāmy avataś chāyāyāṃ samudrasya hṛdaya iti
GV02pncvbr1u:740: (PB 6.4.4) yajño vā āyus tasya tat sadanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:741: (PB 6.4.5) yajño vā avati tasya sā cchāyā kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:742: (PB 6.4.6) madhyato vā ātmano hṛdayaṃ tasmān madhye sadasa audumbarī mīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:743: (PB 6.4.7) namaḥ samudrāya namaḥ samudrasya cakṣuṣa ity āha vāg vai samudro manaḥ samudrasya cakṣus tābhyām eva tan namas karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:744: (PB 6.4.8) sāmā yūnarvāhāsīd ity āha sāma vai yūnarvā sāmna eva tan namaskaroty ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan
GV02pncvbr1u:745: (PB 6.4.9) yo vā evaṃ sāmne namaskṛtya sāmnārtvijyaṃ karoti na sāmno hīyate nainaṃ sāmāpahate
GV02pncvbr1u:746: (PB 6.4.10) ya enam anuvyāharati sa ārtim ārchati
GV02pncvbr1u:747: (PB 6.4.11) ūrg asy ūrjodā ūrjaṃ me dehy ūrjaṃ me dhehy annaṃ me dehy annaṃ me dhehi
GV02pncvbr1u:748: prajāpater vā etad udaraṃ yat sada ūrg udumbaro yad audumbarī madhye sadaso mīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:749: madhyata eva tat prajābhyo 'nnam ūrjaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:750: (PB 6.4.12) tasmād yatraiṣā yātayāmā kriyate tat prajā aśanāyavo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:751: (PB 6.4.13) sāma devānām annaṃ sāmany eva tad devebhyo 'nna ūrhaṃ dadhāti sa eva tad ūrji śritaḥ prajābhya ūrjaṃ vibhajati
GV02pncvbr1u:752: (PB 6.4.14) udaṅṅ āsīna udgāyaty udīcīṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati pratyaṅṅ āsīnaḥ prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:753: pratīcīṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati dakṣiṇāsīnaḥ pratiharati dakṣiṇāṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati
GV02pncvbr1u:754: prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvanti tasmād eṣā diśāṃ vīryavattamaitāṃ hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ prīṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:755: (PB 6.4.15) brahmavādino vadanti kasmāt satyāt prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:756: viparikramyodgātāra iti diśām abhīṣṭyai diśām abhiprītyā iti brūyāt tasmāt sarvāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:757: dikṣv annaṃv vidyate sarvā hy abhīṣṭāḥ prītāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:758: (PB 6.5.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti so 'śocat tasya śocata ādityo
GV02pncvbr1u:759: mūrdhno 'sṛjyata so 'sya mūrdhānam udahan sa droṇakalaśo 'bhavat tasmin devāḥ śukram
GV02pncvbr1u:760: agṛhṇata tāṃ vai sa āyuṣārtim atyajīvat
GV02pncvbr1u:762: (PB 6.5.3) raṃ prohed vānaspatyo 'si bārhaspatyo 'si prājāpatyo 'si prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase
GV02pncvbr1u:763: (PB 6.5.4) yad āha vānaspatya iti satyenaivainaṃ tat prohati
GV02pncvbr1u:764: (PB 6.5.5) yad āha bārhaspatya iti bṛhaspatir vai devānām udgātā tam eva tad yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:765: (PB 6.5.6) yad āha prājāpatya iti prājāpatyo hy eṣa devatāyā yad droṇakalaśo yad āha prajāpater mūrdheti prajāpater hy eṣa mūrdhna udahanyata
GV02pncvbr1u:766: (PB 6.5.7) yad āhātyāyupātram ity ati hy etad anyāni pātrāṇi yad droṇakalaśo devapātraṃ droṇakalaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:768: (PB 6.5.9) brāhmaṇaṃ pātre na mīmāṃseta yaṃ brāhmaṇam iva manyate pra devapātram āpnoti na manuṣyapātrāc chidyate
GV02pncvbr1u:769: (PB 6.5.10) vāg vai devebhyo 'pakrāmat sāpaḥ prāviśat tāṃ devāḥ punar ayācaṃs tā
GV02pncvbr1u:770: abruvan yat punar dadyāma kiṃ nas tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayadhva ity abruvaṃs tā abruvan
GV02pncvbr1u:771: yad evāsmāsu manuṣyā apūtaṃ praveśayāṃs tenāsaṃsṛṣṭā asāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:772: (PB 6.5.11) śuddhā asmā āpaḥ pūtā bhavanti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:773: (PB 6.5.12) sā punartātyakrāmat sā vanaspatīn prāviśat tān devāḥ punar ayācaṃs tāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:774: na punar adadus tān aśapan svena vaḥ kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścān iti tasmād vanaspatīn
GV02pncvbr1u:775: svena kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścanti devaśaptā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:776: (PB 6.5.13) tāṃv vanaspatayaś caturdhā vācaṃv vinyadadhur dundubhau vīṇāyām akṣe tūṇave tasmād eṣā vadiṣṭhaiṣā valgutamā vāg vā vanaspatīnāṃ devānāṃ hy eṣā vāg āsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:777: (PB 6.5.14) adho-'dho 'kṣaṃ droṇakalaśaṃ prohanti tasyā vāco 'varudhyā upary-upary akṣaṃ pavitraṃ prayacchanty ubhayata eva vācaṃ parigṛhṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:778: (PB 6.5.15) yasya kāmayetāsuryam asya yajñaṃ kuryāṃv vācaṃv vṛñjīyeti droṇakalaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:779: prohan bāhubhyām akṣan upaspṛśed asuryam asya yajñaṃ karoti vācaṃv vṛṅkte yo 'sya
GV02pncvbr1u:780: priyaḥ syād anupaspṛśann akṣaṃ prohet prāṇā vai droṇakalaśaḥ prāṇān evāsya kalpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:781: (PB 6.5.16) yan nv ity āhur vācānyān ṛtvijo vṛṇate kasmād udgātāro vṛtā ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:783: (PB 6.5.18) prājāpatyā vā udgātāraḥ prājāpatyo droṇakalaśo droṇakalaśa evainām ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte
GV02pncvbr1u:785: (PB 6.5.20) anabhijitā vā eṣodgātṝṇāṃ dig yat prācī yad droṇakalaśaṃ prāñcaṃ prohanti diśo 'bhijityai
GV02pncvbr1u:786: (PB 6.5.21) yan nv ity āhur antarāśvaḥ prāsevau yujyate 'ntarā śamya anaḍvān ka udgātṝṇāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:787: yoga iti yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti sa eṣāṃ yogas tasmād yuktair evopasadyaṃ na hy ayukto vahati
GV02pncvbr1u:788: (PB 6.6.1) grāvṇaḥ saṃsādya droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viḍ vai grāvāṇo 'nnaṃ somo rāṣṭraṃ droṇakalaśo yad grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viśy eva tad rāṣṭram adhyūhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:789: (PB 6.6.2) yaṃ dviṣyād vimukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amum amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyā viśo 'muṣmād annādyān nirūhāmīti nirūhed viśa evainam annādyān nirūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:790: (PB 6.6.3) yo 'sya priyaḥ syāt saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāṃ viśy amuṣinn annādye 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhed viśy evainam annādye 'dhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:791: (PB 6.6.4) atho tad ubhayam anādṛtyedam ahaṃ māṃ tejasi brahmavarcasse 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhet tejasy eva brahmavarcasa ātmānam adhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:792: (PB 6.6.5) yaḥ kāmayeta viśā rāṣṭraṃ hanyām iti vyūhya grāvṇo 'dho droṇakalaśaṃ sādayitvopāṃśusavanam
GV02pncvbr1u:793: upariṣṭād abhinidadhyād idam aham amuyā viśā 'do rāṣṭraṃ hanmīti viśaiva tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:794: (PB 6.6.6) yo vai daivāni pavitrāṇi veda pūto yajñiyo bhavati cchandāṃsi vai daivāni pavitrāṇi tair droṇakalaśaṃ pāvayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:795: (PB 6.6.7) vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa cchandasā punantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena cchandasā
GV02pncvbr1u:796: punantv ādityās tvā jāgatena cchandasā punantv etāni vai daivāni pavitrāṇi pūto yajñiyo
GV02pncvbr1u:798: (PB 6.6.8) svarbhānur vā āsura ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat taṃ devā na vyajānaṃs te 'trim
GV02pncvbr1u:799: upādhāvaṃs tasyātrir bhāsena tamo 'pāhan yat prathamam apāhan sā kṛṣṇāvir abhavad
GV02pncvbr1u:800: yad dvitīyaṃ sā rajatā yat tṛtīyaṃ sā lohinī yayā varṇam abhyatṛṇat sā śuklāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:801: (PB 6.6.9) tasmāc chuklaṃ pavitraṃ śukraḥ somaḥ sa śukratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:802: (PB 6.6.10) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaiteṣāṃ varṇānām api pavitre kuryāt pāpmanaivainaṃ tamasā
GV02pncvbr1u:803: vidhyati kṛṣṇam iva hi tamo yo 'sya priyaḥ syād āsaktiśuklaṃ kuryāj jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:805: (PB 6.6.11) tasmād ātreyaṃ candreṇecchanty atrir hi tasya jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:806: (PB 6.6.12) abhyatṛṇat pavitraṃv vigṛhṇanti hastakāryam eva tad yajñasya kriyata etad vā udgātṝṇāṃ hastakāryaṃ yat pavitrasya vigrahaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:807: (PB 6.6.13) na hastaveṣyān nir ṛcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:808: (PB 6.6.14) yo 'pi na vigṛhṇāti prāṇād enam antaryanti
GV02pncvbr1u:809: (PB 6.6.15) taṃ brūyād vepamānaḥ prameṣyasa iti vepamāna eva pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:810: (PB 6.6.16) pra śukraitu devī manīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājīty udgātā dhārām anumantrayate
GV02pncvbr1u:811: (PB 6.6.17) āyuṣe me pavasva varcase me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāyety āha mahyaṃ tejase brahmavarcasāyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:812: (PB 6.6.18) eṣa vai somasyodgītho yat pavate somodgītham eva sāma gāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:813: (PB 6.6.19) ācchinnaṃ pāvayanti yajñaṃ caiva prāṇāṃś ca saṃtanvanti saṃtataṃ pāvayanti yajñasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:814: (PB 6.7.1) bṛhaspatir vai devānām udagāyat taṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsan sa ya eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopādhāvat
GV02pncvbr1u:815: (PB 6.7.2) sūryo mā divābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ pārthivābhyaḥ svāheti juhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:816: (PB 6.7.3) ete vā eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopāsarat
GV02pncvbr1u:817: (PB 6.7.4) karoti vācā vīryaṃ na sadasyām ārtim ārcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:818: (PB 6.7.5) vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat tāṃ devā anvamantrayanta sā 'bravīd abhāgāsmi
GV02pncvbr1u:819: bhāgadheyaṃ me 'stv iti kas te bhāgadheyaṃ kuryād ity udgātāra ity abravīd udgātāro
GV02pncvbr1u:821: (PB 6.7.6) tasyai juhuyād bekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāheti
GV02pncvbr1u:822: (PB 6.7.7) vāh vai sarasvatī tām eva tad bhāgadheyenārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:823: (PB 6.7.8) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaitām āhutiṃ juhuyād vācaṃ manasā dhyāyed vācam evāsya vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:824: (PB 6.7.9) bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti svargam eva tal lokaṃ sarpanti
GV02pncvbr1u:825: (PB 6.7.10) prakvāṇā iva sarpanti pratikūlam iva hītaḥ svargo lokaḥ tsaranta iva sarpanti mṛgadharmo vai yajño yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:826: (PB 6.7.11) vācaṃ yacchanti yajñam eva tad yacchanti yad vyavavadeyur yajñaṃ nirbrūyus tasmān na vyavavadyam
GV02pncvbr1u:827: (PB 6.7.12) pañcartvijaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpanti pā-nkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam eva saṃtanvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:828: (PB 6.7.13) yadi prastotāvacchidyate yajñasya śiraś chidyate brahmaṇe varaṃ dattvā sa eva punar vartavyaś chinnam eva tat pratidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:829: (PB 6.7.14) yady udgātāvacchidyate yajñena yajamāno vyṛdhyate 'dakṣiṇaḥ sa yajñakratuḥ saṃsthāpyo 'thānya āhṛtyas tasmin deyaṃ yāvad dāsyan
GV02pncvbr1u:830: (PB 6.7.15) yadi pratihartā 'vacchidyate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai pratihartā sarvavedasaṃ deyaṃ yadi sarvavedasaṃ na dadāti sarvajyāniṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:832: (PB 6.7.17) yajamāno vai prastaro yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ harati
GV02pncvbr1u:833: (PB 6.7.18) yajño vai devebhyo 'śvo bhūtvāpākrāmat taṃ devāḥ prastareṇāsamayaṃs tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:834: aśvaḥ prastareṇa saṃmṛjyamāna upāvarabhate yad adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:835: (PB 6.7.19) prajāpatiḥ paśun asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā aśanāyanto 'pākrāmaṃs tebhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:836: prastaram annaṃ prāyacchat enam upāvartanta tasmād adhvaryuṇā prastara īṣad iva vidhūyo
GV02pncvbr1u:837: vidhūtim iva hi tṛṇaṃ paśava upāvartante
GV02pncvbr1u:838: (PB 6.7.20) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:841: (PB 6.7.23) aṣṭhīvatopaspṛśatodgeyaṃ tenāsya havir askannaṃ bhavati na yajamānaṃ svargāl lokād avagṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:842: (PB 6.7.24) cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanty atra vā asāv āditya āsīt ta
GV02pncvbr1u:843: devā bahiṣpavamānena svargaṃl lokam aharan yac cātvālam avekṣya bahiṣpavamānaṃ stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:844: yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ haranti
GV02pncvbr1u:845: (PB 6.8.1) sa tu vai yajñena yajetety āhur yasya virājaṃ yajñamukhe dadhyur iti
GV02pncvbr1u:846: (PB 6.8.2) navabhiḥ stuvanti hiṅkāro daśamo daśākṣarā virāḍ virājam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:847: (PB 6.8.3) navabhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāḥ prāṇair evainaṃ samarddhayanti hiṅkāro daśamas tasmān nābhir anavatṛṇṇā daśamī prāṇānām
GV02pncvbr1u:848: (PB 6.8.4) navabhiḥ stuvanti navādhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti tān eva tat pāvayanti teṣāṃ prāṇān utsṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:849: (PB 6.8.5) prajāpatir vai hiṅkāras trayo bahiṣpavamānyo yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti mithunam evāsyā yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:850: (PB 6.8.6) eṣa vai stomasya yogo yad dhiṅkāro yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti yuktenaiva stomena prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:851: (PB 6.8.7) eṣa vai sāmnāṃ raso yad dhiṅkāro yad dhiṅkṛtya prastauti rasenaivaitā abhyudya prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:852: (PB 6.8.8) āraṇyebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad bahiṣpavamānam ekārūpābhiḥ stuvanti tasmād ekarūpā āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:853: (PB 6.8.9) parācībhiḥ stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prajāyante parāñco vitiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:854: (PB 6.8.10) apariśrite stuvanti tasmād aparigṛhītā āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:855: (PB 6.8.11) bahiḥ stuvanty antar anuśaṃsanti tasmād grāmam āhṛtair bhuñjate
