GV02pncvbr1u:856: (PB 6.8.12) grāmebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad ājyair nānārūpaiḥ stuvanti tasmān nānārūpā grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:857: (PB 6.8.13) punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmāt pretvaryaḥ pretya punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:858: (PB 6.8.14) pariśrite stuvanti tasmāt parigṛhītā grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:859: (PB 6.8.15) amuṣmai vā etal lokāya stuvanti yad bahiṣpavamānaṃ sakṛd dhiṅkṛtābhiḥ parācībhiḥ stuvanti sakṛd dhīto 'sau parāṅ lokaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:860: (PB 6.8.16) asmai vā etal lokāya stuvanti yad ājyaiḥ punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmād ayaṃl lokaḥ punaḥ-punaḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:861: (PB 6.8.17) parāñco vā eteṣāṃ prāṇā bahvantīty āhur ye parācībhir bahiṣpavamānībhiḥ stuvata ity āvatīm uttamāṃ gāyet prāṇānāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:862: (PB 6.8.18) cyavante vā ete 'smāl lokād ity āhur ye parācībhir bahiṣpavamānībhiḥ stuvata iti rathantaravarṇam uttamāṃ gāyed iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:863: (PB 6.9.1) upāsmai gāyata nara iti grāmakāmāyapratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:864: (PB 6.9.2) naro vai devānāṃ grāmo grāmam evāsmā upākaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:866: (PB 6.9.4) upoṣu jātam apturam iti prajākāmāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:867: (PB 6.9.5) upa vai prajā tāṃ jātam ity evājījanat
GV02pncvbr1u:868: (PB 6.9.6) sa naḥ pasvasya śaṃ gava iti pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:869: (PB 6.9.7) yāṃ samāṃ mahādevaḥ paśūn hanyāt sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gava iti catuṣpade bheṣajaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:870: (PB 6.9.8) śaṃ janāyeti dvipade śam arvata ity ekaśaphāya
GV02pncvbr1u:871: (PB 6.9.9) viṣeṇa vai tāṃ samām oṣadhayo 'ktā bhavanti yāṃ samāṃ mahādevaḥ paśūn
GV02pncvbr1u:872: hanti yac chaṃ rājann oṣadhībhya ity āhauṣadhīr evāsmai svadayaty ubhayyo 'smai svaditāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:874: (PB 6.9.10) pavasva vāco agriya iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yaṃ kāmayeta samānānāṃ śīreṣṭhaḥ syād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:875: (PB 6.9.11) pavasva vāco agriya ity agram evainaṃ pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:876: (PB 6.9.12) śrīr vai vāco 'graṃ śriyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:877: (PB 6.9.13) ete asṛgram indava iti bahubhyaḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:878: (PB 6.9.14) eta iti sarvān evainān ṛddhyai bhūtyā abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:879: (PB 6.9.15) eta iti vai prajāpatir devān asṛjatāsṛgram iti manuṣyān indava iti pitṝṃs tiraḥ pavitra iti grahān āśava iti stotraṃv viśvānīti śastram abhi saubhagety anyāḥ prajāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:880: (PB 6.9.16) yad eta iti tasmād yāvanta evāgre devās tāvanta idānīm
GV02pncvbr1u:881: (PB 6.9.17) sarvān vṛddhim ārdhnuvaṃ sthiteva hy eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:882: (PB 6.9.18) yad asṛgram iti tasmān manuṣyāḥ śvaḥ-śvaḥ sṛjyante
GV02pncvbr1u:883: (PB 6.9.19) yad indava itīndava iva hi pitaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:885: (PB 6.9.21) yāntāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭā ṛddhim ārdhnuvaṃs tām ṛdhnuvanti yeṣām evaṃv vidvān etāṃ pratipadaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:886: (PB 6.9.22) chandāṃsi vai somam āharaṃs taṃ gandharvo viśvāvasuḥ paryamuṣṇāt. tenāpaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:887: prāviśat taṃ devatā anvaicchaṃs taṃ viṣṇur apsu paryapaśyat sa vyakāṅkṣad ayaṃ nū3
GV02pncvbr1u:888: nā3 iti taṃ padā prāsphurat tasmāt pṛthag indavo 'sṛjyanta sa devatābhyo 'bhitas
GV02pncvbr1u:889: tiṣṭhantībhya ete asṛgram indava iti prābravīd bahiṣpavamānena vai yajñaḥ sṛjyate
GV02pncvbr1u:890: yad ete asṛgram indava iti prastauti yajñam eva tat sṛṣṭaṃ devatābhyaḥ prāha
GV02pncvbr1u:891: (PB 6.9.23) vyṛddhaṃ vā etad apaśavyaṃ yat prātaḥsavanam aniḍaṃ hi yad iḍām asmabhyaṃ saṃyatam ity āha prātaḥsavanam eva tad iḍāvat paśumat
GV02pncvbr1u:893: (PB 6.9.25) davidyūtatyā receti vai gāyatryā rūpaṃ pariṣṭobhantyeti triṣṭubhaḥ kṛpety
GV02pncvbr1u:894: anuṣṭubhaḥ somāḥ śukrā gavāśira iti jagatyāḥ sarveṣāṃ vā eṣā cchandasāṃ rūpaṃ cchandāṃsīva
GV02pncvbr1u:895: khalu vai vratopadeṣā pratipad bhavati svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:896: (PB 6.9.26) vṛddhā vā eta indriyeṇa vīryeṇa yad vrāta indriyaṃ vīryaṃ chandāṃsīndriyeṇaivainān vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:897: (PB 6.10.1) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:898: (PB 6.10.2) apūtā iva vā ete yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate yady eṣāgnipāvamānī pratipad bhavaty agnir evainān niṣṭapati pavamānaḥ punāti
GV02pncvbr1u:899: (PB 6.10.3) yad āyūṃṣīty āha ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:900: (PB 6.10.4) ā no mitrāvaruṇeti jyogāmayāvine pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:901: (PB 6.10.5) apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānāv evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:902: (PB 6.10.6) apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇa ity anṛtam abhiśasyamānāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:903: (PB 6.10.7) arāvāṇo vā ete ye 'nṛtam abhiśaṃsanti tān evāsmād apahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:904: (PB 6.10.8) gacchann indrasya niṣkṛtam iti pūtam evainaṃ yajñiyam indrasya niṣkṛtaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:905: (PB 6.10.9) vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti rājanyāya pratipadaṃ kuryād vṛṣā vai rājanyo vṛṣāṇam evainaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:906: (PB 6.10.10) marutvate ca matsara iti maruto vai devānāṃ viśo viśam evāsmā anu niyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:907: (PB 6.10.11) viśvā dadhāna ojasety ojasaivāsmai vīryeṇa viśaṃ purastāt parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:908: (PB 6.10.12) pavasvendo vṛṣāsuta iti pratipadaṃ kuryād yaḥ kāmayeta jane ma ṛdhyeteti
GV02pncvbr1u:909: (PB 6.10.13) kṛdhī no yaśaso jana iti janatāyām evāsmā ṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:910: (PB 6.10.14) yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥ patī iti dvābhyāṃ pratipadaṃ kuryāt samāvadbhājāv evainau yajñasya karoty ubhau yajñayaśasenārpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:911: (PB 6.10.15) prāsya dhārā akṣarann iti vṛṣṭikāmāya pratipadaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:912: (PB 6.10.16) prāsya dhārā akṣarann iti divo vṛṣṭiṃ cyāvayati vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasa ity antarikṣāt
GV02pncvbr1u:913: (PB 6.10.17) devāṃ anu prabhūṣata ity asmin loke pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:914: (PB 6.10.18) ojasā vā etad vīryeṇa pradīyate yad aprattaṃ bhavati yad vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasa ity āhaujasaivāsmai vīryeṇa divo vṛṣṭiṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:915: (PB 6.10.19) tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgamañ janyāsa up no gṛham iti pratipadaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:916: kuryād yaḥ kāmayetopa mā janyā gāvo nameyur vindeta me janyā gā rāṣṭram iti yad eṣā
GV02pncvbr1u:917: pratipad bhavaty upainaṃ janyā gāvo namanti vindate 'sya janyā gā rāṣṭram
GV02pncvbr1u:918: (PB 7.1.1) ime vai lokā gāyatraṃ tryāvṛd geyaṃ trayo hīme lokā yat tryāvṛd gāyaty ebhir evainaṃ lokaiḥ saṃmimīte
GV02pncvbr1u:920: (PB 7.1.3) yat trir avanardaty ati tad gāyatraṃ recayati
GV02pncvbr1u:921: (PB 7.1.4) yo vai gāyatreṇāpratihṛtenodgāyaty apratiṣṭhāno bhavati hiṅkāro vai gāyatrasya pratihāraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:922: (PB 7.1.5) sa manasā dhyeyaḥ pratihṛtena gāyatreṇodgāyati pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:923: (PB 7.1.6) yo vā ebhyo lokebhyo gāyatraṃ gāyati naibhyo lokebhya āvṛścyata ima enaṃ lokā ūrjjābhisaṃvasate
GV02pncvbr1u:924: (PB 7.1.7) mandram ivāgra ādadītātha tārataram atha tāratamaṃ tad ebhyo lokebhyo 'gāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:925: (PB 7.1.8) aniruktaṃ geyam etad vai gāyatrasya krūraṃ yan niruktaṃ yad aniruktaṃ gāyati krūram evāsya parivṛṇakti
GV02pncvbr1u:926: (PB 7.1.9) prāṇo gāyatraṃ na vyavānyāt prāṇasyāvicchedāya yadi vyavāniti pramāyuko bhavati yadi na vyavāniti sarvam āyur eti
GV02pncvbr1u:927: (PB 7.1.10) yadi vyavānyān madhya ṛco vyavānyāt prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇam eva tan madhyata ātman dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti
GV02pncvbr1u:928: (PB 7.1.11) iḍāṃ paśukāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt svaḥ svargakāmāya yaśo brahmavarcasakāmāyāyur āmayāvine haṃsīty abhicarate
GV02pncvbr1u:930: (PB 7.1.13) brahmavarcasasī paśumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:931: (PB 7.2.1) prajāpatir devebhya ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ kṛtvā prāyacchat te 'nyo 'nyasmā agrāya nātiṣṭhanta tān abravīd ājim asminn iteti ta ājim āyan yad ājim āyaṃs tad ājyānām ājyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:932: (PB 7.2.2) sa indro 'ved agnir vā idam agra ujjyeṣyatīti so 'bravīd yataro nāv idam
GV02pncvbr1u:933: agra ujjayat tan nau saheti so 'gnir agra udajayad atha mitrāvaruṇāv athendro 'thaiṣaikā
GV02pncvbr1u:934: hotrānujjitāsīt sa indro 'gnim abravīd yat sahāvocāvahī yan nau tad iti saiṣaindrāgny
GV02pncvbr1u:937: (PB 7.2.4) ṣaḍdhā vihito yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:938: (PB 7.2.5) sarvāṇi svārāṇy ājyāni taj jāmi nānādevatyaiḥ stuvanty ajāmitāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:939: (PB 7.2.6) grāmyebhyo vā etat paśubhyaḥ stuvanti yad ājyaiḥ punarabhyāvartaṃ stuvanti tasmāt parāñcaḥ prājyante pratyañcaḥ prajāyante tasmād u pretya punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:941: (PB 7.3.2) tribhiś ca cchandobhiḥ pañcabhiś ca sāmabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:942: (PB 7.3.3) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti mādhyandinam eva tat savanaṃ pāvayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:943: (PB 7.3.4) etāvanti vāva sarvāṇi sāmāni yāvanti mādhyandine pavamāne
GV02pncvbr1u:945: (PB 7.3.6) yan mādhyandinena pavamānena stuvanti sarvair eva tat sāmabhiḥ stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:946: (PB 7.3.7) ātmā vai yajñasya pavamāno mukhaṃ gāyatrī prāṇo gāyatraṃ yad gāyatryāṃ gāyatreṇa stuvanti mukhata eva tat prāṇān dadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:947: (PB 7.3.8) prāṇāpānā vā etāni cchandāṃsi prāṇo gāyatrī vyāno bṛhaty apānas triṣṭub yad etaiś chandobhiḥ stuvanti prāṇāpānānām avicchedāya
GV02pncvbr1u:948: (PB 7.3.9) ime vai lokā etāni cchandāṃsy ayam eva gāyatry ayaṃ madhyamo bṛhaty asāv uttamas triṣṭub yad etaś chandobhiḥ saṃhitaiḥ stuvanty eṣāṃ lokānām avicchedāya
GV02pncvbr1u:949: (PB 7.3.10) yad anyac chando 'ntarā vyaveyād imāṃl lokān vicchindyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:950: (PB 7.3.11) gāyatreṇa stutvā nidhanavatā stuvantīyaṃ vai gāyatry asyām eva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:951: (PB 7.3.12) yad anidhanenāgre stuyur anāyatano yajamānaḥ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:952: (PB 7.3.13) nidhanavatā stuvanti vīryaṃ vai gāyatrī vīryaṃ nidhanaṃ vīryeṇaiva tad vīryaṃ samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:954: (PB 7.3.15) paśavo vā iḍā paśavo bṛhatī paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:957: (PB 7.3.18) abaliṣṭha iva vā ayaṃ madhyami lokas tasyaiva tad āyatanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:958: (PB 7.3.19) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati trīṇi savanānāṃ chidrāṇi tāni tenāpidhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:959: (PB 7.3.20) triṇidhanaṃ bhavati traya ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:960: (PB 7.3.21) triṇidhanaṃ bhavaty etena vai mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ yat triṇidhanaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:961: (PB 7.3.22) dvyakṣarāṇi nidhanāni bhavanti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣthāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:963: (PB 7.3.24) yan nidhanavat syād yajamānaṃ svargāl lokān nirhanyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:965: (PB 7.3.26) svareṇa vai devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pradīyate svareṇaiva tad devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:967: (PB 7.3.28) prāṇo vai gāyatraṃ prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evatad ubhayato dadhāti tasmād ubhayataḥ prāṇāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:968: (PB 7.3.29) yad gāyatraṃ purastād bhavati svāram antataḥ prāṇair eva praity apāne pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:969: (PB 7.4.1) etad vai yajñasya svargyaṃ yan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ mādhyandinasya pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:970: pavamānasya bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante svargasyaiva tal lokasyāyatane dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:971: (PB 7.4.2) devā vai cchandāṃsy abruvan yuṣmābhiḥ svargyaṃl lokam ayāmeti te gāyatrīṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:972: prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvaṃs triṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvañ jagatīṃ prāyuñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:973: tayā na vyāpnuvann anuṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayālpakādi na vyāpnuvaṃs ta āsāṃ diśāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:974: rasān prabṛhya catvāry akṣarāṇy upādadhuḥ sā bṛhaty abhavat tayemāṃl lokān vyāpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:975: (PB 7.4.3) bṛhatī maryā yayemāṃl lokān vyāpāmeti tad bṛhatyā bṛhattvam
GV02pncvbr1u:976: (PB 7.4.4) paśūn vā asyāntān upādadhuḥ paśavo vai bṛhatī yad bṛhatyāḥ stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante sva eva tad āyatane dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:977: (PB 7.4.5) yan nv ity āhur anyāni cchandāṃsi varṣīyāṃsi kasmād bṛhaty ucyata eṣā
GV02pncvbr1u:978: hīmāṃl lokān vyāpnon nānyac chandaḥ kiṃ cana yāni sapta caturuttarāṇi cchandāṃsi
GV02pncvbr1u:979: tāni bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyante tasmād bṛhaty ucyate
GV02pncvbr1u:980: (PB 7.4.6) yan nv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kasmād bṛhatyā madhyandine stuvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:981: (PB 7.4.7) bahiṣpavamānena vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃl lokam aharan sa nādhriyata taṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:982: bṛhatyā madhyandine 'stabhnuvaṃs tasmād bṛhatyā madhyandinaṃ stuvanty ādityaṃ hy
GV02pncvbr1u:984: (PB 7.4.8) yair u kaiś ca cchandobhir madhyandine stuvanti tāni triṣṭubham abhi saṃpadyante tasmāt triṣṭubho nayanti mādhyandināt savanāt
GV02pncvbr1u:985: (PB 7.5.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa śocann amahīyamāno 'tiṣṭhat
GV02pncvbr1u:986: sa etad āmahīyavam apaśyat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā amahīyanta yad amahīyanta tasmād āmahīyavam
GV02pncvbr1u:987: (PB 7.5.2) tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tāsāṃ divi sad bhūmy ādada iti prāṇān ādatta
GV02pncvbr1u:988: tā enaṃ prāṇeṣv ātteṣu punar upāvartanta tābhya ugraṃ śarma mahi śrava iti punaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:989: prāṇān prāyacchat tā asmād ud evāyodhaṃs tāsāṃ stauṣa iti manyūn avāśṛṇāt tato vai
GV02pncvbr1u:991: (PB 7.5.3) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:992: (PB 7.5.4) prajānāṃ ca vā eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ pāpavasīyaś ca vidhṛtir yad āmahīyavam
GV02pncvbr1u:993: (PB 7.5.5) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:994: (PB 7.5.6) devā vai yaśaskāmāḥ sattram āsatāgnir indro vāyur makhas te 'bruvsn yan
GV02pncvbr1u:995: no yaśa ṛcchāt tan naḥ sahāsad iti teṣā makhaṃ yaśa ārcchat tad ādāyāpākrāmat tad
GV02pncvbr1u:996: asya prāsahāditsanta taṃ paryayatanta svadhanuḥ pratiṣṭhābhyātiṣṭhat tasya dhanurārtnir
GV02pncvbr1u:997: ūrdhvā patitvā śiro 'cchinat sa pravargyo 'bhavad yajño vai makho yat pravargyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:999: (PB 7.5.7) tad devā yaśo vyabhajanta tasyāgnī rauravaṃ prābṛhata
GV02pncvbr1u:1000: (PB 7.5.8) tad vai sa paśuvīryaṃ prābṛhata paśavo vai rauravam
GV02pncvbr1u:1003: (PB 7.5.11) asurā vai devān paryayatanta tata etāv agnī rūrau viṣvañcau stobhāv apaśyat tābhyām enān pratyauṣat te pratyuṣyamāṇā aravanta yad aravanta tasmād rauravam
GV02pncvbr1u:1004: (PB 7.5.12) athendro yaudhājayaṃ prābṛhata tad vai sa vajraṃ prābṛhata vajro vai yaudhājayam
GV02pncvbr1u:1005: (PB 7.5.13) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1009: (PB 7.5.17) tad vai sa prāṇvīryaṃ prābṛhata prāṇā vā auśanam
GV02pncvbr1u:1010: (PB 7.5.18) sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1012: (PB 7.5.20) uśanā vai kāvyo 'surāṇāṃ purohita āsīt taṃ devāḥ kāmadughābhir apāmantrayanta tasmā etāny auśanāni prāyacchan kāmadughā vā auśanāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1013: (PB 7.5.21) kāmadughā enam upatiṣṭhante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1014: (PB 7.6.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa tūṣṇīṃ manasādhyāyat tasya yan manasy āsīt tad bṛhat samabhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1015: (PB 7.6.2) sa ādadhīta garbho vai me 'yam antarhitas taṃv vācā prajanayā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1016: (PB 7.6.3) sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sā vāg rathantaram anvapadyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1017: (PB 7.6.4) ratham aryāḥ kṣeplātārīd iti tad rathantarasya rathantaratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1018: (PB 7.6.5) tato bṛhad anu prājāyata bṛhan maryā idaṃ sa jyog antarabhūd iti tad bṛhato bṛhattvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1019: (PB 7.6.6) yathā vai putro jyeṣṭha evaṃ bṛhat prajāpateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1021: (PB 7.6.8) pra jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1022: (PB 7.6.9) yan nv ity āhur bṛhat pūrvaṃ prajāpatau samabhavat kasmād rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśa iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1023: (PB 7.6.10) bṛhad eva pūrvaṃ samabhavad rathantaraṃ tu pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyāsṛjata tasmāt pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:1024: (PB 7.6.11) tayoḥ samānaṃ nidhanam āsīt tasmin nātiṣṭhetāṃ ta ājim aitāṃ tayor has iti bṛhat prāṇam udajayad as iti rathantaram apānam abhisamaveṣṭata
GV02pncvbr1u:1025: (PB 7.6.12) prāṇāpānau vai bṛhadrathantare jyog āmayāvina ubhe kuryād apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānāv evāsmin
GV02pncvbr1u:1026: (PB 7.6.13) yan nv ity āhur ubhe bṛhadrathantare bahirṇidhane kasmād bṛhad bahirṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntarṇidhanāni rathantaram iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1027: (PB 7.6.14) prāṇo bṛhat tasmād bahirṇidhanāni bhajate bahir hi prāṇo 'pāno rathantaraṃ tasmād antarṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntar hy apānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1029: (PB 7.6.16) yad vai mahāvṛkṣau samṛcchete bahu tatra vibhagnaṃ prabhagnaṃ śete
GV02pncvbr1u:1030: (PB 7.6.17) airaṃ vai bṛhad aiḍaṃ rathantaraṃ mano vai bṛhad vāg rathantaraṃ sām
GV02pncvbr1u:1031: a vai bṛhad ṛg rathantaraṃ prāṇo vai bṛhad apāno rathantaram asau vai loko bṛhad
GV02pncvbr1u:1032: ayaṃ rathantaram etāni manasānvīkṣyodgāyet kḷptābhyām evābhyām udgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1034: ṛcaḥ prastauty aṣṭāśaphāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1035: (PB 7.7.2) dvyakṣareṇottarayor ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1036: (PB 7.7.3) pañcākṣareṇa rathantarasya pratiharati pāṅktāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1037: (PB 7.7.4) caturakṣareṇa bṛhataḥ pratiharati catuṣpadas tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1038: (PB 7.7.5) na vai bṛhan na rathantaram ekaṃ chando 'yacchat tataḥ kakubhāv uttare
GV02pncvbr1u:1039: upādadhus tasmād bṛhatī prathamā kakubhāv uttare tasmād bṛhadrathantare ekarcena
GV02pncvbr1u:1040: kurvanti na hi te ekaṃ chando 'yacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:1041: (PB 7.7.6) nava bṛhato rohān rohati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇān evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1042: (PB 7.7.7) trīn prathamāyāṃ rohati bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyat tān evāvarundhe trīn madhyamāyāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1043: rohaty ātmānaṃ prajāṃ paś+ūṃs tān evāvarundhe trīn uttamāyāṃ rohati traya ime lokā
GV02pncvbr1u:1045: (PB 7.7.8) sarvān kāmān avarundhe ya evaṃv vidvān bṛhato rohān rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1046: (PB 7.7.9) vajreṇa vā etat prastotodgātāram abhipravartayati yad rathantaraṃ prastauti samudram antardhāyodgāyed vāg ity ādeyaṃv vāg vai samudraḥ samudram evāntardadhāty ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1047: (PB 7.7.10) balavad geyaṃ vajram evaṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyudgṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1048: (PB 7.7.11) balvalā kurvatā geyam abhilobhayateva vajram evābhilobhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1050: (PB 7.7.13) devaratho vai rathantaram akṣareṇākṣareṇa pratiṣṭhāpayatodgeyam areṇāreṇa hi rathaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1051: (PB 7.7.14) yo vai devaratham ananvālabhyātiṣṭhaty avāsmāt padyata iyaṃ vai devaratha imām ālabhyodgāyen nāsmād avapadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1052: (PB 7.7.15) īśvaraṃ vai rathantaram udgātuś cakṣuḥ pramathitoḥ prastuyamāne saṃmīlet svardṛśaṃ prativīkṣeta nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1053: (PB 7.7.16) prajananaṃ vai rathantaraṃ yat tasthuṣa ity āhāsthāyukodgātur vāg bhavaty
GV02pncvbr1u:1054: api prajananaṃ hanty asthuṣa iti vaktavyaṃ susthuṣa iti vā sthāyukodgātur vāg bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1056: (PB 7.7.17) pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta tair devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ rathantaraṃ mahimnā nāśaknod utpatat
GV02pncvbr1u:1057: (PB 7.7.18) tasya vaśiṣṭho mahimno vinidhāya tena stutvā svargaṃl lokam ait tān saṃbhṛtyodgāyet
GV02pncvbr1u:1058: (PB 7.7.19) yas te goṣu mahimā yas te apsu rathe vā te stanayitnau ya u te yas te agnau mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇavan na edhi
GV02pncvbr1u:1059: (PB 7.8.1) apo vā ṛtvyam ārcchat tāsāṃv vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vasu vāmaṃ samabhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1060: tasmin mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatāṃ tāv abrūtāṃv vāmaṃ maryā idaṃ deveṣv ājānīti tasmād vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1061: (PB 7.8.2) tat parigṛhṇantāv abrūtām idam avidāvedaṃ nau mābhyartiḍhvam iti tat prajāpatir abravīn mad vā etad dhy ajani mama vā etad iti tad agnir abravīn māṃ (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1062: vā etad annam ajani mama vā etad iti tad indro 'bravīc chreṣṭhasthā vā etad ahaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1063: vaḥ śreṣṭho 'smi mama vā etad iti tad viśve devā abruvann asmaddevatyaṃ vā etad yad
GV02pncvbr1u:1064: adbhyo 'dhi samabhūd asmākaṃ vā etad iti tat prajāpatir abravīt sarveṣāṃ na idam
GV02pncvbr1u:1065: astu sarva idam upajīvāmeti tat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ sarvadevatyaṃ vai vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1066: (PB 7.8.3) yat kavatīṣu tena prājāpatyaṃ ko hi prajāpatir yad aniruktāsu tena prājāpatyam anirukto hi prajāpatiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1067: (PB 7.8.4) yad gāyatrīṣu tenāgneyaṃ gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1068: (PB 7.8.5) yat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadadhus tenaindraṃ sarvāṇi hi pṛṣṭhānīndrasya niṣkevalyāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1070: (PB 7.8.7) yad bahudevatyam uttamaṃ padaṃ tena vaiśvadevaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1071: (PB 7.8.8) prajāpatir vā etāṃ gāyatrīṃ yonim apaśyat sa ādīdhītāsmād yoneḥ pṛṣṭhāni sṛjā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1072: (PB 7.8.9) sa rathantaram asṛjata tad rathasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1073: (PB 7.8.10) sa bṛhad asṛjata tat stanayitnor ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata sa vairūpam asṛjata tad vā tasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1074: (PB 7.8.11) sa vairūpam asṛjata tad agner ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1075: (PB 7.8.12) sa śakvarīr asṛjata tad apāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1076: (PB 7.8.13) sa revatīr asṛjata tad gavāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1077: (PB 7.8.14) etair vā etāni saha ghoṣair asṛjyanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1078: (PB 7.8.15) sarve 'smin ghoṣāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyā vāco vadanti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1082: (PB 7.9.4) yad dhi putro 'śāntaṃ carati pitā tac chamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1083: (PB 7.9.5) ayaṃ vai loko madhyamo vāmadevyam etasmād vā imau lokau viṣvañcāv asṛjyetāṃ bṛhac ca ratantaraṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1084: (PB 7.9.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvanti ye rathantarāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1085: yad bṛhatā stuvanti ye bārhatāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti te vāmadevyasya stotreṇāvaruddhāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1087: (PB 7.9.8) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1088: (PB 7.9.9) antarikṣaṃ vai vāmadevyam adhūnvatevodgeyam adhūtam ivāntarikṣaṃ paśavo vai vāmadevyam ahiṃsatevodgeyaṃ paśūnām ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1089: (PB 7.9.10) katham iva vāmadevyaṃ geyam ity āhuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1090: (PB 7.9.11) yathāṅkulī putrān saṃdaśyāsaṃbhindantī harati yathā vāto 'psu śanair vāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1092: (PB 7.9.13) yo vai svadhūr vāmadevyaṃ gāyati svadhūr bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1093: (PB 7.9.14) yāty asyānyo niyānena nānyasya niyānena yāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1094: (PB 7.9.15) na bṛhato na rathantarasyānurūpaṃ geyaṃ svenaivāyatanena geyam āyatanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1095: (PB 7.9.16) devā vai paśūn vyabhajanta te rudram antarāyaṃs tān vāmadevyasya stotra upekṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:1097: (PB 7.9.18) yan nirāha rudrāya paśūn apidadhāti rudras tāṃ samāṃ paśūn dhātuko bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1099: (PB 7.9.20) āpo vai revatyaḥ paśavo vāmadevyam adbhya evāsmai paśūn prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1100: (PB 7.9.21) anavartiḥ paśuto bhavati prajā svasya mīliteva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1102: (PB 7.10.1) imau vai lokau sahāstāṃ tau viyantāv abrūtāṃv vivāhaṃv vivahāvahai saha nāv astv iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1103: (PB 7.10.2) tayor ayam amuṣmai śyaitaṃ prāyacchan naudhasam asāv asmai
GV02pncvbr1u:1104: (PB 7.10.3) tata enayor nidhane viparyakrāmatāṃ devavivāho vai śyaitanaudhase
GV02pncvbr1u:1105: (PB 7.10.4) pravasīyāṃsaṃ vivāham āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1106: (PB 7.10.5) ito vā ime lokā ūrdhvāḥ kalpamānā yanty amuto 'rvāñcaḥ kalpamānā āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1107: (PB 7.10.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvantīmaṃl lokaṃ tena yunakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena naudhasenāmuṃ yad bṛhatā stuvanty amuṃl lokaṃ tena yanakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena śyaitenemam
GV02pncvbr1u:1108: (PB 7.10.7) kḷptān imāl lokān upāste ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1109: (PB 7.10.8) bṛhadrathantare vai śaitanaudhase yad rathantarāya naudhasaṃ prati prayuñjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1110: bṛhad evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti bṛhad dhy etat paro'kṣaṃ yan naudhasaṃ yad bṛhate
GV02pncvbr1u:1111: śyaitaṃ prati prayuñjanti rathantaram evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti rathantaraṃ hy
GV02pncvbr1u:1113: (PB 7.10.9) ubhabhyāṃ bṛhadrathantarābhyāṃ stute ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1114: (PB 7.10.10) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tāṃ nodhāḥ kākṣīvata āgacchat te 'bruvann
GV02pncvbr1u:1115: ṛṣir na āgaṃs tasmai brahma dadāmeti tasmā etat sāma prāyacchaṃs tasmān naudhasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1119: (PB 7.10.13) prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān etena sāmnābhivyāharat
GV02pncvbr1u:1120: te 'smā atiṣṭhanta te śetyā abhavan yac chetyā abhavaṃs tasmāc chyaitaṃ paśavo vai śyaitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1122: (PB 7.10.15) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā aśocaṃs tāḥ śyaitena huṃmā ity abhyajighrat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃ vidvāñ chyaitenodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1123: (PB 7.10.16) eṣa vai yajamānasya prajāpatir yad udgātā yac chyaitena hiṅ karoti prajāpatir eva bhūtvā prajā abhijihgrati
GV02pncvbr1u:1124: (PB 7.10.17) vasunidhanaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vasu paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1125: (PB 8.1.1) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃv vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanam abhicaraṇīyasya brahmasāma kuryād abhinidhanaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne
GV02pncvbr1u:1126: (PB 8.1.2) deveṣur vā eṣā yad vaṣatkāro 'bhīti vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharad abhītyevāsmai vajraṃ prahṛtya deveṣv ā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vidhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1127: (PB 8.1.3) traikakubhaṃ paśukāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣa ity etāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:1128: (PB 8.1.4) indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta rāyovājo
GV02pncvbr1u:1129: bṛhadgiriḥ pṛthuraśmis te 'bruvan ko naḥ putrān bhariṣyantīty aham intīndro 'bravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1130: tāṃs trikakub adhinidhāyācarat sa etat sāmāpaśyad yat trikakub apaśyat tasmāt traikakubham
GV02pncvbr1u:1131: (PB 8.1.5) sa ātmānam eva punar upādhāvat tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1132: na tvad anyo maghavann asti ca marḍitendra bravīmi te vaca iti sa etena ca pragāthenaitena
GV02pncvbr1u:1133: sāmnā sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata tān ebhyaḥ prāyacchat te pratyatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:1134: (PB 8.1.6) yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syād yah pratiṣṭhākāma etasmin pragātha etena sāmnā stuvīta pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1135: (PB 8.1.7) trivīryaṃ vā etat sāma trīndriyam aindrya ṛca aindraṃ sāmaindreti nidhanam indriya eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1137: (PB 8.1.9) ime vai lokāḥ sahāsaṃs te 'śocantaṃs teṣām indra etena sāmnā śucam apāhan yat trayāṇāṃ śocatām apāhaṃs tasmāt traiśokam
GV02pncvbr1u:1138: (PB 8.1.10) yāsmād apāhan sā puṃścalīṃ prāviśad yām antarikṣāt sā klībaṃ yām amuṣmāt sainasvinam
GV02pncvbr1u:1139: (PB 8.1.11) tasmāt teṣāṃ nāśaitavyā ya eṣām āśāmeti tasmā eva śuco 'pabhajate
GV02pncvbr1u:1140: (PB 8.1.12) śucā vā eṣa viddho yasya jyog āmayati yat traiśokaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śucam evāsmād apahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1141: (PB 8.1.13) diveti nidhanam upayanti vyuṣṭir vai divā vy evāsmai vāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1143: (PB 8.2.2) kaṇvo vā etat sāmarte nidhanam apaśyat sa na pratyatiṣṭhat sa vṛṣadaṃśasyāṣiti
GV02pncvbr1u:1144: kṣuvata upāśṛṇot sa tad eva nidhanam apaśyat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhad yad etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1147: (PB 8.2.4) vasiṣṭho vā etat putrahataḥ sāmāpaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad etat sāma bhavati prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1149: (PB 8.2.6) atharvāṇo vā etal lokākāmāḥ sāmāpaśyaṃs tenāmartyaṃl lokam apaśyan yad etat sāma bhavati svargasya lokasya prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1151: (PB 8.2.8) abhīvartena vai devā asurān abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati bhrātṛvyasyābhivṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1153: (PB 8.2.10) prajāpatir uṣasam adhyait svāṃ duhitaraṃ tasya retaḥ parāpatat tad asyāṃ nyaṣicyata tad aśrīṇād idaṃ me mā duṣad iti tat sad akarot paśūn eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1154: (PB 8.2.11) yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śrīṇāti caivenaṃ sac ca karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1155: (PB 8.3.1) devāś ca vā asurāś caiṣu lokeṣv aspardhanta te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:1156: tebhya etat sāma prāyacchad etenainān kālayiṣyaddham iti tenainān ebhyo lokebhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:1158: (PB 8.3.2) ebhyo vai lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ kālayate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1159: (PB 8.3.3) stomo vai deveṣu taro nāmāsīd yajño 'sureṣu vidadvasus te devās tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomena yajñam asurāṇām āvṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1160: (PB 8.3.4) stomena yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1161: (PB 8.3.5) sāhdyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena
GV02pncvbr1u:1162: saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ lokeyena samatanvan yat kāleyaṃ bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1163: (PB 8.3.6) vidadvasu vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanam eva tad abhyativadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1164: (PB 8.3.7) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi kāleyaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato
GV02pncvbr1u:1165: rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yat stobhavān pratihāras tena bārhataṃ yad dravadiḍaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1166: tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1167: (PB 8.4.1) sādhyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te sarveṇa yajñena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:1168: te devāśīchandāṃsy abruvan somam āharateti te jagatīṃ prāhiṇvan sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi
GV02pncvbr1u:1169: hitvaikākṣarā bhūtvāgacchat triṣṭubhaṃ prāhiṇvan saikam akṣaraṃ hitvā tryakṣarā bhūtvāgacchad
GV02pncvbr1u:1170: gāyatrīṃ prāhiṇvaṃś caturakṣarāṇi vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsan sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty
GV02pncvbr1u:1171: āgacchad aṣṭākṣarā bhūtvā trīṇi ca savanāni hastābhyāṃ dve savane dantair daṃṣṭvā
GV02pncvbr1u:1172: tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād dve aṃśumatī savane dhītaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dantair hi tad daṃṣṭvā
GV02pncvbr1u:1173: dhayanty aharat tasya ye hriyamāṇasyāṃśavaḥ parāpataṃs te pūtīkā abhavan yāni puṣpāṇy
GV02pncvbr1u:1174: avāśīyanta tāny arjjunāni yat prāprothat te praprothās tasmāt tṛtīyasavana āśiram
GV02pncvbr1u:1175: avanayanti yam eva taṃ gāvaḥ somam adanti tasya taṃ rasam avanayanti sasomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1176: (PB 8.4.2) te triṣṭub jagatyai gāyatrīm abrūtām upa tvāyāveti sābravīt kiṃ me tataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1177: syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abrūtāṃ sābvravīn mama sarvaṃ prātaḥsavanam aham uttare
GV02pncvbr1u:1178: savane praṇayānīti tasmād gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ gāyatry uttare savane praṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1179: (PB 8.4.3) tān triṣṭup tribhir akṣarair upait saikādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata tāṃ jagaty ekenākṣareṇopait sā dvādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1180: (PB 8.4.4) tasmād āhur gāyatrī vāva sarvāṇi cchandāṃsi gāyatrī hy etān poṣān puṣyanty aid iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1181: (PB 8.4.5) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat tad devāḥ svādiṣṭhayeti asvadayan
GV02pncvbr1u:1182: madiṣṭhayeti madvad akurvan pavasva soma dhārayety apāvayann indrāya pātave suta
GV02pncvbr1u:1183: iti tato vai tad indra upāvartata yat svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti prastauti tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1184: (PB 8.4.6) svādiṣṭhā vai deveṣu paśava āsan madiṣṭhā asureṣu te devāḥ svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti paśūn asurāṇām avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1185: (PB 8.4.7) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1187: (PB 8.4.9) sādhyā vai nāmadevā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ saṃhitena samadadhur yat samadadhus tasmāt saṃhitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1188: (PB 8.4.10) kāleyaṃ purastād bhavati saṃhitam upariṣṭād etābhyāṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ saṃtāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1189: (PB 8.4.11) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi saṃhitaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yad padanidhanaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1191: (PB 8.5.2) uṣṇikkakubbhyāṃ vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat kakubhi parākramatoṣṇihā
GV02pncvbr1u:1192: prāharat tasmāt kakubho madhyamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ parākramaṇaṃ hi tad abhi
GV02pncvbr1u:1193: samauhat tasmād uṣṇiha uttamaṃ padaṃ bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ puro gurur iva hi vajraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1194: (PB 8.5.3) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1195: (PB 8.5.4) nāsike vā ete yajñasya yad uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt samānaṃ chandaḥ satī nānā yajñaṃv vahatas tasmāt samānāyā nāsikāyāḥ satyā nānā prāṇāv
GV02pncvbr1u:1196: (PB 8.5.5) prāṇā vā uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vaṣaṭ kurvanti yad vaṣaṭ kuryuḥ prāṇān agnau pradadhyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1197: (PB 8.5.6) tāsu saphaṃ vipham iva vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanasya saphatvāyāthauṣkalam
GV02pncvbr1u:1198: etena vai prajāpatiḥ puṣkalān paśūn asṛjata teṣu rūpam adadhād yad etat sāma bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1200: (PB 8.5.7) purojitī vo andhasa iti padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ padyayā vai
GV02pncvbr1u:1201: devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyann akṣaryayā ṛṣayo nu prājānān yad ete padyā cākṣaryā ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1204: (PB 8.5.9) śyāvāśvam ārvanānasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ dhanvodavahan sa etat sāmāpaśyat tena vṛṣṭim asṛjata tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata gātuvid vā etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1206: (PB 8.5.11) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat taṃ devāḥ śyāvāślvenaihāyi ehiyety anvāhvayan sa upāvartata yad etat sāma bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1207: (PB 8.5.12) athaitad āndhīgavam andhīgur vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1208: paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ bhavaty
GV02pncvbr1u:1209: etena vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yan madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1210: (PB 8.5.13) daśākṣaraṃ madhyato nidhanam upayanti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1211: (PB 8.5.14) abhi priyāṇi pavata iti kāvaṃ prājāpatyaṃ sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1212: (PB 8.5.15) prajā vai priyāṇi paśavaḥ priyāṇi prajāyām eva paśuṣu pratitiṣtśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1213: (PB 8.5.16) raśmī vā etau yajñasya yad auśanakāve devakośo vā eṣa yajñam abhisamubjito yad ete antato bhavato yajñasyāriṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1214: (PB 8.6.1) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tasya yo raso 'tyaricyata tad yajñāyajñīyam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1215: (PB 8.6.2) brahmaṇo vā eṣa raso yad yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad yajñāyajñīyena stuvanti brahmaṇa eva rase yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1216: (PB 8.6.3) yonir vai yajñāyajñīyam etasmād vai yoneḥ prajāpatir yajñam asṛjata tasmād yajñāyajñīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1217: (PB 8.6.4) tasmād vā etena purā brāhmaṇā bahiṣpavamānam astoṣata yoner yajñaṃ pratanavāmahā iti yajñaṃ tataḥ stuvanti yonau yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1218: (PB 8.6.5) asureṣu vai sarvo yajña āsīt te devā yajñāyajñīyam apaśyaṃs teṣāṃ yajñā-yajñā
GV02pncvbr1u:1219: vo agnaya ity agnihotram avṛñjata girā-girā ca dakṣasa iti darśapūrṇamāsau pra-pra
GV02pncvbr1u:1220: vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam iti cāturmāsyāni priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam iti saumyam adhvaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1221: (PB 8.6.6) yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣase pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1222: na śaṃsiṣam iti vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsaṃs te devā abhyārambham abhinivartyaṃ cchandobhir
GV02pncvbr1u:1224: (PB 8.6.7) chandobhir yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1225: (PB 8.6.8) etad dha sma vā āha kūśāmbaḥ svāyavo brahmā lātavyaḥ kaṃ svid adya śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā gariṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1226: (PB 8.6.9) eṣā vai śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad girā-girety āhātmānaṃ tad udgātā girati
GV02pncvbr1u:1227: (PB 8.6.10) airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam irāyāṃ yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaty apramāyuka udgātā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1228: (PB 8.6.11) vaiśvānare vā etad udgātātmānaṃ pradadhāti yat pra-pra vayam ity āha praprīṃ vayam iti vaktavyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:1229: (PB 8.6.12) yo vai nihnuvānaṃ cchanda upaiti pāpīyān ujjagivān bhavaty etad vai nihnuvānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1230: cchando yan na śaṃsiṣam iti nu śaṃsiṣam iti vaktavyaṃ suśaṃsiṣam iti vā na nihnuvānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1232: (PB 8.6.13) yasya vai yajñā vāgantā bhavanti vācaś chidreṇa sravanty ete vai yajñā
GV02pncvbr1u:1233: vāgantā ye yajñāyajñīyāntā etad vācaś chidraṃ yad anṛtaṃ yad agniṣṭomayājy anṛtam
GV02pncvbr1u:1234: āha tad anv asya yajñaḥ sravaty akṣareṇāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpyam akṣareṇaiva yajñasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1236: (PB 8.6.14) virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad akṣaraṃ virājy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1237: (PB 8.7.1) ito vai prātar ūrdhvāṇi cchandāṃsi yujyante 'muto 'vāñci yajñāyajñīyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1238: stotre yujyante yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣasa iti dvādaśākṣaraṃ pra vayam amṛtaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1239: jātavedasam ity ekādaśākṣaraṃ priyaṃ mitraṃn na śaṃsiṣam ity aṣṭākṣaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1240: (PB 8.7.2) anuṣṭubham uttamāṃ saṃpādayatīyaṃ vā anuṣṭub asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1241: (PB 8.7.3) vāg vā anuṣṭub vācy eva pratitiṣṭhati jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vā anuṣṭub jaiṣṭhya eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1242: (PB 8.7.4) katham iva yajñāyajñīyaṃ geyam ity āhur yathānaḍvān prasrāvayamāṇa ittham iva cettham iva ceti
GV02pncvbr1u:1243: (PB 8.7.5) vaiśvānaraṃ vā etad udgātānu prasīdann etīty āhur yad yajñāyajñīyasyarcaṃ saṃpratyāheti parikrāmatevodgeyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:1244: (PB 8.7.6) vaiśvānare vā etad adhvaryuḥ sadasyān abhisṛjati yad yajñāyajñīyasya stotram upāvartayati prāvṛtenodgeyaṃv vaiśvānareṇānabhidāhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1245: (PB 8.7.7) na ha tu vai pitaraḥ prāvṛtaṃ jānanti yajñāyajñīyasya vai stotre pitaro
GV02pncvbr1u:1246: yathāyathaṃ jijñāsanta ākarṇābhyāṃ prāvṛtyaṃ tad eva prāvṛtaṃ tad aprāvṛtaṃ jānanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1248: (PB 8.7.8) apaḥ paścāt patnya upasṛjanti vaiśvānaram eva tac chamayanty āpo hi śāntiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1249: (PB 8.7.9) atho reta eva tat siñcanty āpo hi retaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1250: (PB 8.7.10) dakṣiṇān ūrūn abhiṣiñcanti dakṣiṇato hi retaḥ sicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1251: (PB 8.7.11) mahad iva pratyūhyaṃ mana evāsya taj janayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1253: (PB 8.7.13) hiṅkāraṃ prati saṃkhyāpayanti hiṅkṛtād dhi reto 'dhīyata
GV02pncvbr1u:1255: (PB 8.8.1) devā vā agniṣṭomam abhijityokthāni nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'gnim abruvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:1256: tvayā mukhenedaṃ cayāmeti so 'bravīt kiṃ me tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abruvan
GV02pncvbr1u:1259: (PB 8.8.3) tasmād u gāyatrīṣu gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1260: (PB 8.8.4) te 'gniṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā sākam aśvenābhyakrāman yat sākam aśvenābhyakrāmaṃs tasmāt sākamaśvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1261: (PB 8.8.5) tasmāt sākamaśvenokthāni praṇayanty etena hi tāny agre 'bhyajayan
GV02pncvbr1u:1262: (PB 8.8.6) sa indro 'bravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti varuṇas taṃv varuṇo 'nvatiṣṭhad indra āharat tasmād aindrāvaruṇam anuśasyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1263: (PB 8.8.7) sa evābravīt kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti bṛhaspatis taṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1264: bṛhaspatir anvatiṣṭad indra āharat tasmād aindrābārhaspatyam anuśasyate sa evābravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1265: kaś cāhaṃ cedam anvavaiṣyāva ity ahaṃ ceti viṣṇus taṃ viṣṇur anvatiṣṭad indra āharat
GV02pncvbr1u:1267: (PB 8.8.8) paśūn vā ebhyas tān āharat paśavo vā ukthāni paśukāma ukthena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1268: (PB 8.8.9) bṛhatā vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat tasya tejaḥ parāpatat tat saubharam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1269: (PB 8.8.10) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yad rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ rathantaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1270: saṃdhir nāntarā bṛhatā stuvantīti yat saubhareṇa stuvanti bṛhataiva tad antarā stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1271: bṛhato hy etat tejo yat saubharam
GV02pncvbr1u:1272: (PB 8.8.11) yadi bṛhat sāmātirātraḥ syāt saubharam ukthānāṃ brahma sāma kāryaṃ bṛhad eva tat tejasā samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1274: (PB 8.8.13) devānāṃ vai svargaṃl lokaṃ +yatāṃ diśo 'vlīyanta tāḥ saubhareṇo ity udastaṃbhuvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:1275: tato vai tā adṛṃhanta tataḥ pratyatiṣṭhaṃs tataḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ prājānan yaḥ svargakāmaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1276: syād yaḥ pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta pra svargaṃl lokaṃ jānāti pratitṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1277: (PB 8.8.14) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā āśanāyaṃs tābhyaḥ saubhareṇorg ity annaṃ prāyacchat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1278: (PB 8.8.15) samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃv vidvān saubhareṇodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1279: (PB 8.8.16) tā abruvan subhṛtaṃ no 'bhārṣīr iti tasmāt saubharam
GV02pncvbr1u:1280: (PB 8.8.17) vṛṣṭiṃ vā abhyastāṃ prāyacchad annam eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1281: (PB 8.8.18) yo vṛṣṭikāmaḥ syād yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ saubhareṇa stuvīta
GV02pncvbr1u:1282: (PB 8.8.19) hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryād ūrg ity annādyakāmāyo iti svargakāmāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1283: (PB 8.8.20) sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharaṃ sarveṣv eva kāmeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1285: (PB 8.8.22) nṛmedhasam āṅgirasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ śvabhir abhyāhvayan so 'gnim upādhāvat
GV02pncvbr1u:1286: pāhi no agna ekayeti taṃv vaiśvānaraḥ paryudatiṣṭhat tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata
GV02pncvbr1u:1287: (PB 8.8.23) gātuvid vā etat sāma vindate gātuṃ pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1288: (PB 8.8.24) naiva hy etad ahno rūpaṃ na rātrer yad ukthānām
GV02pncvbr1u:1289: (PB 8.8.25) kakup prathamāthoṣṇig atha purauṣṇig anuṣṭup tenānuṣṭubho nayanty acchāvākasāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1291: (PB 8.9.2) asurā vā eṣu lokeṣv āsaṃs tān devā hariśriyam ity asmāl lokāt prāṇudanta virājasīty antarikṣād divo-diva ity amuṣmāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1292: (PB 8.9.3) tad ya evaṃ vedaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudyemāṃl lokān abhyārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1293: (PB 8.9.4) harivarṇo vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭaiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1294: (PB 8.9.5) aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃl lokaṃ yato rakṣāṃsy anvasacanta tāny etena harivarṇo 'pāhanta yad etat sāma bhavati rakṣasām apahatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1295: (PB 8.9.6) pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta teṣāṃ yat tejo raso 'tyaricyata tad devāḥ samabharaṃs tad udvaṃśīyam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1296: (PB 8.9.7) sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ tejo yad udvaṃśīyaṃ tasmād vā etat purā sajātāya nākran pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1297: (PB 8.9.8) eṣa hy eva pṛṣṭhais tuṣṭuvāno ya udvaṃśīyena stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:1299: (PB 8.9.10) gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇa eti rathantarasya rūpam eti hi rathantaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1300: (PB 8.9.11) ādir bṛhata ūrdhvam iva hi bṛhat
GV02pncvbr1u:1304: (PB 8.9.15) ardheḍayā vai devā asurān avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohan
GV02pncvbr1u:1305: (PB 8.9.16) tad ya evaṃv vedārdheḍayaiva bhrātṛvyam avahatyātisvāreṇa svargaṃl lokam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:1306: (PB 8.9.17) ardheḍayā vai pūrvaṃ yajñaṃ saṃsthāpayanty atisvāreṇottram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1307: (PB 8.9.18) upainam uttaro yajño namati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1308: (PB 8.9.19) pāṅktaṃ vā etat sāma pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1310: (PB 8.9.21) aṣṭādaṃṣṭro vairūpo 'putro 'prajā ajīryat sa imāṃl lokān vicicchidvāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1311: amanyata sa ete jarasi sāmanī apaśyat tayor aprayogād abibhet so 'bravīd ṛdhnavad
GV02pncvbr1u:1313: (PB 8.9.22) ṛṣer vā etat prāśodbhūtaṃ yad aṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavata ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1314: (PB 8.10.1) gāyatrīṣu brahmavarcasakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur gāyatryāṃ brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā gāyatrī saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1315: (PB 8.10.2) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1316: (PB 8.10.3) gāyatrīṣu paśukāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣoṣṇik saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1318: (PB 8.10.5) gāyatrīṣu puruṣakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyuḥ kakubhi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā kakup saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1320: (PB 8.10.7) virāṭsv annādyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣā virāṭ saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1322: (PB 8.10.9) akṣarapaṅktiṣu jyaiṣṭhyakāmāyokthāni praṇayeyur uṣṇihi brahmasāmānuṣṭubhy acchāvākasāma saiṣānuṣṭup saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1324: (PB 9.1.1) devā vā ukthāny abhijitya rātriṃ nāśaknuvann abhijetuṃ te 'surān rātriṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1325: tamaḥ praviṣṭāṃ nānuvyapaśyaṃs ta etam anuṣṭupśirasaṃ pragāthm apaśyan virājaṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1326: tān virājā jyotiṣānupaśyanto 'nuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātrer nirāghnan
GV02pncvbr1u:1327: (PB 9.1.2) yad eṣo 'nuṣṭupśirāḥ pragātho bhavati virāḍ eva jyotiṣānupaśyann anuṣṭubhā vajreṇa rātrer bhrātṛvyaṃ nirhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1328: (PB 9.1.3) tān samantaṃ paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta yat paryāyaṃ prāṇudanta tat paryāyāṇāṃ paryāyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1329: (PB 9.1.4) prathamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti prathamasya paryāyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1330: (PB 9.1.5) prathamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāya prathamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1331: (PB 9.1.6) pāntam ā vo andhasa iti prastauti
GV02pncvbr1u:1332: (PB 9.1.7) ahar vai pāntam andho rātrir ahnaiva tad rātrim ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1334: (PB 9.1.9) vītahavyaḥ śrāyaso jyog niruddha etat sāmāpaśyat so 'vagacchat pratyatiṣṭhad avagacchati pratitiṣṭhaty etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1335: (PB 9.1.10) tam iva vā ete praviśantiye rātrim upayanti yad eko nidhanaṃ rātrer mukhe bhavati prajñātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1336: (PB 9.1.11) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti sarvam asmai divā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1337: (PB 9.1.12) te madhyamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣām aurdhvasadmanena vācam avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:1338: (PB 9.1.13) vācaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1340: (PB 9.1.15) yathā vā ahno mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ triṇidhanāyatanam evam eṣa rātrer madhyamaḥ paryāyas triṇidhanāyatanaḥ salokatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1341: (PB 9.1.16) madhyamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanti madhyamasya paryāyasya madhyamair hi padaiḥ punar ādāyaṃ madhyamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1342: (PB 9.1.17) ta uttamaṃ paryāyam aśrayanta teṣāṃ ghṛtaścyun nidhanena paśūn avṛñjata paśavo vai ghṛtaścyutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1343: (PB 9.1.18) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1344: (PB 9.1.19) uttamāni padāni punarādīni bhavanty uttamasya paryāyasyottamair hi padaiḥpunar ādāyam uttamarātrāt prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1347: (PB 9.1.22) asaṃhāyyaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ gamayati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1348: (PB 9.1.23) eṣā vā agniṣṭomasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1349: (PB 9.1.24) dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśa strotrāṇi rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1350: (PB 9.1.25) eṣā vā ukthasya saṃmā yad rātriḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1352: (PB 9.1.27) yathā vā ahna ukthāny evam eṣa rātreḥ sandhir nānārūpāṇy ahna ukthāni nānārūpā ete tṛcā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1354: (PB 9.1.29) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1356: (PB 9.1.31) svargo loko bṛhat svarga eva loke pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1357: (PB 9.1.32) vāravantīyaṃ vā vāmadevyaṃ vā śruddhyaṃ vai teṣām ekaṃ paśukāmāya sandhiṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1358: (PB 9.1.33) paśavo vā etāni sāmāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1360: (PB 9.1.35) prajāpatir vā etat sahasram asṛjata tad devebhyaḥ prāyacchat tasmin na samarādhayaṃs te sūryaṃ kāṣṭhāṃ kṛtvājim adhāvan
GV02pncvbr1u:1361: (PB 9.1.36) teṣām aśvinau prathamāv adhāvatāṃ tāv anvavadan saha no 'stv iti tāv
GV02pncvbr1u:1362: abrūtāṃ kiṃ tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayethe ity abruvaṃs tāv abrūtām asmaddevatyam idam
GV02pncvbr1u:1363: uktham ucyātā iti tasmād āśvinam ucyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1365: (PB 9.1.38) kṣipraṃ śasyam ājim iva hy ete dhāvanty ā sūryasyodetoḥ śaṃset sūryaṃ hi kāṣṭhām akurvata
GV02pncvbr1u:1366: (PB 9.2.1) pāntam ā vo andhasa iti vaitahavyam anyakṣetraṃvā ete prayanti ye rātrim upayanti yad okonidhanaṃ rātrer mukhe bhavaty okaso 'pracyāvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1367: (PB 9.2.2) pra va indrāya mādanam iti gaurīvitam
GV02pncvbr1u:1368: (PB 9.2.3) brahma yad devā vyakurvata tato yad atyaricyata tad gaurīvitam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1369: (PB 9.2.4) atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atiriktam etat stotraṃ yad rātrir atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1370: (PB 9.2.5) vayam u tvā tad id arthā iti kāṇvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1371: (PB 9.2.6) etena vai kaṇva indrasya sāṃvidyam agacchad indrasyaivaitena sāṃvidyaṃ gacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:1372: (PB 9.2.7) indrāya madvane sutam iti śrautakakṣaṃ kṣatrasāma pra kṣatram evaitena bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1373: (PB 9.2.8) ayaṃ ta indra soma iti daivodāsam
GV02pncvbr1u:1374: (PB 9.2.9) agniṣṭomena vai devā imaṃl lokam abhyajayann antarikṣam ukthenātirātreṇāmuṃ.
GV02pncvbr1u:1375: ta imaṃl lokaṃ punar abhyakāmayanta ta ihety asmiṃl loke pratyatiṣṭhan yad etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1378: (PB 9.2.11) asurā vā eṣu lokeṣv āsaṃs tān devā ūrdhvasadmanenaibhyo lokebhyaḥ prāṇudanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1379: (PB 9.2.12) tad ya evaṃv vedaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudya sva āyatane sattram āste
GV02pncvbr1u:1380: (PB 9.2.13) ā tū na indra kṣumantam ity ākūpāram
GV02pncvbr1u:1381: (PB 9.2.14) akūpārāṅgirasasyāsīt tasyā yathā godhāyās tvag eva tvag āsīt tām etena
GV02pncvbr1u:1382: triḥsāmnendraḥ pūtvā sūryatvacasam akarot tad vāva sā tarhy akāmayata yatkāmā etena
GV02pncvbr1u:1383: sāmnā stuvate sa ebhyaḥ kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1384: (PB 9.2.15) abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sutaṃ ity ārṣabhaṃ kṣatrasāma kṣatram evaitena bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1385: (PB 9.2.16) idaṃv vaso sutam andha iti gāram etena vai gara indram aprīṇāt prīta evāsyaitenendro bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1386: (PB 9.2.17) idaṃ hy anv ojaseti mādhucchandasaṃ prajāpater vā eṣā tanūr ayātayāmnī prayujyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1388: (PB 9.2.19) devātithiḥ saputro 'śanāyaṃś carann araṇya urvārūṇy avindat tāny etena sāmnopāsīdat tā asmai gāvaḥ pṛśnayo bhūtvodatiṣṭhan yad etat sām a bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1389: (PB 9.2.20) yoge-yoge tavastaram iti saumedhaṃ rātriṣāma rātrer eva samṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1391: (PB 9.2.22) kutsaś ca luśaś cendraṃ vyahvayetāṃ sa indraḥ kutsam upāvartata taṃ śatena
GV02pncvbr1u:1392: vārdhrībhir āṇḍayor abadhnāt taṃ luśo 'bhyavadat pramucyasva pari kutsād ihāgahi
GV02pncvbr1u:1393: kim u tvāvān āṇḍayor baddha āsātā iti tās saṃcchidya prādravat sa etat kutsaḥ sāmāpaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:1396: (PB 9.3.1) yadi sattrāya dīkṣerann atha sāmy uttiṣṭhet somam apabhajya viśvajitātirātreṇa yajeta sarvavedasena sarvasmā eva dīkṣate sarvam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1397: (PB 9.3.2) yā id dakṣiṇā dadāti tābhir iti prayuṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1398: (PB 9.3.3) yadi paryāyair astutam abhivyucchet pancadaśabhir hotre stuyuḥ pañcabhiḥ-pañcabhir itarebhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1399: (PB 9.3.4) agne vivasvad uṣasa iti sandhinā stuyuḥ prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā rathantaraṃ sāmnāṃ prāṇāṃs caivopayanti pratiṣṭhāṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1400: (PB 9.3.5) ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni hotā śaṃsati
GV02pncvbr1u:1401: (PB 9.3.6) tāvatyaḥ saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarasaṃmitābhir eva tad ṛgbhir āśīvinam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1402: (PB 9.3.7) yad arvāk stuvanti tad astutaṃ yat samprati stuvanti tat stutaṃ yad atiṣṭuvanti tat suṣṭutam
GV02pncvbr1u:1403: (PB 9.3.8) yady arvāk stuyur yāvatībhir na stuyus tāvatībhir vātiṣṭuyur bhūyo 'kṣarābhir vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1404: (PB 9.3.9) yady atiṣṭuyur yāvatībhir atiṣṭuyus tāvatībhir vā na stuyuḥ kanīyo 'kṣarābhir vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1405: (PB 9.3.10) yady arvāk stuyus trīḍam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ nidhanam ekeḍayā ye dve tābhyām eva tat samaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1406: (PB 9.3.11) yady atiṣṭuyuḥ svāram agniṣṭomasāma kāryam ūnam iva vā etat sāmno yat svaras tenaiva tat samaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1407: (PB 9.4.1) yadi somau saṃsutau syātāṃ mahati rātreḥ prātaranuvākam upākuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1408: (PB 9.4.2) pūrvo vācaṃ pūrvaś chandāṃsi pūrvo devatā vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1409: (PB 9.4.3) vṛṣaṇvatīṃ pratipadaṃ kuryād indro vai vṛṣā prātaḥsavanād evaiṣām indraṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1410: (PB 9.4.4) atho khalv āhuḥ savanamukhe-savanamukhe kāryā savanamukhāt-savanamukhād evaiṣām indraṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1411: (PB 9.4.5) susamiddhe hotavyam agnir vai sarvā devatāḥ sarvā eva devatāḥ paśyañ juhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1413: triṣṭubhe cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāyopaveśāya jagatyai cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāheti juhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1414: (PB 9.4.7) cchandāṃsi vā abhibhūtayas tair evainān abhibhavaty ubhe bṛhadrathantare kārye
GV02pncvbr1u:1415: (PB 9.4.8) yatra vā indrasya harī tad indraḥ. indrasya vai harī bṛhadrathantare yad ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavataḥ pūrva evendrasya harī ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1417: (PB 9.4.10) turaśravasaś ca vai pārāvatānāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata ete turaśravāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1418: sāmanī apaśyat tābhyām asmā indraḥ śalmalināṃ yamunāyā havyaṃ nirāvahat yat tair
GV02pncvbr1u:1421: (PB 9.4.12) yā vai pūrvāḥ prasnānti tāḥ pūrvās tīrthaṃ jayanti pūrva evendram ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1423: (PB 9.4.14) jamadagneś ca vā ṛṣīṇāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata etaj gamadagnir vihavyam apaśyat tam indra upāvartata yad vihavyaṃ hotā śaṃsatīndram evaiṣāṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1424: (PB 9.4.15) yadītaro 'gniṣṭomaḥ syād ukthaḥ kāryo yady uktho 'tirātro yo vai bhūyān yajñakratuḥ sa indrasya priyo bhūyasaivaiṣāṃ yajnakratunendraṃv
GV02pncvbr1u:1425: (PB 9.4.16) atho khalv āhur duṣprāpa iva vai paraḥ panthā yam evāgre yajñakratum ārabheta tasmān neyād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1427: (PB 9.4.18) asyā amuṣyā adyaśvān mithunād ahorātrābhyām evainān nirbhajati
GV02pncvbr1u:1428: (PB 9.5.1) yadi somam akrītam apahareyur anyaḥ kretavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1429: (PB 9.5.2) yadi krītaṃ yo 'nyo 'bhyāśaṃ syāt sa āhṛtyaḥ somavikrayaṇe tu kiṃ cid dadyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1430: (PB 9.5.3) yadi somaṃ na vindeyuḥ pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyur yadi na pūtīkān arjjunāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1431: (PB 9.5.4) gāyatrī somam āharat tasyā anu visṛjya somarakṣiḥ parṇam acchinat tasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1432: yo 'ṃśuḥ parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavat tasmin devā ūtim avindann ūtīko vā eṣa yat pūtīkān
GV02pncvbr1u:1434: (PB 9.5.5) pratidhuk ca prātaḥ pūtīkāś ca śṛtaṃ ca madhyandine pūtīkāś ca dadhi cāparāhṇe pūtīkāś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1435: (PB 9.5.6) somapītho vā etasmād apakrāmatīty āhur yasya somam apaharantīti sa oṣadhīś ca paśūṃś ca praviśati tam oṣadhibhyaś ca paśubhyaś cāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1436: (PB 9.5.7) indro vṛtram ahaṃs tasya yo nastaḥ somaḥ samadhāvat tāni babhrutūlāny
GV02pncvbr1u:1437: arjunāni yo vapāyā utkhinnāyās tāni lohitatūlāni yāni babhrutūlāny arjunāni tāny
GV02pncvbr1u:1438: abhiṣuṇuyād etad vai brahmaṇo rūpaṃ sākṣād eva somam abhiṣuṇoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1439: (PB 9.5.8) śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma kāryaṃ sad evainaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1440: (PB 9.5.9) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi prohed vācaivainaṃ samardhayati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryam indriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1442: (PB 9.5.11) pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:1444: (PB 9.5.13) tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1445: (PB 9.6.1) yadi kalaśo dīryeta vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ brahmasāma kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1446: (PB 9.6.2) avaṣaṭkṛto vā etasya somaḥ parāsicyate yasya kalaśo dīryate yad vaṣaṭkāraṇīdhanaṃ brahmasāma bhavati vaṣaṭkṛta evāsya somo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1447: (PB 9.6.3) vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnām ity etāsu kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:1448: (PB 9.6.4) eṣa hi bahūnāṃ samane dīryate yat kalaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1449: (PB 9.6.5) tad āhur na vā ārtyārtir anūdyārtyā vā eṣa ārtim anuvadati yaḥ kalaśo dīrṇe dadrāṇavatīṣu karotīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1451: (PB 9.6.7) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricāno 'manyata sa etac chrāyantīyam apaśyat tenātmānaṃ samaśrīṇāt prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1452: (PB 9.6.8) dugdha iva eṣa riricāno yasya kalaśo dīryate yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati punar evātmānaṃ saṃśrīṇāti prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1453: (PB 9.6.9) yadi śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma syād vaiṣṇavīṣv anuṣṭupsu vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1454: (PB 9.6.10) yad vai yajñasya sravati vācaṃ pratisravati vāg anuṣṭup yajño viṣṇur vācaiva yajñasya cchidram apidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1455: (PB 9.6.11) yad vai yajñasya sravaty antataḥ sravati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ yajñasyaiva cchidraṃ vārayate
GV02pncvbr1u:1456: (PB 9.7.1) yadi prātassavanāt somo 'tiricyeta asti somo ayaṃ suta iti marutvatīṣu gāyatreṣu stuyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1457: (PB 9.7.2) mādhyandinaṃ vā eṣa savanaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yaḥ prātassavanād
GV02pncvbr1u:1458: atiricyate tasmān marutvatīṣu stuvanti marutvad dhi mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ tasmād u
GV02pncvbr1u:1460: (PB 9.7.3) yasmāt stomād atiricyate sa eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1462: (PB 9.7.5) vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya eva yajñe pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1463: (PB 9.7.6) yadi mādhyandināt savanād atiricyeta baṇ mahāṃ asi sūryety ādityavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1464: (PB 9.7.7) tṛtīyasavanaṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo mādhyandināt savanād
GV02pncvbr1u:1465: atiricyate tasmād ādityavatīṣu stuvanty ādityaṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād u bṛhatīṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1467: (PB 9.7.8) yasmāt stomād atiricyeta sa eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāyaindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ hotānuśaṃsati vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya eva yajñe
GV02pncvbr1u:1468: (PB 9.7.9) yadi tṛtīyasavanād atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1469: (PB 9.7.10) yajño vai viṣṇuś śipiviṣṭo yajña eva viṣṇau pratitiṣṭhaty atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1470: (PB 9.7.11) etad anyat kuryur ukthāni praṇayeyur ukthāni vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1471: yo 'gniṣṭomād atiricyate yady ukthyebhyo 'tiricyetātirātraḥ kāryo rātriṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno
GV02pncvbr1u:1472: 'bhyatiricyate ya ukthyebhyo 'tiricyate yadi rātrer atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1473: bṛhatā stuyur eṣu tu vā atiricyata ity āhur yo rātrer atiricyata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1474: (PB 9.7.12) amuṃ vā eṣa lokaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo rātrer atiricyate bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1475: (PB 9.8.1) yadi dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate dagdhvāsthīny upanahya yo nediṣṭhī syāt taṃ dīkṣayitvā saha yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:1476: (PB 9.8.2) etad anyat kuryur abhiṣutyānyat somam agṛhītvā grahān yāsau dakṣiṇā sraktis tad vā stuyur mārjālīye vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1477: (PB 9.8.3) api vā etasya yajñe yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate tam etena niravadayante
GV02pncvbr1u:1479: (PB 9.8.5) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti tṛtīye hi loke pitaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1482: (PB 9.8.8) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhis tvacam apaghnate
GV02pncvbr1u:1483: (PB 9.8.9) tā ṛco 'nubruvantas trir mārjālīyaṃ pariyanti savyān ūrūn āghnānāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1484: (PB 9.8.10) stutam anuśaṃsaty amuṣminn evainaṃ loke nidhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1485: (PB 9.8.11) yanti vā ete patha ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīty aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇate punaḥ panthānam apiyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1486: (PB 9.8.12) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipatkāryā ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1487: (PB 9.8.13) saṃvatsare 'sthīni yājayeyuḥ saṃvvatsaro vai sarvasya śāntir yat purā saṃvvatsarād yājayeyur vācam aruṣkṛtāṃ krūrām ṛccheyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1488: (PB 9.8.14) vṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ syuḥ saptadaśam itarat sarvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1489: (PB 9.8.15) yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān evopayanti yat saptadaśam itarat sarvaṃ prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajatim
GV02pncvbr1u:1490: (PB 9.8.16) prāṇāpānair vā ete vyṛdhyanta ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīti maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇate prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānair eva samṛdhyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1491: (PB 9.9.1) yasya kalaśa upadasyati kalaśam evāsyopadasyantaṃ prāṇo 'nūpadasyati prāṇo hi somaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1493: (PB 9.9.3) atho khalv āhur antarhitam iva vā etad yat payo hiraṇyam evāpo'bhyavanayed dhiraṇyam abhyunnayed iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1494: (PB 9.9.4) prāṇā vā āpo 'mṛtaṃ hiraṇyam amṛta evāsya prāṇān dadhāti sa sarvam āyur eti
GV02pncvbr1u:1495: (PB 9.9.5) yasya nārāśaṃsa upavāyati nārāśaṃsam evāsyopa+vāyantaṃ prāṇo 'nūpadasyati prāṇo hi somaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1496: (PB 9.9.6) yam adhvaryur antato grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tasyāptum avanayet
GV02pncvbr1u:1497: (PB 9.9.7) prāyaścityai vai graho gṛhyate prāyaścityevāsmai prāyaścittiṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1498: (PB 9.9.8) yadi pītāpītau somau saṃgaccheyātām antaḥ paridhyaṅgārān nirvartya juhuyāt hutasya cāhutasya cāhutasya hutasya ca /
GV02pncvbr1u:1499: pītāpītasya somasyendrāgnī pibataṃ sutaṃ svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1500: (PB 9.9.9) prajāpataye svāhety abhakṣaṇīyasya juhuyād uttarārdhyapūrvārdhya uparavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1501: (PB 9.9.10) indur indum avāgād ity avavṛṣṭasya bhakṣayet
GV02pncvbr1u:1502: (PB 9.9.11) tasya ta indrav indrapītasyendriyāvatas sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa upahūta upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:1503: (PB 9.9.12) hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgra ity ājyenābhyupākṛtasya juhuyād agnīdhraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1504: paretya bhūtānāṃ jātaḥ patir eka āsīt sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ tasmai ta indo
GV02pncvbr1u:1505: haviṣā vidhema svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1506: (PB 9.9.13) yadi grāvāpi śīryate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai grāvāṇo dyutānasya mārutasya sāmnā stuyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1507: (PB 9.9.14) mārutā vai grāvāṇaḥ svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1508: (PB 9.9.15) yadi somam abhidahed grahān adhvaryuḥ spāśayeta stotrāṇy udgātā śastrāṇi
GV02pncvbr1u:1509: hotātha yathāpūrvaṃ yajñena careyuḥ pañca dakṣiṇā deyāḥ pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas
GV02pncvbr1u:1510: tam ārabhate 'vabhṛthād udetya punar dīkṣate tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt purā
GV02pncvbr1u:1511: dvādaśyā dīkṣeta yad dvādaśīm atinayed antardhīyeta
GV02pncvbr1u:1512: (PB 9.10.1) yadi mahāvīro bhidyeta taṃ bhinnam abhimṛśed ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ /
GV02pncvbr1u:1513: saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ mā bhema niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva /
GV02pncvbr1u:1514: vanāni na prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi /
GV02pncvbr1u:1516: sakṛt sute mahatā śūra rādhasānu stomaṃ mademahīti mahāvīraṃ bhinnam abhimṛśet saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1517: (PB 9.10.2) asuryaṃ vā etasmād varṇaṃ kṛtvā teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ prajāḥ paśavo 'pakrāmanti yasya yūpo virohati sa īśvaraḥ pāpīyān bhavitoḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1518: (PB 9.10.3) tvāṣṭraṃ paśuṃ bahurūpam ālabheta tvaṣṭā vai paśūnāṃ rūpāṇāṃ vikartā
GV02pncvbr1u:1519: tam eva tad upadhāvati sa enaṃ tejaseindriyeṇa vīryeṇānnādyena prajayā paśubhiḥ punas
GV02pncvbr1u:1521: (PB 10.1.1) agninā pṛthivyauṣadhibhis tenāyaṃ lokas trivṛd vāyunāntarikṣeṇa vayobhis
GV02pncvbr1u:1522: tenaiṣa lokās trivṛd yo 'yam antar ādityena divā nakṣatrais tenāsau lokas trivṛd
GV02pncvbr1u:1523: etad eva trivṛta āyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1524: (PB 10.1.2) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1525: (PB 10.1.3) tam u pratiṣṭhetyāhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1527: (PB 10.1.5) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1528: (PB 10.1.6) taṃ caujo balam ity āhur ardhamāsaśo hi prajāḥ paśava ojo balaṃ puṣyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1529: (PB 10.1.7) saṃvatsara eva saptadaśasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcadartava etad eva saptadaśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1530: (PB 10.1.8) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1531: (PB 10.1.9) tam u prajāpatir ity āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ hi prajāḥ paśavo 'nuprajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1532: (PB 10.1.10) āditya evaikaviṃsasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcavartas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśa etad evaikaviṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1533: (PB 10.1.11) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1534: (PB 10.1.12) tam u devatalpa ity āhuḥ pra devatalpam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1536: (PB 10.1.14) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1537: (PB 10.1.15) tam u puṣṭir ity āhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣa puṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1538: (PB 10.1.16) devatā eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanaṃ trayastriṃśad devatāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśa etad eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1539: (PB 10.1.17) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1540: (PB 10.1.18) tam u nāka ity āhur na hi prajāpatiḥ kasmai canākam
GV02pncvbr1u:1541: (PB 10.1.19) chandāṃsy eva chandomānām āyatanam eṣaiṣāṃ bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1542: (PB 10.1.20) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1543: (PB 10.1.21) tān u puṣṭir ity āhuḥ paśavo hi chandomāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1544: (PB 10.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'tāmyat tasmai vāj jyotir udagṛhṇāt so 'bravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1545: ko me 'yaṃ jyotir udagṛhṇād iti svaiva te vāg ity abravīt tām abravīd virājaṃ tvā
GV02pncvbr1u:1547: (PB 10.2.2) tasmād yo virājaṃ stomaṃ saṃpadyate taṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭoma ity ācakṣate virāḍ ḍhi chandasāṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1548: (PB 10.2.3) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1549: (PB 10.2.4) anuṣṭup ca vai saptadaśaś ca samabhavatāṃ sānuṣṭup caturuttarāṇi chandāṃsy asṛjata ṣaḍuttarān stomān saptadaśas tāv etān madhyataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1550: (PB 10.2.5) trivṛc ca triṇavaś ca rāthantarau tāv ajaś cāśvaś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau rāthantaraṃ prācīnaṃ pradhūnutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1551: (PB 10.2.6) pañcadaśaś caikaviṃśaś ca bārhatau tau gauś cāviś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau bārhataṃ prācīnaṃ bhāskurutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1552: (PB 10.2.7) evaṃ vai vidvāṃsam āhur api grāmyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ vāca ājānāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1553: (PB 10.3.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa ātmann ṛtvyam apaśyat tata
GV02pncvbr1u:1554: ṛtvijo 'sṛjata yad ṛtvyād asṛjata tad ṛtvijām ṛtviktvaṃ tair etaṃ dvādaśāham upāsīdat so 'rādhnot
GV02pncvbr1u:1555: (PB 10.3.2) pitā no 'rātsīd iti māsā upāsīdaṃs te dīkṣayaivārādhnuvann upasatsu trayodaśam
GV02pncvbr1u:1556: adīkṣayan so ' nuvyam abhavat tasmād upasatsu didīkṣāṇo 'nuvyaṃ bhavaty eva ca hi
GV02pncvbr1u:1558: (PB 10.3.3) eko dīkṣetaiko hi prajāpatir arādhnod dvādaśa dīkṣeran dvādaśa hi māsā arādhnuvaṃś caturviṃśatir dīkṣeraṃś caturviṃśatir hy ardhamāsā
GV02pncvbr1u:1559: (PB 10.3.4) yadi pañcadaśo dīkṣeteme pañceme pañceme pañceme pañceme catvāro 'sāv eka iti nirdiśeyur yasmā arāddhikāmāḥ syus tam evārāddhir anveti sarva itare rādhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1560: (PB 10.3.5) yo vai devānāṃ gṛhapatiṃ vedāśnute gārhapataṃ pra gārhapatam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1561: (PB 10.3.6) saṃvatsaro vai devānāṃ gṛhapatiḥ sa eva prajāpatis tasya māsā eva saha dīkṣiṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1562: (PB 10.3.7) vindate saha dīkṣiṇo 'śnute gārhapatyaṃ pra gārhapatyaṃ āpnoti ya evaṃv veda /
GV02pncvbr1u:1563: (PB 10.3.8) yo vai chandasāṃ svarājaṃ vedāśnute svārājyaṃ pra svārājyaṃ āpnoti bṛhatī vāva chandasāṃ svarāḍ aśnute svārājyaṃ pra svārājyaṃ āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1564: (PB 10.3.9) tām etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ dvādaśa dīkṣā svādaśopasado dvādaśa prasutaḥ ṣaṭriṃśad etā rātrayo bhavanti ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī
GV02pncvbr1u:1565: (PB 10.3.10) jāyate vāva dīkṣayā punīta upasadbhir devalokam eva sutyayāpyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:1566: (PB 10.3.11) etāvad vāva saṃvatsara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ yad etā rātrayo dvādaśa pūṛnamāsyo
GV02pncvbr1u:1567: dvādaśaikaṣṭakā dvādaśāmāvāsyā yāvad eva saṃvatsara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ tad etenāptvāvarundhe dvādaśāhena
GV02pncvbr1u:1568: (PB 10.3.12) triṃśadakṣarā vā eṣā virāḍ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva virājā pratitiṣṭhaty ṛtubhir virāji
GV02pncvbr1u:1569: (PB 10.3.13) dvātriṃśadakṣarā vā eṣānuṣṭub vāg anuṣṭup catuṣpādaḥ paśavo vācā paśūn dādhāra tasmād vācā siddhā vācāhūtā āyanti tasmād u nāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1570: (PB 10.4.1) bhūtaṃ pūrvo 'tirātro bhaviṣyad uttaraḥ pṛthivī pūrvo 'tirātro dyaur uttaro 'gniḥ pūrvo 'tirātra āditya uttaraḥ prāṇaḥ pūrvo 'tirātra udāna uttaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1571: (PB 10.4.2) cakṣuṣī atirātrau kanīnike agniṣṭomau yasmād antarā agniṣṭomāv atirātrābhyāṃ tasmād antare satyau kanīnike bhuṅktaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1572: (PB 10.4.3) saṃvatsarasya vā etau daṃṣṭrau yad atirātrau tayor na svaptavyaṃ saṃvatsarasya daṃṣṭrayor ātmānaṃ ned apidadhānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1573: (PB 10.4.4) tad āhuḥ ko 'svaptum arhati yad vāva prāṇo +jāgāra tad eva jāgaritam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1574: (PB 10.4.5) gāyatrīṃ vā etāṃ jyotiḥpakṣām āsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham aṣṭau madhya ukthā agniṣṭomāv abhito māsā svargṃ lokam etyājarasaṃ brahmādyam annam atti dīpyamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1575: (PB 10.4.6) triṣpurastād rathantaraṃ upayanti tryāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ tanvate
GV02pncvbr1u:1576: (PB 10.4.7) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yat triṣpurastād rathantaram upayantīti saubharam ukthānāṃ brahmasāma bhavati tenaiva tad ajāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:1577: (PB 10.4.8) pratnavatyaḥ prāyaṇīyasyāhnaḥ pratipado bhavanti teno eva tad ajāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:1578: (PB 10.4.9) trir vevopariṣṭād rathantaram upayanti trāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhād uttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1579: (PB 10.5.1) trayo vā ete trirātrā yad eṣa dvādaśāho gāytramukhaḥ prathamo gāyatramadhyo dvitīyo gāyatrottamas tṛtīyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1580: (PB 10.5.2) yasmād gāyatramukhaḥ prathamas tasmād ūrdhvo 'gnir dīdāya yasmād gāyatramadhyo dvitīyas tasmāt tiryaṅ vāyuḥ pavate
GV02pncvbr1u:1583: (PB 10.5.5) tejasā vā ete prayanti tejo madhye dadhati tejo 'bhyudyanti jyotiṣā vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1584: ete prayanti jyotir madhye dadhati jyotir abhyudyanti cakṣuṣā vā ete prayanti cakṣur
GV02pncvbr1u:1585: madhye dadhati cakṣur abhyudyanti prāṇena vā ete prayanti prāṇaṃ madhye dadhati prāṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1586: abhyudyanti ye gāyatryā prayanti gāyatrīṃ madhye dadhati gāyatrim abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1587: (PB 10.5.6) tantraṃ vā etad vitāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tasyetair (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1589: (PB 10.5.7) girikṣidauccāmanyaveti hovācābhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ kathaṃ dvādaśāha iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1590: yathārān nemiḥ paryety evam enaṃ gāyatrī paryeti avisraṃsāya yathārā nābhau dhṛtā
GV02pncvbr1u:1592: (PB 10.5.8) anuṣṭubhaṃ vā etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham
GV02pncvbr1u:1593: (PB 10.5.9) aṣṭābhir vā akṣair anuṣṭup prathamaṃ dvādaśāhasyāhar duyacchaty ekādaśabhir dvitīyaṃ dvādaśābhis tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1594: (PB 10.5.10) akṣaraṃ tryakṣaram ucchiṣyate tad evottaraṃ trirātram anuvidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1596: (PB 10.5.12) tāṃ vā etāṃ pratīcīṃ tiraścīṃ parācīm āsate 'nnādyāya tasmāt pratyañcaṃ tiryañcaṃ parāñcaṃ prajāḥ paśum upajīvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1597: (PB 10.5.13) chandāṃsi vā anyo'nyasya lokam abhadhyāyan gāyatrī triṣṭubhas triṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:1598: jagatyā jagatī gāyatryās tāni vyauhan yathālokaṃ tato vai tāni yaṃ-yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta tam asanvan
GV02pncvbr1u:1599: (PB 10.5.14) yatkāmo vyūḍhacchandasā dvadaśāhena yajate so 'smai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1600: (PB 10.5.15) oko vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho yatho vai manuṣyā imaṃ lokam āviṣṭā evaṃ devatā dvādaśāham āviṣṭā devatā ha vā etena yajate ya evaṃv vidvān dvādaśāhena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:1601: (PB 10.5.16) gṛhā vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho nāgṛhatāyā bhayyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1602: (PB 10.5.17) yo vai dvādaśāham agniṣṭomena kalpamānaṃ veda kalpate 'smai prātaḥsavanenaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:1603: prathamas trirātraḥ kalpate mādhyandinena dvitīyas tṛtīyasavanena tṛtīyo 'gniṣṭomasāmnaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:1606: (PB 10.6.1) eti prety āśumad vītimad rukmat tejasvad yuñjānaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpaṃ trivṛtaḥ stomasya gāyatrasya chandaso rathantarasya sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1607: (PB 10.6.2) vṛṣavad vṛtravad rayimad viśvavad upasthitaṃ dvitīyasyāhno rūpaṃ pañcadaśasya stomasya traiṣṭubhasya chandaso bṛhataḥ sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1608: (PB 10.6.3) udvat trivad digvat gomaṭ ṭaṣabhavat tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ saptadaśasya stomasya jāgatasya chandaso vairūpasya sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1609: (PB 10.6.4) rājanvaj janavadvat sūryavad virāḍanutodavac caturthasyāhno rūpam ekaviṃśasya stomasyānuṣṭubhasya chandaso (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1611: (PB 10.6.5) citravac chiśumat paṅktiḥ śakvarī dyūnākṣarā gomad ṛṣabhavad vajryabhimat pañcamasyāhno rūpaṃ triṇavasya stomasya pāṅktena chandaso śakvarīṇāṃ sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1612: (PB 10.6.6) parivat prativat saptapadā dvipadā vinārāśaṃsā gomad ṛṣabhavat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ trayastriṃśasya stomasya sarveṣāṃ chandasāṃ rūpaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1614: (PB 10.6.7) yasmād eṣā samānā satī ṣaḍahavibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād virūpaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1615: (PB 10.6.8) virūpam enam anuprajāyate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1616: (PB 10.7.1) agna iti prathamasyāhno rūpam agnivibhakter agnim iti dvitīyasyāgnineti tṛtīyasyāgnir iti caturthasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1617: (PB 10.7.2) devā vai śriyam aicchaṃs tān na prathame 'hany avindan na dvitīye na
GV02pncvbr1u:1618: tṛtīye tāñ caturthe 'hany avindan vindate śriyaṃ ya evaṃ vedāgner iti pañcamasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1620: (PB 10.7.3) aprativādy enaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1621: (PB 10.7.4) agna iti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa prayanti tad abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1622: (PB 10.7.5) yasmād eṣā samānā saty agnivbhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv ādityas tapati
GV02pncvbr1u:1623: (PB 10.8.1) indreti prathamasyāhno rūpam indravibhakter indram iti dvitīyasyendreṇeti
GV02pncvbr1u:1624: tṛtīyasyendra iti caturthasyendrād iti pañcamasyendreti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1625: prayanti tad abhyudyanti yasmād eṣā samānā satīndravibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv oṣadhayaḥ pacyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1626: (PB 10.9.1) yad ṛcā prastauti tat prathamasyāhno rūpam svaravibhakter yat purastāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1627: stobhaṃ tad dvitīyasya yad ubhayataḥ stobhaṃ tat tṛtīyasya yad anutunnaṃ tac caturthasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1628: yad abhyārabdhaṃ tat pañcamasya yad ihakāreṇābhyastaṃ tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:1629: (PB 10.9.2) svarāṇāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī svaravibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmād yathartu vāyuḥ pavate
GV02pncvbr1u:1630: (PB 10.10.1) padanidhanaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam nidhanavibhakter bahirṇidhanaṃ dvitīyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1631: niṃnidhanaṃ tṛtīyasyenidhanañ caturthasyāthakāraṇidhanaṃ pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1632: tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ nidhanānāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī nidhanavibhaktir nnānārūpā
GV02pncvbr1u:1633: tasmād ime lokāḥ saha santo nānaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:1634: (PB 10.11.1) dravadiḍaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam iḍāvibhakter ūrdhveḍaṃ dvitīyasya pariṣṭubdheḍaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1635: tṛtīyasyeḍābhir aiḍaṃ caturthasyādhyardheḍaṃ pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ tat
GV02pncvbr1u:1636: ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpam iḍānāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satīḍāvibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmāt samānāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1638: (PB 10.12.1) bharadvājāyanā vai sattram āsata tān apṛcchan kiṃ prathamenāhnā kuruteti
GV02pncvbr1u:1639: praivaimeti kiṃ dvitīyenety avasam evākurmahīti kiṃ tṛtīyeneti pary evāplavāmahīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1640: kiṃ caturtheneti sataiva sad apyadadhmeti kiṃ pañcameneti prāṇān eva vicchindanta
GV02pncvbr1u:1642: (PB 10.12.2) yasya padena prastauty atha svāram abhi vāva tena devāḥ paśūn apaśyan
GV02pncvbr1u:1643: yat purastāt stobhaṃ atha svāram ud eva tenāsṛjanata yad ubhayataḥ stobham atha svāram
GV02pncvbr1u:1644: ebhya eva tena lokebhyo devāḥ paśubhyo 'nnādyaṃ prāyacchan yad anutunnam atha svāram
GV02pncvbr1u:1645: upaiva tenāśikṣan yasya madhye nidhanam atha svāraṃ garbhāṃs tenādadhata tāni havatāsvāreṇa prājanayan
GV02pncvbr1u:1646: (PB 10.12.3) imaṃ vāva devā lokaṃ padanidhanenābhy ajayann amuṃ bahirṇidhanenāntarikṣaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1649: (PB 10.12.4) imaṃ vāva devā lokaṃ dravadiḍenābhy ajayann amum ūrdhveḍenāntarikṣaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1650: pariṣṭubdheḍena pratiṣṭhām iḍābhir aiḍenāvārundhata pratiṣṭhāyādhyardheḍena vyajayantāsminn
GV02pncvbr1u:1652: (PB 10.12.5) na vāk saṃvatsaram ativadatīḍaiva saṃvatsaram ativadati garbheṇa saṃvatsare paryāvṛtya prajāyete tenātivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1653: (PB 10.12.6) tā vā etāś catasraḥ ṣaḍahaṃ parācya iḍā atiyanty eṣā nūtaiṣā viṣūcy eṣā pratīcy etad vīḍam
GV02pncvbr1u:1654: (PB 10.12.7) saṃvatsaro 'gnir vāk samvatsaro yad agnir vibhajyate vācam eva tad vibhajanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1655: (PB 10.12.8) dve dve akṣare vibhajanti dvau dvau hi māsāv ṛturatho māsānām eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1656: (PB 10.12.9) ṣaḍ ahāni vibhajanti ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtūnāṃ dhṛtyā ṛtūnāṃ pratiṣṭhityā atho ṛtūnām eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate ṣaḍ u puruṣā yān agnir anuvihriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1657: (PB 10.12.10) yad idaṃ bahudhāgnir vihriyate tad asāv ādityaḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ pratyaṅ tasmād ete devate vibhaktim ānaśāte nāto 'nyā kā cana
GV02pncvbr1u:1658: (PB 11.1.1) stomo yujyate sattriyebhyo ' harbhyaḥ pratnavatībhiś copavatībhiś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:1659: (PB 11.1.2) yat pratnavatyo upavatībhyaḥ pūrvā yujyante brahma tat pūrvaṃ kṣatrād yujyate brahma hi pūrvaṃ kṣatram
GV02pncvbr1u:1660: (PB 11.1.3) manas tat pūrvaṃ vāco yujyate mano hi yad dhi manasābhigacchati tad vācā vadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1661: (PB 11.1.4) bṛhat tat pūrvaṃ rathantarād yujyate bṛhad dhi pūrvaṃ rathantarād vijityā tu vai rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:1662: (PB 11.1.5) sambhāryās tṛcā bhavanti yathāśiṣṭhān vahiṣṭhān sambhared evam evaitān sambharanti gatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1663: (PB 11.1.6) nava bhavanti navāhasya yuktyā ṛcarcaivāhar yunakti yathāprārthasya śamyā avadadhyād evam evaitan navāhasya śamyā avadadhāti gatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1664: (PB 11.1.7) trivṛd eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1665: (PB 11.2.1) ubhābhyāṃ vai rūpābhyāṃ bahiṣpavamānyo yujyante yatsāmā stomo bhavati tad ājyeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1666: (PB 11.2.2) nirāhāvanty ājyāni bhavanti yuktam eva tair āhvayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1667: (PB 11.2.3) agna āyāhi vītaya ā no mitrāvaruṇāyāhi suṣamā hi ta indrāgnī āgataṃ sutam iti rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1668: (PB 11.3.1) pra somāso vipaścita iti gāyatrī bhavati pretyā abhidroṇāni babhrava
GV02pncvbr1u:1669: ity abhikrāntyai stutā indrāya vāyava iti saṃskṛtyai pra soma deva vītaya iti pretyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1670: pra tu draveti pretyai pra vā etenāhnā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1674: (PB 11.3.5) aśvo vai bhūtvā prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa prājāyata bahur abhavat prajāyate bahur bhavaty āśvena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1676: (PB 11.3.7) anativādy enaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1678: (PB 11.3.9) yathā vā imā anyā oṣadhayaḥ evaṃ soma āsīt sa tapo 'tapyata sa etat somasāmāpaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:1679: tena rājyamādhipatyam agacchad yaśo 'bhavad rājyam ādhipatyaṃ gacchati yaśo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1681: (PB 11.3.10) yaudhājayaṃ bhavati yad eva yaudhājayasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1683: (PB 11.4.1) abhi tvā śūra no nu ma ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rathantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1684: (PB 11.4.2) kayā naś citra ābhuvad iti kavatyas tena prājāpatyāḥ ko hi prajāpatiḥ prajāpater āptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1685: (PB 11.4.3) taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhaso 'bhivatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rathantaraṃ hy etad
GV02pncvbr1u:1686: (PB 11.4.4) indraṃ gīrbhir havāmaha iti havanta evainam
GV02pncvbr1u:1687: (PB 11.4.5) tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomo vai taro yajño vidadvasuḥ stomena vai yajño yujyate yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum ity āha yajñam eva tad yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:1688: (PB 11.4.6) rathantaraṃ bhavati brahma vai rathantaraṃ brahma prāyaṇīyam ahar brahmaṇa eva tad brahmākramya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1689: (PB 11.4.7) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratiṣṭhāya sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:1690: (PB 11.4.8) vāmadevyaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ paśūnām avaruddhyai prājāpatyaṃ vai vāmadevyaṃ prajāpatāv eva pratiṣṭhāya sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:1691: (PB 11.4.9) naudhasaṃ bhavati brahma vai naudhasaṃ brahma prāyaṇīyam ahar brahmaṇa eva tad rahmākramante
GV02pncvbr1u:1692: (PB 11.4.10) kāleyaṃ bhavati samānaloke vai kāleyañ ca rathantarañ ceyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ paśavaḥ kāleyam asyāñ caiva paśuṣu ca pratiṣṭhāya sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:1693: (PB 11.4.11) dravadiḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1694: (PB 11.5.1) pra somāso madacyuta iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavṛt tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1695: madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāty ayā pasvasva devayur ity eti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rāthantaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1696: hy etad ahaḥ pavate 'har yato harir iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bṛhad eva tad etasminn ahani
GV02pncvbr1u:1697: yunakti tad yuktaṃ śva ārabhante pra sunvānāyāndhasa iti pravatyo bhavanti praṇinīṇyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1698: iva hy etad ahar abhi priyāṇi pavate ca nohita ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rāthantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1699: (PB 11.5.2) yajñā yajñā vo agnaya ity agner vai yajño yajña eva tad yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1700: (PB 11.5.3) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1701: (PB 11.5.4) saṃhitaṃ bhavati vyakṣaraṇidhanaṃ pratiṣṭhāyai pratiṣṭhāyaiva sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:1703: (PB 11.5.6) saphena vai devā imān lokān samāpnuvvan yat samāpnuvaṃs tat saphasya saphatvam imān evaitena lokān samāpya sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:1705: (PB 11.5.8) aṣṭau vā etāḥ kādughā āsaṃs tāsām (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1706: ekā samaśīryata sā kṛṣir abhavad ṛdhyate 'smai kṛṣau ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1707: (PB 11.5.9) tāsu devāsurā aspardhanta te devā asurān kāmadughābhya ākṣāreṇānudanta nudate bhrātṛvyaṃ kāmadughābhya ākṣāreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1708: (PB 11.5.10) ebhyo vai lokebhyo raso 'pākrāmat taṃ prajāpatir ākṣāreṇākṣārayad yad ākṣārayat tad ākṣārasyākṣāratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1709: (PB 11.5.11) tasmād yaḥ purā puṇyo bhūtvā paścāt pāpīyān syād ākṣāraṃ brahma sāma kurvītātmany eved indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam ākṣārayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1710: (PB 11.5.12) januṣaikarco bhavato 'hno dhṛtyai yad vā etasyāhno 'dhṛtaṃ tad etābhyāṃ dādhāra
GV02pncvbr1u:1712: (PB 11.5.14) gaurīvitir vā etac chāktyo brāhmaṇo 'tiriktam apaśyat tad gaurīvitam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:1713: (PB 11.5.15) atiriktaṃ vā etad atiriktena stuvanti yad gaurīvitenāhīnāñ chavastanavad bhavaty api prajāyā upakḷptam
GV02pncvbr1u:1714: (PB 11.5.16) vṛṣā vā etad vājisāma vṛṣabho retodhā adya stuvanti śvaḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1715: (PB 11.5.17) anuṣṭubhi chandasāṃ kriyate 'nuṣṭub bhi chandasāṃ yoniḥ svāyām eva tad yonau reto dhatte prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1716: (PB 11.5.18) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1717: (PB 11.5.19) dvyudāsaṃ bhavaty etau vā udāsau svargasya lokasyāvasānadarśau pūrveṇa pūrvam ahaḥ saṃsthāpayanty uttareṇottaram ahar abhyativadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1718: (PB 11.5.20) tad yathādaḥ pūrvedyuḥ spaṣṭaṃ tṛṇodakam anvavasyanto yanty evam eva tābhyāṃ svargaṃ lokam anvavasyanto yanti
