GV02pncvbr1u:1720: (PB 11.5.22) sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1721: (PB 11.5.23) yad u caivānuṣtṭubhasya madhye nidhanasya brāhmaṇaṃ tad du caitasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1723: (PB 11.5.25) lokabinduḥ sāma vindate lokaṃ kāvena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1724: (PB 11.5.26) svārasu svareṇa svareṇa hi devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pradīyate svareṇaiva tad devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pra yacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:1726: (PB 11.5.28) vāg yajñāyajñīyaṃ vāci yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhito vācy eva tad yajñam antataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti taṃ vāco 'dhi śva ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1727: (PB 11.5.29) trivṛd eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1730: (PB 11.6.3) pavasvendo vṛṣāsuta ity anurūpyo bhavati vṛṣāvad vā eta aindraṃ traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1731: (PB 11.6.4) pūrvam u tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1732: (PB 11.6.5) anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1738: (PB 11.6.11) ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhati ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1739: (PB 11.7.1) ubhābhyāṃ vai rūpābhyāṃ bahiṣpavamānyo yujyante yatsāmā stomo bhavati tad ājyeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1741: (PB 11.7.3) agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmaha indram id gāthino bṛhad indro agnā namo bṛhad iti bārhatam eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1742: (PB 11.8.1) vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1743: (PB 11.8.2) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1746: (PB 11.8.5) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa samṛddhā vṛṣaṇvad vā etad aindraṃ traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1747: (PB 11.8.6) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1749: (PB 11.8.8) yuktāśvo va āṅgirasaḥ śiśū jātau viparyaharat tasmān mantro 'pākrāmat
GV02pncvbr1u:1750: sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad yauktāśvam apaśyat taṃ mantra upāvartata tad vāva sa tarhy
GV02pncvbr1u:1751: akāmayata kāmasani sama yauktāśvaṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1753: (PB 11.8.10) ayāsyo vā āṅgirasa ādityānāṃ dīkṣitānām annādyam āśnāt taṃ śug ārcchat sa tapo 'tapyata sa ete āyāsye apaśyat tābhyāṃ śucam apāhatāpa śucaṃ hata āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1754: (PB 11.8.11) ebhyo vai lokebhyo vṛṣṭir apākrāmat tām ayāsya āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayati vṛṣṭim āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1755: (PB 11.8.12) annādyaṃ vāva tad ebhyo lokebhyo 'pākrāmat tad ayāsya āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat cyāvayaty annādyam āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1757: (PB 11.8.14) vasiṣṭho vā etena vaiḍavaḥ stutvāñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1758: (PB 11.9.1) tvām id dhi havāmaha iti tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1759: (PB 11.9.2) abhipravaḥ surādhasam iti yuñjate vai pūrveṇāhnā hy etena prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1760: (PB 11.9.3) tvām idā hyo nara ity adya caiva hyaś ca samārabhate dvirātrasyāvisraṃsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1761: (PB 11.9.4) bṛhad bhavati varṣma vai bṛhad varṣma dvitīyam ahar varṣmaṇa eva tad varṣmākramante
GV02pncvbr1u:1763: (PB 11.9.6) mādhucchandasaṃ bhavati sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1764: (PB 11.9.7) ūrdhveḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1765: (PB 11.10.1) yas te mado vareṇya iti gāyatrī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1766: (PB 11.10.2) madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1767: (PB 11.10.3) pavasva madhumattama iti pavanta iva hy etenāhnā madhumattama ity annaṃ vai madhv annādyam eva tad yajamāne dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1768: (PB 11.10.4) indram accha sutā ima itīndriyasya vīryasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1770: (PB 11.10.6) anuṣṭubhaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1771: (PB 11.10.7) vṛṣāmatīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇa iti jagatyaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1772: (PB 11.10.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1774: (PB 11.10.10) haviṣmāṃś ca vai haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv āstāṃ dvitīye 'hani haviṣmān arādhnon navame 'hani haviṣkṛt
GV02pncvbr1u:1775: (PB 11.10.11) ayaṃ haviṣmān ity eva jātam ahar jātaṃ somaṃ prāha devebhyaḥ sāmnaivāsmā āśiṣam āśāste sāma hi saty āśīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1776: (PB 11.10.12) śaṅku bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai yad vā adhṛtaṃ śaṅkunā tad dādhāra
GV02pncvbr1u:1777: (PB 11.10.13) tad u sīdantīyam iy āhur etena vai prajāpatir ūrdhva imān lokān asīdad yad asīdat tat sīdantīyasya sīdantīyatvam ūrdhva imān lokān sīdati sīdantīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1779: (PB 11.10.15) svarvad vai rāthantaraṃ rūpaṃ svarṇadhanaṃ bārhatam
GV02pncvbr1u:1780: (PB 11.10.16) svarṇadhanaṃ bhavati tathā hy etasyāhno rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:1781: (PB 11.10.17) pluvau vā etāv upohante svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1782: (PB 11.10.18) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1784: (PB 11.10.20) vāg vai krauñcaṃ vāg dvādaśāho vācy eva tad vācā stuvate yajñasya prabhūtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1786: (PB 11.10.22) etena vai yamo 'napajayyam amuṣya lokasyādhipatyam āśnutānapajayyam amuṣya lokasyādhipatyam aśnute yāmena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1787: (PB 11.10.23) etena vai yamī yamaṃ svargaṃ lokam agamayat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1788: (PB 11.11.1) ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi ta ity ehivatyai bhavanti tṛtīyasyāhna upahavāya santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1789: (PB 11.11.2) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yad ukthāni yad eti salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1790: (PB 11.11.3) evāhy asi vīrayur iti samānaṃ vadantīdam ittham asad iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1791: (PB 11.11.4) indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann ity avardhanta hy etarhi yajamānam evaitayā vardhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1792: (PB 11.11.5) sākam aśvaṃ bhavaty ukthānām abhijityā abhikrāntyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1793: (PB 11.11.6) etena hy agra ukthāny adhyajayann etenābhyakrāman
GV02pncvbr1u:1794: (PB 11.11.7) āmahīyavaṃ bhavati kḷptiś cānnādyañ ca samānaṃ vadantīṣu kriyata idam ittham asad iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1795: (PB 11.11.8) kṣatraṃ vā etad ahar abhinirvadati yat pañcadaśaṃ yad gāyatrīṣu brahmasāma
GV02pncvbr1u:1796: bhavati brahma caiva tat kṣatrañ ca sayujī karoti brahmaiva kṣatrasya purastān nidadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1797: brahmaṇe kṣatrañ ca viśañ cānuge karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1798: (PB 11.11.9) brahma vai pūrvam ahaḥ kṣatraṃ dvitīyaṃ yad gāyatrīṣu brahma sāma bhavati brahma tad yaśasārdhayati brahma hi gāyatrī
GV02pncvbr1u:1799: (PB 11.11.10) tad u samānaṃ vadantīṣu kriyate samṛddhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1801: (PB 11.11.12) aiyāhā iti vā indro vṛtram ahann aiyādohoveti nyagṛhṇād vārtraghne sāmanī vīryavatī
GV02pncvbr1u:1803: (PB 11.11.14) pañcadaśa eva stomo bhavaty ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhaty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1805: (PB 12.1.2) davidyutatī vai gāyatrī pariṣṭobhantī triṣṭub gavāśīr jagatī trīṇi rūpāṇi samārabhate trirātrasyāvisraṃsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1806: (PB 12.1.3) ete asṛgram indava ity anurūpo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1807: (PB 12.1.4) eta iti vai prajāpatir devān asṛjatāsṛgram iti manuṣyān indava iti pit.ṛṃs tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1808: (PB 12.1.5) pūrvam u caiva tad repam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam apareṇa rūpaṇo 'nuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1810: (PB 12.1.7) rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhy antarikṣeṇa yātava iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1811: (PB 12.1.8) antarikṣadevatyas tṛco bhavaty antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1812: (PB 12.1.9) pañcarcau bhavati pañcapadā paṅktiḥ pāṅktam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1813: (PB 12.1.10) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhy upayānti
GV02pncvbr1u:1814: (PB 12.1.11) saptadaśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1815: (PB 12.2.1) agnināgniḥ samidhyata ity āgreyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1816: (PB 12.2.2) pūrve eva tad ahanī samiddhe tṛtīyam ahar abhisamindhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1817: (PB 12.2.3) mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣam iti rāthantaram maitrāvaruṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1819: (PB 12.2.5) rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yad vairūpaṃ rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1820: (PB 12.2.6) indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣusa ity aindram
GV02pncvbr1u:1821: (PB 12.2.7) sam iva vā ime lokā dadṛśire 'ntarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1822: (PB 12.2.8) tā huve yayor idam iti rāthantaram aindrāgnam
GV02pncvbr1u:1823: (PB 12.2.9) huva iti vai rāthantaraṃ rūpaṃ rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yad vairūpaṃ rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1824: (PB 12.3.1) uccā te jātam andhasa iti gāyatrī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1825: (PB 12.3.2) udvad vā etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1826: (PB 12.3.3) andhasvatī bhavaty ahar vā andho 'hna ārambhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1828: (PB 12.3.5) abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ bṛhad iti bṛhata ubhayoḥ saha rūpam upaity ubhau hi varṇāv etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1829: (PB 12.3.6) tisro vāca īrayati pravahnir iti tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ tena tṛtīyam ahar ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1830: (PB 12.3.7) triṣṭubhaḥ satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa jāgataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1831: (PB 12.3.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1833: (PB 12.3.10) ahar vā etad avlīyata tad devā vaiṣṭambhair vyaṣṭabhnuvaṃs tad vaiṣṭambhasya vaiṣṭambhatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:1834: (PB 12.3.11) diśa iti nidhanam upayanti diśāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1836: (PB 12.3.13) ahar vā etad avlīyamānaṃ tad rakṣāṃsy anvasacanta tasmād devāḥ paurūmadgena rakṣāṃsy apāghnann apa pāpmānaṃ hate paurūmadgena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1837: (PB 12.3.14) devāś ca vāsurāś cāspardhanta te devā asurāṇāṃ paurūmadgena puro 'majjayan yat puro 'majjayaṃs tasmāt paurūmadgaṃ pāpmānam evaitena bhrātṛvyaṃ majjayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1840: (PB 12.3.17) ubhayataḥ stotraṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:1842: (PB 12.3.19) antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyam antarikṣa eva tad antarikṣeṇa stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1844: (PB 12.3.21) as iti vai rāthantaraṃ rūpaṃ has iti bārhataṃ tṛtīyam eva tad rūpam upayanti samṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1846: (PB 12.3.23) etena vā aṅgirasaḥ saṃkrośamānāḥ svargaṃ lokam āpan svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1847: (PB 12.4.1) yady āva indra te śatam iti śatavatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1848: (PB 12.4.2) śatavad vai paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ sahasravat paśūnām evaitābhī rūpam avarūndhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1849: (PB 12.4.3) vayaṅ ghatvā sutāvanta iti satobṛhatyo varṣīyaś chanda ākramate 'napabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1850: (PB 12.4.4) taraṇir it siṣāsati vājaṃ purandhyā yujā/
GV02pncvbr1u:1851: āva indraṃ puruhūtaṃ na me girety āvad akṣaram uddhatam iva vai tṛtīyam ahar yad eva tāvad akṣaraṃ bhavaty ahar evaitena pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1852: (PB 12.4.5) pañcanidhanaṃ vairūpaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati diśāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1854: (PB 12.4.7) diśāṃ vā etat sāma yad vairūpaṃ diśo hy evaitenābhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1855: (PB 12.4.8) atha yat pañcanidhanaṃ tenartūnāṃ pañca hy ṛtavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1856: (PB 12.4.9) ṛtubhiś ca vā ime lokā digbhiś cāvṛtās teṣv evobhayeṣu yajamānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati yajamānaṃ vā anupratitiṣṭhantam udgātā pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ vidvān vairūpeṇodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:1858: (PB 12.4.11) diśaṃ viśam iti nidhanam upayanti diśāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1859: (PB 12.4.12) has ity upariṣṭād diśāṃ nidhanam upayanti tena bārhatam
GV02pncvbr1u:1860: (PB 12.4.13) rāthantaro vā ayaṃ loko bārhato 'sāv ubhe eva tad bṛhadrathantarayo rūpeṇāparādhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1861: (PB 12.4.14) anaḍvāhau vā etau devayānau yajamānasya yad bṛhadrathantare tāv eva tad yunakti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1863: (PB 12.4.16) yathā maṇḍūka āṭ karoty evaṃ nidhanam upayanty ayātayāmatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1864: (PB 12.4.17) dvādaśa vairūpāṇi bhavanti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:1867: (PB 12.4.20) yadā vai puruṣo 'nnam atty athāntarato viṣṭabdhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1868: (PB 12.4.21) diśa iti nidhanam upayanti diśāṃ dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1869: (PB 12.4.22) sato bṛhatīṣu stuvanti pūrvayor ahnoḥ pratyudyamāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1872: (PB 12.4.25) agnir vā etasya paśūn apakramayati yasya paśavo 'pakrāmanty agnir eva tasya paśūn abhikramayati yasya paśavo 'bhikrāmanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1873: (PB 12.4.26) abhy abhy evāsya paśavaḥ krāmanti ya evaṃ vidvān rauraveṇa stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:1874: (PB 12.4.27) pariṣṭubdheḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1875: (PB 12.5.1) ''tisro vāca udīrata'' iti tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ tena tṛtīyam ahar ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1876: (PB 12.5.2) udvad vā etat trivad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1878: (PB 12.5.4) anto vai tṛtīyam ahas tasyaitāḥ paryāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1879: (PB 12.5.5) ''sakhāya āniṣīdata'' ity uddhattam iva vai tṛtīyam ahar yad āha niṣīdatety ahar evaitena pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1880: (PB 12.5.6) ''sutāso madhumattamā'' ity anuṣṭubhaḥ satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa jāgataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1882: (PB 12.5.8) vitatam iva vā idam antarikṣam antareme antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1883: (PB 12.5.9) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam

GV02pncvbr1u:2054: (PB 12.13.11) viśālaṃ libjayā śrūtyābhyadhād iti hovācopoditir gopāleyo 'nuṣṭubhi nānadam akar gaurīvitena ṣoḍaśinam astoṣṭāñjasā śriyam upāgān na śriyā avapadyata iti

GV02pncvbr1u:2063: (PB 12.13.20) trayastriṃśadakṣarā vā etā virājo yad ekaviṃśatiḥ pratiṣṭhā sā yad dvādaśa prajātiḥ sā
GV02pncvbr1u:2064: (PB 12.13.21) pratiṣṭhāya prajāyate no cāntasthāyāṃ jīryate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2065: (PB 12.13.22) atha vā etā ekapadās tryakṣarā viṣṇoś chando bhurijaḥ śakvaryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2066: (PB 12.13.23) etābhir vā indro vṛtram ahan kṣipraṃ vā etābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ hanti kṣipraṃ vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2067: (PB 12.13.24) catustriṃśadakṣarāḥ saṃstuto bhavati trayastriṃśaddevattāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evopayanty ariṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2068: (PB 12.13.25) hiraṇyaṃ sampradāyaṃ ṣoḍaśinā stuvate jyotiṣmān asya ṣoḍaśī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2069: (PB 12.13.26) aśvaḥ kṛṣṇa upatiṣṭhati sāmyekṣayāya bhrātṛvyalokam eva sa vidhamaṃs tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2070: (PB 12.13.27) ekākṣaraṃ vai devānām avamaṃ chanda āsīt saptākṣaraṃ paramaṃ navākṣaram
GV02pncvbr1u:2071: asurāṇām avamaṃ chanda āsīt pañcadaśākṣaraṃ paramaṃ devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:2072: tān prajāpatir ānuṣṭubho bhūtvāntarātiṣṭhat taṃ devāsurā vyahvayanta sa devān upāvartata
GV02pncvbr1u:2074: (PB 12.13.28) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2075: (PB 12.13.29) te devā asurāṇām ekākṣareṇaiva pañcadaśākṣaram avṛñjata dvyakṣareṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2076: caturdaśākṣaraṃ tryakṣareṇa trayodaśākṣaraṃ caturakṣareṇa dvādaśākṣaraṃ pañcākṣareṇaikādaśākṣaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2077: ṣaḍakṣareṇa daśākṣaraṃ saptākṣareṇa navākṣaram aṣṭābhir evāṣṭāv avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:2078: (PB 12.13.30) evam eva bhrātṛvyād bhūtiṃ vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2079: (PB 12.13.31) aparuddhayajña iva vā eṣa yat ṣoḍaśī kanīyasvina iva vai tarhi devā āsan bhūyasvino 'surāḥ kanīyasvina bhūyasvinaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2080: (PB 12.13.32) ''yasmād anyo na paro 'sti jāto ya ābabhūva bhuvanāni viśvā/
GV02pncvbr1u:2081: prajāpatiḥ prajayā samvidānas trīṇi jyotīṃ ṣi sacate sa ṣoḍaśī-'' ity udgātā graham avekṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:2082: (PB 12.13.33) jyotiṣmān asya ṣoḍaśī bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2083: (PB 12.13.34) ekaviṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2084: (PB 13.1.1) ''govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid'' iti pañcamasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2085: (PB 13.1.2) govid vā etad vasuvid dhiraṇyavidyac chakvaryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2087: (PB 13.1.4) ''tvaṃ suvīro asi somaviśvavid'' ity eṣa yāva suvīro yasya paśavas tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2088: (PB 13.1.5) tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtaṃ paya'' iti madhumad vai ghṛtaṃ payaḥ paśavaḥ kṣaranti tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2090: (PB 13.1.7) viśvam eva tadvit tam abhivadati viśvaṃ hi paśubhir vindate
GV02pncvbr1u:2091: (PB 13.1.8) ''pra te sargā asṛkṣata-'' iti sṛṣṭānīva hy etarhy ahāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2092: (PB 13.1.9) pūrvam u caiva tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpeṇānuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam,
GV02pncvbr1u:2093: anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda stotrīyānurupau tṛcau bhavataḥ prāṇāpānānām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2096: (PB 13.1.12) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhy udyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2097: (PB 13.1.13) triṇava eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai puṣṭyai trivṛd vā eṣa puṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2098: (PB 13.2.1) ''tava śriyo varṣasy eva vidyuta'' ity āgneyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2099: (PB 13.2.2) śrīr vai paśavaḥ śrīḥ śakvaryaḥ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2100: (PB 13.2.3) ''agneś cikitra uṣasām ivetaya'' itītānīva hy etarhy ahānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2101: (PB 13.2.4) ''ā te yatente rathyo yathā pṛthag'' ity eva hy etarhy ahāni yatante
GV02pncvbr1u:2102: (PB 13.2.5) ''purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa-'' iti maitrāvaruṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2103: (PB 13.2.6) yad vai yajñasya duriṣṭaṃ tad varuṇo gṛhṇāti tad eva tad avayajati
GV02pncvbr1u:2105: (PB 13.2.8) pañca vā ṛtava utthānasya rūpam ojasā sahety ojasaiva vīryeṇa sahottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2107: (PB 13.2.10) rathantaram etat parokṣaṃ yac chakvaryo rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2108: (PB 13.3.1) ''arṣā soma dyumattama'' iti viṣṇumatyo gāyatryo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2109: (PB 13.3.2) brahma vai gāyatrī yajño viṣṇur brahmaṇy eva tad yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2110: (PB 13.3.3) ''soma uṣvāṇas sotṛbhir'' iti simānāṃ rūpaṃ svenaivaitās tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2111: (PB 13.3.4) ''yat soma citram ukthyam'' iti gāyatryaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubhāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2112: (PB 13.3.5) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2113: (PB 13.3.6) yaṇvaṃ bhavati paśavo vai yaṇvaṃ paśūnām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2117: (PB 13.3.10) etena vai śakalaḥ pañcame 'hani pratyatiṣṭhat pratitiṣṭhati śākalena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2119: (PB 13.3.12) vṛśo vaijānas tryaruṇasya traidhātavasyaikṣvākasya purohita āsīt sa
GV02pncvbr1u:2120: aikṣvāko 'dhāvayat brāhmaṇakumāraṃ rathena vyacchinat sa purohitam abravīt tava mā
GV02pncvbr1u:2121: purodhāyām idam īdṛg upāgād iti tam etena sāmnā samairayat tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata
GV02pncvbr1u:2125: (PB 13.3.15) etena vai manuḥ prajāpatiṃ bhūmānam agacchat prajāyate bahur bhavati mānavena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2127: (PB 13.3.17) etena vai vadhryaśva ānūpaḥ paśūnāṃ bhūmānam āśnuta paśūnāṃ bhūmānam aśnuta ānūpena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2129: (PB 13.3.19) māmārṣeyeṇa praśastaṃ yaṃ vai gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ praśaṃsanti vāma iti taṃ praśaṃsanty ahar evaitena praśaṃsanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2132: (PB 13.3.22) agriḥ sṛṣṭo nodadīpyata taṃ prajāpatir etena sāmnopādhamat sa udadīpyata dīptiś ca vā etat sāma brahmavarcasaṃ ca dīptiś caivaitena brahmavarcasaṃ cāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2134: (PB 13.3.24) śiśur vā āṅgiraso mantrakṛtāṃ mantrakṛd āsīt sa pit.ṛn putrakā ity āmantrayata,
GV02pncvbr1u:2135: taṃ pitaro 'bruvan na dharmaṃ karoṣi yo naḥ pit.ṛn sataḥ putrakā ity āmantrayama iti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2136: so 'bravīd ahaṃ vāva vaḥ pitāsmi yo mantrakṛd asmīti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2137: taṃ deveṣv apṛcchanta te devā abuvann eṣa vāva pitā yo mantrakṛd iti tad vai sa udajayad ujjayati śaiśavena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2138: (PB 13.3.25) gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭhāyai brahmavarcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2139: (PB 13.3.26) viṣṇumatyo gāyatryo bhavanti tad u traiṣṭubhād rūpān na yanti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2140: (PB 13.4.1) indraḥ prajāpatim upādhāvad vṛtraṃ hanānīti tasmā etac chandobhya indriyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2141: vīryaṃ nirmāya prāyacchad etena śaknuhīti tac chakvarīṇāṃ śakvarītvaṃ sīmānam abhinat
GV02pncvbr1u:2142: tat simā mahnyam akarot tan mahnyā mahān ghoṣa āsīt tan mahānāmnyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2143: (PB 13.4.2) diśaḥ pañcapadā dādhārartūn ṣaṭpadā chandāṃsi saptapadā puruṣaṃ dvipadā
GV02pncvbr1u:2144: (PB 13.4.3) dvyopaśāḥ saṃstutā bhavanti tasmād dvyopaśāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2145: (PB 13.4.4) iḍe abhito 'thakāraṃ tasmāc chṛṅge tīkṣṇīyasī stūpāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2149: (PB 13.4.8) āpo vai kṣīrarasā āsaṃste devāḥ pāpavasīyasād abibhayur yad apa upanidhāya stuvate pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2150: (PB 13.4.9) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2151: (PB 13.4.10) gāyatram ayanaṃ bhavati brahmavarcasakāmasya svarṇidhanaṃ madhunāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate,
GV02pncvbr1u:2152: traiṣṭubham ayanaṃ bhavaty ojaskāmasyāthakāraṇidhana mājyenāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate,
GV02pncvbr1u:2153: jāgatam ayanaṃ bhavati paśukāmasyeḍānidhanaṃ payasāmuṣmiṃl loka upatiṣṭhate
GV02pncvbr1u:2154: (PB 13.4.11) añjasāryo mālyaḥ śakvarīḥ prārautsīd iti hovācālammaṃ pārijānataṃ rajanaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2155: kauṇayo yady enāḥ pratiṣṭhāpaṃ śakṣyatīty etad vā etāsām añjayati pratiṣṭhitā ya
GV02pncvbr1u:2158: (PB 13.4.13) paśavo vai śakvaryo gauṣṭhaḥ purīṣaṃ goṣṭham eva tat paśubhyaḥ paryasyanti tam evainān pravartyanty avisraṃsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2159: (PB 13.4.14) ''indro madāya vāvṛdha'' ity avardhanta hy etarhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2161: (PB 13.4.16) ''svādor itthā viṣuvata'' iti viṣuvān vai pañcamam ahas tāsu rāyovājīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2162: (PB 13.4.7) indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta pṛthuraśmir
GV02pncvbr1u:2163: bṛhadgirī rāyovājas te 'bruvan ko na imān putrān bhariṣyatīty aham itīndro 'bravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:2165: vardhayaṃs tān vardhayitvābravīt kumārakā varān vṛṇīdhvam iti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2166: kṣatraṃ mahyam ity abravīt pṛthuraśmis tasmā etena pārthuraśmena kṣatraṃ prāyacchat kṣatrakāma etena stuvīta kṣatrasyaivāsya prakāśo bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:2167: brahmavarcasaṃ mahyam ity abravīt bṛhādgiris tasmā etena bārhadgireṇa prāyacchat brahmavarcasakāma etena stuvīta brahmavarcasī bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:2168: paśūn mahyam ity abravīd rāyovājas tasmā etena rāyovājīyena paśūn prāyacchat paśukāma etena stuvīta paśumān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2169: (PB 13.4.18) pārthuraśmaṃ rājanyāya brahmasāma kuryāt bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇāya rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyāya svenaivenāṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2170: (PB 13.5.1) ''asāvy aṃśur madāya-'' iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2171: (PB 13.5.2) ''abhi dyumnaṃ bṛhadyaśa'' ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ bṛhad iti bṛhata ubhayos saha rūpam upaity ubhau hi varṇāv etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2172: (PB 13.5.3) ''prāṇā śiśur mahīnām'' iti simānāṃ rūpaṃ mahyo hi simāḥ svenaivainās tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2174: (PB 13.5.5) yajño vai viṣṇur yad atra nāpi kriyate tad viṣṇunā yajñenāpi karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2175: (PB 13.5.6) ''indur vājī pavate gonyoghā'' iti simānāṃ rūpaṃ svenaivainās tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2176: (PB 13.5.7) triṣṭubhaḥ satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa tasmāj jagatīnāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2177: (PB 13.5.7) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2179: (PB 13.5.90) vāg vā eṣā pratatā yad dvādaśāhas tasyā eṣa viṣuvān yat pañcamam ahas tām evaitena santanoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2181: (PB 13.5.12) prajātir vai cyāvanaṃ prajāyate bahur bhavati cyāvanena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2182: (PB 13.5.13) ebhyo vai lokebhyo vṛṣṭir apākrāmat tāṃ prajāpatiś cyāvanenācyāvayad yad acyāvayat tac cyāvanasya cyāvanatvaṃ cyāvayati vṛṣṭiṃ cyāvanena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2184: (PB 13.5.15) etena vā indra indrakrośe viśvāmitrajamadagnī imā gāva ity ākrośat paśunām avarudhyai krośaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2185: (PB 13.5.16) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2187: (PB 13.5.18) paśavo vai śakvaryaḥ paśuṣv eva tan mithunam apy arjati prajātyai na ha vā anṛṣabhāḥ paśavaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2189: (PB 13.5.20) etena vai pṛthur vainya ubhayeṣāṃ paśūnām ādhipatyam āśnutobhayeṣāṃ paśunām ādhipatyam aśnute pārthena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2191: (PB 13.5.22) indro vṛtrāya vajram udayacchat taṃ ṣoḍaśabhir bhogaiḥ paryabhujat sa etaṃ padastobham apaśyat tenāpāveṣṭayad apāveṣṭayann iva gāyet pāpmano 'pahatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2192: (PB 13.5.23) pāpmā vāva sa tam agṛhṇāt taṃ padastobhenāpāhatāpa pāpmānaṃ hate padastobhena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2193: (PB 13.5.24) pador uttamam apaśyat tat padastobhasya padastobhatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2196: (PB 13.5.27) yāṃ vai gāṃ praśaṃsanti dāśaspatyeti tāṃ praśaṃsanty ahar evaitena praśaṃsanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2197: (PB 13.5.28) nidhanāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanty ahno dhṛtyai stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2199: (PB 13.6.2) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yad ukthāni yad eti salomatvāyaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:2200: (PB 13.6.3) ''indrāya sāma gāyata-'' iti pūrṇāḥ kakubhas tenānaśanāyuko bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2201: (PB 13.6.4) puruṣo vai kakup puruṣam eva tan madhyataḥ prīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2202: (PB 13.6.5) ''asāvi soma indra ta'' iti simānāṃ rūpaṃ svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2204: (PB 13.6.7) devāś ca vā asurāś ca samadadhata yatare naḥ sañjayāṃs teṣāṃ naḥ paśavo
GV02pncvbr1u:2205: 'sān iti te devā asurān sañjayena samajayan yat samajayaṃs tasmāt sañjayaṃ paśūnām
GV02pncvbr1u:2208: (PB 13.6.9) dīrghajihvī vā idaṃ rakṣo yajñahā yajñiyān avalihaty acarat tām indraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2209: kayācana māyayā hantuṃ nāśaṃsatātha ha sumitraḥ kutsaḥ kalyāṇa āsa tam abravīd imām
GV02pncvbr1u:2210: acchā brūṣveti tām acchā brūta sainam abravīn nāhaitan na śuśruva priyam iva tu me
GV02pncvbr1u:2211: hṛdayasyeti tām ajñapayat tāṃ saṃskṛte 'hatāṃ tad vāva tau tarhy akāmayetāṃ kāmasani
GV02pncvbr1u:2213: (PB 13.6.10) sumitraḥ san krūram akar ity enaṃ vāg abhyavadat taṃ śug ārcchat sa tapo 'tapyata sa etat saumitram apaśyat tena śucam apāhatāpaśucaṃ hate saumitreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2215: (PB 13.6.12) pāpmānaṃ hatvā yad amahīyanta tan mahāvaiśvāmitrasya mahāvaiśvāmitratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2216: (PB 13.6.13) hāyā ihayā ohā oheti paśūn evaitena nyauhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:2218: (PB 13.6.15) dravantīm iḍām uttamām upayanti ṣaṣṭhasyāhnaḥ santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2219: (PB 13.6.16) triṇava eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai puṣṭyai trivṛd vā eṣa puṣṭhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2220: (PB 13.7.1) ''jyotir yajñasya pavate madhupriyam'' iti ṣaṣṭhasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2221: (PB 13.7.2) jyotir vai gāyatrī chandamāṃ jyotiḥ revatī sāmnāṃ jyotis trayastriṃśaḥ stomānāṃ jyotir eva tat samyak saṃdadhāsy api ha putrasya putro jyotiṣmān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2222: (PB 13.7.3) ''madhu priyam'' iti paśavo vai revatyo madhupriyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2223: (PB 13.7.4) ''madintamo matsara indriyo rasa'' itīndriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ rasaḥ paśavas tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2226: (PB 13.7.7) pūrvam u caiva tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam apareṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2227: rūpeṇānuvadati tad anurūpasyānurūpatvam anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda stotrīyānurūpau
GV02pncvbr1u:2229: (PB 13.7.8) daśarcau bhavato daśākṣarā virāṭ vairājam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2230: (PB 13.7.9) uttaro daśarco bhavati sodarka indriyasya vīryasya rasasyānatikṣārāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2231: (PB 13.7.10) yatra ve devā indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam apaśyaṃs tad anunyatudan
GV02pncvbr1u:2233: (PB 13.7.12) dhvasre vai puruṣantī tarantapurumīḍhābhyāṃ vaitadaśvibhyāṃ sahasrāṇy
GV02pncvbr1u:2234: aditsatāṃ tāv aikṣetāṃ kathaṃ nāv idam āttam apratigṛhītaṃ syād iti tau praty etāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2236: tarat sa mandī dhāvatīti tato vai tat tayor āttam apratigṛhītam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:2237: (PB 13.7.13) āttam asyāpratigṛhītaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2238: (PB 13.7.14) vinārāśaṃso bhavaty ubhayasyānnādyasyāvarudhyai mānuṣasya ca daivasya ca
GV02pncvbr1u:2239: (PB 13.7.15) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2240: (PB 13.7.16) trayastriṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai devatāsu vā eṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2241: (PB 13.8.1) ''imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedasa'' ity āgneyam ājyaṃ bhavati sodarkam
GV02pncvbr1u:2242: indriyasya vīryasya rasasyānatikṣārāya yatra vai devā indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam apaśyaṃs tad anunyatudan
GV02pncvbr1u:2244: (PB 13.8.3) anto vai sūro 'nta etat ṣaṣṭham ahar ahnām anta eva tad ante stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2245: (PB 13.8.4) ''bhindhi viśvā apadviṣa'' ity aindraṃ sodarkam indriyasya vīryasya rasasyānatikṣārāya yatra vai devā indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam apaśyaṃs tad anunyatudan
GV02pncvbr1u:2246: (PB 13.8.5) ''yajñasya hi stha ṛtvija'' ity aindrāgnaṃ sodarkam indriyasya vīryasya rasasyānatikṣārāya yatra vai devā indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam apaśyaṃs tad anunyatudan stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2250: (PB 13.9.4) samānaṃ vai simānāṃ rūpaṃ revatīnāṃ ca simābhyo hy adhirevatyaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2251: (PB 13.9.5) ''etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipa'' ity ādityā ādityā vā imāḥ prajās tāsām eva madhyataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2252: (PB 13.9.6) gāyatryaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubhāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2253: (PB 13.9.7) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2255: (PB 13.9.9) paśavo vā iṣovṛdhīyaṃ paśūnām avarudhyā iṣe vai pañcamam ahar vṛdhe ṣaṣṭham avardhanta hy etarhi yajamānam evaitena vardhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2257: (PB 13.9.11) kruṅṅ eṣyam ahar avindad eṣyam iva vai ṣaṣṭham ahar evaitena vindanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2259: (PB 13.9.13) annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai yadā hi vā annam atha gaur athāśvo 'tha puruṣo vājī
GV02pncvbr1u:2262: (PB 13.9.16) āpo vai revatyas tā yat pṛṣṭhaṃ kuryur apaśur yajamānaḥ syāt paśūn asya
GV02pncvbr1u:2263: nirdaheyur yatra vā āpo vivartante tad oṣadhayo jāyante 'tha yatrāvatiṣṭhante nirmṛtukās
GV02pncvbr1u:2264: tatra bhavanti tasmāt pavamāne kurvanti parācā hi pavamānena stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2265: (PB 13.9.17) methī vā iṣovṛdhīyaṃ rajjuḥ krauñcaṃ vatso vājadāvaryo revatyo mātaro yad etāny evaṃ sāmāni kriyanta evam eva prattāṃ dugdhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2267: (PB 13.9.19) ukṣṇorandhro vā etābhyāṃ kāvyo 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2268: (PB 13.9.20) vājajid bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvaṃ vā ete vājaṃ jayanti ye ṣaṣṭham ahar āgacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2271: (PB 13.9.23) etena vai varuṇo rājyam ādhipatyam agacchad yaśo 'bhavad rājyam ādhipatyaṃ gacchati yaśo bhavati varuṇasāmnā tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2273: (PB 13.9.25) paśavo vai revatyo gauṣṭham eva tat paśubhyaḥ paryasyanti tam evainān pravartayanty avisraṃsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2275: (PB 13.9.27) etena vai vāmadevo 'nnasya purodhām agacchad annaṃ vai brahmaṇaḥ purodhā annasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2276: (PB 13.9.28) gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭhāyai brahmavarñcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2277: (PB 13.9.29) marutvatyo gāyatryo bhavanti tad u traiṣṭubhād rūpān na yanti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2278: (PB 13.10.1) yātayāmāny anyāni chandāṃsy ayātayāmā gāyatrī tasmād gāyatrīṣu stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2279: (PB 13.10.2) ''surūpa kṛtnum ūtaya'' ity abhyārambheṇa ṣaṭpadāḥ ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ tena ṣaṣṭham ahar ārabhante santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2280: (PB 13.10.3) ''ubhe yad indra rodasī'' iti ṣaṭpadāḥ ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ tena ṣaṣṭham ahar ārabhante santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2282: (PB 13.10.5) apāṃ vā eṣa raso yad revatyo revatīnāṃ raso yad vāravantīyaṃ sarasā eva tad revatīḥ prayuṅkte yad vāravantīyena pṛṣṭhena stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2283: (PB 13.10.6) revad vā etad raivatyaṃ yad vāravantīyam asya revān revātyā jāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2285: (PB 13.10.8) keśine vā etad dālbhyāya sāmāvir abhavat tad enam abravīd agātāro mā
GV02pncvbr1u:2286: gāyanti mā mayodgāsiṣur iti kathaṃ ta āgā bhagava ity abravīd āgeyam evāsmy āgāyann
GV02pncvbr1u:2287: iva gāyet pratiṣṭhāyai tad alammaṃ pārijānataṃ paścādakṣaṃ śayānam etām āgāṃ gāyantam
GV02pncvbr1u:2288: ajānāt tam abravīt puras tvā dadhā iti tam abruvan ko nv ayaṃ kasmā alam ity alaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2289: nu vai mahyam iti tad alammasyālammatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2292: (PB 13.10.11) paśavo vai raivatyaḥ paśuṣv eva tan mithunam apyarjati prajātyai na ha vā anṛṣabhāḥ paśavaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2294: (PB 13.10.13) śyeno ha vai pūrvapretāni vayāṃsy āpnoti pūrvapretānīva vai pūrvāṇy ahāni teṣām āptyai śyenaḥ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2295: (PB 13.10.14) śyeno vā etad ahaḥ sampārayitum arhati sa hi vayasām āśiṣṭhas tasyānapahananāya sampāraṇāyaitat kriyate 'nto hi ṣaṣṭhaṃ cāhaḥ saptamaṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:2296: (PB 13.10.15) brahmavādino vadanti yad bṛhad āyatanāni pṛṣṭhāny athaite dve gāyatryau dve jagatyau kva tarhi bṛhatyo bhavantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2297: (PB 13.10.16) ye dve jagatyoḥ pade te gāyatryā upasampadyete tat sarvā bṛhatyo bhavanty āyatane pṛṣṭhāni yātayatyāyatanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2300: (PB 13.11.1) ''parisvāno giriṣṭhā'' iti parivatyo gāyatryo bhavanti sarvasya paryāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2301: (PB 13.11.2) ''sasunveyo vasūnām'' iti paśavo vai vasu paśūnām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2303: (PB 13.11.4) vālakhilyāv etau tṛcau ṣaṣṭhe cāhani saptame ca
GV02pncvbr1u:2304: (PB 13.11.5) yad etau vālakhilyau tṛcau bhavato 'hnor eva vyatiṣaṅgayāvyatisraṃsāya santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2305: (PB 13.11.6) ''somāḥ pavanta indava'' ity anuṣṭubho nibhasado bhavanti pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2306: (PB 13.11.7) ''ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni-'' iti triṣṭubhas satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa tasmāj jagatīnāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2307: (PB 13.11.8) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brahmāṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2309: (PB 13.11.10) vidanvān vai bhārgava indrasya pratyahaṃs taṃ śug ārcchat sa tapo 'tapyata sa etāni vaidanvatāny apaśyat taiḥ śucam apāhatāpaśucaṃ hate vaidanvatais tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2312: (PB 13.11.13) tad u dīrgham ity āhur āyur vai dīrgham āyuṣo 'varudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2314: (PB 13.11.15) karṇaśravā vā etad āṅigarasaḥ paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2318: (PB 13.11.18) paramasyānnādyasyāvarudhyai paramaṃ vā etad annādya yan madhu
GV02pncvbr1u:2319: (PB 13.11.19) prajāpater vā etau stanau yad ghṛtaścyunnidhanaṃ ca madhuścyunnidhanaṃ ca yajño vai prajāpatis tam etābhyāṃ dugdhe yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ dugdhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2322: (PB 13.11.23) śnuṣṭir vā etenāṅgiraso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāt lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2323: (PB 13.11.24) agner vā etad vaiśvānaraṃ sāma dīdihīti nidhanam upayanti dīdā eva hy agnir vaiśvānaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2324: (PB 13.11.25) nidhanāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanty ahno dhṛtyai stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2325: (PB 13.12.1) brahmavādino vadanti prāyaṇato dvipadāḥ kāryā udayanatā3 iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2326: (PB 13.12.2) udayanata eva kāryāḥ puruṣo vai dvipadāḥ pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2327: (PB 13.12.3) vācā vai sarvaṃ yajñaṃ tanvate tasmāt sarvāṃ vācaṃ puruṣo vadati sarvā hy asmin saṃstutā pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2329: (PB 13.12.5) gopāyanānāṃ vai sattram āsīnānāṃ kirātakulyāv asuramāye antaḥparidhy
GV02pncvbr1u:2330: asūn prākiratāṃ te ''agre tvan no antama'' ity agnim upāsīdaṃs tenāsūn aspṛṇvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:2331: tad vāva te tarhy akāmayanta kāmasani sāma gūrdaḥ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2333: (PB 13.12.7) āśiṣam evāsmā etenāśāste sāma hi satyāśīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2334: (PB 13.12.8) etena vai gotamo jemānaṃ mahimānam agacchat tasmād ye ca parāñco gotamād ye cārvāñcas ta ubhaye gotamā ṛṣayo bruvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2338: (PB 13.12.12) tasmād ūdhardhārā ati carantīḍāyām antataḥ paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2339: (PB 13.12.13) kḷpta upariṣṭād ṛk sāma ca vimucyete abhy u svareṇa saptamam ahaḥ svarati santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2340: (PB 13.12.14) ūhuṣīva vā etarhi vāg yadā ṣaḍahaḥ santiṣṭhate na bahu vaden nānyaṃ pṛcchen nānyasmai prabrūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2341: (PB 13.12.15) madhu vāśayed ghṛtaṃ vā yathehuṣo bahaṃ pratyanakti tathā tat
GV02pncvbr1u:2342: (PB 13.12.16) trayastriṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai devatāsu vā eṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2343: (PB 14.1.1) āpyante vā etat stomāś chandāṃsi yat ṣaḍaha āpyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2344: (PB 14.1.2) āpte ṣaḍahe chandāṃsi stomān kṛtvā prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2345: (PB 14.1.3) ''pra kāvyam uśanevara bruvāṇa'' iti gāyatryā rūpeṇa prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2346: (PB 14.1.4) iyaṃ vai gāyatry asyām eva pratiṣṭhāya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2348: (PB 14.1.6) ojo vīryaṃ triṣṭubojasyeva vīrye parākramya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2352: (PB 14.1.10) dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram eva tatpūrvasmai ṣaḍahāya pratyudyacchati savīvadhatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2353: (PB 14.1.11) caturviṃśatir bhavanti caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram eva tatpūrvasmai ṣaḍahāya pratyudyacchati savīvadhatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2354: (PB 14.1.12) dṛta aindrota iti hovācābhipratārī kākṣasenir ye mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ gacchanti ka te tato bhavanti prarājan pakṣiṇaḥ patanty avāpakṣāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2355: (PB 14.1.13) ye vai vidvāṃsas te pakṣiṇo ye 'vidvāṃsas te 'pakṣās trivṛt pañcadaśāv eva stomau pakṣau kṛtvā svarga lokaṃ prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2356: (PB 14.1.14) caturviṃśa eva stomo bhavati teja se brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2357: (PB 14.2.1) ''mūrdhānaṃ divo aratim pṛthivyā'' ity āgreyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2358: (PB 14.2.2) mūrdhā vā eṣa divo yas tṛtīyas trirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2359: (PB 14.2.3) ''vaiśvānaram ṛta ājātam agnim'' iti vaiśvānara iti vā agneḥ priyaṃ dhāma priyeṇaivainaṃ tad dhāmnā parokṣam upaśikṣati
GV02pncvbr1u:2360: (PB 14.2.4) ''pra vo mitrāya gāyata-'' iti dyāvāpṛthivīyaṃ maitrāvaruṇaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vai mitrāvaruṇayoḥ priyaṃ dhāma priyeṇaivainau tad dhāmnā parokṣam upaśikṣati
GV02pncvbr1u:2361: (PB 14.2.5) ''indrāyāhi citrabhānav'' ity ārbhavam aindram ṛbhavo vā indrasya priyaṃ dhāma priyeṇaivainaṃ tad dhāmnā parokṣam upaśikṣati
GV02pncvbr1u:2362: (PB 14.2.6) ''tam īḍiṣva yo arciṣā-'' ity aniruktam aindrāgnaṃ devatānām anabhidharṣāyottamārdhe 'nirāha devatānām apraṇāśāya stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2363: (PB 14.3.1) ''vṛṣā pavasva dhāraya-'' iti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2364: (PB 14.3.2) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2366: (PB 14.3.4) ''pro ayāsīd indur indrasya niṣkṛtam'' iti pravatyo bhavanti praṇinīṣeṇyam iva hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2367: (PB 14.3.5) jagatyaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubhāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2369: (PB 14.3.8) yathā vai vyokasau vipradravata evam ete ṣaṣṭhaṃ cāhaḥ saptamaṃ ca vipradravatas tau yathā samānīya saṃyujyād evam evaite etena sāmnā saṃyunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2370: (PB 14.3.10) yajño vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat sa suparṇarūpaṃ kṛtvācarat taṃ devā etaiḥ sāmabhirārabhanta yajña iva vā eṣa yac chandomā yajñasyaivaiṣa
GV02pncvbr1u:2372: (PB 14.3.12) etena vai viśvāmitro rohitābhyāṃ rohitakūla ājim ajayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2373: (PB 14.3.13) viśvāmitro bharatānāṃ manassatyāyāt so 'dantibhir nāma janatayāṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2374: prāsyate māṃ māṃ yūyaṃ astikāṃ jayāthemāni mahyaṃ yūyaṃ pūrayātha yadīmāv idaṃ rohitāv
GV02pncvbr1u:2375: aśmācitaṃ kūlam udvahāta iti sa ete sāmanī apaśyat tābhyāṃ yuktvā prāsedhat sa udjayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2376: (PB 14.3.14) ājir vā eṣa pratato yad dvādaśāhas tasyaite ujjityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2377: (PB 14.3.15) kaṇvarathantaraṃ bhavati tejo vā etad rathantarasya yat kaṇvarathantaram
GV02pncvbr1u:2378: (PB 14.3.16) sarasam eva tad rathantaraṃ prayuṅkte yat kaṇvarathantareṇa saptame 'hani stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2379: (PB 14.3.17) jāmi dvādaśāhasyāstīti ha smāhogradevo rājanir bārhataṃ ṣaṣṭham ahar bārhataṃ saptamaṃ yat kaṇvarathantaraṃ bhavati tenājāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:2381: (PB 14.3.19) agnir akāmayatānnādaḥ syām iti sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad gauṅgavam apaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:2382: tenānnādo 'bhavad yad annaṃ vitvā gardadyad agaṅgūyat tad gauṅgavasya gauṅgavatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2384: (PB 14.3.20) yat sāma devatā praśaṃyati tena yajamānāḥ satyāśiṣaḥ satyāśiṣo 'sāmeti vai sattram āsate satyāśiṣa eva bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2386: (PB 14.3.22) ayāsyo vā āṅgirasa ādityānāṃ dīkṣitānām annam āśnāt sa vyabhraṃśata
GV02pncvbr1u:2387: sa etāny āyāsyāny apaśyat tair ātmānaṃ samaśrīṇād vibhraṣṭam iva vai saptamam ahar
GV02pncvbr1u:2388: yad etat sāma bhavaty ahar eva tena saṃśrīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2390: (PB 14.4.1) ''vayaṃ ghatvā sutāvanta'' iti bṛhatyo varṣīyaśchanda ākramate 'napabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2391: (PB 14.4.2) ''nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad'' iti bṛhatyaḥ satyo 'bhyārambheṇa jagatyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2392: (PB 14.4.3) apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yaj jyāyasaḥ stomāt kanīyāṃsaṃ stomam upayanti yad etā abhyārambheṇa jagatyo bhavanty ahna eva pratyuttambhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2394: (PB 14.4.5) abhinidhanena vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat tam astṛṇuta stṛṇute bhrātṛvyam abhinidhanena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2395: (PB 14.4.7) vaikhānasā vā ṛṣaya indrasya priyā āsaṃs tān rahasyur devamalimluḍ munimaraṇe 'mārayat taṃ devā abruvan kva tarṣayo (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:2396: 'bhūvānn iti tān praiṣam aicchat tān nāvindat sa imān lokān ekadhāreṇāpunāt tān munimaraṇe
GV02pncvbr1u:2397: 'vindat tān etena sāmnā samairayat tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sāma vaikhānasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2399: (PB 14.5.1) ''yas te mado vareṇya'' iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2400: (PB 14.5.2) ''eṣasya dhārayā suta'' iti kakubhaḥ satyo 'bhyārambheṇa triṣṭubhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2401: (PB 14.5.3) apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yat jyāyasaḥ stomāt kanīyāṃsaṃ stomam upayanti yad etā abhyārambheṇa triṣṭubho bhavanty ahna eva pratyuttambhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2402: (PB 14.5.4) ''sakhāya āniṣīdata-'' iti vālakhilyā vālakhilyāv etau tṛcau ṣaṣṭhe cāhani saptame ca yad etau vākhilyau tṛcau bhavato 'hnor eva vyatiṣaṅgāyāvyavasraṃsāya santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2403: (PB 14.5.5) ''purojitī vo andhasa'' iti virāḍ annaṃ virāḍ annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2404: (PB 14.5.6) ''pra vājy akṣār'' ity akṣarapaṅktiḥ stomānāṃ prabhūtiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2405: (PB 14.5.7) atho etad (?) dhy evaitarhi chando 'yātayāma yad akṣarapaṅktis tena chandomā ayātayāmānaḥ kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2406: (PB 14.5.8) brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś chandomā ity etac chandaso yad etā akṣarapaṅktaya iti brūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2407: (PB 14.5.9) ''ye somāsaḥ parāvati-'' iti parāvatam iva vā etarhi yajño gatas tam evaitenānvicchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2409: (PB 14.5.13) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭā abalā ivācchadayaṃs tāsv etena sāmnā dakṣāyety ojo vīryam adadhād yad etat sāma bhavaty oja eva vīryam ātman dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:2411: (PB 14.5.15) indraṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny astuvan sa śarkaraṃ śiśumārarṣim upetyābravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:2412: stuhi meti so 'paḥ praskandann abravīd etāvato 'haṃ tvāṃ stuyām iti tasmād apāṃ vegam
GV02pncvbr1u:2413: avejayat sa hīna ivāmanyata sa etat sāmāpaśyat tenāpo 'nusamāśnuta tad vāva sa tarhy
GV02pncvbr1u:2414: akāmayata kāmasani sāma śārkaraṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2416: (PB 14.5.17) samudraṃ vā ete prasnāntīty āhur ye dvādaśāham upayantīti yo vā aplavaḥ samudraṃ prarunāti na sa tata udeti yata plavo bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2417: (PB 14.5.18) ativiśvāni duritā taremeti yad evaiṣāṃ duṣṭutaṃ duśśastaṃ tad etena taranti
GV02pncvbr1u:2418: (PB 14.5.19) ekādaśākṣaraṇidhano bhavaty ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub ojīvīryaṃ triṣṭub ojasy eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2419: (PB 14.5.20) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brahmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2424: (PB 14.5.25) suhavir vā etenāṅgiraso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2425: (PB 14.5.26) brahmāvādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś
GV02pncvbr1u:2426: chandomā iti puruṣaś chandasa iti brūyāt puruṣo vai pāṅktaḥ puruṣo dvipadā chandomānām ayātayāmatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2428: (PB 14.5.28) annaṃ vai jarābodhīyaṃ mukhaṃ gāyatrī mukha eva tad annaṃ dhatte 'nnam atti
GV02pncvbr1u:2430: (PB 14.5.30) gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭhāyai brahmavarcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2431: (PB 14.5.31) iḍāntāḥ pāvamānā bhavanti paśavo vā iḍāḥ paśavaś chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2432: (PB 14.6.1) ''ā te vatso mano yamad'' ity apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yad ukthāni yad eti salomatvāyaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:2434: (PB 14.6.3) apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yaj jayāyasaḥ stomāt kanīyāṃsaṃ stomam upayanti yad etāḥ pūrṇāḥ kakubho bhavanty anapabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2435: (PB 14.6.6) vatsaś ca vai medhātithiś ca kāṇvāv āstāṃ taṃ vatsaṃ medhātithir ākrośad
GV02pncvbr1u:2436: abrāhmaṇo 'si śūdrāputra iti so 'bravīd ṛtenāgniṃ vyayāva yataro nau brahmīyān iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2437: vātsena vatso vyain maidhātithena medhātithis tasya na loma ca nauṣat tad vāva sa
GV02pncvbr1u:2438: tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sāma vātsaṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2440: (PB 14.6.8) upagur vai sauśravasaḥ kutsasyauravasya purohita āsīt sa kutsaḥ paryaśapad
GV02pncvbr1u:2441: ya indraṃ yajātā iti sa indraḥ suśravasam upetyābravīd yajasva māśanāyāmivā iti tam
GV02pncvbr1u:2442: ayajata sa indraḥ puroḍāśas taḥ kutsam upetyābravīd ayakṣata mā kva te pariśaptam
GV02pncvbr1u:2443: abhūd iti kas tvā yaṣṭeti suśravā iti sa kutsa aurava upāgāḥ sauśravasasyodgāyata
GV02pncvbr1u:2444: audumbaryā śiro 'cchinat sa śuśravā indram abravīt tvattanād vai medam īdṛg upāgād
GV02pncvbr1u:2445: iti tam etena sāmnā samairayat tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sāma sauśravasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2448: (PB 14.6.10) cyavano vai dādhīco 'śvinoḥ priya āsīt so 'jīryat tam etena sāmnāpsu
GV02pncvbr1u:2449: vyaiṅkayatāṃ taṃ punaryuvānam akurutāṃ tad vāva tau tarhy akāmayetāṃ kāmasani sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:2451: (PB 14.6.11) caturviṃśa eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2452: (PB 14.7.1) ''śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryataṃ mṛjanti'' ity aṣṭam asy āhnaḥ pratid bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2453: (PB 14.7.2) śiśur iva vā eṣa saptamenāhnā jāyate tam aṣṭamenāhnā mṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2457: (PB 14.7.7) pañcarco bhavati pañcapadā paṅktiḥ pāṅktam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2458: (PB 14.7.8) bāṇavān bhavaty anto vai bāṇo 'nta etad aṣṭamam ahnām anta eva tad antena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2460: (PB 14.8.1) ''agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣā'' ity āgneyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2461: (PB 14.8.2) agnibhir ity eva pūrvāṇy ahāni abhi samiddhāny aṣṭamam ahar abhisamindhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2463: (PB 14.8.4) ugragādham iva vā etac chandomās tad yathāta ugragādhe vyātiṣajya gāhanta evam evaitad rūpe vyatiṣajati chandomānām asaṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2465: (PB 14.8.6) aṣṭamena vai devā ahnendram avājayan navamena pāpmānam aghnann ahar evaitena vājayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2466: (PB 14.8.7) ''indre agnā namo bṛhad'' iti bārhatam aindrāgnam
GV02pncvbr1u:2467: (PB 14.8.8) ugragādham iva vā etad yac chandomās tad yathāta ugragādhe vyatiṣajya gāhanta evam evaitad rape vyatiṣajati chandomānām asaṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2468: (PB 14.9.1) ''adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutam'' iti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2469: (PB 14.9.2) gāyatryaḥ satyas triṣṭubhorūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2470: (PB 14.9.3) ''abhi somāsa āyava'' ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ bṛhad iti bṛhata ubhayoḥ saha rūpam upaity ubhau hi varṇāv etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2471: (PB 14.9.4) ''dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo rasa'' ity adhṛta iva vā eṣas tryaho yad dharteti dhṛtyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:2472: (PB 14.9.5) jagatyas satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubho loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2473: (PB 14.9.6) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2475: (PB 14.9.8) paśavo vai vairūpaṃ paśūnām avarudhyai virūpaḥ saṃvatsaro virūpam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2477: (PB 14.9.10) ahar vā etad avlīyata tad devā āśunābhyadhinvaṃs tad āśor āśutvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2479: (PB 14.9.12) devaṃ vā etaṃ mṛgayur iti vadanty etena vai sa ubhayeṣāṃ paśūnām ādhipatyam āśnutobhayeṣāṃ paśūnām ādhipatyam aśnute mārgīyaveṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2483: (PB 14.9.16) iṭan vā etena kāvyo 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2484: (PB 14.9.17) sākamaśvaṃ bhavati yad eva sākamaśvasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2485: (PB 14.9.18) tad u dhurāṃ sāmety āhuḥ prāṇā vai dhuraḥ prāṇānām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2487: (PB 14.9.20) ātmā vā eṣa sauparṇānāṃ yad aṣṭame 'hani pakṣāv etāv abhito bhavato
GV02pncvbr1u:2488: ye saptamanavamayor vīva vā antarātmā pakṣau lambate yadantarātmā pakṣau vilambate
GV02pncvbr1u:2491: (PB 14.9.23) dvitīyaṃ hy etad rūpaṃ yac chandomāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2492: (PB 14.9.24) paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ paśavaś chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva tat paśūn saṃdadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2494: (PB 14.9.26) ahar vā etad avlīyata tad devā gāyatrapārśvena samatanvaṃs tasmād gāyatrapārśvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2495: (PB 14.9.27) trirātro yad vyaśīryata tam etaiḥ sāmabhir abhiṣajyan gāyatrapārśvenopāyacchan
GV02pncvbr1u:2496: santaninā samatanvan saṃkṛtinā samaskurvan pratiṣṭhitau pūrvau trirātrāv apratiṣṭhita
GV02pncvbr1u:2497: eṣa yad etāny eva sāmāni kriyanta etasyaiva pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2499: (PB 14.9.29) puruhanmā vā etena vaikhānaso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2502: (PB 14.9.32) dvigad vā etena bhārgavo dviḥ svargaṃ lokam agacchad āgatya punar agacchat dvayoḥ kāmayor avarudhyai dvaigataṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2505: sa etad dhārāyaṇam apaśyat tena tejo haro 'vārundha tejasvī harasvī bhavati hārāyaṇena tuṣtuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2507: (PB 14.9.66) yad vā etasyāhnaś chidram āsīt tad devā acchidreṇāpy auhaṃs tad acchidrasyācchidratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2509: (PB 14.9.38) bṛhaduktho vā etena vāmneyo 'nnasya purodhām agacchad annaṃ vai brahmaṇaḥ purodhām annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2511: (PB 14.9.40) pravatā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāyann udvatodāyan
GV02pncvbr1u:2512: (PB 14.9.41) nidhanāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanty ahno dhṛtyai stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2513: (PB 14.10.1) ''ka īṃ veda sute sacā-'' iti satobṛhatyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2514: (PB 14.10.2) apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yas saptame 'hani satobṛhatyo bhavanti nāṣṭame tasmād aṣṭame kāryā anapabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2515: (PB 14.10.3) tadāhuḥ śithilam iva vā etac chando yat satobṛhātīty eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā yad indra prāg apāg udag iti diśāṃ vimarśaḥ pratiṣṭityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2517: (PB 14.10.5) sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2519: (PB 14.10.7) yac ca pṛṣṭhāni yāni caitāny ahāni teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2521: (PB 14.10.9) vyaśvo vā etenāṅgiraso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyā etat pṛṣṭhānām antataḥ kriyate stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2522: (PB 14.11.1) ''pavasva deva āyuṣag indraṃ gacchatu te mada'' iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2523: (PB 14.11.3) ''prāṇā śiśur mahīnām'' iti prāṇavatyo bhavanti prāṇān eva tad yajamāne dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2524: (PB 14.11.4) ''abhī no vājasātamam'' ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rāthantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2525: (PB 14.11.5) ''pavasva soma mahān samudra'' ity akṣarapaṅktiḥ stomānāṃ prabhūtir
GV02pncvbr1u:2526: atho etad dhy evaitarhi chando 'yātayāma yad akṣarapaṅktis tena chandomā ayātayāmānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2527: kriyante brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś chandomā
GV02pncvbr1u:2528: ity etac chandaso yad etā akṣarapaṅktaya iti brūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2529: (PB 14.11.6) ''hinvanti sūram usraya'' iti gāyatryaḥ satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa tasmāj jagatīnāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2530: (PB 14.11.7) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2532: (PB 14.11.9) annaṃ vā arko 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai prāṇā vai svāśiraḥ prāṇānām arudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2537: (PB 14.11.14) svarbhānur vā āsura ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat sa na vyarocata tasyātrir bhāsena tamo 'pāhan sa vyarocata yad vai tad bhā abhavat tad bhāsasya bhāsatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2538: (PB 14.11.15) tama iva vā etāny ahāni yac chandomās tebhya etena sāmnā vivāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2540: (PB 14.11.17) kākṣīvān vā etenauśijaḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchat prajāyate bahur bhavati kākṣīvatena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2542: (PB 14.11.19) asito vā etena daivalas trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ dṛṣṭim apaśyat trayāṇāṃ kāmānām avarudhyā āsitaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2545: (PB 14.11.23) padanidhanaṃ rāthantaraṃ rāthantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2546: (PB 14.11.24) nāthavindu sāma vindate nāthaṃ nāthavindūny etāny ahāni yat chandomā nātham evaitair vindate
GV02pncvbr1u:2547: (PB 14.11.25) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2549: (PB 14.11.27) etena vai kutso 'ndhaso vipānam apaśyat sa ha sma vai surādṛtinopavasathaṃ dhārayaty ubhayasyānnādyasyāvarudhyai kautsaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2551: (PB 14.11.29) indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'śuddho 'manyata sa etac chuddhāśuddhīyam apaśyat tenāśudhyac chudhyati śuddhāśuddhīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2552: (PB 14.11.30) krauñcaṃ bhavati yad eva krauñcasya brāhmaṇaṃ yat dvitīye 'hani
GV02pncvbr1u:2556: (PB 14.11.34) udalo vā etena vaiśvāmitraḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchat prajāyate bahur bhavaty audalena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2557: (PB 14.11.36) brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś
GV02pncvbr1u:2558: chandomā iti puruṣachandasa iti brūyāt puruṣo vai pāṅktaḥ puruṣo dvipadāś chandomānām ayātayāmatayau
GV02pncvbr1u:2560: (PB 14.11.38) agnir akāmayata viśo viśo 'tithis syāṃ viśo viśa ātithyam aśnuvīyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2561: sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad viśoviśīyam apaśyat tena viśo viśo 'tithir abhavat viśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2562: viśa ātithyam aśnuta viśo viśo 'tithir bhavati viśo viśa ātithyam aśnute viśoviśīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2563: (PB 14.11.39) gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭāyai brahmavarcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2564: (PB 14.11.40) iḍāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanti paśavo vā iḍā paśavaś chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2565: (PB 14.12.1) ''preṣṭhaṃ vo atithim'' ity ātithyasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2568: indro viśvasya karmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭuta'' iti dhṛtyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:2570: (PB 14.12.5) uśanā vai kāvyo 'kāmayata yāvān itareṣāṃ kāvyānāṃ lokas tāvantaṃ spṛṇuyām
GV02pncvbr1u:2571: iti sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad auśanam apaśyat tena tāvantaṃ lokam aspṛṇod yāvān itareṣāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2572: kāvyānām āsīt tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sāmauśanaṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2574: (PB 14.12.7) devānāṃ vai yajñaṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsaṃs tāny etena indraḥ saṃvartam
GV02pncvbr1u:2575: apāvapad yat saṃvartam apāvapat tasmāt sāṃvartaṃ pāpmā vāva sa tān asacata taṃ sāṃvartenāpāghnatāpa
GV02pncvbr1u:2578: (PB 14.12.9) māsā vai raśmayo maruto raśmayo maruto vai devānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhā bhūyiṣṭhā
GV02pncvbr1u:2579: asāmeti vai sattram āsate bhūyiṣṭhā eva bhavanty ṛtumanti pūrvāṇy ahāny anṛtavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2580: chandomā yad etat sāma bhavati tenaitāny ahāny ahāny ṛtumanti bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2581: (PB 14.12.10) catuścatvāriṃśa eva stomo bhavaty ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhaty ojo vīrye triṣṭup
GV02pncvbr1u:2582: (PB 15.1.1) ''akrān samudraḥ parame vidharmann'' iti navamasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2583: (PB 15.1.2) paramaṃ vā etad ahar vidharma vidharma vā etad anyair aharbhir ahar yan navamaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ hi variṣṭham
GV02pncvbr1u:2584: (PB 15.1.3) ''matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase na'' iti vāruṇy eṣā bhavati yad vai yajñasya duriṣṭaṃ tad varuṇo gṛhṇati tad eva tad avayajati
GV02pncvbr1u:2586: (PB 15.1.5) daśarco bhavati daśākṣarā virāṭa vairājam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2587: (PB 15.1.6) saprabhṛtayo bhavāntīndriyasya vīryasya rasasyānaticārāya yatra vai devā indriyaṃ vīryaṃ rasam apaśyaṃs tad anunyatudan
GV02pncvbr1u:2590: aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2592: (PB 15.1.10) catvāraḥ ṣaḍṛcā bhavanti caturviṃśatir ardhamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2593: (PB 15.1.11) savān uttamaḥ ṣaḍṛco bhavaty ubhayasya parokṣapratyakṣasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2594: (PB 15.1.12) tṛca uttamo bhavati yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2595: (PB 15.1.13) aṣṭācatvāriṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2596: (PB 15.2.1) ''aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭham'' ity āgneyam ājyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2597: (PB 15.2.2) gacchantīva vā ete ye navamam ahar gacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2598: (PB 15.2.3) ''yo dīdāya samiddhasve duroṇa'' iti dīdāyeva hy eṣa yo navabhir aharbhis
GV02pncvbr1u:2599: tuṣṭuvānaḥ ''svāhutam'' iti svāhuto hy eṣa yo navabhir aharbhir āhuto ''viśvataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2600: pratyañcam'' iti viśvato hy eṣa pratyaṅ
GV02pncvbr1u:2601: (PB 15.2.4) ''tvaṃ varuṇa uta mitro agna'' iti vāruṇy eṣā bhavati yad vai yajñasya duriṣṭaṃ tad varuṇo gṛhṇati tad eva tad avayajati
GV02pncvbr1u:2603: (PB 15.2.6) ugragādham iva vā etad yac chandomās tad yathāta ugragādhe vyatiṣajya gāhanta evam evaitad rūpe vyatiṣajati chandomānām asaṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2604: (PB 15.2.7) ''mahāṃ indro ya ojasā-'' ity aindram aṣṭamena vai devā ahnendram avājayann avamena pāpmānam aghnann ahar evaitena mahayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2605: (PB 15.2.8) ''tā huve yayor idam'' iti rāthantaram aindrāgnam
GV02pncvbr1u:2606: (PB 15.2.9) ugragādham iva vā etad yac chandomās tad yathāta ugragādhe vyatiṣajya gāhanta evam evaitad rūpe vyatiṣajati chandomānām asaṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2607: (PB 15.3.1) ''pavamānasya jighnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata'' iti harivatyo gāyatryo bhavanti chandomānām ayātayāmatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2608: (PB 15.3.2) ''pavamānasya jighnata'' iti vai bṛhato rūpaṃ ''hareś candrā asṛkṣata-'' iti jagatyā ubhayoḥ saharūpam upaiti sāmnaś ca chandasaś
GV02pncvbr1u:2609: (PB 15.3.3) ''parīto ṣiñcatā sutam'' iti parivatyo bhavanty anto vai navamam ahas tasyaitāḥ paryāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2610: (PB 15.3.4) ''asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harir'' iti jagatyas satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa tasmāt triṣṭubhāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2611: (PB 15.3.5) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2613: (PB 15.3.7) divodāsaṃ vai bharadvājapurohitaṃ nanājanāḥ paryayanta sa upāsīdad ṛṣe
GV02pncvbr1u:2614: gātuṃ me vindeti tasmā etena sāmnā gātum avindad gātuvid vā etatsāmānena dāre nāsṛnmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2615: tad adārasṛto 'dārasṛttvaṃ vindate gātuṃ na dāre dhāvaty adārasṛtā tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2616: (PB 15.3.8) surūpaṃ bhavati yad eva surūpasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2618: (PB 15.3.10) paśavo vai hariśriyaḥ paśūnām avarudhyai śriyaṃ ca haraś copaiti tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2619: (PB 15.3.11) saindhukṣitaṃ bhavati yad eva saindhukṣitasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2621: (PB 15.3.13) vabhrur vā etena kaumbhyo 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2623: (PB 15.3.15) paśavo vā iḍā paśavaś chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2625: (PB 15.3.17) paśavo vai chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva tan mithunam apyarjati prajātyai na ha vā anṛṣabhāḥ paśavaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2627: (PB 15.3.19) pṛṣṭhaṃ vā etad ahnāṃ yan navamaṃ pṛṣṭha eva tat pṛṣṭhena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2629: (PB 15.3.21) kulmalabarhir vā etena svargaṃ lokam apaśyat prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchat prajāyate bahur bhavati kaulmalabarhiṣeṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2631: (PB 15.3.23) annaṃ vai devā arka iti vadanti rasam asya puṣpām iti sarasam evānnādyam avarundhe 'rkapuṣpeṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2633: (PB 15.3.25) dīrghaśravā vai rājanya ṛṣir jyog aparuddho 'śanāyaṃś caran sa etad
GV02pncvbr1u:2634: dairghaśravasam apaśyat tena sarvābhyo digbhyo 'nnādyam avārundha sarvābhyo adigbhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:2636: (PB 15.3.26) vaiyaśvaṃ bhavati yad eva vaiyaśvasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2638: (PB 15.3.28) devasthānaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai saṃskṛti bhavati saṃṃskṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2639: (PB 15.3.29) ahar vā etad avlīyata tad devā devasthāne tiṣṭhantaḥ saṃkṛtinā samaskurvaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:2640: tat saṃkṛteḥ saṃkṛtitvaṃ devasthānena vai devāḥ svarge loke pratyatiṣṭhan svarge
GV02pncvbr1u:2642: (PB 15.3.30) varuṇāya devatā rājyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa etad devasthānam apaśyat tato vai tās tasmai rājyāyātiṣṭhanta tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śreṣṭhyāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2643: (PB 15.3.31) kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2644: (PB 15.3.32) bhargo bhargeṇa tuṣṭuvāno bhavati yaśo yaśasā
GV02pncvbr1u:2645: (PB 15.3.33) vāsiṣṭhaṃ bhavati yad eva vāsiṣṭhasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2647: (PB 15.3.35) sāmarājaṃ bhavati sāmrājyam ādhipatyaṃ gacchati sāmarājñā tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2648: (PB 15.3.36) tad u saṃvad ity āhuḥ saṃvatā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ prāyann udvatodāyan
GV02pncvbr1u:2649: (PB 15.3.37) nidhanāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanty ahno dhṛtyai stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2651: (PB 15.4.2) ādityadevatyaṃ hy etad ahar anto vai sūro 'nta etan navamam ahnām anta eva tad antena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2652: (PB 15.4.3) ''yata indra bhayāvahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi/
GV02pncvbr1u:2653: maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtaye vidviṣo vimṛdho jahi-'' iti dviṣaś caiva mṛdhaś ca navamenāhnā vihatya daśamenāhnottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2654: (PB 15.4.5) śrīr vai śrāyantīyaṃ śrīr navamam ahaḥ śriyam eva tac chriyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2656: (PB 15.4.7) samantena paśukāmaḥ stuvīta purodhākāmaḥ samantena stuvīta
GV02pncvbr1u:2657: (PB 15.4.8) āgneyī pṛthivy āgneyo brāhmaṇa aindrī dyaur aindro rājanyo 'ntarikṣeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2658: dyāvāpṛthivī samante antarikṣeṇaivainaṃ samantaṃ karoti vindate paśūn pra purodhām
GV02pncvbr1u:2659: āpnoti ya evaṃ vidvān samantena stuvate stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2660: (PB 15.5.1) ''tvaṃ somāsi dhārayur'' iti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2661: (PB 15.5.2) ''tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā'' iti tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2662: (PB 15.5.3) ''pavasva deva vītaya'' iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2663: (PB 15.5.4) ''parityaṃ haryataṃ harim'' iti parivatyo bhavanty anto vai navamam ahasyaitāḥ paryāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2664: (PB 15.5.5) ''pavasva soma mahe dakṣāya-'' ity akṣarapaṅktiḥ stomānāṃ prabhūtir atho
GV02pncvbr1u:2665: etad dhy evaitarhi chando 'yātayāma yad akṣarapaṅktis tena chandomā ayātayāmānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2666: kriyante brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś chandomā
GV02pncvbr1u:2667: ity etac chandaso yad etā akṣarapaṅktaya iti brūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2668: (PB 15.5.6) ''upoṣu jātam apturam'' iti gāyatryas satyo jagatyo rūpeṇa tasmāt jagatīnāṃ loke kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2669: (PB 15.5.7) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brahmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2671: (PB 15.5.9) agniṃ vai pūrvair aharbhir ājuhoty athaitad ādityadaivatyam ahaḥ śukra āhuta ity asau vā ādityaḥ śukras tam evaitenājuhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2673: (PB 15.5.11) śammad vā etenāṅgiraso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2674: (PB 15.5.13) āśiṣam evāsmā etenāśāste sāma hi satyāśīḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2675: (PB 15.5.14) dāvasur vā etad āṅgirasaḥ paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjat yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2677: (PB 15.5.16) parācībhir vā anyābhir iḍābhī reto dadhad athaitat pratīcīneḍaṃ kāśītaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2678: prajātyai tasmāt parāñco garbhāḥ sambhavanti pratyañcaḥ prajāyante tasmād ute 'vācīnabilebhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:2679: nāvapadyanta etena hy eva te dhṛtāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2680: (PB 15.5.17) hāviṣkṛtaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai kṛtānuvāda eva saḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2681: (PB 15.5.18) sauparṇaṃ bhavati yad eva sauparṇasya brahmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2683: (PB 15.5.20) viśvamanasaṃ vā ṛṣim adhyāyam udvrajitaṃ rakṣo 'gṛhṇāt tam indro 'cāyad ṛṣiṃ vai rakṣo 'grahīd iti tam abhyavadad ṛṣe kas tvaiṣa
GV02pncvbr1u:2685: sa sthāṇur ity abravīt tasmai vā etena praharety asmā iṣīkāṃ vajraṃ prayacchann abravīt
GV02pncvbr1u:2686: tenāsya sīmānam abhinat saiṣendreṇateṣīkā pāpmā vāva sa tam agṛhṇāt taṃ vaiśvamanasenāpāhatāpapāpmānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2688: (PB 15.5.21) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati yad eva gaurīvitasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2690: (PB 15.5.23) hīti vā annaṃ pradīyata īty āgrir annam atti
GV02pncvbr1u:2691: (PB 15.5.24) ṛṣayo vā indraṃ pratyakṣa nāpaśyan sa vasiṣṭho 'kāmayata katham indraṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyeyam iti sa etan nihavam apaśyat tato vai sa indraṃ pratyakṣam apaśyat,
GV02pncvbr1u:2692: sa enam abravīd brāhmaṇaṃ te vakṣyāmi yathā tvatpurohitā bharatāḥ prajaniṣyante 'tha
GV02pncvbr1u:2693: mānyebhya ṛṣibhyo mā pravoca iti tasmā etān stomabhāgān abravīt tato vai vasiṣṭhapurohitā
GV02pncvbr1u:2694: bharatāḥ prājāyanta sendraṃ vā etat sāma yad etat sāma bhavati sendratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2696: (PB 15.5.26) brahmayaśasaṃ vā etāni sāmāny ṛcā śrotrīyāṇi brahmāyaśasī bhavati yad vāhiṣṭhīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2700: (PB 15.5.30) akūpāro vā etena kaśyapo jemānaṃ mahimānam agacchaj jemānaṃ mahimānaṃ gacchaty ākūpāreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2702: (PB 15.5.32) brahmavādino vadanti yat ṣaḍahe stomāś chandāṃsy āpyante kiṃ chandasaś
GV02pncvbr1u:2703: chandomā iti puruṣacchandasa iti brūyāt puruṣo vai pāṅktaḥ puruṣo dvipadā chandomānām ayātayāmatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2706: (PB 15.5.35) prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān etena sāmnā śrūdhiyā ehiyety anvahvayat ta enam upāvartanta yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnām upāvṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2707: (PB 15.5.36) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2708: (PB 15.5.37) gāyatrīṣu stuvanti pratiṣṭhāyai brahmavarcasāya yenaiva prāṇena prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2709: tam abhyudyantīḍāntāḥ pavamānā bhavanti paśavo vā iḍā paśavaś chandomāḥ paśuṣv eva
GV02pncvbr1u:2711: (PB 15.6.1) āgreyīṣu pūrveṣām ahnām ukthāni praṇayanty athaitasyāhna āgneyy aindrayāṃ praṇayanty ubhayor eva rūpayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2713: (PB 15.6.3) āgneyy aindrīṣu stuvanti brahma caiva tat kṣatraṃ ca sayujīkaroti brahmaiva kṣatrasya purastān nidadhāti brāhmaṇe kṣatraṃ ca viśaṃ cānuge karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2715: (PB 15.6.5) ojasy eva tad vīrye pratitiṣṭhaty ojo vīryaṃ traikakubham
GV02pncvbr1u:2717: (PB 15.6.7) aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2718: (PB 15.7.1) gāyatraṃ vai saptamam ahas traiṣṭubham aṣṭamaṃ jāgataṃ navamam athaitad ānuṣṭubham ahar yad daśamam
GV02pncvbr1u:2719: (PB 15.7.2) tad āhur yad ānuṣṭubhaṃ stomyāṃ pratyakṣam upeyuḥ parāṃ parāvataṃ yajamāno
GV02pncvbr1u:2720: gacchen na pratitiṣṭhed iti yā vai caturviṃśatir gāyatryas tā aṣṭādaśānuṣṭubho 'nuṣṭubham
GV02pncvbr1u:2721: eva tat stomyāṃ parokṣam upayanti pratiṣṭhāyai pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2722: (PB 15.7.3) prajāpatiṃ vā etenāhnā pariveviṣati tatra vyavavadyaṃ yad vai śreṣṭhe pariviṣyamāṇo vadaty annādyasya so 'vagrahas tasmān na vyavavadyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2723: (PB 15.7.4) tad u vyavavadyaṃ yathā śreṣṭhāya baliṃ hriyamāṇaṃ panthānaṃ paryanuvedayati gatyai tathā tat
GV02pncvbr1u:2724: (PB 15.7.5) yāvaty anuṣṭup tāvatīṃ vācaṃ sampādya vibrūyus tad v anatiriktaṃ svasyo caiva yajñasyāriṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2725: (PB 15.7.6) abhi vā ete devān ārohantīty āhur ye daśabhir aharbhiḥ stuvata iti pañcānām
GV02pncvbr1u:2726: ahnām anurūpaiḥ pratyavayanti yathābhyāruhya pratyavarohet tathā tan navarco bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2727: yā evāmūḥ prayacchan yā avadadhāti tā etā udasyati
GV02pncvbr1u:2728: (PB 15.7.7) vāruṇy eṣā bhavati yad vai yajñasya duriṣṭaṃ tad varuṇo gṛhṇāti tad eva tad avayajaty ādityaiṣā bhavatīyaṃ vā aditir asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2729: (PB 15.7.8) caturviṃśa eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2730: (PB 15.8.1) ''suṣamiddho na āvaha-'' ity āpriya ājyāni bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2731: (PB 15.8.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricānāmanyata sa etāny āpriya ājyāny
GV02pncvbr1u:2732: apaśyat tair ātmānam āprīṇāt dugdha iva vā eṣa riricāno yo daśabhir aharbhis tuṣṭuvāno
GV02pncvbr1u:2733: yad etāny āpriya ājyāni bhavanty ātmānam evaitair āprīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2734: (PB 15.8.3) ''yad adya sūra udita'' iti sūravan maitrāvaruṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2735: (PB 15.8.4) anto vai sūro 'nta etad daśamam ahnām anta eva tadantena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2736: (PB 15.8.5) ''ut tvā madantu somā'' ity udvad aindram utthānasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:2737: (PB 15.8.6) ''indrāgnī āgataṃ sutam'' iti yenaiva rūpeṇa prayanti tad abhyudyanti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2738: (PB 15.9.1) ''uccā te jātam andhasa'' ity udvatyo gāyatryo bhavanty utthānasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:2739: (PB 15.9.2) ''punānas soma dhāraya-'' iti panthānam eva tat paryavayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2740: (PB 15.9.3) ''ā jāgṛvir vipra ṛtaṃ matīnām'' iti yad āpte pravatīḥ kuryur atipadyer anyad āvatyo bhavanty anatipādāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2741: (PB 15.9.4) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2742: (PB 15.9.5) āmahīyavaṃ bhavati kḷptiś cānnādyaṃ ca kḷptiṃ caivaitenānnādyaṃ cābhyuttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2744: (PB 15.9.7) ājir vā eṣa pratato yat dvādaśāhas tasyaitad ujjityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2746: (PB 15.9.9) āṅgirasas tapas tepānāḥ śucam aśocaṃs ta etat sāmāpaśyaṃs tān abhīke
GV02pncvbr1u:2747: 'bhyavarṣat tena śucam aśamayanta yad abhīke 'bhyavarṣat tasmād ābhīkaṃ yām eva pūrvair
GV02pncvbr1u:2748: aharbhiḥ śucaṃ śocanti tām etenānna śamayitvottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2750: (PB 15.9.11) utsedhena vai devāḥ paśūn udasedhan niṣedhena paryagṛhṇan
GV02pncvbr1u:2752: (PB 15.9.13) paśavo 'nnādyaṃ yajñāyajñīyaṃ paśūn eva tad annādyam utsedhaniṣedhābhyāṃ parigṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2753: (PB 15.9.14) mādhyandine vai pavamāne devā yajñāyajñīyena yajñaṃ saṃsthāpya svargaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2754: lokam ārohaṃs tad ya evaṃ veda mādhyandina evaitat pavamāne yajñāyajñīyena yajñaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2756: (PB 15.9.15) atho parokṣam anuṣṭubhaṃ sampadyate 'har eṣā vai pratyakṣam anuṣṭup
GV02pncvbr1u:2757: yad yajñāyajñīyaṃ tad yat tṛtīyasavane kuryuḥ pratyakṣam anuṣṭubham ṛccheyus tasmān
GV02pncvbr1u:2758: mādhyandine kurvanti tena parokṣam anuṣṭubham upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2760: (PB 15.9.17) etad vai yajñasya śvastanaṃ yad gaurīvitam etad āyatano yajamāno yan madhyandino yad gaurīvitaṃ madhyandine bhavati śvastanam eva tad yajamāna ātman dhatte stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2761: (PB 15.10.1) ''kayā naś citra ābhuvad'' iti kavatyas tena prājāpatyāḥ ko hi prajāpatiḥ prajāpater āptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2762: (PB 15.10.2) ''mā cid anyad viśaṃsata-'' ity utthānam eva tad āśiṣo hy etarhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2763: (PB 15.10.3) ''ud u tye madhumattamā'' ity udvatya udayanīye 'hany etad āśiṣo hy evaitarhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2764: (PB 15.10.4) ''tarobhir vo vidadvasum'' iti stomo vai taro yajño vidadvasuḥ stomena vai yajño yujyate yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum ity āha yajñam eva tad yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2766: (PB 15.10.6) gāyatrī vai rathantarasya yoniḥ svāyām eva tad yonau rathantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2767: (PB 15.10.7) tejo vai gāyatrī chandasā tejo rathantaraṃ sāmnā tejaś caturviṃśastomānāṃ teja eva tat samyak saṃdadhāty api ha putrasya putras tejasvī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2768: (PB 15.10.8) aṣṭākṣareṇa prathamāyā ṛcaḥ prastauty aṣṭāśaphāṃs tatpaśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2769: (PB 15.10.9) dyvakṣareṇottarayor ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2770: (PB 15.10.10) gāyatraṃ vai rathantaraṃ gāyatracchando yad gāyatrīṣu rathantaram bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2771: tena svāyāṃ janatāyām ṛdhnotīme vai lokā gāyatrī yad gāyatrīṣu rathantaraṃ bhavatīmān
GV02pncvbr1u:2774: (PB 15.10.12) etena vai medhātithiḥ kāṇvo vibhindukād vyūdhnīr gā udasṛjata paśūnām avarudhyai maidhātithaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2776: (PB 15.10.14) ekākṣarā vai vāg vācy eva pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2778: (PB 15.10.16) samānaloke vai kāleyaṃ ca rathantaraṃ ceyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ paśavaḥ kāleyam asyāṃ caiva paśuṣu ca pratiṣṭhāyottiṣṭhanti stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2779: (PB 15.11.1) ''svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā-'' iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2780: (PB 15.11.2) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2783: (PB 15.11.5) saphena vai devā imān lokān samāpnuvant samāpnuvaṃs tat saphasya saphatvam imān evaitena lokān samāpyottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2784: (PB 15.11.6) rohitakūlīyaṃ bhavati yad eva rohitakūlīyasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2785: (PB 15.11.7) śyāvāśvāndhīgave bhavataḥ samīcyau virājau dadhāty annādyāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2787: (PB 15.11.9) indro vṛtraṃ hatvā nāstṛṣīti manyamānaḥ parāṃ parāvatam agacchat sa
GV02pncvbr1u:2788: etām anuṣṭubhaṃ vyauhat tāṃ madhye vyavāsarpad indragṛhe vā eṣo 'bhaye yajate abhaya
GV02pncvbr1u:2789: uttiṣṭhati ya evaṃ vidvān etāsu stuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2790: (PB 15.11.10) yajñāyajñīyanidhanaṃ sauhaviṣaṃ bhavati yajñāyajñīyād eva tat tṛtīyasavene na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2792: (PB 15.11.12) sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvaṃ vā ete vājaṃ jayanti ye daśamam ahar āgacchanty annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2793: (PB 15.11.13) daśākṣaraṃ nidhanam upayanti daśarātrasya dhṛtyai daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2794: (PB 15.11.14) sūryavatīṣu stuvanty anto vai sūro 'nta etad daśamam ahnām anta eva tad antena stuvate pratiṣṭhāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2795: (PB 15.11.15) upavatyo bhavanti pratiṣṭhāyai parivatyo bhavanti sarvasya paryāptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2796: (PB 15.11.16) caturviṃśa eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2797: (PB 15.12.1) virāṭsu vāmadevyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavati śāntyai kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2798: (PB 15.12.2) sad vai vāmadevyaṃ sāmnāṃ sad virāṭ chandasāṃ sat trayastriṃśaḥ stomānāṃ satām antān saṃdhāyottiṣṭhanty api ha putrasya sattvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2799: (PB 15.12.3) brahmavādino vadanti yatas sattrād udasthātā3 sthitā3d iti yad yata
GV02pncvbr1u:2800: iti brūyur apratiṣṭhānā aprajaso bhaviṣyantīty enān brūyād yat sthitād iti brūyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2801: sthāyukaiṣāṃ śrīr bhaviṣyati na vasīyāṃso bhaviṣyantīty enān brūyāt pūrṇād eva pūrṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2803: (PB 15.12.4) ete vai pūrṇāt pūrṇam abhyuttiṣṭhanti ye vāmadevyena stutvottiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2804: (PB 15.12.5) antarikṣaṃ vai vāmadevyam antarikṣeṇedaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:2805: (PB 15.12.6) eṣa vai samṛddhaḥ stomo yat trayastriṃśas trayastriṃśadakṣarāsu samṛddhāv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2806: (PB 15.12.7) sarveṣāṃ vā etāś chandasāṃ rūpaṃ yāt tripadās tena gāyatryo yad ekādaśākṣarāṇi
GV02pncvbr1u:2807: padāni tena triṣṭubho yat dvādaśākṣaraṃ padaṃ tena jagatyo yat trayastriṃśadakṣarās
GV02pncvbr1u:2808: tena virājas tenaiva cānuṣṭubho na hy ekasmād akṣarād virādhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2809: (PB 15.12.8) trayastriṃśa eva stomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai devatāsu vā eṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2810: (PB 16.1.1) prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīn nāhar āsīn na rātrir āsīt so 'sminn andhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2811: tamasi prāsarpat sa aicchat sa etam abhyapadyata tato vai tasmai vyaucchad vyuṣṭir
GV02pncvbr1u:2812: vā eṣa āhriyate yad vai taj jyotir abhavat tat jyotiṣo jyotiṣṭvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2813: (PB 16.1.2) eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajate gartapatyam eva taj jīyate pra vā mīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2814: (PB 16.1.3) yathā vā idam agner jātād agnayo vihriyanta evam etasmād adhy anye yajñā vihriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2815: (PB 16.1.4) yo hi trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśaḥ sa taṃ yaḥ saptadaśaḥ sa taṃ ya ekaviṃśaḥ sa tam
GV02pncvbr1u:2816: (PB 16.1.5) etat tad yad āhur eko yajña ity etad dhi sarve jyotiṣṭomā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2817: (PB 16.1.6) asthūrir vā eṣa santato yajño dvau dvau hi stomau savanaṃ vahatas trivṛt
GV02pncvbr1u:2818: pañcadaśau prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśasaptadaśau mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaikaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam
GV02pncvbr1u:2819: (PB 16.1.7) yā mitadakṣiṇaiva syād eṣa eva kārya iyaṃ vai jyotir iyam amitasya yantrikaiṣā vā etaṃ yantum arhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2820: (PB 16.1.8) tasya navatiśataṃ stotrīyās tāsāṃ yā aśītiśataṃ tāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśinyo virājaḥ ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva virājā pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2821: (PB 16.1.9) atha yā daśaiṣā vā ātmanyā virāḍ etasyāṃ vā idaṃ puruṣaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2822: (PB 16.1.5) gauś cāśvaś cāśvataraś ca gardabhaś cājāś cāvayaś ca vrīhayaś ca yavāś ca tilāś ca māṣāś caitasyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2824: (PB 16.1.12) vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yaḥ somam abhiṣuṇoti yāḥ śataṃ vairaṃ tad devān
GV02pncvbr1u:2825: avadayate 'tha yā daśa daśa prāṇāḥ prāṇāṃs tābhiḥ spṛṇoti yaikādaśyātmānaṃ tayā yā
GV02pncvbr1u:2827: (PB 16.1.13) śleṣma vā etad yajñasya yad dakṣiṇā na vā aśleṣmā ratho vahaty atha
GV02pncvbr1u:2828: śleṣmavatā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnuta evam etena dakṣiṇāvatā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:2829: (PB 16.1.14) śubho vā etā yajñasya yad dakṣiṇā yad dakṣiṇāvatā yajate śubham evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2831: (PB 16.1.2) gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudantaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nudate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2832: (PB 16.1.3) yad vai tad devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo govayaṃs tad gor gotvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2833: (PB 16.1.4) govayati pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2834: (PB 16.1.5) tasya pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ vajro vai pañcadaśo vajram eva tat purastān nidadhāti tena vijayate
GV02pncvbr1u:2835: (PB 16.1.6) paśustomo vā eṣa evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyo 'ṇīyas yo grīvā pārśvābhyāṃ varīyāṃ sakthibhyāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2836: (PB 16.1.7) yat pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati trivṛt tyājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ rūpeṇaivainaṃ tat samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2837: (PB 16.1.8) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate tasmāt paśoḥ paścād atiriktam
GV02pncvbr1u:2839: (PB 16.2.2) gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudantaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nudate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2840: (PB 16.2.3) yad vai tad devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo govayaṃs tad gor gotvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2841: (PB 16.2.4) govayati pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2842: (PB 16.2.5) tasya pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ vajro vai pañcadaśo vajram eva tat purastān nidadhāti tena vijayate
GV02pncvbr1u:2843: (PB 16.2.6) paśustomo vā eṣa evam iva vai paśuḥ samāhitaḥ śiraḥ sthavīyo 'ṇīyasyo grīvā pārśvābhyāṃ varīyāṃsakthibhyāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2844: (PB 16.2.7) yat pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati trivṛnty ājyāni saptadaśa mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ rūpeṇaivainaṃ tat samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2845: (PB 16.2.8) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate tasmāt paśoḥ paścād atiriktam
GV02pncvbr1u:2847: (PB 16.3.2) āyuṣā vai devā asurān āyuvatāyute bhrātṛvyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2851: (PB 16.3.6) sa gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate prāṇo gāyatry āyur eṣa āyuś caivāsmin prāṇaṃ cobhe samīcī dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2852: (PB 16.3.7) svargyā vā ete stomā yat jyotir bhavati jyotir evāsmai sa purastād dharaty
GV02pncvbr1u:2853: athaiṣa gaur ekayā virājam atirikta ārambhaṇam eva tad athaiṣa āyur ekasyā virāja
GV02pncvbr1u:2854: ūna āsāda eva so 'tho ūnātiriktau stomau mithunau prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2855: (PB 16.3.8) ete vai trikadrukāḥ stomā etair vā indraḥ sarvāṃ tṛptim atṛpyat
GV02pncvbr1u:2856: (PB 16.3.9) tṛpyati prajayā paśubhir ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2857: (PB 16.4.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmai śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa āsāṃ diśāṃ prajānāṃ ca rasaṃ pravṛhya srajaṃ kṛtvā pratyamuñcata tato 'smai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:2858: (PB 16.4.2) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2859: (PB 16.4.3) so 'kāmayatendro me prajāyāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ syād iti tām asmai srajaṃ pratyamuñcat tato vā indrāya prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta tac chilpaṃ paśyantyo yat pitary apaśyan
GV02pncvbr1u:2860: (PB 16.4.4) tasmād yaḥ putrāṇāṃ dāyaṃ dhanatamam ivopaiti taṃ manyante 'yam evedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2861: (PB 16.4.5) tato vā idam indro viśvam ajayad yad viśvam ajayat tasmād viśvajit
GV02pncvbr1u:2862: (PB 16.4.6) so 'kāmayata yan me 'nabhijitaṃ tad abhijayeyam iti sa etam abhijitam apaśyat tenānabhijitam abhyajayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2864: (PB 16.4.8) tau vā etāv indrastomau vīryavantau śilpaṃ vā etau nāma stomāv āstām
GV02pncvbr1u:2865: (PB 16.4.9) paśyate gṛhe śilpaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2866: (PB 16.4.10) na vai yamau nāma stomau sto yo yamābhyāṃ yajetaitābhyāṃ yajeta samṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2867: (PB 16.4.11) punarabhyāvartaṃ stomā bhavanti punarabhyāvartaṃ hy etābhyām indro 'jitam ajayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2868: (PB 16.4.12) trīṃs trivṛdabhijitaḥ praṇayati trīn pañcadaśaḥ trīn saptadaśaḥ trīn ekaviṃśas te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2869: (PB 16.4.13) caturas trivṛdviśvajitaḥ praṇayati caturaḥ pañcadaśaś caturaḥ saptadaśas te dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2870: (PB 16.5.1) ''upa tvā jāmayo gira'' ity upavatī pratipad bhavati stomasya rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:2871: (PB 16.5.2) prāṇair vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti sarvān stomān sarvāṇi pṛṣṭhāny upaitīti yad vāyavyā bhavati prāṇānāṃ samṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2873: (PB 16.5.4) mithunaṃ vā etad yat sarasvāṃś ca sarasvatī ca mithunam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti prajananāya
