GV02pncvbr1u:2875: (PB 16.5.6) duṣkaraṃ vā eṣa karoti yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti yat sāvitrī bhavati savitṛprasṛtaṃ me karmāsad iti savitṛprasūtam evāsya karma bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2877: (PB 16.5.8) brahma vai brahmaṇaspatir brahmaivāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2879: (PB 16.5.10) agnir evainaṃ niṣṭapati pavamānaḥ punāti pūtam evainaṃ yajñiyaṃ pṛṣṭhāny upanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2880: (PB 16.5.11) yanti vā ete patha ity āhur ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvate
GV02pncvbr1u:2881: (PB 16.5.12) pāvamāna uttamas tṛco bhavati tena patho nayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2882: (PB 16.5.13) sa tu vai pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvītety āhur ya etāni bahiṣpavamāne yuñjyād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2883: (PB 16.5.14) upavatī pratipad bhavaty upa vai rathantaraṃ rathantaram evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2884: (PB 16.5.15) sarasvatī dvitīyā bhavati svargo lokaḥ sarasvān svargo loko bṛhad bṛhad evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2885: (PB 16.5.16) sarasvatyās tṛtīyā bhavati vāg vai sarasvatī vāg vairūpaṃ vairūpam evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2886: (PB 16.5.17) sāvitrī caturthī bhavati prajāpatir vai savitā prajāpatir vairājaṃ vairājam evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2887: (PB 16.5.18) brāhmaṇaspatyā pañcamī bhavati brahma vai brahmaṇaspatir brahma śakvaryaḥ śakvarīr evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2888: (PB 16.5.19) āgnipāvamānī ṣaṣṭhī bhavati gāyatrī vai revatī gāyatracchandā agnī revatīr evāsmai tayā yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:2889: (PB 16.5.20) na catvāri ṣaḍbhyo vibhavanti yad aniruktāni tena vibhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2890: (PB 16.5.21) sarvāṇi svārāṇy ājyāni taj jāmi nānādevatyaiḥ stuvanty ajāmitāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2891: (PB 16.5.22) ''suṣamiddho na āvaha-'' ity āpriya ājyāni bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2892: (PB 16.5.23) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricāno 'manyata sa etāny āpriya ājyāny apaśyat tair ātmānam [thus BI;
GV02pncvbr1u:2893: KSS ātmanam] āprīṇād dugdha iva vā eṣa riricāno yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti yad āpriya ājyāni bhavanty ātmānam evaitair āprīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2894: (PB 16.5.24) etarhi tu vai pṛṣṭhāni yathāyatanaṃ kalpanta ity āhur yad rathantaraṃ prathamaṃ bṛhad uttamaṃ madhya itarāṇīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2895: (PB 16.5.24) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yat sarvāṇi nidhanavanti saha kriyanta iti yad antarā somā yanty antarokthāni śasyante 'ntarā vaṣaṭkurvanti tenājāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:2896: (PB 16.5.26) vyatyāsam iḍāś ca nidhanāni cāhus tenājāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:2897: (PB 16.5.27) cyavante vā etad revatyaḥ svād āyatanād ity āhur yat trayastriṃśāt stomād yantīti yad gāyatryo bhavanti tenāyatanān na cyavante yā hi kā ca gāyatrī sā revatī
GV02pncvbr1u:2898: (PB 16.6.1) paraśubhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāti tac chavīṃ paridhatte paśubhir eva samṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2899: (PB 16.6.2) rohiṇī chavī bhavaty etad vai paśunāṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ rūpaṃ yad rohitaṃ sākṣād evainān avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2900: (PB 16.6.3) araṇye tisro vasaty āraṇyaṃ tābhir annādyam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2901: (PB 16.6.4) udumbare vasaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2903: (PB 16.6.6) ubhayataḥkṣṇud abhrir bhavaty ubhayata evāsmā annādyaṃ rajaty asmāc ca lokād amuṣmāc ca
GV02pncvbr1u:2904: (PB 16.6.7) niṣādeṣu tisro vasaty asyāṃ vā ete parīttā yad evāsyām annādyaṃ tad avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2905: (PB 16.6.8) jane tisro vasati janyaṃ tābhir annādyam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2907: (PB 16.6.10) dvādaśaitā rātrayo bhavanti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram anv annādyaṃ prajāyate tad evāptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2908: (PB 16.6.11) saṃvatsaraṃ na yāced āmādyam iva vā etad yaḥ sadyodattaṃ pratyatti sadyo vai devānaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2911: (PB 16.6.14) na mṛnmayena pibed āhutir vā eṣā yad brāhmaṇasya mukhaṃ na vai mṛnmayam āhutim ānaśe 'tha yad amṛnmayapo bhavati sva eva mukha āhutiṃ juhoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2913: (PB 16.7.2) sarvajitā vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2916: (PB 16.7.5) caturviṃśatiḥ saṃvatsarasyārdhamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ pañcaviṃśo 'nnaṃ vrataṃ saṃvatsarād etenānnādyam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2918: (PB 16.7.7) etena vai gaurāṅgirasaḥ sarvaṃ pāpmānam atarat sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taraty etena stomena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2920: (PB 16.8.2) parāṅ vai trirātro 'rvāṅ agniṣṭomo yas trirātre vibhraṃśate na tasmin
GV02pncvbr1u:2921: punar asty atha yo 'gniṣṭome prāyaścittimat tad api hy etenaikaviṃśatidakṣiṇena punar
GV02pncvbr1u:2922: yajeta yasmin hy eva yajñakratau vibhraṃśate saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2923: (PB 16.8.3) upasadi sahasraṃ prātaranuvākam anvāha tad asau lokaḥ sahasraṃ dakṣiṇās tad antarikṣaṃ sahasram etāny akṣarāṇi tad ayaṃ loka eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2924: (PB 16.8.4) ṛksthā vā anyat sahasram ity āhur akṣaresthā anyad iti yat trirātre dīyate tadṛksthā/
GV02pncvbr1u:2926: (PB 16.8.5) yat sahasrākṣarāsu brahmasāma bhavati sahasrasyaiva sā pratiṣṭutiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2927: (PB 16.8.6) yāvad vai sahasraṃ gāva uttarādharā ity āhus tāvad asmāt lokāt svargo loka iti tasmād āhuḥ sahasrayājī vā imān lokān prāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2928: (PB 16.8.7) paśubhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyata ity āhur yaḥ sadyaḥ sahasraṃ dadātīti paṅktiṣu brahmasāma bhavati pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2930: (PB 16.8.9) prāṇo vai trivṛd annaṃ virāṭ na vai prāṇa ṛte 'nnāt pārayati nānnam ṛte prāṇāt prāṇeṣu caivānnādye ca pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2931: (PB 16.9.1) athaiṣa sarvajyotiḥ sarvasyāptiḥ sarvasya jitiḥ sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2932: (PB 16.9.2) paramo vā eṣa yajñaḥ paramaṃ sahasraṃ paramatāṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2933: (PB 16.9.3) tasya dviśatāḥ stotrīyā anto vai vāco dviśatamantaḥ sahasramanta eva tad antaṃ pratiṣṭāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2934: (PB 16.9.4) kṛtastomo vā eṣa sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati sarvaṃ hi kṛtena jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2936: (PB 16.9.6) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2938: (PB 16.10.2) paśavo vā ukthāni paśavo viśvaṃ jyotir viśva eva jyotau paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2939: (PB 16.10.3) aharbhir vai trirātra imān lokān āpnoti savanair eṣa uttamam uttaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2940: trirātrasyāhar varṣīya uttaram uttaram etasya savanaṃ varṣīyas tena trirātram āpnoty
GV02pncvbr1u:2941: uttara uttara eṣāṃ lokānāṃ jyāyāṃs tenemān lokān āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2942: (PB 16.10.4) asthūrir vā eṣa santato yajño dvau dvau hi stomau savanaṃ vahataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2943: (PB 16.10.5) trivṛtpañcadaśau prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśapañcaviṃśau mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ caturviṃśaikaviṃśau tṛtīyasavanam
GV02pncvbr1u:2944: (PB 16.10.6) yad vai yukte santata ādhīyate vahati tadyathā yukte santata ādadhyād evam etasmin sahasram ādhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2946: (PB 16.10.8) iyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ dyaur bṛhad evāsmāl lokād gāyaty evāmuṣmād ubhayor anayor lokayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2949: (PB 16.10.11) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2950: (PB 16.10.12) uktho bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśavaḥ sahasraṃ paśuṣv eva tat paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2951: (PB 16.11.1) yo vā agniṣṭome trirātraṃ protaṃ vidyāt so 'gniṣṭome sahasraṃ dadyāt trirātrāyatanaṃ hi sahasram
GV02pncvbr1u:2952: (PB 16.11.2) ''upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ'' ''upoṣu jātam apturaṃ'' ''pavasva vāco agriya'' iti pratipado bhavanty etad vai trirātram akaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2953: (PB 16.11.3) pavamāne rathantaraṃ karoti pavamānasyāntyaṃ vāmadevyaṃ bṛhat pṛṣṭham
GV02pncvbr1u:2954: (PB 16.11.4) iyaṃ vai rathantaram antarikṣaṃ vāmadevyaṃ dyaur bṛhad ime lokās trirātro yad etāni sāmāni sadhryañci karotīmān eva tal lokān saṃdadhāti tena trirātram āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2956: (PB 16.11.6) puro hy etayā satyā apaśuvīryaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2957: (PB 16.11.7) tasyām iḍānāṃ saṃkṣāraḥ puruṣo vai kakup paśava iḍānāṃ saṃkṣāra ātmany eva tat paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2958: (PB 16.11.8) ''pratnaṃ pīyūṣaṃ pūrvyaṃ yad uktham'' iti satobṛhatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2959: (PB 16.11.9) satobṛhatyā vai devā imān lokān vyāpnuvann imān evaitābhir lokān vyāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2960: (PB 16.11.10) tā vā etā gāyatryo yat tripadās tena gāyatryas tā vā etā jagatyo yad
GV02pncvbr1u:2961: dvādaśākṣarāṇi padāni tena jagatyas tā vā etā bṛhatyo yat ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarās tena
GV02pncvbr1u:2962: bṛhatyaḥ sarveṣāṃ vā etāś chandasāṃ rūpaṃ sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśūnām avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2963: (PB 16.11.11) etad vai pratyakṣaṃ mahāvrataṃ tasya gāyatraṃ śiro bṛhadrathantare
GV02pncvbr1u:2964: pakṣau vāmadevyam ātmā yajñāyajñīyaṃ pucchaṃ dakṣiṇā evārkyam eṣa vāva pratyakṣaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2966: (PB 16.11.12) tasya bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṃ paṅktiṣu brahmasāma tad āhuś chando vyādhīyate yad bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati paṅktiṣu brahmasāmeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2967: (PB 16.11.13) śrāyantīyam eva kāryaṃ na chando vyādhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2969: (PB 16.11.15) sahasram anyam abhitiṣṭhatīty āhuḥ sahasram anyo 'nvātiṣṭhatīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2970: (PB 16.11.16) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhaty atha yad eṣā dvipadā kakubho loke kriyate sahasrasyaiva so 'nvāsthāyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2971: (PB 16.11.17) anuṣṭubhaṃ saṃpadyate vāg anuṣṭub vāk trirātras tena trirātram āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2972: (PB 16.12.1) ādityāś cāṅgirasaś cādīkṣanta te svarge loke 'spardhanta te 'ṅgirasa
GV02pncvbr1u:2973: ādityebhyaḥ śvaḥ sutyāṃ prābruvaṃs ta ādityā etam apaśyaṃs taṃ sadyaḥ parikrīyāyāsyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2974: udgātāraṃ vṛtvā tena stutvā svargaṃ lokam āyann ahīyantāṅgirasaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2976: (PB 16.12.3) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2977: (PB 16.12.4) tasmā amum ādityam aśvaṃ śvetaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇām ānayaṃs te pratigṛhya vyabhraṃśata sa etāny āyāsyāny apaśyat tair ātmānaṃ samaśrīṇāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2980: (PB 16.12.7) bṛhatīṃ saṃpadyate bṛhatyā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2982: (PB 16.12.9) paśavo vai bṛhatī paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2984: (PB 16.13.2) prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇa ādityaḥ prāṇair eṣa vyṛdhyate ya āmayāvī prāṇair evainaṃ samardhayati [thus BI;
GV02pncvbr1u:2986: (PB 16.13.3) virājaṃ saṃpadyate 'pa vā etasmād annādyaṃ krāmati ya āmayāvy annaṃ virāḍ annadyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2987: (PB 16.13.4) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavaty apratiṣṭhito vā eṣa ya āmayāvī pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśaḥ praty eva tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2988: (PB 16.13.5) etenaivānnādyakāmo vā pratiṣṭhākāmo vā yajetānnaṃ virāṭ pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśo 'tty annaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2989: (PB 16.13.6) urvarā vedir bhavaty etad vā asyā vīryavattamaṃ vīryeṇaiva yajñaṃ samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2990: (PB 16.13.7) khala uttaravedir atra hi sa rasaḥ samavaiti sarasam eva yajñaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2991: (PB 16.13.8) khalevālī yūpo bhavaty etayā hi taṃ rasam utkṛṣanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2995: (PB 16.13.12) yojane caturvāhiṇā prācyāṃ diśi prāhaivam iva vā adhvāno vimitā yaivādhvano
GV02pncvbr1u:2996: mātrātāṃ dhāvayanti traipade praṣṭhivāhinodīcyāṃ gavyūtau dvyogena praticyāṃ krośe
GV02pncvbr1u:2997: sthūriṇā dakṣiṇaitad vai diśāṃ rūpaṃ yadaiva diśāṃ rūpaṃ tena yajñaṃ samardhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2998: (PB 16.13.13) sakṣīradṛtayo rathā bhavanti tato yan navanītam udiyāt tadājye 'pi kāryaṃ sadyastvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3000: (PB 16.14.2) etena vā aṅgirasa ādityān āpnuvan yo hīna ānujāvara iva syāt sa etena yajetāpnoti pūrveṣāṃ prahām āpnuvan hy etenāṅgirasa ādityān
GV02pncvbr1u:3002: (PB 16.14.4) caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī gāyatryā vai devā imān lokān vyāpnuvann imān evaitena lokān vyāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3003: (PB 16.14.5) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3005: KSS cāryujaś] ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3007: (PB 16.14.8) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3009: (PB 16.15.2) śilpaṃ vā eṣa stomānāṃ paśyati gṛhe śilpaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3011: (PB 16.15.4) cakrīvān vā eṣa yajñaḥ kāmāya yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenābhyaśnute yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3013: (PB 16.15.6) svargo lokaḥ pṛṣṭhāni svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3014: (PB 16.15.7) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ pṛṣṭhāni yad ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavanty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3015: (PB 16.15.8) annaṃ paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni yad ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavanty ekadhaivāsminn annādyaṃ paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3016: (PB 16.15.9) tad āhur nānālokāni pṛṣṭhāni yad ekasmin yajñakratau samavarudhyanta īśvaro yajamāno 'pratiṣṭhātor iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3017: (PB 16.15.10) ekaviṃśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo madhya eva yajñasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3018: pratitiṣṭhaty ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3019: (PB 16.15.11) dvāv etāv ekaviṃśau bhavato dvipād yajamāno yajamānam eva yajñe paśuṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3021: (PB 16.16.2) etena vai prajāpatir eṣāṃ lokānām udabhinat
GV02pncvbr1u:3022: (PB 16.16.3) kṛtastomo vā eṣa udbhinnaṃ hy eva kṛtasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3023: (PB 16.16.4) yad ekayā stuvanty eko vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim evāpnoty atha yat tisṛbhis traya ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3024: (PB 16.16.5) tā u catasras saṃpadyante catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3025: (PB 16.16.6) gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3026: (PB 16.16.7) prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3027: (PB 16.16.8) ''ayā rucā hariṇyā punāna'' ity ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3028: (PB 16.16.9) sarveṣāṃ vā eṣā chandasāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva chandaḥsv ārbhavaṃ pavamānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3029: (PB 16.16.10) tasyāṃ gāyatrapārśvaṃ na gāyatrād eti na sāmno na nidhanāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3030: (PB 17.1.1) devā vai svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ daivā ahīyanta vrātyāṃ pravasantas
GV02pncvbr1u:3031: ta āgacchan yato devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tena taṃ stomaṃ na chando 'vindan yena
GV02pncvbr1u:3032: tān āpsyaṃs te devā maruto 'bruvann etebhyas taṃ stomaṃ tac chandaḥ prayacchata yenāsmān
GV02pncvbr1u:3033: āpnavān iti tebhya etaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ stomaṃ prāyacchan parokṣam anuṣṭubhaṃ tato vai te tān āpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:3034: (PB 17.1.2) hīnā vā ete hīyante ye vrātyāṃ pravasanti na hi brahmacaryaṃ caranti na kṛṣiṃ vaṇijyāṃ ṣoḍaśo vā etat stomaḥ samāptum arhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3035: (PB 17.1.3) marutstomo vā eṣa yāni kṣudrāṇi chandāṃsi tāni marutām
GV02pncvbr1u:3036: (PB 17.1.4) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhaty atha yad eṣā dvipadā kakubho loke kriyate rūpeṇaivenāṃs tat samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3037: (PB 17.1.2) ''adhāhīndra girvaṇa'' iti viṣamaṃ chando viṣama iva vai vrātaḥ sarvān evaitān samān karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3039: (PB 17.1.7) dyutāno mārutas teṣāṃ gṛhapatir āsīt ta etena stomenāyajanta te sarva ārdhnuvan yad etat sāma bhavaty ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3040: (PB 17.1.8) yan niruktaṃ nidhanam upeyur gṛhapatir evardhnuyād apetara ārdhnītātha yad aniruktam upayanti sarvān evaitān ṛddhau bhūtau pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3041: (PB 17.1.9) garagiro vā ete ye brahmādyaṃ janyam annam adanty aduruktavākyaṃ duruktam
GV02pncvbr1u:3042: āhur adaṇḍyaṃ daṇḍena ghnantaś caranty adīkṣitā dīkṣitavācaṃ vadanti ṣoḍaśo vā eteṣāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3043: stomaḥ pāpmānaṃ nirhantum arhati yad ete catvāraḥ ṣoḍaśā bhavanti tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3044: (PB 17.1.10) ''devo vo draviṇodā'' ity agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ devatāsv evainān pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3045: (PB 17.1.11) atho khalv āhuḥ ''adarśi gātuvittama'' ity eva satobṛhatīṣu kāryaṃ viṣama iva vai vrātaḥ sarvān evainān satobṛhataḥ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3046: (PB 17.1.12) tad āhuḥ śithilam iva vā etat chandaś carācaraṃ yat satobṛhatī ''devo vo draviṇodā '' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:3047: (PB 17.1.13) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā tad yat padaṃ punar ārabhate tasmāt putro mātaram adhyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3048: (PB 17.1.14) uṣṇīṣaṃ ca pratodaś ca jyāhṇoḍaś ca vipathaś ca phalakāstīrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇavalakṣe ajine rajato niṣkas tad gṛhapateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3049: (PB 17.1.15) valūkāntāni dāmatūṣāṇītareṣāṃ dve dve dāmanī dve dve upānahau dviṣaṃhitāny ajināni
GV02pncvbr1u:3050: (PB 17.1.16) etad vai vrātyadhanaṃ yasmā etad dadati tasminn eva mṛjānā yānti
GV02pncvbr1u:3051: (PB 17.1.17) trayastriṃśatā trayastriṃśatā gṛhapatim abhisamāyanti trayastriṃśad dhi devā ārdhnuvan ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3052: (PB 17.2.1) athaiṣa ṣaṭṣoḍaśī ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3053: (PB 17.2.2) abhipūrveṇa vā ete pāpmanā gṛhītā ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat ṣaṭṣoḍaśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tena pāpmāno 'dhi
GV02pncvbr1u:3054: (PB 17.2.3) yad ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3055: (PB 17.2.4) uktho bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśavo nṛśaṃsam agryaṃ pariṇayanti paśubhir evainān agryaṃ pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3056: (PB 17.3.1) athaiṣa dviṣoḍaśo ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3057: (PB 17.3.2) hīnā vā ete ahīyante ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti mukhaṃ vai trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhata evainān yajñasya pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3058: (PB 17.3.3) yad vai ṣoḍaśe stotre bhavatas tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3059: (PB 17.3.4) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3060: (PB 17.4.1) athaiṣa śamanīcāmeḍhrāṇāṃ stomo ye jyeṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:3061: (PB 17.4.2) agrād agraṃ rohanty ūrdhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3062: (PB 17.4.3) etena vai śamanīcāmeḍhrā ayajanta teṣāṃ kuṣītakaḥ sāmaśravaso gṛhapatir
GV02pncvbr1u:3063: āsīt tān luśākapiḥ khārgalir anuvyāharad avākīrṣata kanīyāṃsau stomāv upāgur iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3064: tasmāt kauṣītakānāṃ na kaś canātīva jihīte yajñāva kīrṇā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:3065: (PB 17.5.1) indro vai triśirasaṃ tvāṣṭram ahaṃs tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'gnim
GV02pncvbr1u:3066: upādhāvat sa etad agnistotram apaśyat tad ātmany adhividhāya tenainam ayājayat tenāsyāślīlāṃ vācam apāhan
GV02pncvbr1u:3067: (PB 17.5.2) apāślīlāṃ vācaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3068: (PB 17.5.3) yo 'pūta iva syād agniṣṭutā yajetāgninaivāsya pāpmānam apahatya trivṛtā tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3069: (PB 17.5.4) tad āhur yat trivṛd bhavaty ekasmād evāṅgāt pāpmānam apahanti mukhād eveti
GV02pncvbr1u:3071: (PB 17.5.6) yat trivṛd bhavati yad evāsya mukhato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat pañcadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3072: yad evāsyorasto bāhvor apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat saptadaśo yad evāsya madhyato 'pūtaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3073: tat tenāpahanti yad ekaviṃśo yad evāsya pador aṣṭhīvator apūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3074: (PB 17.5.7) vaiśvānaraṃ vā eṣa praviśatīty āhur yo 'gniṣṭutā yajata iti vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ tasya yad apūtaṃ tad agniḥ kṣāpayaty athetaraḥ śuciḥ pūta udeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3075: (PB 17.6.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma
GV02pncvbr1u:3077: (PB 17.6.3) tejo vai trivṛd brahmavarcasaṃ yad vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty upaivainaṃ tad dhamati
GV02pncvbr1u:3078: (PB 17.6.4) yathā hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭaped evam enam agniṣṭun niṣṭapati
GV02pncvbr1u:3079: (PB 17.7.1) etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3080: (PB 17.7.2) jaratkakṣo vā eṣa yo 'paśur yathā vai jaratkakṣe paśavo na ramanta evam
GV02pncvbr1u:3081: etasmin paśavo na ramante yo 'paśur yadā vai jaratkakṣam agnir dahaty athainam abhivarṣaty
GV02pncvbr1u:3082: athāsminn oṣadhayo jāyante 'tha vai tasmin paśavo ramante
GV02pncvbr1u:3084: (PB 17.7.4) yad evāsyāpaśavyaṃ tad agniṣṭun nirdahati yad agniṣṭun nirdahati tad adbhī revatībhiḥ śamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3087: (PB 17.8.3) agnir vā etasya havyam atti yo yajñe vibhraṃśate na devatā havyaṃ gamayaty agnim evaikadhardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3088: (PB 17.8.4) yad vai saṃśīryate 'thānyan niṣkurvanti tena tad yāti yadā vāva tan niṣkurvanty
GV02pncvbr1u:3089: atha tad yāti yeṣv eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau tair eva yajeta yeṣv
GV02pncvbr1u:3090: eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin yajñakratau teṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3092: (PB 17.9.2) annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'gnir annādyasya pradātāgnir evāsmā annādyaṃ prayacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:3094: (PB 17.9.4) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3096: (PB 17.10.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāman sa etad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanam apaśyat tenāsāṃ madhyaṃ vyavait tā enam upāvartanta pary enam āviśan
GV02pncvbr1u:3097: (PB 17.10.3) grāmakāmo yajeta yad etad aniktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavati madhyam evāsāṃ vyavaity upainam āvartante pary enaṃ viśanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3098: (PB 17.10.4) sa eṣa prajāpater apūrvo nāsmāt pūrvo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3100: (PB 17.11.2) tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣv ekādaśadakṣiṇā vyādiśaty aśvadvādaśā madhyandine tā ubhayīr apākaroty ekādaśa tṛtīyasavane tā vaśāyām apākaroti
GV02pncvbr1u:3101: (PB 17.11.3) trayastriṃśad etā dakṣiṇā bhavanti trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoty aśvaś catustriṃśo dakṣiṇānāṃ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3102: (PB 17.11.4) sa eṣa bṛhaspatisavo bṛhaspatir akāmayata devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3104: (PB 17.11.6) sa eṣa sthapatisavo yaṃ sthāpatyāyābhiṣiñceran sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3106: (PB 17.11.8) kṛṣṇājine 'dhy abhiṣicyata etad vai pratyakṣaṃ brahmavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasa evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3107: (PB 17.11.9) ājyenābhiṣicyate teja ājyaṃ teja ātman dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:3108: (PB 17.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ sa sarvasvāro yaḥ kāmayetānāmayatāmuṃ lokam iyām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3109: (PB 17.12.2) prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evāsya bahir ṇirādadhāti tājak pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3110: (PB 17.12.3) trivṛd vai stomānāṃ kṣepiṣṭho yat trivṛd bhavaty āśīyaḥ saṃgacchātā ity ananto vai svaro 'nanto 'sau loko 'nantam evainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3111: (PB 17.12.4) abhivatyaḥ pravatyo bhavanty asmād evainaṃ lokāt svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3112: (PB 17.12.5) ārbhavapavamāne stūyamāna audumbaryā dakṣiṇā prāvṛto nipadyate tad eva saṃgacchate
GV02pncvbr1u:3113: (PB 17.12.6) sa eṣa śunaskarṇastoma etena vai śunaskarṇo bāṣkiho 'yajata tasmāc chunaskarṇastoma ity ākhyāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3119: (PB 17.13.6) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3120: (PB 17.13.7) tataś caturṣu māseṣu varuṇapraghāsānāṃ loke dvidivaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3123: (PB 17.13.10) maitrāvaruṇy anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśū niyuñjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3124: (PB 17.13.11) śataṃ dakṣiṇā ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3125: (PB 17.13.12) tataś caturṣu māseṣu sākamedhānāṃ loke trirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3126: (PB 17.13.13) anīkavatī pratipad āgneyaḥ paśur mārutī pratipad aindrāgnaḥ paśur vaiśvakarmaṇī
GV02pncvbr1u:3127: pratipad ekādaśinī paśavaḥ sauryānūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3129: (PB 17.13.14) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3130: (PB 17.13.15) tataś caturṣu māseṣu śunāsīryasya loke jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3131: (PB 17.13.16) upavatī pratipad vāyavyaḥ paśur āśviny anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśuṃ niyuñjanti dvādaśaṃ śataṃ dakṣiṇā
GV02pncvbr1u:3132: (PB 17.13.17) agniḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sūryaḥ parivatsaraś candramā idāvatsaro vāyur anuvatsaro
GV02pncvbr1u:3133: 'gniṃ saṃvatsaraṃ vaiśvadevenāpnoti sūryaṃ parivatsaraṃ varuṇapraghāsaiś candramasam
GV02pncvbr1u:3135: (PB 17.13.18) haviryajñair vai devā imaṃ lokam abhyajayann antarikṣaṃ paśumadbhiḥ somair amum imān eva lokān āpnoty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3136: (PB 17.14.1) yadāgnihotraṃ juhoty atha daśa gṛhamedhina āpnoty ekayā rātryā,
GV02pncvbr1u:3137: yadā daśa saṃvatsarān agnihotraṃ juhoty atha darśapūrṇamāsayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3138: yadā daśa saṃvatsarān darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate 'thāgniṣṭomayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3139: yadā daśabhir agniṣṭomair yajate 'tha sahasrayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3141: yadā daśabhir ayutair yajate 'tha prayutayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3142: yadā daśabhiḥ prayutair yajate 'tha niyutayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3144: yadā daśabhir arbudair yajate 'tha nyarbudayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3145: yadā daśabhir nyarbudair yajate 'tha nikharvakayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3146: yadā daśabhir nikharvakair yajate 'tha badvayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:3147: yadā daśabhir badvair yajate 'thākṣitayājinam āpnoti yadā daśabhir akṣitair yajate 'tha gaur bhavati,
GV02pncvbr1u:3148: yadā gaur bhavaty athāgnir bhavati yadāgnir bhavaty atha saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatim āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3149: (PB 17.14.2) yadā saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatir bhavaty atha vaiśvadevasya mātrām āpnoty ato vā itare parastarāṃ parastarām eva sarve
GV02pncvbr1u:3150: (PB 17.14.3) etān eva lokān āpnoty etān lokān jayati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3152: (PB 18.1.2) devāś ca vā asurāś ca prajāpater dvayāḥ putrā āsaṃs te 'surā bhūyāṃso balīyāṃsa āsan kanīyāṃso devās te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvan sa etam upahavyam apaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:3153: (PB 18.1.3) sa aikṣata yan niruktam āhariṣyāmy asurā me yajñaṃ haniṣyantīti so 'niruktam āharat
GV02pncvbr1u:3154: (PB 18.1.4) sa uttame stotre ''devo vo draviṇodā'' iti devān abhiparyāvartata
GV02pncvbr1u:3156: (PB 18.1.6) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3157: (PB 18.1.7) atho khalv āhuḥ ''yajñāyajñā vo agnaya'' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:3158: (PB 18.1.8) agnir vai sarvā devatās tena na devatānāṃ kāṃ canāntar eti
GV02pncvbr1u:3159: (PB 18.1.9) indro yatīn sālāvṛkeyebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat sa prajāpatim upādhāvat tasmā etam upahavyaṃ prāyacchat taṃ viśve devā upāhvayanta tasmād upahavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3161: (PB 18.1.11) devatā vā etaṃ parivrajanti yam anṛtam abhiśaṃsanti devatā evāsyānnam ādayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3162: (PB 18.1.12) tasya pūtasya svaditasya manuṣyā annam adanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3164: (PB 18.1.14) mārutī bhavati marutau vai devānāṃ viśo viśam evāsmā anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3167: (PB 18.1.17) vaiśvadevī bhavati viśve hy enaṃ devā upāhvayanta
GV02pncvbr1u:3173: (PB 18.1.23) brahmā vā ṛtvijām aniruktaḥ svenaivainaṃ tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3174: (PB 18.1.24) yāvad dha vai kumāre sadyo jāta eno nāsmiṃs tāvac ca naino bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3178: (PB 18.2.4) dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3180: (PB 18.2.6) devavrataṃ vai ghṛtaṃ devavratenaiva devatā apyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3181: (PB 18.2.7) uttareṇottareṇa kāṇḍenopaity uttara uttara eṣāṃ lokānāṃ jyāyān svargasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3182: (PB 18.2.8) bṛhatsāma bhavati bṛhatā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargam evetena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3183: (PB 18.2.9) ṛtam uktvā prasarpanty ṛtenaivainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3185: (PB 18.2.11) audumbaro bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3188: (PB 18.2.14) dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavaḥ sa vai saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3190: (PB 18.3.2) tasya dīkṣaṇīyāyām iṣṭau dvādaśamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dadāti caturviṃśatimānaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3191: prāyaṇīyāyāṃ dve caturviṃśatimāne ātithyāyāṃ catvāri caturviṃśatimānāni prātaḥ prathamāyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3192: upasady aṣṭau caturviṃśatimānāny aparāhṇe prathamāyām upasadi ṣoḍaśacaturviṃśatimānāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3193: prātar madhyamāyām upasadi dvātriṃśataṃ caturviṃśatimānāny aparāhṇe madhyamāyām upasadi
GV02pncvbr1u:3194: catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ caturviṃśatimānāni prātar uttamāyām upasady aṣṭāviṃśatiśataṃ caturviṃśatimānāny
GV02pncvbr1u:3195: aparāhṇa uttamāyām upasadi dve aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamāne agnīṣomīyasya paśor vapāyāṃ catvāry
GV02pncvbr1u:3196: aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāni prātaḥ paśor vapāyām aṣṭāv aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāni prātaḥsavane
GV02pncvbr1u:3197: sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣu ṣoḍaśāṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāni mādhyandine savane 'naḍucchataṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:3198: rukmo hotuḥ srag udgātur dvātriṃśatam aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāni tṛtīyasavane sanneṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:3199: nārāśaṃseṣu catuḥṣaṣṭim aṣṭāviṃśatiśatamānāny udayanīyāyām iṣṭāv aṣṭāviṃśatiśatam
GV02pncvbr1u:3201: (PB 18.3.3) eṣa vā anaḍuho lokam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3202: (PB 18.3.4) eṣa vai jyotiṣmantaṃ puṇyaṃ lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ vidvān etena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:3204: (PB 18.4.2) tasya prātaḥsavanīyān somān pratiduhā śrīṇāti śṛtena madhyandine dadhnā tṛtīyasavane
GV02pncvbr1u:3206: (PB 18.4.4) yat sarvāṇi savanāny āśīrvanti bhavanty anusavanam evainaṃ paśubhiḥ sarmardhayati prajā tv asya mīliteva bhavati śukriye hi savane payasā śrīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3208: (PB 18.4.6) etad vai vaiśyasya samṛddhaṃ yat paśavaḥ paśubhir evainaṃ samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3211: (PB 18.4.9) paśavo vai kaṇvarathantaraṃ paśavaḥ sadoviśīyam ābhipūrvān evāsmin paśūn dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3213: (PB 18.4.11) dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavaḥ sa vai saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nuprajāyante tān evāptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3215: (PB 18.5.2) indro vṛtram ahan sa viṣvaṅvīryeṇa vyārcchat tasmai devāḥ prāyaścittim aicchaṃs taṃ na kiṃ canādhinot taṃ tīvrasoma evādhinot
GV02pncvbr1u:3217: (PB 18.5.4) chidra iva vā eṣa yaṃ somo 'tipavate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3219: (PB 18.5.6) viḍ vā etam atipavate yo rājāparudhyate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3221: (PB 18.5.8) grāmo vā etam atipavate yo 'laṃ grāmāya san grāmaṃ na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3222: (PB 18.5.9) prajākāmo yajeta prajā vā etam atipavate yo 'laṃ prajāyāḥ san prajāṃ na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3223: (PB 18.5.10) paśukāmo yajeta paśavo vā etam atipavante yo 'laṃ paśubhyaḥ san paśūn na vindate yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā [thus BI;
GV02pncvbr1u:3225: (PB 18.5.11) āmayāvinaṃ yājayet prāṇā vā etam atipavante ya āmayāvī yat tīvrasomena yajate pihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3228: (PB 18.5.14) abhy abhisomān unnayanti tīvra enaṃ dhinavad ity ubhāv adhvaryū sarve camasādhvaryavo 'cchāvākāya pratigṛṇanti tīvrayanty evainam
GV02pncvbr1u:3229: (PB 18.5.15) tad abhakṣayanta ṛtvijaś camasān avajighranti tīvrayanty evainaṃ tat tān acchāvākasya stotre bhakṣayanti tīvrayanty evainam
GV02pncvbr1u:3230: (PB 18.5.16) tad yat savanāni vyavabhakṣayeyur apakrāmukā yajamānāc chrīḥ syāt sakṛtsakṛt savanānām antato bhakṣayanti savanānām asaṃbhedāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3232: (PB 18.5.18) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyāṃ vā eṣa na pratitiṣṭhati yo na pratitiṣṭhaty asyām evainaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3233: (PB 18.5.19) śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty etad evāsmiñ chrīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3234: (PB 18.5.21) vāg anuṣṭup vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3235: (PB 18.5.22) viśoviśīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty etad evāsmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3236: (PB 18.5.23) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3237: (PB 18.5.24) ukthyo bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3239: (PB 18.6.2) yāvān vai prajāpatir ūrdhvas tāvāṃs tiryaṅ
GV02pncvbr1u:3240: (PB 18.6.3) yāvanta ime lokā ūrdhvās tāvantas tiryañcaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3242: (PB 18.6.5) yat saptadaśa stotrāṇi tenordhvam apnoti yat sarvaḥ saptadaśas tena tiryañcam
GV02pncvbr1u:3244: (PB 18.6.7) aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ vājavan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ citravat tṛtīyasavanam
GV02pncvbr1u:3245: (PB 18.6.8) yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavaty anirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatim
GV02pncvbr1u:3246: evāpnoti yad vājavan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvarudhyai yac
GV02pncvbr1u:3248: (PB 18.6.9) viyonir vājapeya ity āhuḥ prājāpatyaḥ san niruktasāmeti yad aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ tena sayoniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3250: (PB 18.6.11) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3253: (PB 18.6.14) abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati brahmaṇo vā eṣa ṛṣabha ṛṣabhatām evainaṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3254: (PB 18.6.15) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vāg anuṣṭup vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3256: (PB 18.6.17) udvaṃśīyam ukthānām antato bhavati sarveṣāṃ vā etat pṛṣṭhānāṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3258: (PB 18.6.19) atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atiriktaḥ ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3259: (PB 18.6.20) tad āhur jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyate yad udvaṃśīyād gaurīvitena stuvate svārāt svāreṇeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3262: (PB 18.6.23) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yat ṣoḍaśī tenājāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:3263: (PB 18.6.24) yajñāraṇye saṃtiṣṭhata ity āhur aty ukthāny ety ati ṣoḍaśinaṃ na rātriṃ prāpnotīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3265: (PB 18.6.26) eṣā vai prajāpateḥ paśuṣṭhā tanūr yac chipiviṣṭaḥ prāṇo vai bṛhat prāṇa eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3266: (PB 18.6.27) bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3267: (PB 18.7.1) prajāpatir akāmayata vājam āpnuyāṃ svargaṃ lokam iti sa etaṃ vājapeyam apaśyad vājapeyo vā eṣa vājam evaitena svargaṃ lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3268: (PB 18.7.2) śukravatyo jyotiṣmatyaḥ prātaḥsavane bhavanti tejo brahmavarcasaṃ tābhir avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3269: (PB 18.7.3) vājavatyo mādhyandine bhavanti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3270: (PB 18.7.4) annavatyo gaṇavatyaḥ paśumatyas tṛtīyasavane bhavanti bhūmānaṃ tābhir avarunadhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3271: (PB 18.7.5) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3272: (PB 18.7.6) hiraṇyasraja ṛtvijo bhavanti mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3274: (PB 18.7.8) jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ jyotir evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3275: (PB 18.7.9) ājiṃ dhāvanti yajamānam ujjāpayanti svargam evainaṃ tal lokam ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3276: (PB 18.7.10) nākaṃ rohati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:3277: (PB 18.7.11) sarajase rohati manuṣyalokād evainam antar dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3278: (PB 18.7.12) vājināṃ sāma brahmā rathacakre 'bhigāyati vājo vai svargo lokaḥ svargam evainaṃ tal lokam ujjāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3279: (PB 18.7.13) viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu bṛhaduttamaṃ bhavati svargam eva tal lokaṃ rūḍhvā bradhnasya viṣṭapam abhyatikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:3280: (PB 18.8.1) agniṣṭomaṃ prathamam āharati yajñamukhaṃ vā agniṣṭomo yajñamukham evārabhya savamākramate
GV02pncvbr1u:3282: (PB 18.8.3) tasya dvātriṃśāḥ pavamānā dvātriṃśadakṣarā 'nuṣṭub vāg anuṣṭub yāvatī vāk tayaiva sūyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3283: (PB 18.8.4) saṃśara iva vā eṣa chandasāṃ yad viṣamā stomā ayathāpūrvam iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3284: (PB 18.8.5) yat samāḥ pavamānās tenāsaṃśaras tena yathāpūrvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3285: (PB 18.8.6) ātmanā vā agniṣṭomenardhnoty ātmanā puṇyo bhavaty atha yad ukthāni paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni yad ukthāni bhavanty anusantatyā
GV02pncvbr1u:3286: (PB 18.8.7) ''vāyo śukro ayāmita'' iti vāyavyā pratipad bhavati vāg vai vāyur vācam
GV02pncvbr1u:3287: evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tayābhiṣicyate sarvasyā eva vācaḥ sūyate sarvā enaṃ vāco rājeti vadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3288: (PB 18.8.8) saṃbhāryā bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny eva tābhir yunakti yan nānādevatyās tena yunakti vīryaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3289: (PB 18.8.9) yanti vā ete yajñamukhād ity āhur ye saṃbhāryāḥ kurvata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3290: (PB 18.8.10) yat ''pavasya vāco agriya'' iti tena yajñamukhān na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3291: (PB 18.8.11) ''davidyutatyā rucā-'' iti chandasāṃ rūpaṃ chandāṃsy evāsya yajñamukhe yunakti tair abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3292: (PB 18.8.12) ''etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipa'' ity ādityā ādityā vā imāḥ prajās tāsām eva madhyataḥ sūyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3293: (PB 18.8.13) ''pavasvendo vṛṣā suta'' vṛṣaṇvatyo bhavanti triṣṭubho rūpaṃ vīryaṃ vai triṣṭup vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3294: (PB 18.8.14) ''utte śuṣmāsa īrata'' ity udvatyo bhavanty udvad vā anuṣṭubho rūpam ānuṣṭubho rājanyas tasmād udvatyo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3296: (PB 18.8.16) ''adha kṣapā pariṣkṛta'' ity anuṣṭup prathamānuṣṭub uttamā vāg vā anuṣṭub vācaiva prayanti vācam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3297: (PB 18.8.17) chinnam iva vā etad yad ekarcā yad etāvānuṣṭubhau tṛcāv abhito bhavato bahavaḥ puraetāro bhavanti bahavaḥ paścāpinaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3298: (PB 18.8.18) sauryānuṣṭub uttamā bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3299: (PB 18.9.1) varuṇasya vai suṣuvāṇasya bhargo 'pākrāmat sa tredhāpatad bhṛgus tṛtīyam abhavac chrāyantīyaṃ tṛtīyam apas tṛtīyaṃ prāviśat
GV02pncvbr1u:3300: (PB 18.9.2) yad bhārgavo hotā bhavati tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvāvarundhe yat
GV02pncvbr1u:3301: śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvārundhe yat puṣkarasrajaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3302: pratimuñcate tenaiva tad indriyaṃ vīryam āptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3304: (PB 18.9.4) daśa camasā daśa camasādhvaryavo daśa daśa camasam abhiyanty ā daśamāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3305: puruṣād anvākhyāya prasarpanti daśa samṛddho hy eṣa yajña enaṃ vāva te tad yajñam
GV02pncvbr1u:3306: anvaicchan ya etena yajata etad evendriyaṃ vīryam āttvāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3307: (PB 18.9.5) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavaḥ sa vai saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarād evendriyaṃ vīryam āptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3308: (PB 18.9.6) indro vṛtram ahaṃs tasyeyaṃ citrāṇy upaid rūpāṇy asau nakṣatrāṇām avakāśena puṇḍarīkaṃ jāyate yat puṣkarasrajaṃ pratimuñcate vṛtrasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kṣatraṃ pratimuñcate
GV02pncvbr1u:3309: (PB 18.9.7) dvādaśa puṣkarā bhavanti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsare 'ntar bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca bhūtena caivainaṃ bhavyena ca samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3310: (PB 18.9.8) srag udgātus saurya udgātā na vai tasmai vyaucchad atho vy evāsmai vāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3311: (PB 18.9.9) rukmo hotur āgneyo hotātho amum evāsmā ādityam unnayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3312: (PB 18.9.10) prākāśāv adhvaryor yāv iva hy adhvaryū atho cakṣuṣī evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3313: (PB 18.9.11) aśvaḥ prastotuḥ prājāpatyo 'śvaḥ prājāpatyaḥ prastotātho preva hy aśvaḥ prothati preva prastotā stauti
GV02pncvbr1u:3315: (PB 18.9.13) vaśā maitrāvaruṇasya vaśaṃ mā nayād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3316: (PB 18.9.14) ṛṣabho brāhmaṇācchaṃsino vīryaṃ vā ṛṣabho vīryam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3318: (PB 18.9.16) varāsī neṣṭur anulambeva hy eṣā hotrā
GV02pncvbr1u:3319: (PB 18.9.17) sthūri yavācitam acchāvākasya sthūrir iva hy eṣā hotrātho nirvaruṇatvāyaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:3320: yavā na vai tarhi yad asyāṃ dakṣiṇā abhy abhavann atho asya ta eva tenābhīṣṭāḥ prītā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3323: (PB 18.9.20) vatsatary unnetuḥ sāṇḍas trivatso grāvastuto mithunatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3324: (PB 18.9.21) dvādaśa paṣṭhauhyo garbhiṇyo brahmaṇo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsara
GV02pncvbr1u:3325: eva pratitiṣṭhaty atha yad garbhiṇyo vāg vai dhenur mantro garbho vācy evāsya mantraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3326: dadhāty āmantraṇīyo bhavaty atha yad dhenubhavyā dvādaśa payāṃsi tāny evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3327: tasmād āhuḥ payasvī rājā puṇya iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3328: (PB 18.10.1) yo vai savād eti nainaṃ sava upanamaty atha yaḥ sāmabhya eti pāpīyān suṣuvāṇo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3329: (PB 18.10.2) saṃbhāryā bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny eva tābhir yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:3331: (PB 18.10.4) yat saṃbhāryā bhavanti tad eva sāmabhyo naiti
GV02pncvbr1u:3332: (PB 18.10.5) yāni devarājñāṃ sāmāni tair amuṣmin loka ṛdhnoti yāni manuṣyarājñāṃ tair asminn ubhayor anayor lokayor ṛdhnoti devaloke ca manuṣyaloke
GV02pncvbr1u:3333: (PB 18.10.6) sāmatriṣṭubhy adhy abhiṣicyate vīryaṃ vai sāma triṣṭup vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3334: (PB 18.10.7) ekādaśa rājasāmāni bhavanty ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub ojo vīryaṃ triṣṭub ojasy eva vīrye 'dhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3335: (PB 18.10.8) yat trivṛtam abhiṣecanīye kuryur brahma kṣatrāyāpidadhyur yat trivṛtam
GV02pncvbr1u:3336: uddharanti brahma tat kṣatrād uddharanti tasmād bharatāṃ pratidaṇḍā brahmaṇā na hi
GV02pncvbr1u:3339: prathamaḥ kṣatraṃ vā ekaviṃśo viṭ saptadaśaḥ kṣatreṇaivāsmai viśam ubhayataḥ parigṛhṇāty
GV02pncvbr1u:3341: (PB 18.10.10) yad vai rājasūyenābhiṣicyate tat svargaṃ lokam ārohati sa yad imaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3342: lokaṃ nopāvarohed ati janaṃ vā gacched ud vā mādyed yad eṣo 'rvācīnastomaḥ keśavapanīyo
GV02pncvbr1u:3343: bhavaty asya lokasyānuddhānāya yathā śākhāyāḥ śākhām ālambham upāvarohed evam etenemaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3345: (PB 18.11.1) indro vṛtram ahan sa viṣyaṅvīryeṇa vyabhraṃśata sa etac chrāyantīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3346: apaśyat tenātmānaṃ samaśrīṇād indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3347: vṛtraṃ hi hanti yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati punar evātmānaṃ saṃśrīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3348: (PB 18.11.2) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi bhavati vācā vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate vṛtraṃ hi hanti vāg anuṣṭub vāco raso yajñāyajñīyaṃ vācy evāsya rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3349: (PB 18.11.3) vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīndriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3350: yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate vṛtraṃ hi hanti yad vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīndriyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3352: (PB 18.11.4) aśrayan vāva śrāyantīyenāvārayanta vāravantīyenendriyasya vā eṣā vīryasya parigṛhītiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3353: (PB 18.11.5) apratiṣṭhito vā eṣa yo rājasūyenābhiṣicyate yadā vā etena dvirātreṇa yajate 'thaiva pratiṣṭhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3354: (PB 18.11.6) yāvanti saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇi tāvatya etāḥ stotrīyāḥ saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3355: (PB 18.11.7) agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar atirātra uttaraṃ nānaivāhorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3357: uddṛṣṭa] uttaraṃ nānaivārdhamāsayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati paurṇamāsyāṃ pūrvam ahar vyaṣṭakāyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3358: uttaraṃ nānaiva māsoḥ pratitiṣṭhati tad āhur ya eva samānapakṣe puṇyāhanī syātāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3360: (PB 18.11.9) apaśavyo dvirātra ity āhur dve hy ete chandasī gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ ca jagatīm antaryantīti na tena jagatī kṛtā yat tṛtīyasavane
GV02pncvbr1u:3361: (PB 18.11.10) yadā vā eṣāhīnasyāhar bhajate sāhvasya vā savanam athaiva jagatī kṛtā
GV02pncvbr1u:3362: traiśokam uttarasyāhno brahmasāma bhavati vaikhānasam acchāvākasāma yac chukriye
GV02pncvbr1u:3363: savane kriyete tenaiva jagatī kṛtā tena paśavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3364: (PB 18.11.11) vyuṣṭir vā eṣa dvirātro vy evāsmai vāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3366: (PB 19.1.2) yo rājya āśaṃsamāno rājyaṃ na prāpnuyāt sa etena yajeta rājaivainaṃ rājānaṃ karoti taṃ tu vairājeti vadeyur yaṃ rājā rājānaṃ kuryād rājaivainaṃ rājānaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3367: (PB 19.1.3) chando 'nye yajñāḥ saṃpadyante stomam eṣa vīryaṃ vai stomo vīrya evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3368: (PB 19.1.4) aṣṭāv ekaviṃśāḥ saṃstuto bhavaty aṣṭau vai vīrā rāṣṭraṃ samudyacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3369: rājabhrātā ca rājaputraś ca purohitaś ca mahiṣī ca sūtaś ca grāmaṇī ca kṣattā ca
GV02pncvbr1u:3370: saṃgrahītā caite vai vīrā rāṣṭraṃ samudyacchanty eteṣv evādhy abhiṣicyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3371: (PB 19.1.5) kṣatraṃ vā ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhā kṣatrasyevāsya prakāśo bhavati pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3373: (PB 19.2.2) parokṣam anye yajñā virājaṃ saṃpadyante pratyakṣam eṣa virājaṃ saṃpannaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3374: (PB 19.2.3) pratyakṣam etenānnādyam avarundhe 'nnādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3375: (PB 19.2.4) sarvo daśadaśī bhavati daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājam annam annādyasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3376: (PB 19.2.5) tā u pañca pañca bhavanti pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktā paśavo yajña eva paśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3377: (PB 19.2.6) etenaiva pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta daśabhir vā idaṃ puruṣaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'syām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3379: (PB 19.3.2) gandharvāpsarasāṃ stomaḥ prajākāmo yajeta gandharvāpsaraso vai manuṣyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3380: prajāyā vāprajastāyā veśate teṣām atra somapīthas tān svena bhāgadheyena prīṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3383: (PB 19.3.4) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati puruṣo vai kakub garbha eva sa madhyato dhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3384: (PB 19.3.5) atha yad eṣā dvipadā kakubho loke kriyate garbha eva tad dhi taṃ prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3386: (PB 19.3.7) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3387: (PB 19.3.8) vasiṣṭhasya janitre bhavato vasiṣṭho vā ete putrahataḥ sāmanī apaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad ete sāmanī bhavataḥ prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3388: (PB 19.3.9) dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete dve striyā ūne prajananāya prajananam eva tat kriyate prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3390: (PB 19.4.2) yo bahu pratigṛhya garagīr iva manyeta sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3391: (PB 19.4.3) yaikādaśī yad eva pūrvavayase bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti prātaḥsavanāya tan niharati
GV02pncvbr1u:3392: (PB 19.4.4) atha yā dvādaśī yad evottaravayase bahu pratigṛhṇati yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti tṛtīyasavanāya tan niharati
GV02pncvbr1u:3393: (PB 19.4.5) vairājo vai puruṣaḥ sa madhyato 'śuddho madhyata evainaṃ pāpmano muñcati
GV02pncvbr1u:3395: (PB 19.4.7) indro yatīn sālāvṛkeyebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat so 'śuddho 'manyata sa ete śuddhāśuddhīye apaśyat tābhyām aśudhyat
GV02pncvbr1u:3396: (PB 19.4.8) yad eva bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti yad aśuddho manyate tad etābhyāṃ śudhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3398: (PB 19.4.10) gauṣūktiś cāśvasūktiś ca bahu pratigṛhya garagirāv amanyetāṃ tāv ete sāmanī apaśyatāṃ tābhyāṃ garaṃ niraghnātām
GV02pncvbr1u:3399: (PB 19.4.11) yad eva bahu pratigṛhṇāti yad garaṃ girati yad anannam atti tad etābhyāṃ nirhate
GV02pncvbr1u:3400: (PB 19.4.12) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi bhavanty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśaḥ pāpmana evainaṃ muktvaujasā vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3403: (PB 19.5.3) yac catasṛbhir bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3404: (PB 19.5.4) yad aṣṭābhir ājyāny aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3405: (PB 19.5.5) yat dvādaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāno dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tān evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3406: (PB 19.5.6) yat ṣoḍaśāni pṛṣṭhāni ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3407: (PB 19.5.7) yad viṃśa ārbhavaḥ pāṅktatvam eṣāṃ tad āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3408: (PB 19.5.8) yac caturviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaś caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3409: (PB 19.5.9) prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3410: (PB 19.5.10) ekaṃ sāma bahūni chandāṃsi tasmād eko bahūn poṣān puṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3411: (PB 19.5.11) ātmā vā agniṣṭomaḥ paśavaś chandāṃsy ātmany eva tat paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayati noktho nāgniṣṭomo na hi grāmyāḥ paśavo nāraṇyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3412: (PB 19.6.1) atha yasya catvāri stotrāṇi catasṛbhiś catvāry aṣṭābhiś catvāri dvādaśabhiś catvāri ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sa gāṃ nātivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:3413: (PB 19.6.2) ṣoḍaśakalāḥ paśavaḥ kalāśas tat paśūn [KSS & BI:
GV02pncvbr1u:3415: (PB 19.6.3) ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśimān bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni vajraḥ ṣoḍaśī vajreṇaivāsmai
GV02pncvbr1u:3416: paśūn parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukā asmāt paśavo bhavanti noktho nātirātro na hi grāmyāḥ paśavo nāraṇyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3417: (PB 19.7.1) asurāṇāṃ vai balas tamasā prāvṛto 'śmāpidhānaś cāsīt tasmin gavyaṃ vasv
GV02pncvbr1u:3418: antar āsīt taṃ devā nāśaknuvan bhettuṃ te bṛhaspatim abruvann imān na utsṛjeti sa
GV02pncvbr1u:3419: udbhidaiva balaṃ vyacyāvayad balabhidābhinat tān utsedhenaivodasṛjan niṣedhena paryagṛhṇāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3421: (PB 19.7.3) yad udbhidā yajeta balam evasmai vicyāvayati yad balabhidā balam evāsmai bhinatti
GV02pncvbr1u:3422: (PB 19.7.4) utsedhaniṣedhau brahmasāmanī bhavata utsedhenaivāsmai paśūn utsidhya niṣedhena parigṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3423: (PB 19.7.5) ''yajña indram avardhayad'' iti brahmaṇa ājyaṃ rūpeṇa samṛddham
GV02pncvbr1u:3424: (PB 19.7.6) saptisaptadaśau bhavato yat saptabhiḥ stuvanti sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3425: paśūn evāvarūndhe saptapadā śakvarī paśavaḥ śakvarī paśūn evāvarūndhe 'tha yat saptadaśabhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3427: (PB 19.7.7) gāyatrīṃ saṃpadyate tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ prāṇād eva gāyatryāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3429: (PB 19.8.2) tasya caturviṃśau pavamānau caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī tejasaivāsmai brahmavarcasenāpacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3430: (PB 19.8.3) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavata ubhābhyām evāsmai bṛhadrathantarābhyām apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3431: (PB 19.8.4) bhargayaśasī bhavato bhargeṇaivāsmai bhargo dadhāti yaśasā yaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3432: (PB 19.8.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś cobhayair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3433: (PB 19.8.6) tad āhur vilomāna stomā īśvarā yajamānaṃ vikṣetor vi hy atiyantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3434: (PB 19.8.7) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3435: (PB 19.9.1) athaiṣa sarvastomo 'pacitir apacitikāmo yajeta sarvair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3436: (PB 19.9.2) virājaṃ saṃpadyata eṣa vā apacito yo 'nnādo 'nnaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3437: (PB 19.9.3) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavato bhargayaśasī bhavata ubhaye stomāś chandomāś ca pṛṣṭhyāś cobhayair evāsmai stomair apacitiṃ vindati
GV02pncvbr1u:3438: (PB 19.9.4) tasya chandomāḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśavo vai chandomā annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny abhipūrvam evāsminn annādyaṃ paśūn dadhāti yac chandomavāṃs tena dvādaśāhayājinam
GV02pncvbr1u:3439: (PB 19.9.5) tad āhur nānālokāḥ stomāś chandomāś ca pṛṣṭhyāś ca yad ekasmin yajñakratau samavarudhyanta īśvaro [corr. Caland;
GV02pncvbr1u:3441: (PB 19.9.6) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhām eva tad abhyāyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3444: (PB 19.10.3) na vā apakṣaḥ pakṣiṇam āpnoty atha yad eṣa pakṣy apakṣiṇi nidhīyate tasmāt pakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaiḥ patanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3445: (PB 19.10.4) pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3446: (PB 19.10.5) trivṛtāv abhito bhavatas tejo brahmavarcasaṃ trivṛt teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3447: (PB 19.10.6) atha pañcadaśau vīryaṃ vai pañcadaśo vīryam evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3448: (PB 19.10.7) atha saptadaśau paśavo vai saptadaśaḥ paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3449: (PB 19.10.8) athaikaviṃśau pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3450: (PB 19.10.9) atha triṇavāv ime vai lokās triṇava eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3452: (PB 19.10.11) varṣma svānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3453: (PB 19.10.12) eṣa vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad etau trayastriṃśau madhyataḥ saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:3454: (PB 19.10.13) madhyato vā agnir variṣṭhas tasmād ete stomā madhyato variṣṭhāḥ kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3455: (PB 19.10.14) trivṛtā praiti trivṛtodeti prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇenaiva praiti prāṇam abhyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3457: (PB 19.11.2) tasya trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni caturviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3459: (PB 19.11.4) mukhaṃ gāyatry annaṃ vai saptadaśo mukhata eva tad annaṃ dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:3460: (PB 19.11.5) annam atty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3461: (PB 19.11.6) mādhyandinena vai pavamānena devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan yad eṣa caturviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3462: mādhyandinaḥ pavamāno bhavati svargasya lokasyākrāntyai caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī
GV02pncvbr1u:3463: tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatrī teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe prāṇo gāyatrī prajananaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3465: (PB 19.11.7) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3466: (PB 19.11.8) pakṣi vā etac chandaḥ pakṣī jyotiṣmān puṇyān lokān saṃcarati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3467: (PB 19.11.9) madhyato vā agnir variṣṭhas tasmād ete stomā madhyato variṣṭhāḥ kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3468: (PB 19.11.10) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyata ekākinam evainam annādyasyādhyakṣaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3469: (PB 19.11.11) jyotir vā eṣo 'gniṣṭomo jyotiṣmantaṃ puṇyaṃ lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ vidvān etena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:3471: (PB 19.12.2) ṛṣabho vā eṣa stomānām ṛṣabhatāṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3472: (PB 19.12.3) rājanyaṃ yājayed ṛṣabho vai paśūnām adhipatī rājanyo manuṣyāṇām
GV02pncvbr1u:3474: (PB 19.12.5) adhipatiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3475: (PB 19.12.6) tasya sadoviśīyaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne bhavati viśam evāsmai savanābhyāṃ parigṛhṇāty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3476: (PB 19.12.7) samantaṃ bhavati samantām evāsmai viśaṃ karoty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3477: (PB 19.12.8) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavata iyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ dyaur bṛhadevāsmāl lokād gāyatry evāmuṣmād ubhayor anayor lokayoḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3478: (PB 19.12.9) anuṣṭubhi bṛhad bhavaty anto vā anuṣṭup chandasām anto bṛhat sāmnām
GV02pncvbr1u:3479: anto rājanyo manuṣyāṇām anta eva tad antaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmād yo rājanyānāṃ hīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3481: (PB 19.13.1) yo vai vājapeyaḥ sa rājasūyo yo rājasūyaḥ sa varūṇasavo 'thaiṣa gosavaḥ svārājyo vā eṣa yajñaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3485: (PB 19.13.5) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavatas tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3486: (PB 19.13.6) ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3487: (PB 19.13.7) pratiduhābhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3488: (PB 19.13.8) bṛhataḥ stotra pratyabhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3491: (PB 19.14.1) athaiṣa marutstoma etena vai maruto 'parimitāṃ puṣṭim apuṣyann aparimitāṃ puṣṭiṃ puṣyati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3492: (PB 19.14.2) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomās tena marutstomo gaṇaśo hi marutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3494: (PB 19.14.4) yat trīṇi trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3499: (PB 19.15.1) athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ kulāyaḥ prajākāmo vā paśukāmo vā yajeta prajā vai kulāyaṃ paśavaḥ kulāyaṃ gṛhāḥ kulāyaṃ kulāyam eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3501: (PB 19.15.3) yat ṣaṭ trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhato
GV02pncvbr1u:3502: yat dve pañcadaśe nānā vīrye yat dve saptadaśe nānā paśuṣu yat dve ekaviṃśe nānā
GV02pncvbr1u:3505: (PB 19.16.2) etena vā indro 'ty anyā devatā abhavad aty anyāḥ prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3507: (PB 19.16.4) sarvaḥ pañcadaśo bhavaty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa ojasaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3509: (PB 19.16.6) ukthyo bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni viśam evāsmai paśūn anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3510: (PB 19.16.7) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśāni bhavanty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśo 'bhipūrvam evāsminn ojo vīryaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3511: (PB 19.17.1) athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ stoma etena vā indrāgnī aty anyā devatā abhavatām aty anyāḥ prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3513: (PB 19.17.3) brahma vai trivṛt kṣatraṃ pañcadaśo brahmaṇa iva cāsya kṣatrasyeva ca prakāśo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3516: (PB 19.17.6) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ gāyatryā brāhmaṇo 'varundhe viśaṃ rājā jagatyā praviśati
GV02pncvbr1u:3518: (PB 19.17.8) bṛhaspatir akāmayata devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchad gacchati purodhāṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3520: (PB 19.18.2) indro 'kāmayata pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vihanyām iti sa etaṃ vighanam apaśyat tena pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vyahan vi pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3521: (PB 19.18.3) yat trivṛd bhavati prāṇāṃs tenāvarundhe yat dvādaśaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ tena
GV02pncvbr1u:3522: yat pañcadaśo vīryaṃ tena yat saptadaśo 'nnādyaṃ tena yad ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhā tena
GV02pncvbr1u:3523: yan navadaśaḥ prajananaṃ tena yac caturviṃśo brahmavarcasaṃ tena yat triṇavo vajraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3525: (PB 19.18.4) paśukāmo yajeta bṛhatīṃ saṃpadyate paśavo vai bṛhatī paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3526: (PB 19.18.5) ṣaḍ etā bṛhatyo bhavanti ṣaḍ ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tān evāptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3527: (PB 19.19.1) indram adevyo māyā ayacanta sa prajāpatim upādhāvavat tasmā etaṃ vighanaṃ prāyacchat tena sarvā mṛdho vyahata yad vyahata tad vighanasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3528: (PB 19.19.2) sarvā mṛdho vihate ya evaṃ vidvān vighanena yajate yam evaṃ vidvān vighanena yājayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3529: (PB 19.19.3) paśukāmo yajeta paśavo vai bṛhatī paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3530: (PB 20.1.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3531: saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthyaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3532: (PB 20.1.2) jyotiṣṭomenātirātreṇarddhikāmo yajetābhikramo vā eṣa stomānām abhikrāntyā abhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3533: (PB 20.1.3) eṣo 'gniṣṭoma eṣa ukthya eṣo 'tirātro 'gniṣṭomena vai devā imaṃ lokam abhyajayann ukthyair antarikṣaṃ rātryāmuṃ lokam ajayann ahorātrābhyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3534: (PB 20.1.4) parācyo vā anyā vyucchanti pratīcyo 'nyā eṣā vāva pratīcī vyucchati yāśvinena vyucchati pratīcīr evāsmā uṣaso vivāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3535: (PB 20.1.5) dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete eṣā vai stanavatī virāṭ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etāṃ dugdhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3536: (PB 20.1.6) trivṛtā praiti trivṛtodeti prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇenaiva praiti prāṇam abhyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3537: (PB 20.2.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna
GV02pncvbr1u:3538: ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3539: triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3540: (PB 20.2.2) sarvastomenātirātreṇa bubhūṣan yajeta sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3541: (PB 20.2.3) yat trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati tat trivṛtaṃ stomam āpnoti gāyatrīṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3542: chando yat pañcadaśāny ājyāni tat pañcadaśaṃ stomam āpnoti triṣṭubhaṃ chando yat
GV02pncvbr1u:3543: saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānas tat saptadaśaṃ stomam āpnoti jagatīṃ chando yad
GV02pncvbr1u:3544: ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭāni tad ekaviṃśaṃ stomam āpnoty anuṣṭubhaṃ chando yat triṇava ārbhavas
GV02pncvbr1u:3545: tat triṇavaṃ stomam āpnoti paṅktiṃ chando yat trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomas tat trayastriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3546: stomam āpnoti virājaṃ chando yad uṣṇikkakubhau kriyete tad uṣṇikkakubhāv āpnoti yad
GV02pncvbr1u:3547: āśvinaṃ śasyate tat sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3548: (PB 20.2.4) prāñcaṃ vai trayastriṃśo yajñaṃ prabhujati tam adhvaryur ekādaśinyā purastāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3549: pratyudyacchaty ekādaśa raśanā ekādaśa paśava ekādaśa yūpā bhavanti tat trayastriṃśe
GV02pncvbr1u:3551: (PB 20.2.5) tayā samudyatayā rātryā yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam abhyaśnute yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam abhyaśnute ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3552: (PB 20.3.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna
GV02pncvbr1u:3553: ekaviṃśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ chandomā itarāṇi triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3554: pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3555: ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhis trivṛt prathamam atiriktastotram atha pañcadaśam
GV02pncvbr1u:3557: (PB 20.3.2) prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān agniṣṭomena nāpnot
GV02pncvbr1u:3558: tān ukthair nāpnot tān ṣoḍaśinā nāpnot tān rātryā nāpnot tān sandhinā nāpnot tān
GV02pncvbr1u:3559: āśvinena nāpnot tān agnim abravīd imān ma īpseti tān agnis trivṛtā stomena jarābodhīyena
GV02pncvbr1u:3560: sāmnā nāpnot tān indram abravīd imān ma īpseti tān indraḥ pañcadaśena stomena sattrāsāhīyena
GV02pncvbr1u:3561: sāmnā nāpnot tān viśvān devān abravīd imān ma ipsateti tān viśve devāḥ saptadaśena
GV02pncvbr1u:3562: stomena mārgīṃyaveṇa sāmnā nāpnuvaṃs tān viṣṇum abravīd imān ma īpseti tān viṣṇur
GV02pncvbr1u:3563: ekaviṃśena stomenāpnod vāravantīyenāvārayatedaṃ viṣṇur vicakrama iti vyakramata
GV02pncvbr1u:3564: (PB 20.3.3) yasmāt pra preva paśavo bhraṃśeran sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3565: (PB 20.3.4) etena vai devā jaitvāni jitvā yaṃ yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta taṃ tam āpnuvan yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3567: (PB 20.4.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ navasaptadaśāni stotrāṇy ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3568: (PB 20.4.2) navasaptadaśenātirātreṇa prajākāmo yajeta nava vai prāṇāḥ prajāpatiḥ saptadaśaḥ prāṇebhya eva tad adhi prajāpateḥ prajāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3569: (PB 20.4.3) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati puruṣo vai kakup garbho vā eṣa madhyato dhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3571: (PB 20.4.5) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā na prājāyanta sa etat sāmāpaśyat tā aśvo bhūtvābhyajighrat tāḥ prājāyanta prajananaṃ vā etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:3572: (PB 20.4.6) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3573: (PB 20.4.7) dvipadāṃ kakubho loke karoti garbham eva taddhitaṃ madhyataḥ prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3574: (PB 20.4.8) atirātro bhavaty ahorātre vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante 'horātre evānu prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3575: (PB 20.5.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3576: saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśāny ukthāni pañcadaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:3578: (PB 20.5.2) viṣuvatātirātreṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ jyaiṣṭhineyaṃ yājayed viṣuvān vā eṣa stomānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3579: viṣuvān eva bhavati yad eka ekaviṃśo bhavaty ekaviṃśo vā ito 'sāv āditya dvādaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:3581: (PB 20.5.3) asāv āditya ekaviṃśa ādityasyaivainaṃ mātrāṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3582: (PB 20.5.4) eṣa vā udeti na vā enam anyat jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ pratyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3583: (PB 20.5.5) nainam anyaḥ sveṣu pratyudeti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3584: (PB 20.6.1) pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛnty ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam
GV02pncvbr1u:3585: ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir goṣṭomenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:3586: bhrātṛvyavān yajeta gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudanta rātryānapajayyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3587: ajayann ebhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudya rātryānapajayyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3588: (PB 20.7.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam
GV02pncvbr1u:3589: ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir āyuṣṭomenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:3590: svargakāmo yajetordhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrābhyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3592: (PB 20.8.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3593: pañcadaśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ saptadaśam acchāvākasyaikaviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3594: saptadaśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭham ekaviṃśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya triṇavaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsina ekaviṃśam
GV02pncvbr1u:3595: acchāvakasya triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3596: prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir abhijitātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:3597: bhrātṛvyavān yajetābhijitā vai devā asurān imān lokān abhyajayat rātryānapajayyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3598: ajayann abhijitaiva bhrātṛvyam imān lokān abhijitya rātryānapajayyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3599: (PB 20.9.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasyaikaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3600: brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ pañcadaśam acchāvākasya saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3602: (PB 20.9.1) saptadaśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsina ekaviṃśam acchāvākasya triṇava ārbhavas
GV02pncvbr1u:3603: trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike
GV02pncvbr1u:3604: pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhir viśvajitātirātreṇa paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3605: (PB 20.9.2) reto hi nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ paśavo vālakhilyā yan nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ pūrvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3606: śasyata uttarā vālakhilyā retasas tat paśavaḥ prajāyante rūpāṇi vikaroti yad vārṣākapam
GV02pncvbr1u:3608: (PB 20.10.1) trivṛt ātirātreṇa brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta tejo vai trivṛt brahmavarcasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3609: teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe tejasi brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhati pañcadaśenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:3610: vīryakāmo yajetaujo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa oja eva vīryam avarundha ojasi vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3611: saptadaśenātirācreṇānnādyakāmo yajetānnaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam evāvarundha ekaviṃśenātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:3612: pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrayor eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3614: (PB 20.11.2) tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3615: pavamāna ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy
GV02pncvbr1u:3616: ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:3618: (PB 20.11.3) aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ haviṣmāṃś ca haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv
GV02pncvbr1u:3619: ahīyetā tāv āgacchetāṃ yato 'ṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tāv atapyetāṃ tāv ete sāmanī
GV02pncvbr1u:3620: apaśyatāṃ tābhyāṃ dvirātram atanvātāṃ tena svargaṃ lokam aitām
GV02pncvbr1u:3621: (PB 20.11.4) yaḥ pauṇyo hīna iva syāt sa etena yajetāpnoti pūrveṣāṃ prahām āpnutāṃ hi tāv aṅgirasaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3622: (PB 20.11.5) prajākāmo yajeta dvitīyaṃ hy etad yat prajāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3623: (PB 20.11.6) svargakāmo yajeta dvitīyād dhi lokāt paro loko 'bhiprakramyo durādho dvirātra ity āhur yad agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty ukthyam antaryanti yady ukthyo 'gniṣṭomam
GV02pncvbr1u:3624: (PB 20.11.7) yaj jyotir ukthyaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavati nāgniṣṭomam antaryanti nokthāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3625: (PB 20.11.8) tad āhur eṣā vāva yajñasya mātrā yad agniṣṭomo yad agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3626: ahar bhavati yajñasya mātrāṃ nātikrāmaty athottarasyāhna ukthebhyo 'dhi rātrim upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3628: (PB 20.11.9) caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavaty uttarasyāhnaś caturviṃśaty akṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3629: (PB 20.11.10) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3630: (PB 20.11.11) sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3631: (PB 20.12.1) atha yasya jyotir ukthyaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty āyur atirātra uttaram
GV02pncvbr1u:3632: (PB 20.12.2) tisraḥ pūrvasyāhno virājam atiricyante dvābhyām uttaram ahar virāja ūnam ūnātiriktaṃ vā anuprajāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3633: (PB 20.12.3) pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3634: (PB 20.12.4) ekā saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyate ekākinam evainam annādyasyādhyakṣaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3635: (PB 20.12.5) etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayaṃs tam ekākinam annādyasyādhyakṣam akurvaṃs tasmāc caitrarathīnām ekaḥ kṣatrapatir jāyate 'nulamba iva dvitīyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3636: (PB 20.13.1) atha yasya trivṛt pañcadaśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty āyur atirātra uttaram
GV02pncvbr1u:3637: (PB 20.13.2) mithunābhyāṃ stomābhyām uttaram ahaḥ prajanayanti tat prajātaṃ śva ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:3638: cakre vā ete sākaṃvṛtī yat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenābhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3639: yatra yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3640: (PB 20.13.3) atha yad āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:3641: (PB 20.13.4) etena vai kapivano bhauvāyana iṣṭvārūkṣatām agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3642: (PB 20.13.5) arūkṣo bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān etena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:3643: (PB 20.14.1) trivṛt prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3644: pañcadaśaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3645: soktham ekaviṃśaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśa ārbhavaś
GV02pncvbr1u:3646: catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni ṣoḍaśaṃ prathamaṃ rātriṣāma
GV02pncvbr1u:3648: (PB 20.14.2) prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt tasya vāg eva svam āsīd vāg dvitīyā sa aikṣatemām
GV02pncvbr1u:3649: eva vācaṃ visṛjā iyaṃ vā idaṃ sarvaṃ vibhavanty eṣyatīti sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sedaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3650: sarvaṃ vibhavanty ait sordhvodātanod yathāpāṃ dhārā santataivaṃ tasyā eti tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3651: acchinat tad bhūmir abhavad abhūd iva vā idam iti tad bhūmer bhūmitvaṃ keti tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3652: acchinat tad antarikṣam abhavad antar eva vā idam iti tad antarikṣasyāntarikṣatvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3653: ho iti tṛtīyam ūrdhvam udāsyat tat dyaur abhavad adyutad iva vā iti tad divo divatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3654: (PB 20.14.3) eṣā vāva pratyakṣaṃ vāg yaj jihvāgreṇaitad vāco vadati yad eti madhyenaitad vāco vadati yat keti sarvayaitad vāco raso 'dhyūrdhva udvad ati yaddho iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3655: (PB 20.14.4) yad etāni rūpāṇy anvahaṃ vyajyante mukhata eva tad vācaṃ visṛjante mukhato yajñiyaṃ karma
GV02pncvbr1u:3656: (PB 20.14.5) prajāpatir vā idam ekākṣarāṃ vācaṃ satīṃ tredhā vyakarot ta ime lokā
GV02pncvbr1u:3657: abhavan rūkṣā anupajīvanāḥ sa aikṣata katham ime lokā loma gṛhṇīyuḥ katham upajīvanīyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3658: syur iti sa etaṃ trirātram apaśyat tam āharat tenemān lokān anvātanot tato vā ime
GV02pncvbr1u:3659: lokā lomāgṛhṇaṃs tata upajīvanīyā abhavaṃs trirātrasya vā idaṃ puṣṭaṃ trirātrasyodaraṇaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3661: (PB 20.14.6) gacchati paśūnāṃ bhūmānaṃ dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3662: (PB 20.14.7) prajāpatir yad vācaṃ vyasṛjata sākṣarad eveti prathamaṃ kṣeti dvitīyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3663: reti tṛtīyaṃ yena yena vai rūpeṇa prajāpatir vācaṃ vyasṛjata tena tena rūpeṇājyāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3665: (PB 20.13.8) tad āhur brahmavādino 'kṣarestho vai trirātra ity ekākṣarā vai vāk tryakṣaram akṣaraṃ tryakṣaraḥ puruṣaḥ sa vā enaṃ vedety āhur ya enaṃ puruṣasammitaṃ vedeti
GV02pncvbr1u:3666: (PB 20.15.1) etena vai devā eṣu lokeṣv ārdhnuvann etena svargaṃ lokamāyan
GV02pncvbr1u:3667: (PB 20.15.2) vāg vai trirātro vāco rūpeṇājyāni cāhāni ca vibhajyanta ekākṣarā vai
GV02pncvbr1u:3668: vāk tryakṣaram akṣaram akṣarasya rūpeṇa vibhajyante trayo gandharvās teṣām eṣā bhaktir
GV02pncvbr1u:3669: agneḥ pṛthivī vāyor antarikṣam asāv ādityasya dyaus trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante
GV02pncvbr1u:3670: (PB 20.15.3) agnir uṣasaṃ sacate vāyur uṣasaṃ sacate 'sāv āditya uṣasaṃ sacate
GV02pncvbr1u:3672: (PB 20.15.5) mithunaṃ dve sambhavato mithunād yat prajāyate tat tṛtīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3673: (PB 20.15.6) indro vṛtrāya vajram udayacchat so 'bravīn mā me praharṣīr asti vā idaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3674: mayi vīryaṃ tat te pradāsyāmīti tad asmai prāyacchat tad viṣṇuḥ pratyagṛhṇāt sa dvitīyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3675: sa tṛtīyam udayacchat sa evābravīn mā me prahārṣīr asti vā idaṃ mayi vīryaṃ tat te
GV02pncvbr1u:3676: pradāsyāmīti tad asmai prāyacchat tad viṣṇuḥ pratyagṛhṇād etad vāca tad abhyanūcyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3677: (PB 20.15.7) ubhau jigyathur na parājayethe na parājigye kataraś ca nainoḥ indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vitad (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:3679: (PB 20.15.8) etad vā ābhyāṃ tat sahasraṃ prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3680: (PB 20.15.9) tasyaiṣā bhaktir ya ārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai prathame 'hani deyaṃ yathā vā iyaṃ evaṃ sa pratiṣṭhiteyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ saḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3681: (PB 20.15.10) yo 'nārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai dvitīye 'hani deyaṃ yathā vā antarikṣam evaṃ so 'ntarikṣam ity antarikṣaṃ vidur vedaṃ tasya viduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3682: (PB 20.15.11) ya ārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai tṛtīye 'hani deyaṃ yathā vai dyaur evaṃ sa dyaur iti divaṃ vidur bandhu tasya viduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3683: (PB 20.15.12) śatāny anvahaṃ dīyante eṣā vāva yajñasya mātrā yac chataṃ saiva sāvicchinnā dīyate daśato 'nvahaṃ dīyante daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājo yajñaḥ saiva sā vicchinnā dīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3684: (PB 20.15.13) trayastriṃśac ca trīṇi ca śatāni prathame 'hani deyās tathā dvitīye tathā tṛtīye
GV02pncvbr1u:3685: (PB 20.15.14) athaiṣā dvidevatyā trirūpā brahmaṇo dve tṛtīye tṛtīyam agnīdhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3686: (PB 20.15.15) kāmyāsi priyāsi havyāsīḍe rante sarasvati mahi viśruta etāni te 'ghnye nāmāni deveṣu naḥ sukṛto brūtāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3687: (PB 20.16.1) idaṃ vāva prathamenāhnā vyakarod yad idam asyām adhyāyat ta mūlam idaṃ dvitīyena yad idaṃ prāṇād ejaty adas tṛtīyena yad varṣati yan nakṣatrāṇi yad amuṃ lokaṃ bheje
GV02pncvbr1u:3688: (PB 20.16.2) tad āhur brahmavādino mahāvrataṃ vā etad yad eṣa trirātra iti tasyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3689: tad eva mukhaṃ yad eteṣām ahvāṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ ye abhito 'hanī tau pakṣau yan madhyamam
GV02pncvbr1u:3691: (PB 20.16.3) yad evāsāv udeti tan mukhaṃ ye abhito 'hanī tau pakṣau yan madhyamam ahaḥ sa ātmāgniḥ puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:3692: (PB 20.16.4) yad evāsāv udeti tan mukhaṃ ye abhito 'hanī tau pakṣau yan madhyamam ahaḥ sa ātmā yad astam eti tat puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:3693: (PB 20.16.5) etāvān vāva trirātro gāyatraḥ prāṇas traiṣṭubhaṃ cakṣur jāgataṃ śrotraṃ sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3694: (PB 20.16.6) tad āhur brahmavādinaḥ kiyāṃs trirātra itīyān iti brūyād iyaddhayetad
GV02pncvbr1u:3695: abhy atho iyān iti brūyād iyaddhayevaitad abhiparā3ṅ arvā3ṅ ity āhuḥ parāṅ iti brūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3696: parāṅ hi vadati parāṅ paśyati parāṅ prāṇity ekā3 dvā3 u trayā3 ity āhur eka iti brūyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3697: samāno hy eṣa yat prāṇo 'pāno vyānas tad yathā vā ado maṇau sūtram otam evam eṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:3698: lokeṣu trirātra otaḥ śobhate 'sya mukhaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3699: (PB 20.16.7) yad vai trirātrasya saloma tad asya viloma yad asya viloma tad asya
GV02pncvbr1u:3700: saloma tad yad etat paraṃ sad ahar avaraṃ kriyate yajamānāyaiva tat paśūn parigṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3701: prajananāya na hy amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3702: (PB 20.16.8) ete vāva chandasāṃ vīryavattame yad gāyatrī ca triṣṭup ca yad ete abhito
GV02pncvbr1u:3703: bhavato madhye jagatī vīryavatībhyām eva tac chandobhyāṃ paśūn parigṛhṇāti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3704: na hy amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3705: (PB 20.16.9) asau vāva trirātro yathodety evaṃ prathamam ahar yathā madhyandina evaṃ dvitīyaṃ yathāstam ety evaṃ tṛtīyaṃ gacchaty amuṣyasāyujyaṃ gacchati sāveśyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3706: (PB 21.1.1) indro marutaḥ sahasram ajināt svāṃ viśaṃ somāya rājñe procya tasmād rājñe
GV02pncvbr1u:3707: procya viṃśa jinanti tau yamo 'śṛṇon maruto ha sahasram ajyāśiṣṭām iti sa āgacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3708: so 'bravīd upa māsmin sahasre hvayethām iti tam upāhvayetāṃ sa yamo 'paśyad ekāṅgāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3709: sahasre 'pi sahasrasya payo bibhratīṃ so 'bravīd iyam eva mamāstu sahasraṃ yuvāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3710: vikalpayethām iti tāv abrūtāṃ yathā vāva tvam etāṃ paśyasy evam āvam etāṃ paśyāva iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3711: (PB 21.1.2) tayā vā idaṃ sahasraṃ vikalpayāmahā ity abruvaṃs tām udake prāveśayaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:3712: te 'bravan na śānāharāmahai yasmai na iyaṃ prathamāyādeṣyati iti te 'ṃśān āharanta
GV02pncvbr1u:3714: (PB 21.1.3) te 'bruvan somāya rājña udehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3715: payasa iti sā babhruḥ piṅgākṣy ekavarṣodait tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3716: payasaḥ sā yā somakrayaṇī saiva sā
GV02pncvbr1u:3717: (PB 21.1.4) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ somaḥ krīto bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān somaṃ krīṇāti yasmā evaṃ viduṣe somaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3718: (PB 21.1.5) te 'bruvann indrāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa
GV02pncvbr1u:3719: iti sā śabalī paṣṭhauhy udait tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā
GV02pncvbr1u:3721: (PB 21.1.6) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa indriyaiṣyā dattā bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti yasmā evaṃ viduṣa indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3722: (PB 21.1.7) te 'bruvan yamāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa
GV02pncvbr1u:3723: iti sā jaratī kuṣṭhāśṛṅgyad aid dhūmrā vā dityauhīrmato hrasīyasī tṛtīyena cātmanaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3724: tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā yānustaraṇī saiva sā
GV02pncvbr1u:3725: (PB 21.1.8) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payaso 'nustaraṇī
GV02pncvbr1u:3726: kṛtā bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān anustaraṇīṃ karoti yasmā evaṃ viduṣe 'nustaraṇīṃ kurvanti nācakṛvān manyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3727: (PB 21.1.9) tad āhur brahmavādino na vā amuṣmin loke sahasrayāḍ aloko 'stīti tad
GV02pncvbr1u:3728: yāvad itaḥ sahasrasya gaur gavi pratiṣṭhitā tāvad asmāl lokād asau lokaḥ sarasrayājī
GV02pncvbr1u:3729: vā imān lokān vyāpnoty atho yāvat sahasraṃ yojanāny atho sahasram āśvīnān yatho yāvat
GV02pncvbr1u:3730: sahasram ahnayāni tad gavā gavā spṛṇoti samākramaṇāya vā etā dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3731: (PB 21.1.10) sahasraṃ yad asṛjata tasya tārpyaṃ yonir āsīd yat tārpyaṃ pratyasya nayati sayonitvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3732: (PB 21.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ parācya āyan natsyati na iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3733: bibhyatyaḥ so 'bravīd upa mā vartadhvaṃ tathā vai vo 'tsyāmi yathādyamānā bhūyasyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3734: prajaniṣyatha iti tābhyo vainaṃ ṛtaṃ brūhīty abruvaṃs tābhya ṛtanidhanenartam abravīd
GV02pncvbr1u:3735: īnidhanenāvayat triṇidhanena prājanayad etair ha vā idaṃ sāmabhir mṛtyuḥ prajā atti ca prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3736: (PB 21.2.2) adyamānasya bhūyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3738: (PB 21.2.4) gacchati jyaiṣṭhayaṃ śraiṣṭhayaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3739: (PB 21.2.5) etair vai sāmabhiḥ prajāpatir imān lokān sarvān kāmān dugdhe yad ācyā dugdhe tad ācyā dohānām ācyā dohatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3740: (PB 21.2.6) sarvān imān lokān kāmān dugdhe ya evaṃ vidvān etais sāmabhiḥ stute
GV02pncvbr1u:3741: (PB 21.2.7) ime vai lokā etāni sāmāny ayam evartanidhanam antarikṣam īnidhanaṃ dyaus triṇidhanam
GV02pncvbr1u:3742: (PB 21.2.8) yathā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrāṇy anusañcaraty evam imān lokān anusañcarati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3743: (PB 21.2.9) agner vā etāni vaiśvānarasya sāmāni yatra vā etair aśāntaiḥ stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3744: tat prajā devo ghātuko bhavaty agnim upanidhāya stuvate svāyā eva tad devatāyāḥ sāmyekṣāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3746: (PB 21.3.1) vāg vai śabalī tasyās trirātro vatsas trirātro vā etāṃ pradāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3747: (PB 21.3.2) tad ya evaṃ veda tasmā eṣā prattā dugdhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3749: (PB 21.3.4) barāsīṃ paridhāya taptaṃ piban dvādaśa rātrīr adhaḥ śayīta
GV02pncvbr1u:3750: (PB 21.3.5) yā dvādaśī syāt tasyā upavyuṣaṃ śabalīhomaṃ hutvā purā vāgbhyaḥ sampravaditor
GV02pncvbr1u:3751: yatra grāmyasya paśor nāśṛṇuyāt tad araṇyaṃ paretya darbhastambam ālabhya śabali
GV02pncvbr1u:3752: śabalīti trir āhvayed yad anyac chunaś ca gardabhāc ca prativāśyate sā samṛddhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3753: (PB 21.3.6) yadi na prativāśyeta saṃvatsare punar āhvayeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3754: (PB 21.3.7) śabali samudro 'si viśvavyacā brahma devānāṃ prathamajā ṛtasyānnam asi
GV02pncvbr1u:3755: śukram asi tejo 'sy amṛtam asi tāṃ tvā vidma śabali dīdyānāṃ tasyāste pṛthivī pādo
GV02pncvbr1u:3756: 'ntarikṣaṃ pādo dyauḥ pādaḥ samudraḥ pāda eṣāsi śabali tāṃ tvā vidma sā na iṣam ūrjaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3757: dhukṣva vasordhārāṃ śabali prajānāṃ śaciṣṭhā vratam anugeṣaṃ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3759: (PB 21.4.2) prajāpater vā akṣy aśvat tat parāpatat tad aśvo 'bhavat tad aśvasyāśvatvaṃ tad devā aśvamedhena pratyadadhur eṣa vāva prajāpatiṃ sarvaṃ karoti yo 'śvamedhena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:3760: (PB 21.4.3) eṣa vāva saśarīraḥ sambhavaty amuṣmai lokāyayo 'śvamedhī
GV02pncvbr1u:3761: (PB 21.4.4) saraghā vā aśvasya sakthy āvṛhat tad devāś catuṣṭomena pratyadadhur yac catuṣṭomo bhavaty aśvasya sarvatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3762: (PB 21.4.5) yat tisro 'nuṣṭubhaś catasro gāyatrīḥ karoti tasmāt tribhis tiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhati sarvān palāyamānaḥ pratidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3763: (PB 21.4.6) anto vā aśvaḥ paśūnām anto 'nuṣṭup chandasām anto viṣṇur devatānām antaś
GV02pncvbr1u:3764: catuṣṭomas stomānām antas trirātro yajñānāṃ yad vaiplavyo 'nuṣṭubhaḥ pratipado bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3765: catuṣṭoma stomas trirātro yajño 'nta eva tadantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3766: (PB 21.4.7) ekaviṃśam ahar bhavati yasminn aśva ālabhyata ekaviṃśo vā ito 'sāv ādityo dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśa ādityasyaivainaṃ mātrāṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3768: (PB 21.4.9) anyad-anyad vā etāś chando 'nyonya ete paśava ālabhyanta etā vā etaṃ samāpnuvanti yan mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanty aśvasya sarvatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3770: (PB 21.4.11) īśvaro vā eṣo 'yato 'dhṛtaḥ parāṃ parāvatam eto raśminā vā aśvo dhṛto yat pārthuraśmaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty aśvasyaiva yatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3771: (PB 21.4.12) sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3772: (PB 21.4.13) ekayūpo vaikādaśinī vānyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavaty ekaviṃśiny aśvamedhasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3773: khādiro vā bailvo vā pārṇo vā 'nyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavati naicudāra ekaviṃśatyaratnir
GV02pncvbr1u:3774: aśvamedhasya nānyeṣāṃ paśūnāṃ tejanyā avadyanty avadyanty aśvamedhasya dakṣiṇato
GV02pncvbr1u:3775: 'nyeṣāṃ paśūnām avadyanty uttarato 'śvamedhasya plakṣaśākhāsv anyeṣāṃ paśūnām avadyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3776: vetasaśākhāsv aśvamedhasya yūpe grāmyān paśūn niyuñjanty ārokeṣv āraṇyān dhārayanty
GV02pncvbr1u:3777: ā grāmyān paśūn labhante prāraṇyān sṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3779: (PB 21.5.2) yo rājya āśaṃseta sa etena yajeta
