GV02pncvbr1u:3780: (PB 21.5.3) rājā vā eṣa stomānāṃ rājyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3781: (PB 21.5.4) yadākṣārāṇi prathamam ahar bhajanta ekākṣarā vai vāg vāco 'nativādāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3782: (PB 21.5.5) atha yat dvyakṣaraṇidhanam ājyadohaṃ bhavaty uttarayor ahor abhisantatyā anvaham ājyadohāni bhavanty anvaham evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3783: (PB 21.5.6) sarve ṣoḍaśimanto bhavantīndriyaṃ vīryaṃ ṣoḍaśīndriyeṇaivainān vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3784: (PB 21.6.1) caturviṃśāḥ pavamānās trivṛnty ājyāni pañcadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3785: 'gniṣṭomaś catuścatvāriṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāny ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3786: 'gniṣṭomaḥ soktho 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśāḥ pavamānā ekaviṃśāny ājyāni triṇavāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3787: 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiś chandomapavamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3789: (PB 21.6.3) paśavo vai chandomā yac chandomāḥ pavamānā bhavanti paśūnevāvarūndhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3790: (PB 21.6.4) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tat mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3791: (PB 21.7.1) trivṛt prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3792: caturviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ catuścatvāriṃśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3793: soktham ekaviṃśaṃ prātassavanan triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3794: soktham ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir antarvasuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3796: (PB 21.7.3) astīva vā ayaṃ loko 'stīvāsau chidram ivāntarikṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:3797: (PB 21.7.4) astīva trirātrasya prathamam ahar astīvottamaṃ chidram iva madhyataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3798: (PB 21.7.5) paśavo vai chandomā yac chandomā madhyato bhavanty apihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3799: (PB 21.8.1) trivṛt prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3800: ekaviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3801: sokthaṃ caturviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ catuścatvāriṃśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3802: tṛtīyasavanaṃ soktham ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ parākaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3803: (PB 21.8.2) parākeṇa vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokamāyan svargakāmo yajeta parāṅ evaitena svargaṃ lokam ākramate
GV02pncvbr1u:3804: (PB 21.8.3) yad vā etasyākaṃ tad asya parāk tat parākasya parākatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:3806: (PB 21.8.5) nāsmā akaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3807: (PB 21.8.6) prajāyās tv akḷptaḥ parāṅ hy evaitena svargaṃ lokam ākramate tad yad ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī bhavati pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhis tenāsmin loke pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3808: (PB 21.9.1) caturviṃśāḥ pavamānās trivṛnty ājyāni pañcadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3809: 'gniṣṭomaś caturviṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāny ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3810: 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaś caturviṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ saptadaśāny ājyāny ekaviṃśani pṛṣṭhāni triṇavo
GV02pncvbr1u:3811: 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaś caturviṃśāḥ pavamānā ekaviṃśāny ājyāni triṇavāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3812: 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhi
GV02pncvbr1u:3813: (PB 21.9.2) atrir akāmayata catvāro me vīrā ājāyerann iti sa etam apaśyat tasya catvāro vīrā ājāyantāsya catvāro vīrā jāyante ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3814: (PB 21.9.3) ekaṃ stomam utsṛjyaikam abhyārabhate vīrajananaṃ vai stomo vīram evāsmai tat prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3815: (PB 21.9.4) caturviṃśāḥ pavamānā bhavanti caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3816: (PB 21.9.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3817: (PB 21.9.6) agniṣṭomaḥ prathamam ahar ūktho dvitīyaṃ ṣoḍaśī tṛtīyam atirātraś caturthaṃ nānāvīryatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3819: (PB 21.9.8) gāyatraṃ vai prathamam ahas traiṣṭubhaṃ dvitīyaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyam ānuṣṭubhaṃ caturtham
GV02pncvbr1u:3820: (PB 21.9.9) tad āhur yat tṛtīye 'hani ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyus tṛtīyenāhnānuṣṭubham āpnuyur acchandaś caturtham ahaḥ syād ānuṣṭubho vai ṣoḍaśīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3821: (PB 21.9.10) caturthe 'hani ṣoḍaśī grahītavyaḥ sva āyatane ṣoḍaśī gṛhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3823: (PB 21.9.12) naudhasaṃ prathamasyāhno brahmasāma śyaitaṃ dvitīyasya śrāyantīyaṃ tṛtīyasya traiśokaṃ caturthasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3824: (PB 21.9.13) tad āhur apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yat jyāyasaḥ chandaso 'dhi kanīyaś chanda upaitīti
GV02pncvbr1u:3826: (PB 21.9.15) kāleyaṃ prathamasyāho 'cchāvākasāma mādhucchandasaṃ dvitīyasya rauravaṃ tṛtīyasya samantaṃ caturthasya nānāvīryatāyai nānāvīryāṇy ahāni karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3827: (PB 21.9.16) ''abhitvā vṛṣabhā suta'' iti tṛtīyasyāhno rathantaraṃ ''kastam indra
GV02pncvbr1u:3828: tvā vasava'' iti vāmadevyaṃ ''yajñā yathā apūrva'' iti caturthasyāhno bṛhat ''ed
GV02pncvbr1u:3829: u madhor madintaram'' iti vāmadevyaṃ chandasāṃ nānāvīryatāyai nānāvīryāṇy ahāni kāroti
GV02pncvbr1u:3831: (PB 21.10.2) athottarasyāhnoś caturviṃśaṃ vahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāni trīṇy ājyāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3832: saptadaśam acchāvākasyaikaviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśe dve pṛṣṭhe ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3834: (PB 21.10.3) tṛtīyasyāhna ekaviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trīṇi cājyāni pañcadaśam acchāvākasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3835: caturviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇavaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dve cokthe
GV02pncvbr1u:3837: (PB 21.10.4) caturthasyāhnaś caturviśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3838: trīṇy ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3840: (PB 21.10.5) jamadagniḥ puṣṭikāma etam āharat sa imān poṣān apuṣyat
GV02pncvbr1u:3841: (PB 21.10.6) yad idam āhur navā ūrvau palitau sañjānāte iti
GV02pncvbr1u:3844: (PB 21.10.9) jagatī vai chandasāṃ paramaṃ poṣaṃ puṣṭā paramam evaite poṣaṃ puṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3845: (PB 21.10.10) puroḍāśinya upasado bhavanti paśavo vai puroḍāśāḥ paśuṣveva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3846: (PB 21.10.11) agne ver hotra ver adhvaram āpitaraṃ vaiśvānaram avase 'kar indrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3847: (PB 21.10.12) devāv aśvinau madhukaśayādyemaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānāya mimikṣatam indrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3848: (PB 21.10.13) deva viṣṇa urv adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyādhi vikramasvendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3849: (PB 21.10.14) deva soma retodhā adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3850: (PB 21.10.15) deva savitaḥ susāvitram adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāsuvasvendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3851: (PB 21.10.16) deva dhātaḥ sudhātādyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3852: (PB 21.10.17) devā grāvāṇo madhumatīm adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāya vācaṃ vadatendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3853: (PB 21.10.18) devy anumate 'nvadyemaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānāya manyasvendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3854: (PB 21.10.19) devy adite svādityām adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyāsuvasvendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3855: (PB 21.10.20) devya āpo nannamyadhvam adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyendrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3856: (PB 21.10.21) sadassadaḥ prajāvān ṛbhur juṣāṇa indrāya devebhyo juhutā havis svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3857: (PB 21.10.22) deva tvaṣṭaḥ suretodhā adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā
GV02pncvbr1u:3858: (PB 21.10.23) āgneya ekakapāla āśvino dvikapālo vaiṣṇavas trikapālaḥ saumyaś catuṣkapālaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3859: sāvitraḥ pañcakapālo dhātraḥ ṣaṭkapālo mārūtaḥ saptakapālo bārhaspatyo 'ṣṭākapālo
GV02pncvbr1u:3860: maitro navakapālo vārūṇo daśakapāla aindra ekādaśakapālo vaiśvadevo dvādaśakapālaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3861: (PB 21.11.1) trivṛta prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3862: pañcadaśaṃ prātassavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3863: sokthaṃ saptadaśaṃ prātassavanam ekaviṃśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ triṇavaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3864: soktham ekaviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3865: pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3866: (PB 21.11.2) vasiṣṭhaḥ putrahato hīna ivāmanyata sa etam apaśyat so 'graṃ paryaid yo hīna iva manyeta sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3867: (PB 21.11.3) yat stomāt stomam abhisaṃkrāmaty agrād evāgraṃ rohati vasiṣṭhasya janitre bhavataḥ prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3869: (PB 21.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa uktha ekaviṃśo 'tirātro viśvāmitrasya sañjayaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3870: (PB 21.12.2) jahnuvṛcīvanto rāṣṭra āhiṃsanta sa viśvāmitro jāhnavo rājaitam apaśyat sa rāṣṭram abhavad arāṣṭram itare
GV02pncvbr1u:3872: (PB 21.12.4) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3874: (PB 21.12.6) jyotiḥ prajānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3875: (PB 21.12.7) catuṣṭomo vā eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3876: (PB 21.12.8) ekaviṃśaṃ stomā nātiyanti pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3877: (PB 21.13.1) dve trivṛtī savane pañcadaśam ekaṃ dve pañcadaśe savane saptadaśam ekaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3878: dve saptadaśe savane ekaviṃśam ekaṃ dve ekaviṃśe savane triṇavam ekaṃ dve triṇave
GV02pncvbr1u:3879: savane trayastriṃśam ekaṃ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe
GV02pncvbr1u:3881: (PB 21.13.2) devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta te na vyajayanta te 'bruvan vāco mithunena
GV02pncvbr1u:3882: vijayāmahai yatare no vāco mithunaṃ na prativindāṃs te parā bhavān iti te devā eka
GV02pncvbr1u:3883: ity abruvann ekety asurā vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindan dvāv iti devā abruvan dve ity
GV02pncvbr1u:3884: asurā vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindanaṃs traya iti devā abruvaṃs tisra ity asurā vāco
GV02pncvbr1u:3885: mithunaṃ pratyavindaṃś catvāra iti devā abruvaṃś catastra ity asurā vāco mithunaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3886: pratyavindan pañceti devā abruvan nāsurā avindaṃs tato devā abhavan parāsurāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3887: (PB 21.13.3) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3888: (PB 21.13.4) saṃvatsaraṃ vā eṣāṃ tad vīryam annādyam avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:3889: (PB 21.13.5) saṃvatsaraṃ vīryam annādyaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3890: (PB 21.13.6) pañcarātro vā eṣa pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3891: (PB 21.13.7) āstharir vā eṣa santato yajño dvau dvau hi stomāv ahar vahato yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenābhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3892: (PB 21.13.8) yatra yatra hy asthūriṇā kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3895: (PB 21.14.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa ukthaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśo 'tirātraḥ pañcaśāradīyo marutāṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3896: (PB 21.14.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3897: (PB 21.14.3) marūto vai devānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhā bahur eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3898: (PB 21.14.4) saptadaśaṃ stomā nātiyanti prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3899: (PB 21.14.5) agastyo vai marūdbhya ukṣṇaḥ praukṣat tān indrāyābadhnāt te vajram ādāyābhyapatan sa etat kayāśubhīyam apaśyat tenāśamayat
GV02pncvbr1u:3901: (PB 21.14.7) saptadaśa pṛśnīn ukṣṇaḥ pañcavarṣān saptadaśa pṛśnīs trivatsā apravītās tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitānetarā labhante pretarān sṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3902: (PB 21.14.8) tataḥ saṃvatsare navanītapṛśnīr arūṇā ānayanti tāṃś caivokṣṇas tān paryagnikṛtān
GV02pncvbr1u:3903: prokṣitān etarā labhante pretarān sṛjanti tataḥ saṃvatsare rājīvā ānayanti tāṃś caivokṣṇas
GV02pncvbr1u:3904: tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitān etarā labhante pretarān sṛjanti tataḥ saṃvatsare piśaṅgīr
GV02pncvbr1u:3905: ānayanti tāṃś caivokṣṇas tān paryagnikṛtān prokṣitān etarā labhante pretarān sṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3906: tataḥ saṃvatsare sāraṅgīr ānayanti tāṃś caivokṣṇas tān paryagnikṛtān pokṣitān etarā
GV02pncvbr1u:3912: (PB 21.14.13) yadi rūdro 'bhimanyotāgnaye rūdravate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3913: (PB 21.14.14) yadi saṃśīryaita bhaumam ekakapālaṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3914: (PB 21.14.15) yady avasīder nairṛtaṃ caruṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta yady apsu mriyetāponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta yady andhasyāt sauryaṃ caruṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3915: (PB 21.14.16) yadi ślavaṇo vā kuṭo vā syād bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nipyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3916: (PB 21.14.17) yadi palāyeta vāyavyaṃ caruṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3917: (PB 21.14.18) yadi prāsahājayeyur indrāya prasahvana ekādaśakapālaṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3918: (PB 21.14.19) yady anyena mṛtyunā mriyeta prājāpatyaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirūpyāthānyam ālabheta
GV02pncvbr1u:3919: (PB 21.14.20) etena vā ekayāvā gāndamo vetasvatīṣṭvā sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot
GV02pncvbr1u:3920: (PB 21.14.21) sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3921: (PB 21.15.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaur ukthyo mahāvrataṃ gaur ukthya āyur atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3922: (PB 21.15.2) saṃvatsaro vai vrataṃ tasya vasanta ṛtur mukhaṃ grīṣmaś ca varṣāś ca pakṣau śaran madhyaṃ hemantaḥ puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:3923: (PB 21.15.3) tasmāc charadam oṣadhayo 'bhisampacyante śarad dhi madhyaṃ saṃvatsarasya
GV02pncvbr1u:3924: (PB 21.15.4) akṛtaṃ vā ete kurvanti ye purā saṃvatsarāt vratam upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3925: (PB 21.15.5) etad vai vratam āptaṃ yat pañcarātre pañca hy ṛtavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3926: (PB 21.15.6) āptena vratena stute sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3928: (PB 22.1.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta praty eva tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3929: (PB 22.1.3) ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitena pratitiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3930: (PB 22.1.4) pratyakṣaṃ hy etenartava ārdhnuvann ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3931: (PB 22.2.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyaḥ saptadaśa ukthyo jyotir gaur āyur atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3932: (PB 22.2.2) yaḥ kāmayeta sarvam āyur iyām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:3933: (PB 22.2.3) yat tryahaḥ purastād bhavati trayaḥ prāṇāpānavyānās ta eva tat saṃdhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3934: (PB 22.2.4) atha yat jyotir gaur āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:3936: (PB 22.3.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tatsatreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:3937: (PB 22.3.3) sattram iva vā etad yad anulomaṃ pṛṣṭhāni yad ekadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavanty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tad ojo vīryaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3943: (PB 22.4.2) sapta ṛṣaya etenārdhnuvaṃs tenarddhis tasmād etena yajanta ṛddhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3944: (PB 22.4.3) sapta śirasi prāṇāḥ prāṇā indriyāṇīndriyāṇy evaitenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3946: (PB 22.4.5) vrataṃ saptamasyāhnaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati tad dhy anāptam annaṃ vai vratam annādyam evaitenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3948: (PB 22.4.7) pratyakṣaṃ hy etena sapta ṛṣaya ārdhnuvann ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3950: (PB 22.5.2) tasya trivṛc chiraḥ pañcadaśau pakṣau saptadaśa ātmaikaviṃśaṃ puccham
GV02pncvbr1u:3952: (PB 22.5.4) pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3953: (PB 22.5.5) saptadaśo vai prajāpatir yat saptadaśaṃ vrataṃ bhavati prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3954: (PB 22.5.6) yat trivṛc chiro bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva prati tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3956: (PB 22.5.8) saptadaśa ātmā bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajā patim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3961: (PB 22.6.4) yac chadomāḥ pavamānā mahāvratasya bhavanti paśūnevāvarūndhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3962: (PB 22.6.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3963: (PB 22.7.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho 'tha trayastriṃśām ahas tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3964: saptadaśaṃ mahāvratam atirātras tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛc chiraḥ pañcadaśau
GV02pncvbr1u:3966: (PB 22.7.2) etena vai jamadagniḥ sarvān poṣān apuṣyat sarvān evaitena poṣān puṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:3967: (PB 22.7.3) yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati santatyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3968: (PB 22.7.4) athaitat trayastriṃśam ahas trayastriṃśad devatā devatā evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3969: (PB 22.7.5) tasya catustriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3970: (PB 22.7.6) caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati mahāvratasya caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3971: (PB 22.7.7) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3972: (PB 22.7.8) yat trivṛc chiro bhavati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati yat pañcadaśau
GV02pncvbr1u:3973: pakṣau savīvadhatvāya saptadaśa ātmā bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim
GV02pncvbr1u:3975: (PB 22.8.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo viśvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvajid agniṣṭomaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3976: (PB 22.8.2) etena vā indro 'ty ānyā devatā abhavad aty anyā prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:3977: (PB 22.8.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3978: (PB 22.8.4) athābhijid abhijitā vai devā imān lokān abhyajayan viśvajitā viśvam ajayan sarvajitā sarvam ajayan
GV02pncvbr1u:3979: (PB 22.8.5) sarvastomātirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:3980: (PB 22.9.1) catvāri trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhāni viśvajin mahāvrataṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3981: (PB 22.9.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata sa sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyam agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:3983: (PB 22.9.4) śiro vā agre sambhavataḥ sambhavati caturdhā vihitaṃ vai śiraḥ prāṇaś cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgātmā vai pṛṣṭhāni yat pṛṣṭhāny upaiti śira evātmānam anusandadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3984: (PB 22.9.5) etad vai purūṣam akas tasmā annam eva vratam apidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:3985: (PB 22.9.6) atha yat jyotiṣṭomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3987: (PB 22.10.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3988: yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattraṃ sattram iva vā etad yad anulomaṃ pṛṣṭhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:3989: yadaikadhā pṛṣṭhāni bhavaty ekadhaivāsmiṃs tejo vīryaṃ dadhāty annaṃ pṛṣṭhāny annādyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3990: evāsmin dadhāti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:3991: (PB 22.10.3) yad vai manuṣyāṇāṃ pratyakṣaṃ taddevānāṃ parokṣamatha yanma manuṣyāṇāṃ parokṣaṃ taddevānāṃ pratyakṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:3992: (PB 22.10.4) etad vai parokṣaṃ vrataṃ yad viśvajit pratyakṣam evaitenānnādyam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:3996: (PB 22.11.4) etad vai vratam āptaṃ yad aṣṭarātre 'gniṣṭomo hi vrataṃ sampadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3997: (PB 22.11.5) atha yat jyotiṣṭhomo 'tirātro bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4000: (PB 22.12.1) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho jyotir gaur āyur atirātro devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etena navarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4001: (PB 22.12.2) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4002: (PB 22.12.3) sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4003: (PB 22.12.4) navarātro vā eṣa nava prāṇāḥ prāṇeṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4004: (PB 22.12.5) pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho bhavati pratyakṣam ṛddhayā atha yat jyotir gaur āyur atirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:4005: (PB 22.13.1) jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭhomo gaur ukthya āyur ukthyo 'bhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4006: (PB 22.13.2) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ purastād bhavati prajñātān stomānupaitīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4007: (PB 22.13.3) atha yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho madhyato bhavati pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4009: (PB 22.14.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyas trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭoma
GV02pncvbr1u:4010: ekaviṃśa ukthyaḥ saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomas triṇavo 'gniṣṭomas trayastriṃśa ukthyas triṇavo
GV02pncvbr1u:4012: (PB 22.14.2) indro 'surān hatvākāryaṃ cakṛvāṃ amanyata taṃ devā etena stomenāyājayan sa pāpmano nairdaśyam agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4013: (PB 22.14.3) tasmād iṣuhato vā daṇḍahato vā daśamīṃ nairdaśyaṃ gacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:4014: (PB 22.14.4) daśa daśinī vā eṣā virāḍ annaṃ virāḍ annādyam evāsmin dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4015: (PB 22.14.5) agniṣṭomena vai devā asurān nigṛhya madhyata ukthaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyantāgniṣṭomenaiva bhrātṛvyaṃ nigṛhya madhyata ukthyaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4017: (PB 22.14.7) trikakup samānānāṃ ca prajānāṃ ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4018: (PB 22.15.1) trayastrivṛto 'gniṣṭomās trayaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyās trayaḥ saptadaśa ukthyā ekaviṃśo 'tirātraḥ kusuruvindadaśarātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4019: (PB 22.15.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4020: (PB 22.15.3) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomo bahur eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4021: (PB 22.15.4) saha trivṛta saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4024: (PB 22.15.7) jyotiṣ prajānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4025: (PB 22.15.8) catuṣṭomo vā eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4026: (PB 22.15.9) ekaviṃśaṃ stomā nātiyanti pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśaḥ praty eva tiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:4027: (PB 22.15.10) etena vai kusurūvinda auddālakir iṣṭvā bhūmānam āśnuta
GV02pncvbr1u:4029: (PB 22.16.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaś catvāraś chandomaḥ viśvajid atirātraḥ paśukāmo yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:4030: (PB 22.16.2) yad abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāhaḥ purastād bhavati pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4031: (PB 22.16.3) chandomā madhyato bhavanti paśavo vai chandomāḥ paśūnām avarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4033: (PB 22.17.1) triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo jyotir ukthyas triṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo gaurukthyo 'bhijid agniṣṭomo gaur ukthyo viśvajid agniṣṭoma āyur ukthyo viśvajid agniṣṭomasya sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4034: (PB 22.17.2) devā vā asurair hanyamānās te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etāṃ devapuraṃ prāyacchat tāṃ prāviśan
GV02pncvbr1u:4035: (PB 22.17.3) abhicāryamāṇaṃ yājayed etām eva devapuraṃ praviśaty asṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4036: (PB 22.18.1) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayaś chandomāś catuṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo viśvajid atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4041: (PB 22.18.6) ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavatas tad dhi svārājyam ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad
GV02pncvbr1u:4042: dhi svārājyaṃ ṣaḍviṃśastomo bhavati sa hi svārājyaṃ catuṣṭomastomaḥ sa hy anto 'nte
GV02pncvbr1u:4044: (PB 22.18.7) etena vai kṣema dhṛtvā pauṇḍarīkaṃ iṣṭvā sudāmnas tīra uttare
GV02pncvbr1u:4045: (PB 22.18.8) sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvāmṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:4046: (PB 23.1.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomo 'tirātraś catvāraś chandomā atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4047: (PB 23.1.2) eṣa vā āpto dvādaśāho yat trayodaśarātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4048: (PB 23.1.3) samāno hy eṣa yat prayaṇīyaś codayanīyaś cātirātrau kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etābhir abhyaśnuvate
GV02pncvbr1u:4049: (PB 23.1.4) gṛhapates tu vāg upadāsukā bhavati tad yan madhye sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati tena gṛhapater vāg anupadāsukā bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4050: (PB 23.1.5) etā vā aryalagṛhapataya ārūṇihotāraḥ subhagāsūpayanti te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4051: (PB 23.2.1) atirātro dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4052: (PB 23.2.2) vāg vā eṣā pratāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tāṃ vicchindyur yan madhye 'tirātraṃ kuryuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4053: (PB 23.2.3) yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti na vācaṃ vicchindanty āpnuvanti trayodaśaṃ māsam
GV02pncvbr1u:4054: (PB 23.2.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitās trayodaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4055: (PB 23.3.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4057: (PB 23.3.3) virāḍh ḍhi daśātmaikādaśī prajā dvādaśī paśavas trayodaśī kāmāya caturdaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:4059: (PB 23.3.5) etā vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad etau trayastriṃśau madhyataḥ saṃdhīyete tena bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ rohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4060: (PB 23.3.6) dviḥ pṛṣṭhāny upayanty abhipūrvam evaitābhir annādyaṃ dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4061: (PB 23.4.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhya ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4062: (PB 23.4.2) yāṃs talpe vodake vā vivāhe vā mīmāṃseraṃs ta etā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4063: (PB 23.4.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātāṃ stomān upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4064: (PB 23.4.4) imān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhānti
GV02pncvbr1u:4065: (PB 23.4.5) atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty eṣu vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4067: (PB 23.4.7) atha yad āyur gaur jyotir atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4068: (PB 23.5.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4069: (PB 23.5.2) yad gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī bhavato mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4070: (PB 23.5.3) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4071: (PB 23.5.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāś caturdaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4072: (PB 23.6.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho mahāvrataṃ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4073: (PB 23.6.2) etābhir vai devā devatvam agacchan devatvaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4074: (PB 23.6.3) etad vai devānāṃ sattraṃ tad adyāpi devāḥ sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:4075: (PB 23.6.4) paurṇamāsy atirātro 'tha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha ekāṣṭakā mahāvratam atha yāni ṣaḍ ahāni sa pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho 'māvāsyātirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4076: (PB 23.6.5) tasmāt tarhi manuṣyāṇāṃ na suto devānāṃ hi tarhi sutaḥ pratyakṣam evaitābhir devatā abhyārohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4077: (PB 23.6.6) pratinodāt tu bhayyam itaram anupakṣo dīkṣerann apratinodāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4078: (PB 23.7.1) atirātras trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaha āyur gaur jyotir atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4081: (PB 23.7.4) yat trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo bhavati brahma tad yaśasārdhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:4083: (PB 23.7.6) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajñātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv
GV02pncvbr1u:4084: eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanty atha yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍaho madhyato bhavaty annaṃ vai pṛṣṭāny
GV02pncvbr1u:4085: annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoty atha yad āyur gaur
GV02pncvbr1u:4086: jyotir atirātro yeneto yanti tena punar āyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4087: (PB 23.8.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4088: (PB 23.8.2) anyasmai vai kāmāya sattram anyasmai yajño na tat sattreṇāpnoti yasmaikaṃ yajño na tad yajñenāpnoti yasmaikaṃ sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:4089: (PB 23.8.3) yad anyato 'tirātrās tena yajño 'tha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni tena sattram
GV02pncvbr1u:4091: (PB 23.9.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ prajākāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4092: (PB 23.9.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata pra prajayā pra paśubhir jāyante ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4093: (PB 23.9.3) yat jyotir gaur āyus tryahaḥ prajātān stomān upayantīmān eva lokān eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4094: (PB 23.9.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4095: (PB 23.9.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ pañcadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4097: (PB 23.10.2) etābhir vā indraḥ paramāṃ vijitiṃ vyajayata paramām evaitābhir vijitiṃ vijayante
GV02pncvbr1u:4098: (PB 23.10.3) pañcadaśo vai vajro na vā agṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti yā ṣoḍaśy ārambhaṇam eva tad gṛhītena vajreṇa vīryaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4099: (PB 23.11.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyur gaur āyuḥ pañcāho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4100: (PB 23.11.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantāṃ śriyam ajayad anantā vā etā yat pañcāhavidhāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4102: (PB 23.11.4) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4103: (PB 23.11.5) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāḥ saptadaśa rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4105: (PB 23.12.2) devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etenāṣṭādaśarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4106: (PB 23.12.3) etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4107: (PB 23.12.4) sarvam āyur yanti vasīyāṃso bhavanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4108: (PB 23.12.5) dvir vā etā nava nava prāṇā abhipūrvam evaitābhir āyur dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4110: (PB 23.13.2) etābhir vai vāyur āraṇyānāṃ paśunām ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4112: (PB 23.13.4) etābhir vā āraṇyāḥ paśavo nākṛtāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4113: (PB 23.13.5) anākṛtam eṣāṃ prajāyate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4114: (PB 23.14.1) atrirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'bhijic ca viśvajic ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4115: (PB 23.14.2) purūṣakāmā upeyur etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ purūṣam asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:4116: (PB 23.14.3) sa sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyam agacchat sarvasyānnādyasyādhipatyaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4118: (PB 23.14.5) viṃśo vai purūṣo daśa hi hastyā aṅgulyo daśa pādyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4119: (PB 23.14.6) yad etā viṃśatī rātrayo bhavanty eṣv evaitābhir lokeṣu purūṣaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4120: (PB 23.14.7) etā vai pratiṣṭhitā viṃśatī rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4121: (PB 23.15.1) atirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4122: (PB 23.15.2) etābhir vā ādityāḥ sapta grāmyān paśūn udasṛjanta paśūn evaitābhir utsṛjanti (utsṛjante)
GV02pncvbr1u:4125: (PB 23.15.5) ādityā asmiṃl loke ṛddhā ādityā amuṣmin
GV02pncvbr1u:4127: (PB 23.15.7) ubhayor anayor lokayor ṛdhnuvanti devaloke ca manuṣyaloke ca ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4128: (PB 23.16.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇo 'tirātro brahmavarcasakāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4129: (PB 23.16.2) svarbhānur vā āsuraḥ sūryaṃ tamasāvidhyat tasmai devāḥ prāyaścittim aicchaṃs ta etā avindaṃs tābhir asmāt tamo 'pāghnan
GV02pncvbr1u:4130: (PB 23.16.3) apa tamo ghnate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4132: (PB 23.16.5) somo vai brāhmaṇaḥ paśavaḥ pūṣā svām eva tad devatāṃ paśubhir baṃhayante tvacam evākrata
GV02pncvbr1u:4134: (PB 23.16.7) manur vai yat kiṃ cāvadat tad bheṣajaṃ bheṣajatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4136: (PB 23.16.9) tad dhy eṣa prati tejiṣṭhaṃ tapati
GV02pncvbr1u:4137: (PB 23.16.10) kilāsatvāt tu bhayam ati hy ebhyo 'pahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4138: (PB 23.16.11) etā vā ugradevo rājanir upait sa kilāso 'bhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:4139: (PB 23.16.12) akilāso bhavati ya evaṃ vidvānetā upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:4140: (PB 23.17.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cānnādyakāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4141: (PB 23.17.2) pañcartavo dvādaśa māsās traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśo 'nnaṃ dvāviṃśam ebhyo lokebhyaḥ saṃvatsarād amuṣmād ādityād annādyam avarundhate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4142: (PB 23.18.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyur gaur āyuḥ pañcāho 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4143: (PB 23.18.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhat
GV02pncvbr1u:4144: (PB 23.18.3) yad etās trayoviṃśatī rātrayo bhavanti traya ime lokā eṣv evaitābhir lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4145: (PB 23.18.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitās trayoviṃśatī rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4146: (PB 23.19.1) atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ stomaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśam ahar aniruktam upahavyasya
GV02pncvbr1u:4147: tantre kḷpta tasya kaṇvarathantaraṃ madhyandine 'tha trayastriṃśa niruktaṃ triṇavaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4148: dve ekaviṃśe triṇavaṃ trayastriṃśam ahar niruktaṃ trayastriṃśam ahar aniruktam pṛṣṭhayaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4149: stomaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pratyaṅ trivṛd ahar aniruktaṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomo 'tirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4150: (PB 23.19.2) etābhir vai devāḥ svarge loke samasīdan svarge loke sīdāmety etāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4151: (PB 23.19.3) etā vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapo yad ete trayastiṃśā madhyataḥ saṃdhīyante tena bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ rohanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4152: (PB 23.19.4) madhyataḥ pṛṣṭhāny upayanty annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4155: (PB 23.19.7) pra prajayā pra paśubhirjāyante ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4156: (PB 23.19.8) apaśavyaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad acchandomaṃ yat saptāhās tena chandomavatyas tena paśavyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4157: (PB 23.19.9) trayastriṃśas trayastriṃśam anveti trivṛt trivṛtam agrād agraṃ rohanti yat trayastriṃśas trayastriṃśam anveti prāṇāt prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4159: (PB 23.19.11) vilomāno vā etā rātrayo yat jyotir agniṣṭoma utthānīyam ahar bhavaty akḷptasya kḷptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4160: (PB 23.20.1) atirātro dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ prajākāmā vā paśukāmā vopeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4161: (PB 23.20.2) kḷptādvai yoneḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ prajāyante yat kḷptau ṣaḍahāv upayanti kḷptādeva yoneḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4162: (PB 23.20.3) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4163: (PB 23.20.4) etā vai pratiṣṭhitāś caturviṃśatī rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4165: (PB 23.21.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ sarvam annādyam avārūndha
GV02pncvbr1u:4166: (PB 23.21.3) caturviṃśatiḥ saṃvatsarasyārdhamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ pañcaviṃśo 'nnaṃ vrataṃ saṃvatsarād etābhir annādyam avarūndhate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4167: (PB 23.22.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍāhau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4168: (PB 23.22.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4169: (PB 23.22.3) ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitābhiḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4170: (PB 23.22.4) yad gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī bhavato mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4171: (PB 23.22.5) yat kḷptau ṣaḍahāv upayanti kḷptyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4172: (PB 23.22.6) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4173: (PB 23.22.7) etā vai pratiṣṭhitā ṣaḍviṃśatī rātrayaḥ pratitiṣṭhanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4174: (PB 23.23.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātra ṛddhikāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4175: (PB 23.23.2) etābhir vai nakṣatrāṇi sarvāmṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4176: (PB 23.23.3) yad etā saptaviṃśatī rātrayo bhavanti saptaviṃśatir nakṣatrāṇi nakṣatrasammitā vā etā rātrayo nakṣatrāṇām evardhim ṛdhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4177: (PB 23.24.1) etā eva samahāvratāḥ paśukāmā upeyur yad etā aṣṭāviṃśatī rātrayo bhavanty aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśa evaitābhiḥ paśūn avarūndhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4178: (PB 23.25.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyur gaur āyuḥ pañcāho dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4179: (PB 23.25.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantāṃ śriyam ajayat
GV02pncvbr1u:4180: (PB 23.25.3) anantā vā etā yā ekayānatriṃśann eti vai vāco 'nantam
GV02pncvbr1u:4181: (PB 23.25.4) yad etā ekayānatriṃśad rātrayo bhavanty anantām evaitābhiḥ śriyaṃ jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4182: (PB 23.26.1) atirātras trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātro 'nnādyakāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4183: (PB 23.26.2) parokṣam anyāni sattrāṇi virājaṃ sampadyante pratyakṣam etā virājaṃ sampannāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4184: (PB 23.26.3) pratyakṣam etābhir annādyam avarūndhate ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4185: (PB 23.27.1) etā eva samahāvratā etābhir vai prajāpatir abhipūrvam annādyam avārūndha
GV02pncvbr1u:4188: (PB 23.28.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4195: (PB 23.28.8) tasmāt te vācā siddhā vācāhūtā ā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4196: (PB 24.1.1) atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā viśvajid atirātra ekaḥ pañcāho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4197: (PB 24.1.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs tā etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhann
GV02pncvbr1u:4198: ime lokā na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4199: (PB 24.1.3) arūpeṇa vā etāḥ sarūpā arūpeṇa prajāḥ sarūpā arūpeṇeme lokāḥ sarūpā yad rathantarasya lokaṃ bṛhad āpadyate bṛhato rathantaram arūpeṇaivaibhyas tat sarūpaṃ prajanayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4200: (PB 24.1.4) lupyate vā etat ṣaṣṭham ahar yat pañcāhān upayanti nartavaḥ kalpanteḥ yat pṛṣṭhayaḥ ṣaḍahas tena ṣaṣṭham ahar na lupyate tenartavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4201: (PB 24.1.5) atha yāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni tena pañcāhebhyo na yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4202: (PB 24.1.6) ūdhar vā antarikṣaṃ stanāv abhito 'nena vā eṣa devebhyo dugdhe 'munā prajābhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4203: (PB 24.1.7) idaṃ vā antarikṣaṃ viyad imau stanāv abhitaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4205: (PB 24.1.9) triṃśati trayaḥ paro ye devā barhir āsata vyann aha dvitā taneti
GV02pncvbr1u:4209: (PB 24.1.13) trayastriṃśad devatā etābhir ārdhnuvaṃs tenardhis tasmād etābhir yajanta ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4210: (PB 24.1.14) nānā brahmasāmāny upayanty ahnā nānā vīryatāyai nānaiva vīryāṇy avarūndhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4211: (PB 24.2.1) atirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tirātro 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirāś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4212: (PB 24.2.2) ādityāś cāṅgirasaś caitat sattraṃ samadadhatādityānām ekaviṃśatir aṅgirasāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4213: dvādaśāha ādityā asmiṃl loka ṛddhā ādityā amuṣminn aṅgiraso 'sminn aṅgiraso 'muṣmin
GV02pncvbr1u:4214: dvayaṃ sattraṃ yāvad dvayena sattreṇardhnuvanti tāvaty etāsām ṛddhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4215: (PB 24.3.1) atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā viśvajid atirātras trayaḥ pañcāhā atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4216: (PB 24.3.2) apaśavyaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad acchandomaṃ yadviśvajiti chandomān upayanti tena chandomavatyas tena paśavyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4217: (PB 24.3.3) pakṣiṇyo vā etā rātrayo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etābhir abhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:4218: (PB 24.3.4) trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtodyanti prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ prāṇair eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4219: (PB 24.4.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cardhikāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4220: (PB 24.4.2) etābhir vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4221: (PB 24.4.3) yad etāś catustriṃśad rātrayo bhavanti trayastriṃśad devatāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpater evardhim ṛdhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4222: (PB 24.5.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyuḥ pañcāhas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4223: (PB 24.5.2) yad etāḥ pañcātriṃśad rātrayo bhavanti pāṅktāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evaitābhir avarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4224: (PB 24.6.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4225: (PB 24.6.2) etābhir vai devā ādityam astabhnuvann ādityalokaṃ jayanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4226: (PB 24.6.3) bṛhatī vā etā rātrayaḥ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī yo vai paśūnāṃ bhūmānaṃ gacchati sa svārājyaṃ gacchati pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4228: (PB 24.7.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir ubhau kāmāv avārūndhānnaṃ vrataṃ paśavo bṛhaty ubhāv evaitābhiḥ kāmāv avarūndhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4229: (PB 24.8.1) atirātro gauś cāyuś ca dve ahanī catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ paśukāmā upeyuḥ spaṣṭo 'rthaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4230: (PB 24.8.2) yad etā aṣṭātriṃśad rātrayo bhavanty aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ śaphaśa evaitābhiḥ paśun avarūndhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4231: (PB 24.9.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4232: (PB 24.9.2) etābhir vai prajāpatir anantā śriyam ajayad anantā vā etā yā ekayānacatvāriṃśan neti vai vāco 'nantam
GV02pncvbr1u:4233: (PB 24.9.3) yad etā ekayānacatvāriṃśad rātrayo bhavanty anantām evaitābhiḥ śriyaṃ jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4235: (PB 24.10.2) sarvā vā etā virājo daśinī prathamā viṃśinī dvitīyā triṃśinī tṛtīyaiṣā vai paramā virāṭ yac catvāriṃśad rātrayaḥ paṅktir vai paramā
GV02pncvbr1u:4237: (PB 24.11.1) atirātras trīṇi trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhāny atirātro daśa pañcadaśā
GV02pncvbr1u:4238: ukthyāḥ ṣoḍaśimad daśamam ahar atirātro dvādaśa saptadaśā ukthyā atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhayaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4240: (PB 24.11.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā avidhṛtā asañjānānā anyonyām ādaṃs tena
GV02pncvbr1u:4241: prajāpatir aśocat sa etā apaśyat tato vā idaṃ vyāvartata gāvo 'bhavann aśvā aśvāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4243: (PB 24.11.3) vi pāpmanā vartante ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4244: (PB 24.11.4) yad atirātrā antarā vidhṛtyai tasmān netara itarasmin reto dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4245: (PB 24.11.5) yat pṛṣṭhyāḥ stomāḥ sa sṛṣṭās tasmād ajāvayaḥ paśūnāṃ saha caranti tasmād u gardabho vaḍavāyā reto dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:4246: (PB 24.11.6) apaśavyaṃ vā etat sattraṃ yad acchandomaṃ yat sandhiṣāmasu chandāṃsy upayanti tena chandomavatyas tena paśavyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4247: (PB 24.11.7) gāyatrīṣu jarābodhīyam uṣṇikṣu śrudhyam anuṣṭupsu nānadaṃ bṛhatīṣu rathantaraṃ paṅktiṣu rāyovājīyaṃ triṣṭupsv auśanaṃ jagatīṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:4249: (PB 24.11.9) prāṇo vai svaro yat svarāv antato bhavatas tasmāt dvāv antataḥ prāṇau
GV02pncvbr1u:4250: (PB 24.12.1) atirātrau dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau gauś cāyuś cātirātrau dvāv abhiplavau
GV02pncvbr1u:4251: ṣaḍahāv abhijic ca viśvajic catirātrāv eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sarvastomaś ca nava
GV02pncvbr1u:4252: saptadaśaś cātirātro dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4254: (PB 24.12.3) yamevaiṣā śrīr bhavati ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4255: (PB 24.12.4) etābhir vā ādityā dvandvam ārdhnuvan mitraś ca varūṇaś ca dhātā cāryamā cāṃśaś ca bhagaś cendraś ca vivasvāś caitāsām eva devatānām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4257: (PB 24.12.6) aṣṭau putrāso aditer ye jātās tanvaṃ pari devā upaprait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyad iti
GV02pncvbr1u:4258: (PB 24.12.7) ādityā asmiṃl loka ṛddhā ādityā amuṣminn ubhayor anayor lokayor ṛdhnuvanti devaloke ca manuṣyaloke ca ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4259: (PB 24.13.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sarvastomo 'tirātro dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4260: (PB 24.13.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa rūkṣo 'bhavat taṃ rūkṣaṃ nājanan sa ā cāṅktābhi cāṅkta
GV02pncvbr1u:4261: (PB 24.13.3) ya ātmānaṃ neva jānīraṃs ta etā upeyur yadā cāñjate 'bhi cāñjate śubham evātman dadhate jānanty enān
GV02pncvbr1u:4262: (PB 24.13.4) gauggulavena prātassavane saugandhikena mādhyandine savane paitudāraveṇa tṛtīyasavane
GV02pncvbr1u:4263: (PB 24.13.5) agnir vai devānāṃ hautram upaiṣyañ charīram adhūnuta tasya yanmāṃ samāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:4264: tad guggulv abhavadyat snāva tat sugandhitejanaṃ yad asthi tat potudārv etāni vai
GV02pncvbr1u:4266: (PB 24.14.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā abhijit
GV02pncvbr1u:4267: trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno viśvajid eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaha
GV02pncvbr1u:4268: āyuś ca gauś ca dve āhanī dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca saṃvatsarasam
GV02pncvbr1u:4269: mitā yāvatī saṃvatsarasyarddhis tāvaty etāsām ṛddhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4270: (PB 24.14.2) tad āhur yac caturviṃśam ahaḥ prayaṇīyaṃ kuryuḥ saṃvatsaram ārabhya na samāpayeyur iti trivṛd eva kāryaṃ prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān
GV02pncvbr1u:4271: (PB 24.14.3) atho khalv āhuś caturviṃśam eva kāryaṃ samṛdhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4272: (PB 24.14.4) athaite svarasāmānaḥ śiro vai divākīrtyaṃ prāṇāḥ svarasāmāno yad divākīrtyam abhitaḥ svarasāmāno bhavanti śirasyeva tat prāṇā dhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4273: (PB 24.14.5) atha yāvantyau prāṇau tau viśvajid abhijitāv athaite goāyuṣī mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4274: (PB 24.14.6) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4275: (PB 24.14.7) athaitad vratam annaṃ vai vrata na vā anyatra mukhād annaṃ dhinoti yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti mukhata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4276: (PB 24.14.8) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4277: (PB 24.15.1) atirātro nava trivṛnty ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaṣ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy
GV02pncvbr1u:4278: ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato nava pañcadaśāny ahāny agniṣṭomam ukhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4279: ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato nava saptadaśāny
GV02pncvbr1u:4280: ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita ukthyaṃ madhyato
GV02pncvbr1u:4281: navaikaviṃśāny ahāny agniṣṭomamukhaḥ ṣaḍaho 'tha yāni trīṇy ahāny agniṣṭomāv abhita
GV02pncvbr1u:4282: ukthyaṃ madhyato dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4283: (PB 24.15.2) etābhir vai savitā sarvasya prasavam agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:4284: (PB 24.15.3) sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4285: (PB 24.15.4) yad gaṇaśaḥ stomā bahava eva bhavanti saha trivṛtaḥ saha pañcadaśāḥ saha saptadaśāḥ sahaikaviṃśāḥ savitur vā etāḥ kakubhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4286: (PB 24.15.5) kakubhaḥ samānānāṃ ca prajānāṃ ca bhavanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4287: (PB 24.16.1) atirātraś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā mahāvrataṃ dvāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau dvādaśāhasya daśāhāny atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4288: (PB 24.16.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etābhiḥ pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4289: (PB 24.16.3) praty eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitābhiḥ pratitiṣṭhanti yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4290: (PB 24.16.4) athaitad vratam annaṃ vai vrataṃ na vā anyatra madhyād annaṃ dhinoti yad vrataṃ madhyata upayanti madhyata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4291: (PB 24.16.5) yat kḷptau ṣaḍahāv upayanti kḷptyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4292: (PB 24.16.6) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāyāthaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4293: (PB 24.17.1) atirātraḥ ṣaḍabhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4294: (PB 24.17.2) etābhir vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4295: (PB 24.17.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etā upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4296: (PB 24.17.4) yat kḷptān ṣaḍahān upayanti kḷptyā evāthaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4297: vācam avicchinnām upayanti prajananāyāthaitad vratam athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv
GV02pncvbr1u:4298: atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4299: (PB 24.18.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4300: ṣaḍaho 'bhijit trayassvarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4301: ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇa eko 'bhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaha āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya
GV02pncvbr1u:4302: daśāhāni mahāvrataś cātirātraś ca tad etad ekaṣaṣṭirātraṃ daivānāṃ vrātyānām
GV02pncvbr1u:4303: (PB 24.18.2) daivā vai vrātyāḥ sattram āsata budhena sthapatinā te ha vā aniryācya
GV02pncvbr1u:4304: varuṇaṃ rājānaṃ devayajanaṃ didīkṣus tān ha vā varūṇo rājānu vyājahārāntar emi vo
GV02pncvbr1u:4305: yajñiyād bhāgadheyān na devayānaṃ panthānaṃ prajñāsyatheti tasmāt tebhyo na havir gṛhṇanti na graham
GV02pncvbr1u:4306: (PB 24.18.3) atha ha vai tarhi nauṣadhīṣu paya āsīn na kṣīre sarpir na māṃse medo
GV02pncvbr1u:4307: na tvaci lomāni na vanaspatiṣu palāśāni tad yata etad ekaṣaṣṭirātraṃ daivā vrātyā
GV02pncvbr1u:4308: upāyaṃs tato vai tāni bhutāny etair vīryaiḥ samasṛjyanta tejasvanty evāsan payasvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4310: (PB 24.18.5) kim akarteti yat putrān muhur daivāṃ apṛcchata mahī budhasyāsīd dīkṣā sa kṣīre sarpir āharat
GV02pncvbr1u:4311: (PB 24.18.6) mahīṃ dīkṣāṃ saumāyano budho yad udayacchadanandat sarvam āpnon manmāṃse medo 'dhā iti
GV02pncvbr1u:4312: (PB 24.18.7) daridrā āsan paśavaḥ kṛśāḥ santo vyasthakāḥ saumāyanasya dīkṣāyāṃ samasṛjyanta medaseti
GV02pncvbr1u:4313: (PB 24.18.8) tad ya etad ekaṣaṣṭirātram upeyus te devayajanam adhyavasāya gārhapatya āhutiṃ juhayur deva varuṇa devayajanaṃ no dehi svāheti te datte devajane yajante
GV02pncvbr1u:4314: (PB 24.18.9) te sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4315: (PB 24.19.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryahaś caturdaśābhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4316: (PB 24.19.2) devā vai mṛtyor abibhayus te prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etena śatarātreṇāmṛtatvaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4317: prāyacchad etad vāva manuṣyasyāmṛtatvaṃ yat sarvam āyur eti vasīyān bhavati sarvam
GV02pncvbr1u:4318: āyur yanti vasīyāṃso bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4320: (PB 24.20.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4321: ṣaḍahaḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4322: ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho 'bhijit trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmāno
GV02pncvbr1u:4323: viśvajit pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4324: ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇaś catvāro 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa
GV02pncvbr1u:4325: tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthas trayo 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahā āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī dvādaśāhasya
GV02pncvbr1u:4328: (PB 25.1.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahar dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau
GV02pncvbr1u:4329: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau trivṛt pañcadaśau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa
GV02pncvbr1u:4330: caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayas trivṛt pañcadaśāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trivṛd bṛhaspatistomas
GV02pncvbr1u:4331: trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4332: pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahas trayastriṃśārambhaṇa ekaḥ pañcadaśas trivṛt ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:4333: vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛta udbhic ca balabhic ca dve ahanī dvau pañcadaśatrivṛtau
GV02pncvbr1u:4334: ṣaḍahau pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau pañcadaśatribṛtau ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4335: sa caturthaḥ pañcadaśatrivṛt ṣaḍahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ pañcadaśatrivṛt ṣaḍaho gauś
GV02pncvbr1u:4336: cāyuś ca dve ahanī chandomadaśāho 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ prathamam ahar atha catuścatvāriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4337: catvāriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ triṃśaṃ dve aṣṭāviṃśe pañcaviṃśaṃ caturviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4339: (PB 25.1.3) madhye pṛṣṭhyena vā ādityāḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramanta yan madhye pṛṣṭhāny upayanti svargasya lokasyākrāntyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4340: (PB 25.1.4) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān madhye sad annaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4342: (PB 25.1.6) cakre vā ete sākaṃvṛtīyat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:4343: (PB 25.1.7) athaiṣa trivṛd bṛhaspatistoma etena vai bṛhaspatir devānāṃ purodhām agacchat purodhakāmā upeyur gacchanti purodhāṃ pura enān dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4344: (PB 25.1.8) athaite svarasāmānaḥ śiro vai divākīrtyaṃ prāṇāḥ svarasāmāno yad divākīrtyam abhitaḥ svarasāmāno bhavanti śivasyeva tat prāṇā dhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4345: (PB 25.1.9) athaiṣa pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthya etena vā indro 'tyanyā devatā abhavad atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4346: (PB 25.1.10) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛto madhyataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4347: pāpmano mucyanta eṣa vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti pravasīyasas talpam āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4348: (PB 25.1.11) athaitāv udbhidbalabhidāv etābhyāṃ vai bṛhaspatir devebhyaḥ paśūn udasṛjat paśūn evaitābhyām utsṛjante
GV02pncvbr1u:4349: (PB 25.1.12) athaite go āyuṣī mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4350: (PB 25.1.13) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doho 'rvāñci chandāṃsy upayanti tasmād arvāñco bhuñjantaḥ paśava upatiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:4351: (PB 25.1.14) athaid vratam annaṃ vai vrataṃ na vā anyatra mukhād annaṃ dhinoti yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti mukhata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4352: (PB 25.1.15) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4353: (PB 25.2.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaś catvāras trivṛto
GV02pncvbr1u:4354: 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayas
GV02pncvbr1u:4355: trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas trivṛd bṛhaspatistomas trayaḥ svarasāmāno
GV02pncvbr1u:4356: divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthyaḥ pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahas
GV02pncvbr1u:4357: trayastriṃśārambhaṇa ekas trivṛd abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās
GV02pncvbr1u:4358: trivṛta udbhic ca balabhic ca dve ahanī catvāras trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4359: ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturtho dvau trivṛtāv abhiplavau ṣaḍahau
GV02pncvbr1u:4360: pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaha āyuś ca gauś ca dve ahanī chandomadaśāhaś caturviṃśaṃ prathamam ahar
GV02pncvbr1u:4361: dve aṣṭāviṃśe triṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ catvāriṃśaṃ catuścatvāriṃśam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4362: caturviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cāṅgirasāṃ purastāt pṛṣṭhyam
GV02pncvbr1u:4363: (PB 25.2.2) purastāt pṛṣṭhyena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramanta yat purastāt pṛṣṭhāny upayanti svargasya lokasyākrāntyai
GV02pncvbr1u:4364: (PB 25.2.3) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan mukhato dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4365: (PB 25.2.4) yad anyac cakrābhyāṃ sākavṛdbhyāṃ tatsamānam ā chandomadaśāhāt
GV02pncvbr1u:4366: (PB 25.2.5) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doha ūrdhvāni chandāṃsy upayanty anapabhraṃśāyaiṣa
GV02pncvbr1u:4367: vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanty athaitad vratam
GV02pncvbr1u:4368: (PB 25.2.6) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiṣa prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4369: (PB 25.3.1) atirātras trivṛtā māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena
GV02pncvbr1u:4370: māsaṃ triṇavena māsaṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ mahāvrataṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena
GV02pncvbr1u:4371: māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ trivṛtā māsam atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4372: (PB 25.3.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitena pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4373: (PB 25.3.3) yad gataṃ madhyata upayanti madhyata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān madhye dhinoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4374: (PB 25.3.4) pakṣi vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:4375: (PB 25.3.5) trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtodyanti prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ prāṇair eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4376: (PB 25.3.6) etad vai dṛtivātavantau khāṇdava upeto viṣuvati vātavān uttiṣṭhati samāpayati dṛtis tasmāt tanīyāṃso vātavatā bhūyāṃso dārteyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4377: (PB 25.4.1) māsaṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti te māsi somaṃ krīṇanti teṣāṃ dvādaśopasada upasadbhiś
GV02pncvbr1u:4378: caritvā somam upanahya māsam agnihotraṃ juhvati māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajante
GV02pncvbr1u:4379: māsaṃ vaiśvadevena māsaṃ varuṇapraghāsair māsaṃ sākamedhair māsaṃ śunāsīryeṇa trivṛtā
GV02pncvbr1u:4380: māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena māsam aṣṭādaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:4381: trayastriṃśāny ahāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:4382: (PB 25.4.2) agnihotraṃ daśahotā darśapūrṇamāsau caturhotā cāturmāsyāni pañcahotā saumyo 'dhvaraḥ saptahotā
GV02pncvbr1u:4383: (PB 25.4.3) ete vāva sarveṇa yajñena yajante ya etad upayanti sarva eva bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4385: (PB 25.4.5) yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ sa potā ya udgātā sa neṣṭā so 'cchāvāko yo maitrāvaruṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4386: sa brahmā sa pratihartāyaḥ prastotā sa brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sa grāvastut yaḥ pratiprasthātā
GV02pncvbr1u:4387: so 'gnīt sa unnetā gṛhapatir gṛhapatiḥ subrahmaṇyassubrahmaṇyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4388: (PB 25.5.1) saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4389: (PB 25.5.2) tat saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti tapa eva tena tapyante yat saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti punata eva tena yat saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto bhavati devalokam eva tenāpi yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4390: (PB 25.5.3) etena vai tapaścito devāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4391: (PB 25.6.1) trayastrivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarās trayaḥ pañcadaśās trayaḥ saptadaśās traya ekaviṃśāḥ prajāpater dvādaśasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4392: (PB 25.6.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4393: (PB 25.6.3) yat trayas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā bhavanti tejo brāhmavarcasaṃ trivṛt teja
GV02pncvbr1u:4394: eva brahmavarcasam avarundhate yat trayaḥ pañca daśā ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa oja eva
GV02pncvbr1u:4395: vīryam avarundhate yat trayaḥ saptadaśā annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam evāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:4396: yat traya ekaviṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4397: (PB 25.6.4) etena vai naimiśīyāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4398: (PB 25.6.5) te ha saptadaśebhya evādhyuttasthus ta u hocur yo naḥ prajāyām ṛdhyātai sa etat sattraṃ samāpayād iti tad etat samīpsanto brāhmaṇās sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:4399: (PB 25.7.1) nava trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā nava pañcadaśā nava saptadaśā navaikaviṃśāḥ śāktyānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4400: (PB 25.7.2) etena vai gaurīvitiḥ śāktas tarasapuroḍāśo yavyāvatyāṃ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4401: (PB 25.7.3) bṛhatī vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4402: (PB 25.7.4) tad etac chāktyānāṃ daśavīram eṣāṃ daśa vīrā jāyante ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4403: (PB 25.8.1) pañcaviṃśatis trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatir ekaviṃśāḥ sādhyānāṃ śatasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4404: (PB 25.8.2) sādhyā vai nāma devebhyo devāḥ pūrva āsaṃs ta etat sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:4405: tenārdhnuvaṃs te sagavaḥ sapuruṣāḥ sarva eva saha svargaṃ lokam āyann evaṃ vāva te
GV02pncvbr1u:4406: saha svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4407: (PB 25.8.3) āyur vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ śatāyuḥ puruṣo yāvad evāyus tad avarundhate na hy atyāyuṣaṃ sattram asti
GV02pncvbr1u:4408: (PB 25.8.4) tad abhyanūktā tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty ūṣā (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:4411: (PB 25.8.6) ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4413: (PB 25.9.2) etena vā agniḥ savasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4414: (PB 25.9.3) agner vai sarvam ādyaṃ sarvam eṣām ādyaṃ bhavati ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4415: (PB 25.9.4) atha yat sahasrasāvyaṃ bhavati sahasrākṣarā vai paramā virāṭ paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4418: (PB 25.10.3) yad ahar atirātro bhavati tad ahar vatsān apākurvanti saṃsthite 'tirātre sānnāyyena yajante
GV02pncvbr1u:4419: (PB 25.10.4) sānnāyyeneṣṭvādhvaryuḥ śamyāṃ parāsyati sā yatra nipatati tad gārhapatyas tataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ prakramān prakramati tad āhavanīyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4420: (PB 25.10.5) cakrīvat sadaś cakrīvad dhavirdhānaṃ cakrīvad āgnīdhram ulūkhalabudhno yūpaḥ prakṛṣya upopta eva noparavān khananti
GV02pncvbr1u:4422: (PB 25.10.7) teṣāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ goṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo bṛhatsāmā
GV02pncvbr1u:4423: (PB 25.10.8) saṃsthite goṣṭome paurṇamāsaṃ nirvapante te tam apakṣīyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsena yanti teṣām amāvāsyāyām āyuṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo
GV02pncvbr1u:4425: (PB 25.10.10) etena vai mitrāvaruṇāv imān lokān ājayatām ahorātrau vai mitrāvaruṇāv
GV02pncvbr1u:4426: ahar mitro rātrir varuṇo 'rdhamāsau vai mitrāvaruṇau ya āpūryate sa mitro yo 'pakṣīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:4427: sa varuṇaḥ sa eṣa mitro varuṇe retaḥ siñcati
GV02pncvbr1u:4428: (PB 25.10.11) sarasvatyā vai devā ādityam astabhnuvan sā nāyacchat sābhyavlīyata
GV02pncvbr1u:4429: tasmāt sā kubjimatīva taṃ bṛhatyāstabhnuvan sāyacchat tasmād bṛhatī chandasāṃ vīryavattamādityaṃ hi tayāstabhnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:4430: (PB 25.10.12) pratīpaṃ yanti na hy anvīpam aṣṭa vai pūrveṇa pakṣasā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4434: (PB 25.10.16) catuścatvāriṃśad āśvīnāni sarasvatyā vinaśanāt plakṣaḥ prāsravaṇas tāvad itaḥ svargo lokaḥ sarasvatīsammitenādhvanā svargaṃ lokaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4435: (PB 25.10.17) etena vai namī sāpyo vaideho rājāñjasā svargaṃ lokam aid añjasāgāmeti tad añjaskīyānām añjaskīyatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:4436: (PB 25.10.18) sa etad avabhṛtham abhyavaid ya eṣa uttareṇa sthūlārmaṃ hradas tad dhāsya śataṃ gāvaḥ sahasraṃ sampeduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4439: (PB 25.10.20) yadā sarvajyāniṃ jīyante 'thotthānaṃ yadā gṛhapatir mriyate 'thotthānam
GV02pncvbr1u:4441: (PB 25.10.22) plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgamyāgnaye kāmāyeṣṭiṃ nirvapante tasyām aśvāṃ ca puruṣīṃ ca dhenuke datvā
GV02pncvbr1u:4443: (PB 25.11.1) atirātras trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4444: (PB 25.11.2) etena vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4445: (PB 25.11.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4446: (PB 25.11.4) atha yat trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4447: (PB 25.12.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4449: (PB 25.12.3) yad āhur aryamṇaḥ panthā ity eṣa vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4450: (PB 25.12.4) pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4451: (PB 25.12.5) tasmād eṣo 'ruṇatama iva diva upadadṛśe 'ruṇatama iva hi panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4452: (PB 25.12.6) atha yat jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:4453: (PB 25.13.1) saṃvatsaraṃ brāhmaṇasya gā rakṣet saṃvatsaraṃ vyarṇe naitandhave 'gnim indhīta saṃvatsare parīṇahy agnīn ādadhīta
GV02pncvbr1u:4454: (PB 25.13.2) sa dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena śamyāparāsīyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:4455: (PB 25.13.3) indraś ca ruśamā cāṃśaṃ prāsyetāṃ yataro nau pūrvo bhūmiṃ paryeti sa
GV02pncvbr1u:4456: jayatīti bhūmim indraḥ paryait kurukṣetraṃ ruśamā so 'bravīd ajaiṣaṃ tv ety aham
GV02pncvbr1u:4457: eva tvām ajaiṣam itīndro 'bravīt tau deveṣv apṛcchetāṃ te devā abruvann etāvatī vāva
GV02pncvbr1u:4458: prajāpater vedir yāvat kurukṣetram iti tau na vyajayetām
GV02pncvbr1u:4459: (PB 25.13.4) sa ya āgneyenāṣṭākapālena dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ śamyāparāsyeti triplakṣān prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavaiti tad eva manuṣyebhyas tiro bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:4461: (PB 25.14.2) adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yad adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yo mānuṣy ṛddhis tāṃ tenardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4462: (PB 25.14.3) atha yat tapas tapyate yā daivī tāṃ tena
GV02pncvbr1u:4463: (PB 25.14.4) yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavaty agnimukhā vai devatā mukhata eva tad devatā
GV02pncvbr1u:4464: ṛdhnoty atho prātassavanam eva tenāpnoty atha yad aindra ekādaśakapālo bhavaty aindraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4465: vai mādhyandinaṃ savaṇaṃ mādhyandinam eva savanaṃ tenāpnoty atha yad vaiśvadevaś
GV02pncvbr1u:4466: carur bhavati vaiśvadevaṃ vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanam eva tenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:4467: (PB 25.14.5) etena vai puro devamuniḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnoti ya etad upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:4468: (PB 25.15.1) atirātrāv abhito 'gniṣṭomā madhye sarvo daśadaśī saṃvatsaro dvādaśo viṣuvān sarpasāmāni viṣuvati kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:4469: (PB 25.15.2) etena vai sarpā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhann eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4470: (PB 25.15.3) jarvaro gṛhapatiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato brahmā pṛthuśvarā daureśravasa
GV02pncvbr1u:4471: udgātā glāvaś cājagāvaś ca prastotṛpratihartārau dattastāpaso hotā śitipṛṣṭho maitrāvaruṇaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4472: takṣako vaiśāleyo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śikhānuśikhau neṣṭāpotārau aruṇa āṭocchāvākaḥ timirgho
GV02pncvbr1u:4473: daureśruto 'gnīt kautastāv adhvaryū arimejayaś ca janamejayaś cārbudo grāvas tu dajiraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4475: (PB 25.15.4) etena vai sarpā apamṛtyum ajayann apamṛtyuṃ jayanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4476: tasmāt te hitvā jīrṇāṃ tvacam atisarpanty apa hi te mṛtyum ajayan sarpā vā ādityā
GV02pncvbr1u:4477: ādityānām ivaiṣāṃ prakāśo bhavati ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4479: (PB 25.16.2) etena vai gāvaḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchan prajāyante bahavo bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4480: ya etad upayanty etena vā ādityā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad
GV02pncvbr1u:4481: upayanty etena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4482: (PB 25.16.3) para āhṇāras trasadasyuḥ paurukutso vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ kakṣīvān auśijas
GV02pncvbr1u:4483: ta etat prajātikāmāḥ sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān apuṣyann evaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4484: vāva te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān puṣyanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4485: (PB 25.17.1) atirātraḥ sahasraṃ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā atirātraḥ prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:4486: (PB 25.17.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4487: (PB 25.17.3) etad vai prajāpatir jīryā mūra upait tena jarām apāhatāpa jarāṃ ghnate ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4488: (PB 25.17.4) tad etat prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4489: (PB 25.18.1) pañca pañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ pañcadaśā pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśata ekaviṃśā viśvasṛjāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4490: (PB 25.18.2) etena vai viśvasṛja idaṃ viśvam asṛjanta yad viśvam asṛjanta tasmāt viśvasṛjaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:4491: (PB 25.18.3) viśvam enān anu prajāyate ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:4492: (PB 25.18.4) tapo gṛhapatir brahma brahmerā patny amṛtam udgātā bhūtaṃ prastotā bhaviṣyat
GV02pncvbr1u:4493: pratihartartava upagātāra ārtavāḥ sadasyāḥ satyaṃ hotartaṃ maitrāvaruṇa ojo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī
GV02pncvbr1u:4494: tviṣiś cāpacitiś ca neṣṭāpotārau yaśo 'cchāvāko 'gnir evāgnīd bhago grāvastud ūrg
GV02pncvbr1u:4495: unnetā vāk subrahmaṇyaḥ prāṇo 'dhvaryur apānaḥ pratiprasthātā diṣṭir viśāstā balaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:4496: dhruvagopam āśā haviṣyeṣy ahorātrāv idhmavāhau mṛtyuḥ śamitaite dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:4497: (PB 25.18.5) tad eṣa śloko viśvasṛjaḥ prathame sattram āsata sahasrasamaṃ prasutena yantas te ha yajñe bhuvanasya gopā hiraṇmayaḥ śakuno brahmanām
GV02pncvbr1u:4498: (PB 25.18.6) brahmaṇaḥ salokatāṃ sārṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti tad
GV02pncvbr1u:4499: etad viśvasṛjāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai viśvasṛjaḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām
